` GANGS LJONGS BOD CHOS SRID GNYIS LDAN GYI ^ RGYAL KHAB

CHEN PO'I SRID DON GYI RGYAL RABS GSAL BAR STON PA

ZLA BA 'BUM PHRAG 'CHAR BA'I RDZING BU'AM,

BLO GSAR BUNG BA DGA' BA'I ROL MTSO

ZHES BYA BA'I GLEGS BAM DANG PO

BZHUGS SO,,

GLEGS BAM DANG PO'I DKAR CHAG,

SHOG GRANGS

MCHOD BRJOD DANG, GLENG GZHI ......1-13

DEB 'DI'I NANG BOD LO DANG, SPYI LO BKOD PA RNAMS DANG GSHAM MCHAN SOGS KLOG TSUL .... 14-16

SA BCAD DANG PO, BOD KYI SNOD BCUD CHAGS TSUL DANG, BOD MI'I THUN MONG DANG THUN MONG MA

YIN PA'I SHES RIG DANG, GOMS GSHIS SOGS KYI SKOR ......17-141

SA BCAD GNYIS PA, BSTAN PA STOBS KYIS SKYONG BA GNA' DUS BOD RGYAL KHAB KYI MNGA' THANG 142-234

SA BCAD GSUM PA, BOD SIL BU'I DUS RABS ......235-262

SA BCAD BZHI PA, SOG PO CHING GE SE KH'ANG DANG, SA SKYA MCHOD YON GYI 'BREL BA BYUNG BA 263-313

SA BCAD LNGA PA, SDE SRID PHAG MO GRU PA DANG, RIN SPUNGS PA, GTZANG STOD SDE PA BCAS KYI

SKOR ......314-364

SA BCAD DRUG PA, SKYABS MGON T'A LA'I BLA MA SKU 'PHRENG DANG PO NAS, BZHI PA'I BAR

BYON TSUL ......365-396

SA BCAD BDUN PA, SKYABS MGON T'A LA'I BLA MA SKU 'PHRENG LNGA PA CHEN POS BOD LJONGS

CHAB SRID KYI SKU DBANG JI LTAR BZHES PA ......397-462

SA BCAD BRGYAD PA, T'A LA'I BLA MA SKU 'PHRENG DRUG PA, SDE SRID SANGS RGYAS RGYA MTSO DANG,

LHA BZANG KH'ANG NANG KHUL 'GAL ZLAR GYUR PA, SOG PO AO ROD 'JUN SGAR BAS BTZAN

'DZUL BYAS PA ......463-521

SA BCAD DGU PA, T'A LA'I BLA MA BDUN PA GSER KHRIR ZHABS 'KHOD DANG, BOD NANG MAN JU'I

RGYUD BSKUL THOG MA BYUNG BA, DBUS GTZANG BKA' BLON RNAMS NANG 'KHRUG DANG, SNYING STOBS

CAN GYI BOD RJE 'GYUR MED RNAM RGYAL GYI SKOR ......522-583

SA BCAD BCU PA, T'A LA'I BLA MA BRGYAD PA DANG, GOR BOD DMAG 'KHRUG SNGA PHYI BYUNG BA ...584-667

SA BCAD BCU GCIG PA, T'A LA'I BLA MA SKU 'PHRENG DGU PA DANG, BCU PA CHEN PO'I SKABS

RNAMS SO ......668-685

@001 *, ,LHAG PA'I LHA MGON PO RJE BTZUN 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS LA PHYAG 'TSAL LO, ,BGRANG YAS

BSKAL PA'I SNGON ROL NYID NAS MNGON SANGS RGYAS KYANG SNYIGS 'GRO'I NGOR, ,GRANGS MED GSUM GYIS

SRID PA MTHAR BYAS BSKAL BZANG RNAM 'DREN BZHI PA'I ZOL, ,SGYU MA'I 'GRO LA SGYU MA'I TSUL GYI BCU

GNYIS MDZAD PA SGYU MA 'PHRUL, ,YE SHES SGYU MA'I NGO MTSAR STON MKHAS SH'AKYA'I TOG DER GUS PHYAG

'TSAL, ,RGYAL KUN GSUNG GI RDO RJE'I RANG GZUGS GAR, ,GNYIS MED SNANG STONG YE SHES ROL PA'I

SPRIN, ,BRTAN PA'I 'KHOR LOR YONGS SHAR MKHYEN PA'I GTER, ,BDAG YID DVANGS MTSOR DGYES ROL

SHIS PAR MDZOD, ,RGYAL BA'I GSANG GSUM 'PHRIN LAS GCIG BSDUS PA'I, ,THUGS GSUNG SKU YI

DKYIL 'KHOR 'KHOR LO'I DPYID, ,RIGS GSUM SGYU 'PHRUL MES DBON RNAM GSUM SOGS, ,RIM BYON

CHOS RGYAL RNAMS LA GUS PHYAG 'TSAL, ,LEGS GSUNGS MDO SNGAGS CHOS TSUL RGYA MTSO'I RGYUN, ,

GANGS LJONGS PHAN BDE'I DPAL DU 'DREN MDZAD PA'I, ,MKHAN SLOB CHOS RGYAL GRUB BRNYES LO PAn GYI,,

BKA' DRIN RJES SU DRAN BZHIN SPYI BOS BTUD, ,'JIG RTEN DBANG PHYUG THUGS RJE'I RANG GZUGS SNYING

RJES YONGS GANG NYAMS BRGYA'I GAR, ,RJES CHAGS BDE CHEN LANG TSOS RNAM SGEG MKHYEN BRTZE'I PHUNG PO

SNYING RJE'I GTER, ,BSKAL MANG MTHAR YANG 'GRO KUN RNAM 'DREN THUGS BSKYED RMAD BYUNG NGO MTSAR PHUL,,

GANGS CAN LHAG CIG PAD DKAR 'CHANG BA RIM BYON GTZUG GI RGYAN DU ROL, ,HE RU KA DPAL BKA' RTAGS

PHYAG RGYAS BSTAN SRUNG GTZO MOR DBANG BSKUR BA, ,SHES RAB PHAR PHYIN MA MO'I GZUGS 'CHANG

DBYINGS PHYUG DPAL LDAN RI MA TI, ,SRID GSUM DBANG SGYUR THOGS MED GAR ROL 'JIGS GZUGS

RNGAM PA'I DRAG SHUL GYIS, ,BSTAN DANG DE 'DZIN GA-YEL MED SKYONG BA'I 'PHRIN LAS MA GA-YEL DPAL

LHA MO, ,RGYAL BA'I SPYAN SNGAR BSTAN PA BSRUNG BAR KHAS BLANGS DAM BCAS GA-YAR DAM CAN, ,

RGYAL BSTAN SKYONG MDZAD MKHA' 'GRO CHOS SRUNG BSTAN LA RAB DAD DKAR PHYOGS LHA, ,RGYAL CHEN BZHI

SOGS GTZANG RIS DPAL MGON MGUL LHA DGE BSNYEN BSTAN MAR BCAS, ,RGYAL BSTAN SKYONG LA

@002 RTAG TU MA GA-YEL BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN SRID RTZER SGRENGS, ,STONG GSUM STONG GI MI MJED ZHING

'DIR PHUL 'GYUR LHO RGYAL 'DZAM BU'I GLING, ,BSKAL BZANG RNAM 'DREN STONG GI ZHING KHAMS DBUS

'GYUR 'PHAGS YUL RDO RJE GDAN, ,DE YI BYANG PHYOGS KHA BA CAN ZHES RGYAL BAS YONGS BSNGAGS

BOD KYI LJONGS, ,KEE LA SHA RI'I 'PHRENG BAS LEGS 'KHYUD SUM RTZEN MI YUL 'PHOS PA BZHIN, ,

'BYOR PA PHUN TSOGS NOR BU'I BA GAM BKOD PA'I NGO MTSAR THIG LE'I 'OD, ,RAB DKAR MU TIG

DOG PA'I DPYANG THAG MDZES MTHONG 'DZUM PA'I LTAD MO CAN, ,PHAN TSUN 'GRAN LA CHAS LTA'I DGA'

BDES MKHA' 'JING GO SA YANGS 'PHROG PA, ,MDZES LDAN GRONG KHYER RGYU SKAR BKRAM PA'I GRANGS

LAS 'GOG PAS KUN NAS MDZES, ,GANGS LJONGS BDE LDAN SKYE RGU YONGS KYI PHUN TSOGS BDE SKYID

LONGS SPYOD DANG, ,TSE CHOS 'DOD RGU THAR PA'I DPAL YON MI ZAD NAM MKHA' MDZOD KYI GTER, ,RGYAL

BSTAN RTZA LAG DGA' BA BRGYA LDAN CHAB SRID GSER 'KHOR RTZIBS STONG CAN, ,MA RUNG BDUD SDES KHRAG

GIS BYUG STE MOG POR BYAS PA'I DUS NGAN 'DIR, ,RGYAL BA'I BSTAN LA CHE BA BRJOD PA DANG, ,SRID KYI

BYA BAR 'JUG PA BDE BA'I PHYIR, ,BLO GSAR TSOGS LA GDAM PAR BYA BA'I SLAD, ,KUN LAS BTUD

PA'I LEGS BSHAD 'DI BRTZAMS SO, ,'DI NI THAG RING MTHONG BA'I RGYANG SHEL TE, ,SA LAM STON

PA'I PHYOGS STON 'KHOR LO YIN, ,KHUNGS MED RDZUN GYI BTZAN 'DZUL BRAG RI'I SPO, ,GTOR BA'I BDEN

PA'I RDUL PHRAN MTSON CHA'ANG YIN, ,'DI SNANG RNYED DANG GRAGS PA'I CHED MA YIN, ,GZHAN LA CO

'DRI NGAG KYAL PHYIR YANG MIN, ,KHUNGS LDAN YIG CHA DPANG POR BZHAG NAS NI, ,BDEN PAS RANG

BTZAN LEN PA'I CHED DU YIN, ,BDEN PA DNGOS PO BDEN PAS LEGS MTHONG BDEN MTHA' GSAL BA'I

ME LONG LA, NGAL BA'I 'KHUR CHEN NGAL BAS RAB BTEGS NGAL BA BRGYA YI BYI DOR GYIS, ,NGES PA'I

DNGOS PO NGES PAR MTHONG BA'I NGES SHES LEGS RNYED PRA PHAB PA, ,'TSAR LONGS BOD PHRUG 'TSAR

LDAN BLO GSAR NGO MTSAR LTAD MO 'DI LA GZIGS, PHUN TSOGS DPAL DE GANG GI BZUNG GYUR PA'I,,

@003 GANGS LJONGS RGYAL RABS CHAB SRID LUGS ZUNG GTAM, ,RNYOG MA'I NGAG GIS MA BSGRIBS LEGS

BSHAD KYI, ,ZLA BA 'BUM PHRAG 'CHAR BA'I RDZING 'DIR DBYE, ZHES YUL DAM PA RNAMS LA SHIS PAR

BRJOD PA DANG, RGYAL BSTAN SRUNG ZHING SKYONG BA'I SRUNG MA RNAMS LA 'PHRIN LAS BCOL BA, BSHAD

PAR DAM BCA' BA SOGS KYI LAM CUNG ZAD YANGS POR PHYE STE, 'DIR BOR YUL GANGS CAN GYI

LJONGS CHOS SRID GNYIS LDAN RGYAL KHAB CHEN PO'I SNGON RABS SRID DON GYI GNAS LUGS LO RGYUS

GSAL BAR STON PA ZLA BA 'BUM PHRAG 'CHAR BA'I RDZING BU'AM, BLO GSAR BUNG BA DGA' BA'I ROL

MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI RTZOM BRIS KYI GLENG GZHI DANG, DGOS PA SOGS CUNG ZAD BRJOD PAR BYA BA NI,

MKHAS MCHOG DBYIG GNYEN GYIS, MDO DON CHE BA NYID THOS NAS, ,NYAN PA DANG NI 'DZIN PA LA, ,

NYAN PA PO YIS GUS BYED PAS, ,THOG MAR DGOS PA BRJOD PAR BYA, ZHES DANG, KHA CHE ZLA BA MNGON

DGAS, BSTAN BCOS 'DI NI THAMS CAD DU, ,LAS NI CI YANG RUNG BA YI, ,JI SRID DGOS PA MA

SMRAS PA, ,DE SRID DU NI SU ZHIG 'DZIN, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR, BDAG GI KHU BO BKA' BLON KHRI SMON

PA NOR BU DBANG RGYAL MCHOG NAS, LCAGS LUG 1931 LOR NYIN GCIG PHRAN GZIM SHAG TU

CHED 'BOD GNANG STE BKA' PHEBS RIGS SU, DE SNGON BOD NANG RGYA NAG MAN JU GONG MA'I DPON

DMAG YOD RIGS RNAMS BOD NAS MTHAR BSKRAD GNANG BA'I SKOR DANG, SHING STAG 1914 LOR

SIM LAR RGYA NAG MI SER RGYAL KHAB DANG, RGYA GAR GYI BDAG PO DBYIN JI, BOD BCAS DBANG

TSAD 'DRA MNYAM THOG NAS CHINGS DON BKA' MOL GNANG SKABS KHU BO MCHOG SRID BLON BSHAD SGRA

DPAL 'BYOR RDO RJE MCHOG GI PHYAG ROGS SU PHEBS GSHIS RGYA BOD PHAN TSUN DAG SKYEL BKA'

MOL GNANG BA'I LO RGYUS PHRA ZHIB GSUNGS PA'I THOG ,SKABS DER DAG SKYEL GYI TSIG THO GO SGRId

GNANG KHAG GI BAR ZIN DANG, KHUNGS SKYEL YIG CHA'I NGO BSHUS, CHINGS ZIN, SA KHRA BCAS

GNAD CHE'I YIG CHA RNAMS MJAL DAR AA SHE DRI BRAL ZHING DANG BCAS PHRAN LA DGYES BRTZE CHEN POS

@004 STZAL TE BKA' LAS, KHYOD KYI YIG CHA 'DI RNAMS LA ZHIB 'JUG DANG, SLOB SBYONG YAG PO ZHIG

BYAS RJES, BOD KYI SRID DON GYI LO RGYUS SHIG BRIS NA BOD LA PHAN THOGS CHEN PO YONG TSUL BKA'

SLOB GNANG BAR SKABS DER NGA LA DE TZAM GYI DO SNANG CHE BA RANG MA BYUNG YANG, RANG NYID CHUNG DUS NAS

RGYAL RABS CHOS 'BYUNG DANG, SKYES CHEN DAM PA'I RNAM THAR, GE SAR GYI SGRUNG YIG SOGS KLOG

PAR RANG BZHIN GYI DGA' SNANG CHE BAS LO RGYUS KYI DPE CHA MTHONG TSAD KLOG STE GAL CHE'I RIGS BRJED THO

RE YANG 'JOG GIN YOD MUR, ME KHYI 1946 ZLA BA DANG PO'I NANG, NGA'I NANG MI BU PHRUG DANG

BCAS RGYA GAR DANG, BAL YUL KHUL GNAS MJAL ZHIG TU BSKYOD SKABS, RGYA GAR MI DMANGS

RNAMS NAS RANG DBANG RANG BTZAN GYI DON LA DBYIN JIR NGO RGOL DANG, RNGAM STON KHROM BSKOR SOGS

BYED PA'I SKABS SU 'KHEL ZHING, NGA TSO 'BOM 'BE'I DU 'BYOR DUS GRONG KHYER GYI MTSO KHAS ZHIG TU

MI MANG 'BUM PHRAG MANG PO TSOGS PA'I DBUS SU PAndI TA 'JO HA LAL NE HE RU DANG, SA THAR SBA LA SPA

KREL, LCAM SA RO CAN NA'I THU SOGS NAS RANG GI YUL LA PHYI MIS DBANG BSGYUR BYAS PA 'DI MI

'OS PAS RANG DBANG RANG BTZAN GYI DON LA MI MANG TSANG MAS MNYAM 'BREL BYAS TE DKA' DPYAD 'BAD

RTZOL BYED DGOS GSUNG BSHAD GNANG BA DANG, RGYA CHE'I MI MANG GI RNAM 'GYUR BCAS KYIS NGA LA

SEMS 'GUL GZHAN DANG MI 'DRA BA ZHIG THEBS 'BYUNG, DE'I RKYEN GYIS LO SHAS SNGON KHU BO MCHOG

NAS GNANG BA'I YIG CHA DE DAG LA DO SNANG DANG, GAL MTHONGS CH RU PHYIN PA MA ZAD, SKU GAM DU

BCAR RES BZHIN CHAB SRID SKOR BKA' 'DRI YANG YANG ZHU RGYU'I 'BAD BRTZON BYAS PA DANG, NGA RANG

GNAS MJAL TE LHA SAR 'BYOR PA NAS BZUNGS CHAB SRID KYI MDZAD GTZO RNAMS LA DENG SKABS

RANG CAG DUS BDE ZHOD 'JAGS, BDE SKYID 'DZOMS PA'I SKABS 'DIR RANG DBANG RANG BTZAN DA

MUS YUN DU GNAS THABS SKOR LA DUS BSTUN MI SER BDE THABS SOGS CHAB SRID KYI MDZAD

PHYOGS DANG, RGYA DKAR NAG DANG, BAL YUL GYIS GTZOS NYE 'BREL RGYAL KHAB RNAMS LA MTHUN

@005 LAM THOG ,GO DON LEGS RTOGS KYI 'BREL BA RGYA CHE GNANG DGOS PA'I GZHEN BSKUL RGYUN CHAD MED

PAR ZHUS PAR BRTEN, ME PHAG 1947 LO MJUG TU BOD KYI TSONG DON BLTA ZHIB DON GCOD MI SNAR

PHRAN NGO LAS, SKAD BSGYUR BCAS 'DZAM GLING STOBS CHEN RGYAL KHAB 'GA' SHAS LA TSONG DON

DANG, SRID DON GYI 'BREL ZHU'I BKA' MNGAGS STZAL BA LTAR THON TE, NGA TSO RGYA GAR RGYAL SA LDI LIR

'BYOR DUS, SBIR LA HA'O SER, RGYA GAR ZHI BDE'I LAM NAS RANG DBANG RANG BTZAN DU 'KHRID PA'I

DED DPON BDAG NYID CHEN PO MA H'A TA MA, GHAN DHI DANG, PHYI RGYAL LAS KHUNGS SU SRID BLON 'JO HA

LAL NE HE RU MJAL BAR SNYING PO CAN GYI BKA' SLOB MANG PO GNANG BYUNG BA'I KHAR, RGYA NAG DANG,

AA MI RI KA, AING LEN, PHA RAN SI, SUD DZA LAN dA, AI tA LI SOGS LA BSKYOD DE SNYAN GRAGS

CAN GYI DBU 'KHRID DANG, SRID DON GYI MKHAS PA MANG PO DNGOS SU MJAL TE BKA' MOL ZHU RGYU'I GO

SKABS DANG, MI DMANGS KYI 'TSO BA'I GNAS STANGS, RGYAL KHAB KYI DPAL 'BYOR STOBS SHUGS

YAR RGYAS SOGS MTHONG BAS BAR LAM RGYA NAG DANG, DBYIN JI'I SRID BYUS DRI MA CAN GYI 'OG ,

BOD 'DI 'DZAM GLING RGYAL KHAB NAS YA BRAL LTA BUR BZHAG PAS CHAB SRID DANG, DPAL 'BYOR TSANG

MA RJES LUS SU GYUR PA'I GNAS TSUL GSAL RTOGS DANG, GZHUNG DANG, MI DMANGS LA PHAN THOd

PA'I DGOS DON MANG PO ZHIG MTHONG BA'I NANG NAS BOD RGYAL SPYI'I KHRIMS THOG NAS GNAS STANGS

DANG, SRID DON GYI LO RGYUS 'DZAM GLING RGYA CHE'I MI MANG TSOS SHES TSOR NYAMS SNANG DGOS PA

GAL CHE SHOS SU MTHONG STE GNAS LUGS RNAMS SKABS 'PHRAL SO SOR RANG GZHUNG BKA' SHAG TU

^ SNYAN 'BUL ZHUS PAS MA TSAD, ^ RGYAL KHAB TU 'BYOR NYID BSAM 'CHAR TSIG THO ZHIG BKA'

SHAG BRGYUD SRID SKYONG RIN PO CHER SNYAN ZHUS KYIS BOD LJONGS TSOGS 'DU HRAG BSDUS RGYAS PA'I

THOG SGROGS SBYANG GNANG BA SOGS YONGS GRAGS DANG,

LCAGS STAG 1950 LOR RTZE GZIM CHUNG MTSAN GZIM LHA MO GSUNG BYON

@006 MA'I GZAN BRTAG DGONGS DON, RTZE PHYAG MKHAN CHUNG THUB BSTAN RGYAL PO DANG, PHRAN GNYIS RGYA

DMAR GUNG BRAN GZHUNG LA BOD RANG DBANG RANG BTZAN DA MUS BZHIN GNAS THABS SKOR BKA' MOL ZHU

BAR GTONG GNANG GIS LDI LIR RGYA DMAR GZHUNG TSAB DANG BKA' MOL ZHU MUR, GLO BUR RGYA DMAR

GYIS KHAMS PHYOGS NAS DRAG PO'I BTZAN 'DZUL BYAS RKYEN ^ GONG SA ^ SKYABS MGON T'A LA'I BLA MA

RIN PO CHES DBUS, STON 'KHOR 'GA' SHAS RGYA GAR DANG NYE BA'I SA GNAS GRO MOR CHIBS BSGYUR

BSKYANGS DGOS BYUNG ZHING, LCAGS YOS 1951 LOR PI CING DU, RGYA DMAR RANG GI 'DOD

PA LTAR BRIS PA'I GROS CHOD DON TSAN BCU BDUN ZHES PA ZHIG LA BTZAN SHUGS KYIS ZHAL BZHES MI

GNANG MTHU MED BYUNG RJES RGYAL BLON RNAMS LHA LDAN RGYAL KHAB TU PHYIR PHEBS SKABS, NGAS RGYA MI

DMAR POR MI 'DOD BZHIN DU MTHUN LAM BYAS TE LOG PA LAS, GANG CI'I DGOS PA DANG BCAS

RANG DBANG YOD PA'I YUL RGYA GAR DU BSDAD PA SBYI SGER GNYIS KAR PHAN THOGS DANG, DGE MTSAN

CHE BAR MTHONG STE RGYA GAR DU SDOD RGYUR 'DEMS KHA BYAS PA YIN,

BSTOD PA BRGYA LNGA BCU PA LAS, RGYA MTSOR GNYA' SHING BU GA RU, ,RUL

SBAL MGRIN PA 'TSUD PA LTAR, ,DAM CHOS DGA' STON CHER BCAS PA'I, ,MI NYID BDAG GIS 'THOB

NAS NI, ,MI RTAG NYID DANG RJES 'BREL ZHING, ,LAS KYI GLAGS LA DOGS BCAS PA, ,BDAG GI

LCE 'DI NYID KYIS KO ,SNYING PO CI'I PHYIR BLANGS MI BYA, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR, NGA LA KHU BO BKA'

BLON MCHOG GI BKA' SLOB DANG, YIG CHA 'DI LTA BU YOD PA DANG, DUS SKABS KYANG DAL PO 'DI

LTA BU ZHIG BYUNG BA'I SKABS 'DIR NGAS BOD KYI SRID DON GYI GNAS STANGS 'DZAM GLING MI MANG RNAMS

KYIS GSAL PO SHES RTOGS THUB PA GAL CHE BAS, CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, MAN JU GONG MA'I SKABS DANG,

DE RJES GO MING TANG GI SKABS NAS, RGYA BOD MCHOD YON GYI 'BREL BAR GO BA LOG SGRUB BYAS TE BOD RGYA

KHONGS YIN RKYANG LTA BU'I DEB DANG, SA KHRA MANG PO BZO 'DON BYAS PAR, DE DAG LA BOD MI'I PHYOGS

@007 NAS SKABS 'PHRAL DGAG BYA BYED MI MED PA'I KHAR, BOD NANG PHYI'I RGYAL KHAB KYI MI SNA BKAG 'DOMS

BYAS PA'I RKYEN GYIS PHYI RGYAL MI RIGS PHAL CHER NAS RGYA MIS BSHAD PA DE RANG YIN SHAG BYED 'DUG PA

DE DAG LA DGAG BYA THUB THABS DANG, LHAG PAR RGYAL GCES SEMS SHUGS LDAN PA'I BOD PHRUG

GZHON NU BLO GSAR BA RNAMS NAS DPE CHA DANG, YIG CHA MANG PO 'BYOR DKA' ZHING, 'BYOR KYANG LTA

RTOG 'BAD RTZOL DKA' BAS DE 'DRA'I DKA' RNYOG MA DGOS PAR, SNGAR BOD RJE CHOS RGYAL GYI SKU DUS

NAS, MTHA' MA DUS NGAN DA LTA'I BAR RANG YUL GYI SRID DON GNAS LUGS JI BYUNG CHA TSANG BA ZHIG

SHES RTOGS THUB PA SOGS DGOS PA DU MA'I SLAD YIG RIGS KHUNGS THUB KYI RGYAB RTEN DANG LDAN PA'I

SRID DON GYI RGYAL RABS 'DI BRTZAMS PA LA 'DUN PA MNGON DU PHYOGS SO, ,

DE YANG RGYAL SRAS CHEN PO ZHI BA LHAS, SNGON BYAS MA BYUNG PA YANG 'DIR BRJOD

MIN, SDEB SBYOR MKHAS PA'ANG BDAG LA YOD MIN TE, ZHES JI SKAD GSUNGS PA LTAR, SNGON CHAD

MKHAS PA DAG GIS MDZAD PA'I CHOS 'BYUNG DANG, RGYAL RABS, DEB THER RNAMS LA RTZA BA'I MA

PHYI BYAS YOD KYANG, DE TSO PHAL CHE BA CHOS PHYOGS GTZO BOR GSUNGS PA DANG, LHAG PAR

SKABS SO SO'I BLA THOG DANG, DPON THOG SO SO'I BAR LAS MED, DE YANG CHOS 'BYUNG 'GA'

SHAS LA LO RTAGS RKYANG PA LAS KHAMS SOGS MED PA DANG, YANG 'GA' SHAS LA LO KHAMS

GNYIS YOD KYANG RAB BYUNG SOGS MED PAS LO RTZIS BYED SKABS LAM SENG RNYED DKA' BA DANG,

SANGS RGYAS KYI 'KHRUNGS GSHEGS KYI LO DANG, BOD RJE CHOS RGYAL RNAMS KYI 'KHRUNGS GSHEGS

KYI LO LA YANG MI 'DRA BA MANG BA SOGS MGO BO RMONGS PA'I GZHIR BRTEN SANGS RGYAS KYI 'KHRUNGS

GSHEGS KYI LO DENG DUS YONGS GRAGS LTAR MDO SDE GNAS BRTAN PA'I LUGS LA CHA BZHAG ,CHOS

RGYAL RNAMS KYI 'KHRUNGS GSHEGS KYI LO YANG MANG MOS LA GZHI BCOL TE DE DAG GI LO DUS

RNAMS SPYIR BTANG SPYI LO'I THOG GUNG GANG THUB KYI BSGRIGS, SNGON GYI MKHAS DBANG RNAMS NAS

@008 GSUNGS PA'I CHOS 'BYUNG, RGYAL RABS, MKHAS GRUB RNAMS KYI RNAM PAR THAR PA, BSTAN RTZIS,

DEB THER, YIG CHA SOGS LAG TU GANG 'BYOR RNAMS LA RTZAD ZHIB NAN TAN THOG ,SRID DON GYI

GNAS LUGS GANG THON RNAMS PHYOGS GCIG TU BSDUS TE YIG TSOGS LA MA BSAMS PAR DE

DAG LA RTZA BA'I MA PHYI BCOL ZHING, KHU BO BKA' BLON MCHOG NAS STZAL BA'I GAL GNAD CAN GYI

YIG CHA DANG, CHINGS YIG ,BKA' SHAG GI MGRON DEB, RGYAL KHAB KYI TSIG THO KHAG ,RDO RING

KHAG GI ZHAL BSHUS, GAL CHE'I YIG CHA KHUNGS LDAN DPANG POR GANG RNYED KYI RIGS DANG,

NYE 'BREL RGYAL KHAB RGYA NAG THANG HRU'U YIG KHAG DANG, TONG HANG NAS BRNYES PA'I YIG CHA, GZHAN YANG RGYA GAR, RGYA NAG, SOG PO, BAL YUL, 'BRUG ,LA DVAGS, 'BRAS LJONGS SOGS KYI

RGYAL RABS DANG, DBYIN JI DANG, THA'I LAN dI, AA RAB SOGS KYI DEB KHAG NAS BOD SKOR GANG

THON RNAMS KYIS ZUR BRGYAN, MKHAS PA'I DBANG PO DANG, SRID DON NYAMS MYONG CAN RNAMS

LAS BRJED PAR PHANGS PA'I LEGS BSHAD GANG THOS RNAMS KHA TSAR LTA BUR BSNAN, YIG

CHA GANG LA BRTEN PA DANG, GSAL BSHAD DGOS RIGS, GZHAN YANG MING TSIG GO DKA'I

RIGS LA AANG RTAGS DANG BCAS GSHAM MCHAN THOG 'BREL BRJOD BYAS, PHYI RGYAL GAL CHE'I MI

RIGS KYI MING DANG, DEB MING, GAL CHE'I LO DUS RNAMS SHAD GUG NANG DBYIN YIG RANG GI

THOG GSAL BAR BKOD, MI RIGS KYI PHYOGS ZHEN DANG, CHOS LUGS KYI KUN SLONG 'THEN

'KHYER SOGS RING DU SPANGS TE RTZOM BRIS BYED PA'I SKABS SU, ME SPRE 1956 LOR ` GONG SA

` SKYABS MGON CHEN PO RGYA GAR DU BDAG CAG GI STON PA THUGS RJE CAN MNYAM MED SH'AKYA'I RGYAL PO

MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS NAS LO NYIS STONG LNGA BRGYA SONG BA'I DUS DRAN MDZAD CHEN DU RGYA GAR GZHUNG DANG, BYANG

CHUB CHEN PO'I CHOS TSOGS NAS TSOGS MGON DU GDAN ZHU GNANG BA LTAR CHIBS BSGYUR BKA'

DRIN CHE SKABS, PHRAN LA RTZOM BRIS BYED BZHIN PA'I RGYAL RABS 'DI'I MJUG SKYEL DGOS PA'I

@009 BKA' SLOB ZAB MO SPYI BOR RTZAL BA LA BRTEN NAS SEMS SHUGS STZAL STON GYIS HA LAM MJUG BSGRIL

NYE BA'I TSE, RGYA DMAR GUNG BRAN TANG NAS KHO RANG TSO'I 'DOD PA LTAR BTZAN BRIS KYIS BZHAG BCUG

PA'I GROS CHOS LA'ANG MA GNAS PAR BOD NANG DRAG PO'I BTZAN SHUGS JE CHER BTANG RKYEN, SA PHAG

1959 ZLA BA GNYIS PA'I NANG BOD MI MANG NAS RANG BTZAN SGER LANGS BYAS TE DMAG 'KHRUG LANGS

SKABS, ^ SKYABS MGON T'A LA'I BLA MA RIN PO CHES DBUS, RGYAL BLON, MI DMANGS SER SKYA STONG

PHRAG BRGYAD CU SKOR RGYA GAR DANG, BAL YUL, 'BRUG YUL SOGS SU SKYABS BCOL DU PHEBS

'BYOR MI GNANG DKA' MED BYUNG GSHIS, PHRAN YANG ` SKYABS MGON T'A LA'I BLA MA'I BKA'

'BREL LTAR, LDI LIR SKU TSAB ZHUS TE PHYI 'BREL DANG, SKYABS BCOL BA RNAMS KYI 'TSO THABS,

GZHIS CHAGS, SLOB SBYONG SKOR LAS DON 'GAN 'KHUR ZHUS TE SDOD DGOS BYUNG BA MA ZAD, DE

GA'I LO MJUG BOD KYI DON GNAD RNAMS MNYAM 'BREL RGYAL TSOGS SU ZHU BSKUL GNANG BAR SKU

TSAB TU SKU'I GCEN PO RGYA LO DON GRUB LAGS DANG, SA 'DU RIN CHEN LAGS, PHRAN BCAS GTONG

GNANG BYUNG BA SOGS RGYA CHE'I LAS SNE MANG BAS RGYAL RABS 'PHRO SKYONG BYED RGYU LUS KYANG, PHYI RGYAL

MI RIGS RNAMS KYIS BOD KYI GNAS STANGS JI BZHIN MI SHES PAS SNGA 'PHROS SRID DON GYI RGYAL RABS

DBYIN YIG THOG PAR 'DEBS 'GREM SPEL BYED RGYU SHIN TU GAL CHE BA MTHONG STE CHU YOS 1963

LOR RE ZHIG LDI LI'I SKU TSAB KYI LAS 'KHUR DGONGS PA ZHUS TE AA'I SHAN PHON KRI SHAN GYI ROGS

RAM 'OG ,YEL SLOB KHANG CHEN POR BSKYOD DE NGA RANG GI BU PHRUG RNAMS DANG, SKU ZHABS RA SE

KAN 'BON BCAS KYIS DBYIN YIG THOG BSGYUR PHAB KYI ROGS RAM THOG ,AA MI RI KA'I NANG BOD KYI

LO RGYUS DANG, NANG PA'I CHOS KYI SKOR LA MKHAS PA CHEN PO SPOR PHE SAR KRU LE, WA'I LI NAS

DEB KYI LUGS SROL DANG MTHUN PA'I KHUNGS BSGRIGS KYI ROGS RAM GNANG BA LA BRTEN NAS BOD KYI

SRID DON GYI RGYAL RABS DBYIN DEB DE BZHIN ME LUG 1967 LOR 'DZAM GLING YONGS LA 'GREMS

@010 SPEL BYAS PAR, SPYI NOR ` GONG SA ` SKYABS MGON CHEN POS KYANG, DUS RABS MANG PO'I RING BOD

GCIG PUR BSDAD PA'I RKYEN GYIS BOD DANG, BOD MI'I GNAS TSUL SHES MKHAN SHIN TU NYUNG BA'I SKABS

'DIR, ZHVA SGAB PA DBANG PHYUG BDE LDAN NAS BOD KYI SRID DON GYI RGYAL RABS DPE DEB 'DI 'DRA ZHIG

BRTZAMS BRIS BYAS PAR DGA' BSU YOD, 'DI NI BOD MIS BOD KYI SRID PHYOGS GNAS STANGS RGYAL

RABS DBYIN SKAD THOG BRIS PA'I THOG MA YIN, BOD KYI BDEN PA'I GNAS STANGS GSAL POR SHES PA

DGOS GAL CHE BA'I DUS TSOD DENG SKABS SU DPE DEB 'DIS PHAN THOGS CHEN PO YONG RGYUR THE TSOM MED,

CES BSNGAGS BRJOD MDZAD PA DANG, DE BZHIN PHYI RGYAL DANG, RGYA GAR GYI GSAR SHOG KHAG ,LO

RGYUS LA MKHAS GRAGS CAN DANG, GZUR GNAS KYI MI CHEN SNYAN GRAGS CAN MANG POS BSNGAGS BRJOD

KYI ME TOG LAN MANG 'THOR BA DANG CHABS CIG DA DUNG NYE BA'I DUS RABS KYI SKOR LA ZHIB RGYAS SHIG RTZOM

BRIS YONG BA'I RE 'DUN GNANG MKHAN MANG PO BYUNG BA MA ZAD, SUD DZAR LAN dI NAS, RAG RA MCHOG

SPRUL RIN PO CHES KYANG SNYAN NGAG GI LAM NAS DRANGS PA'I BSNGAGS BRJOD KYI GSUNG SHOG GNANG BA'I NANG,

RNAM MANG MKHAS PA'I LUNG GI RGYUN 'DUS SHING, ,LUGS GNYIS GTING DPAG DKA' BA'I RDZING ZAB

KYANG, ,NGO MTSAR BDE LDAN RBA RLABS 'DI MTHONG TSE, ,GZUR GNAS BLO YI ZLA BA CIS MI 'PHEL, ,

DENG DUS MES PO GONG MA'I MING TZAM YANG, ,DBANG DKA'I LAS LA BDAG GIR BYED BZHIN DU, ,DKAR

LJANG YON TAN RIN CHEN GTER CHEN GYIS, ,PHONG BDAG NGAG GI CHO GAS KHYOD MNYES BGYI, ,RAB LJANG

MRGAD LTA BU'I KLAD PA NAS, ,RAB THOS DBYANGS CAN DGA' MA'I MGRIN GLU DE, ,RAB SNGO KUN GSAL

DBYINGS SU BSGRAGS PA YIS, ,RAB MKHAS KHYOD KYANG DGYES PA SKYE 'GYUR SNYAM, ,GTI MUG RDO BA'I

GSEB TU GNAS BCAS SHING, ,ZHES SDANG DUG GI KHA RLANGS 'THUL BA CAN, ,'DOD CHAGS 'KHRIL THABS

BTZAN PO'I RNAM GNON GYI, GANGS CAN DGA' MA RGYA DMAR SBRUL GYIS BCINGS, ,'ON KYANG BDEN

PA'I RGYUD STONG RAB BKRA ZHING, ,KHUNGS LDAN DBYANGS KYI 'GYUR BAG STONG LDAN PA, ,RGYAL RABS TSANGS

@011 GLU KHYED KYIS BLANGS MDZAD PAS, ,SKYE BO MANG PO GNYID KYI RGYA LAS GROL, ,TSAD MA'I LUNG GI PHA GU

'DI LTA BU, ,SNYING STOBS LDAN KHYOD LAS GZHAN SUS BRIS NUS, ,ZHES SOGS DGYES PA'I PHYAG

BRIS STZAL BA SOGS KYIS SPOBS PA MTHON POR BTEGS TE DBYIN DEB JI BZHIN BOD YIG THOG 'BRI

MUR, SPYI NOR ` GONG SA ` SKYABS MGON CHEN PO DANG, SKYABS RJE YONGS 'DZIN KHRI BYANG RDO RJE 'CHANG

CHEN PO SOGS NAS, DA LAM BOD YIG THOG BRIS SKABS 'DIR ZHIB CHA GANG CHE ZHIG BYUNG NA BSTAN

SRID DANG, GZHIS BYES GZHON NU 'TSAR LONGS CAN RNAMS LA PHAN THOGS YONG TSUL BKA' BZANG YANG

YANG SPYI PHEBS THOG ,` GONG SA ` SKYABS MGON CHEN PO'I SKU SGER DRUNG CHE RTZA RA BA MDO SNGAGS MTHAR PHYIN

MCHOG NAS, DENG SKABS BOD YUL DU LUS PA'I RANG RE'I RGAN RABS RNAMS DGRA BO'I BKOL SPYOD MI

ZAD PA'I 'OG TU DUS MIN 'CHI RKYEN SNA TSOGS PAS RIM ZAD 'GRO BZHIN KHAR, GZHON SKYES RNAMS NI

KLU KLOS PHYIR BYUG ,NANG 'GENGS THABS RNAM CI DRAG GI SGO NAS RNA MIG GCIG PA'I SHES RMONGS CAN

DU 'GYUR MUS DANG, 'DI PHYOGS SLEBS 'BYOR GSAR BTZAS DANG BCAS PA'I GZHON SKYES RNAMS PHYI

RGYAL YUL DU SLOB SBYONG DANG, 'TSAR LONGS BYED DGOS PA'I DBANG GIS RANG YUL GYI GNAS TSUL JI

MA JI BZHIN SHES RTOGS MI THUB PA NGES CAN LA BRTEN, MA 'ONGS BOD MI GZHON SKYES TSO'I DON DU BOD

KYI LO RGYUS GANG RGYAS SHIG BRIS RTZOM DGOS PA SKABS SU BABS PAS, ` MI MCHOG NAS KYANG BOD

KYI SRID DON GYI RGYAL RABS DBYIN YIG THOG SPEL 'DON GRUB STE PHYAG RJES CHEN PO ZHIG BZHAG GRUB PA

DE LTAR YANG, DA DUNG RTZA BA'I BOD NANG RGYA CHE'I MI DMANGS KYI GNAS STANGS DANG, GZHUNG SROL DUS 'GYUR SNGA PHYI SOGS DANG, BAR LAM BOD GZHUNG NAS SPYI SGER LA PHAN DANG, GNOD PA JI BYUNG

SGRO SKUR SPANG STE RANG BZHIN DRANG PO ZHIB GSAL GANG CHE ZHIG GNANG THUB NA GANG LEGS YONG RGYU, ZHES

BSKUL MA'I PHYAG BRIS STZAL BA DANG, RGYAL GZHEN DANG, SHES YON GNYIS LDAN SKU ZHABS NGAG DBANG

@012 DON GRUB LAGS SOGS LO GZHON HA CANG MANG POS YANG NAS YANG DU BSKUL MA MDZAD PA DANG, LHAG

PAR ME LUG 1967 LOR RGYA DMAR NAS RIG GNAS GSAR BRJE ZER BA'I LAS 'GUL NGAN PA ZHIG

SGRIGS 'DZUGS KYIS DE'I LAS DON BYED MKHAN SRUNG DMAG DMAR PO ZHES PA DE TSO BOD NANG 'BYOR TE

BKA' BKOD RGYUN 'DZIN GYI BSAM BLO RNYING PA, YUL SROL RNYING PA, GOMS GSHIS RNYING PA, CHOS

DAD RNYING PA BCAS RTZA STOR GTONG RGYU ZHES MI LO STONG PHRAG MANG PO'I SNGON GYI RIN THANG BRAL BA'I SKU GSUNG

THUGS RTEN, RIG GZHUNG DPE RGYUN, KHYAD NOR, GOMS GSHIS BZANG PO YOD RGU TSANG MA RTZA GTOR

BTANG STE MUN PA MUN NAG ZHIG TU BZOS GSHIS, DE DAG BSKYAR GSO THUB PA SOGS DGAG BYA DANG,

DGOS PA DU MA'I CHED DU LO RGYUS GANG RGYAS SHIG BZO RGYU'I NGAL BA DVANG DU BLANGS TE ZUNGS ZAD RGAD PO'I

LUS GOG SEMS KYIS DRUD DE SLAR YANG YIG CHA 'TSOL ZHIB TU RGYA GAR NANG 'BRAS LJONGS DANG, 'BRUG,

NAS SNGA PHYI TSANG MAR PHYAG DPE DANG, YIG CHA GANG 'DOD GA-YAR ZHU CHOG PA'I ROGS RAM GNANG BA LA

BRTEN RGYAL RABS 'DI NYID MJUG RDZOGS PAR BYED THUB PA BYUNG BAS THUGS RJE CHE ZHU RGYU DANG, BAR ZIN

BKOD RIM BZHIN YONGS RDZOGS BSTAN PA'I MNGA' BDAG SKYABS RJE YONGS 'DZIN KHRI BYANG RDO RJE 'CHANG

CHEN POR SPYAN ZHUS KYIS SKYON DANG, NOR 'KHRUL YOD RIGS SOGS GANG CIR THUGS ZHIB TSAGS POS

SPYAN RAS KYIS BTZAS TE SRID NA RNYED PAR DKA' BA'I BKA' SLOB DANG, BKA' BCOS STZAL BA LA LHA

PHYAG GRANGS MED DANG BCAS SNYING NAS THUGS RJE DANG, BKA' DRIN MCHOG TU CHEE ZHES ZHU RGYU, LHAG PAR

BRTZE DUNG CAN GYI LCAM PADMA GA-YU SGRON LAGS DE NYID NAS RGYAL RABS 'BRI BA LA MTHUN RKYEN DANG, RGYAB

@013 TSANG MAS KYANG SNGA PHYI BAR GSUM LA MTHUN 'GYUR ROGS RAM BYAS PA DANG, MA ZIN SNGA RJES LA ZHUS

*, ,RANG CAG BOD LJONGS KHA BA CAN PA RNAMS KYI SRID DON GYI ` RGYAL RABS SHES PAR 'DOD PA

RNAMS THOG MAR SNGON 'GRO LTA BUR BOD KYI SNOD BCUD CHAGS TSUL DANG, SHES RIG, GOMS GSHIS

LA SOGS PA'I RANG LUGS GSAR RNYING RNAMS SHES PA SHIN TU GAL CHE, DE YANG, SNOD BCUD

CHAGS TSUL GCIG PUR ZHIB RGYAS BYAS NA DNGOS SU 'BRI RGYU'I RGYAL RABS LAS CHES MANG BAS LO MAS

'BRAS SGRIB LTA BUR YANG 'GRO NYEN CHE BAS RE ZHIG SA DPYAD MA STONG TZAM CUNG ZAD SPRO NA, DKON MCHOG

'BANGS KYI SKYES RABS LAS, SHAR RDO RJE GDAN GYI BYANG PHYOGS NA, GNAS PUR RGYAL BOD CES BYA

BA YOD, RI MTHON PO GNAM GYI KA BA YOD, MTSO DMA' PO GA-YU YI MAndAL YOD, GANGS DKAR

PO SHEL GYI MCHOD RTEN YOD, SPANG SER PO GSER GYI LHUN PO YOD, DRI ZHIM PO SMAN GYI BDUG SPOS

YOD, STON BKRA BA GSER GYI ME TOG YOD, DBYAR BKRA BA GA-YU YI ME TOG YOD, KYE GANGS RI'I

MGON PO SPYAN RAS GZIGS, GNAS DE NA KHYOD KYI ZHING KHAMS YOD, ZHING DE NA KHYOD KYI GDUL BYA YOD,

CES GSUNGS PA DANG,

DE YANG BAL BZA' KHRI BTZUN LA YAB KYIS BSLAB BYA STZAL BAR, BOD CES BYA BA

KHYAD PAR 'PHAGS PA'I YUL, RI MTHO SA GTZANG GANGS RI GNYAN GYI YUL, BSIL LA MDZES PA LHA

GNAS GZHAL YAS KHANG, NGO MTSAR RMAD BYUNG PHAN BDE 'BYUNG BA'I GZHI, CHU BO BZHI 'BAB RTZI SHING

@018 'DZAM GLING GI, ,BYE BRAG BRJID LDAN GANGS RI'I BYANG, ,LO HI TA 'GRAM RIN CHEN KHUNGS, ,KHA BA

CAN ZHES MING GRAGS NA, ,BLO CHEN STOBS LDAN MI BSUN PA, ,BOD CES BYA BA GNAS PA'I PHYIR, ,ZHES

DANG, RIN SPUNGS NGAG DBANG 'JIG RTEN DBANG PHYUG GIS, ,NOR 'DZIN SA 'DI'I RGYAN DU SRID PA YIS,,

BYIN PA'I GANGS RI DPAL GYI DO SHAL CAN, ,LTO BA CHOS KYI RGYAL SRID BLA NA MED, ,GLING RNAMS KUN GYI

GTZUG NOR 'DI YIN NO, ,ZHES SOGS RI MTHO, SA GTZANG BA, BSIL LA MDZES PA LHA'I GZHAL MED

KHANG DANG 'DRA BA, GANGS RI'I 'PHRENG BAS KUN NAS BSKOR BA, GSER DNGUL ZANGS LCAGS LA SOGS

PA RIN PO CHE'I 'BYUNG KHUNGS, RTZI MCHOG DRI ZHIM LA BCUD CHE BA, MI DPA' LA, RTA MGYOGS PA ZHES DAm

PA DU MAS LAN GCIG MA YIN PAR YONGS SU BSNGAGS PAR MDZAD PA'I BOD YUL GANGS CAN GYI LJONGS

'DI BZHIN SNGAR GYI RGYAL RABS RNAMS SU, STOD MNGA' RIS SKOR GSUM RDZING DANG 'DRA, BAR DBUS

GTZANG RU BZHI YUR BA DANG 'DRA, SMAD MDO KHAMS SGANG DRUG ZHING DANG 'DRA ZHES YUL GYI DBYIBS TZAM

BSTAN NAS, YUL DE DAG PHAL CHE BA NAGS TSAL DANG, CHUS KHENGS SHING, RJES SU RIM PAS CHU

LAM BYE STE LUNG PA CHAGS, SA LA'I NAGS TSAL RIM BZHIN BYUNG STE, GCAN GZAN GDUG PA CAN DANG,

BYA DANG, RI DVAGS KYI GNAS YUL LTA BU DANG, DE NAS MI'I 'GRO BA RIM PAS BYUNG TSUL GSUNGS PA

RNAMS 'DZAM GLING SPYI'I SNOD BCUD CHAGS TSUL JI LTA BA BZHIN BYUNG BA ZHIG STE, LO RGYUS SMRA BA'I DBANG

PHYUG BU STON THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DANG, 'GOS LO TZ'A BA GZHON NU DPAL, STAG TSANG LO TZ'A BA SOGS

KYIS, BOD KYI YUL 'DI YANG RGYA GAR DANG 'DRA BA YUL DANG, MI RIGS BSKAL PA NAS BYUNG ZHES BYAS

NA YANG LUNG DANG RIG PAS 'GAL BA MED CES GSUNGS PA LTAR, CHES YA THOG RING MO ZHIG NAS

YUL 'DI CHAGS PA RED CES BRJOD CHOG CING, DE YANG 'DZAM GLING GI SA KHRA'I DBANG DU BTANG NAS,

RGYA GAR 'PHAGS PA'I YUL DANG, BAL YUL, 'BRUG YUL SOGS NAS BRTZIS NA BYANG DANG, KASMIR

DANG, AAPHA GHA NE SE THAN SOGS NAS BRTZIS NA SHAR, SHAR KRAR KI SI THAN (SHIN CANG) HOR SOG GI

@019 YUL NAS RTZIS NA LHO, RGYA NAG GI YUL NAS RTZIS NA NUB NYID DU GNAS SHING, 'DZAM GLING GI

SA THIG RAGS PA'I DBANG DU BTANG NA, GZHUNG THIG (Longitudes) 780E NAS 103

OE BAR DANG, PHRED THIG (Latitudes) 27 0N NAS 37 0N GYI BAR LA YOD CES BRJOD

CHOG ,'DZAM GLING NANG MI'I 'GRO BA GNAS PA'I SA MTHO SHOS DANG, SHAR PHYOGS YUL GYI CHU CHEN

THAMS CAD KYI 'BYUNG KHUNGS LTA BUR BTZI YI YOD PA RED,

YUL LA BOD CES MING THOGS TSUL NI, BOD CES MING THOGS TSUL DE LA BSHAD SROL MI 'DRA

BA 'GA' SHAS YOD CING, BON PO RNAMS KYI BOD KYI YUL DU GSHEN RAB BON GYI CHOS DAR BAS CHOS

MING YUL LA THOGS TE BON ZER RGYU YIN PA LA ZUR CHAG STE BOD CES BRJOD TSUL ZER BA DANG, YANG 'GA'

SHAS KYIS, GRI GUM BTZAN PO'I SRAS BYA KHRI BTZAN PO KONG PO'I YUL NAS GDAN DRANGS TE MAS NGA'I BU

'DI GRI GUM GYI SRAS YIN NA BOD KYI CHAB SRID BRTAN PA SHOG ,CES SMOS BOR BA'I TSE NAM MKHA' NAS,

KHYOD KYI BU 'DI KUN LAS RGYAL BAR 'GYUR RO ZHES SGRA BSGRAGS PAS, MI RNAMS KYIS DE 'BOD MA SHES

PAR PU TE GUNG RGYAL ZHES BOD PAS RGYAL PO'I MTSAN YUL LA CHAGS TE PUR RGYAL BOD BYUNG ZHES GSUNG TSUL

YANG YOD PA DANG, YANG RGYA GAR BA RNAMS BHOt ZHES 'BOD PA DE LA BOD CHAGS PA SEMS PA'ANG,

MKHAS SHING GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG KHU NU RGAN BSTAN 'DZIN RGYAL MTSAN MCHOG NAS BHOt LAS BOD BYUNG BA

SI TU BSTAN PA'I NYIN 'BYED KYI GSUNG LAS LUNG 'DREN GNANG 'DUG KYANG, BOD LAS BHOt BYUNG ZHES

DRAN DBANG DGE 'DUN CHOS 'PHEL LAGS NAS KHUNGS 1 SKYEL 1 BOD CHEN PO'I SRID LUd DANG 'BREL BA'I RGYAL RAB DEB THER DKAR PO 3-BA-1, GNANG 'DUG ,DNGOS 'BREL BYAS NA, RGYA

GAR GYI RGYAL RABS NANG, RTZOD LDAN THOG MA'I SKABS, SKYA SENG BU LNGA'I DMAG BYUNG BA'I TSE R'U PA TI BYA

BA'I RGYAL PO DPUNG TSOGS GCIG DANG BCAS GA-YUL 'GYED PA'I TSE BUD MED KYI CHA LUGS SU BYAS TE

BROS NAS RI KHA BA CAN GYI KHROD DU ZHUGS TE GNAS PA'I RIGS LA DENG SANG NA YANG BOD CES BYA BA

@020 GRAGS PA YIN NO, ,ZHES SLOB DPON BDE BYED BDAG POS MDZAD PA'I LHA LAS PHUL BYUNG GI BSTOD PA'I

'GREL PA, BHENG 'GOL GYI PAndITA CHEN PO SHES RAB GO CHAS MDZAD PA LAS 2 GSUNGS (2 SNAR THANG PAR MA'I BSTAN 'GYUR BSTOD TSOGS KA PA 52-NA-2) SHING, BROS ZHES

PA'I TSIG LA DENG DUS KYANG DBUS PA RNAMS KYIS BOS ZHES SGRA BOD DANG, 'BOD BZHIN PA YIN PA

DE LAS BOD CES PA'I MING THOGS SHING, YUL LA BOD YUL DANG, DE LA GNAS PA'I GANG ZAG LA

BOD PA ZHES ZER BA DANG, YANG PHYI RGYAL GYI MI RIGS RNAMS NAS BOD LA, (Tibet) ZER BA

'DI NI, SNGAR RGYA NAG GI YIG CHA RNYING PA RNAMS SU BOD LA TA'O PHANG, ZER BA DANG, DE BZHIN SOG

PO'I YIG CHA RNYING PAR, THU SBI THU, AA RAB KYI YIG CHA RNYING PAR, THU SBAG TA, THA'I GI YIG CHA

RNYING PAR, THI SBI THI, RGYA GAR NANG, TA MIL GYI YIG CHAR, THI RU PA TI (Thriupathi) ZER

BA'I SGRA DE TSO NAS KRI SBI KRI ZHES CHAGS PA SHIN TU GSAL PO YOD CING, YANG, KHA BA CAN DANG,

GANGS LJONGS, GANGS CAN, BSIL LDAN GYI LJONGS ZER BA NI, BOD KYI LHO PHYOGS RNAMS HI MA

LA'I RI BRGYUD DANG, BYANG PHYOGS KUN LUNG GI RI BRGYUD RNAMS SU GANGS MANG PO YOD PA DANG, BOD

KYI NANG DBYAR MI BZHU PA'I GANGS RI MTHON PO MANG PO YOD PAR BRTEN 'DRA BA RGYU MTSAN DU BYAS PA'AM,

SNYAN NGAG MKHAN RNAMS KYIS MNGON BRJOD KYI BTAGS PA'I MING ZHIG LAS, PHYI RGYAL PA MANG PO'I

BSAMS PAR, 'DZAM GLING HRIL POR GNAS PA'I BYANG MTHA'I RTZA (NOR THA SP'OL) DANG, LHO MTHA'I

RTZE (SA'U THA SP'OL) LTA BU GANGS KHO NA'I DKYIL DU SDOD KYI YOD PA LTA BU SEMS PAS DE 'DRA NI MA

YIN NO, ,

MI'I 'GRO BA THOG MAR BYUNG TSUL, YUL DE'I NANG MI'I 'GRO BA THOG MAR BYUNG TSUL LA

BSHAD SROL MI 'DRA BA GNYIS YOD PA LAS, DANG PO NI, GONG DU JI LTAR BRJOD PA LTAR, RGYA GAR

'PHAGS PA'I YUL NA RTZOD DUS THOG MA SKYA SENG BU LNGA 'THAB PA'I TSE, RGYAL PO R'U PA TI DPUNG

TSOGS RI BO GANGS CAN GYI GSEB TU BROS PA'I RIGS LAS BOD KYI MI'I 'GRO BA THOG MA BYUNG BA,

@021 DMAG 'KHRUG DE NI YE SHU MA SHI KA MA 'KHRUNGS PA'I LO NYIS STONG LNGA BRGYA'I GONG LA YIN PA RGYA GAR GYI

LO RGYUS RNAMS LA YONGS SU GRAGS PAS NA, DUS DE TZAM NAS BOD KYI NANG MI'I 'GRO BA YOD PA CHA

'JOG BYED DGOS PA DANG, GNYIS PA, JO BO RJE DPAL LDAN AA TI SHAS LHA SA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG

GI KA BA BUM PA CAN NAS GTER DU BZHES PA'I BKA' CHEMS KA 'KHOL MA DANG, GRUB THOB

DNGOS GRUB KYIS LHA SA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG GI THUGS RJE CHEN PO RANG BYON LNGA LDAN GYI 'KHOR RTA MGRIN GYI

ZHABS GA-YAS PA'I 'OG GTER NAS BZHES PA'I MA nI BKA' 'BUM LTAR BYAS NA, BOD KYI MI'I RGYUD

NI; 'PHAGS PA SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYIS BYIN GYIS SA BA RLABS PA'I SPRE'U BYANG CHUB SEMS PA DANG, BRAG

SRIN MO GNYIS 'DUS PA LAS SPREL PHRUG MANG DU 'PHEL TE DE DAG GI RGYUD PAS BOD KYI MI RNAMS BYUNG

BA GSUNGS SHING, SNE GDONG KHUL DU DE DAG GNAS PA'I BRAG GI SKYIBS DANG, RTZED MO RTZED SA'I THANG,

ZHING LA SOGS PA GNAS BSHAD BYED SROL YOD PA DANG, 'GA' 3 SHAS 3 CHOS 'BYUNG BSTAN PA'I PADMA RGYAS PA'I NYIN 'BYED 97-BA-2, KYIS KONG YUL SPRE SNA MI YUL

LDING BYA BAR BOD MI THOG MAR BYUNG TSUL BCAS GSUNGS PA LTAR BYAS NA, SANGS RGYAS MYA NGAN LAS

'DAS NAS LO BRGYA THAMS PA'I RJES LA KHA BA CAN GYI MTSO BRI, DE NAS RIM BZHIN SA 4 LA'I 4 SHING SA LA NI, SPOS DKAR YONG BA'I SHING SGRON ME SHING DAM THANG SHING ZER BA DE YIN, NAGS TSAL

DANG SPRE'U'I RIGS LAS MCHED PA'I MI'I 'GRO BA DE DAG BYUNG BAR CHA BZHAG NA, YE SHU MA SHI

KA MA 'KHRUNGS PA'I LO NYIS BRGYA, SUM BRGYA'I NANG NAS BOD LA MI'I 'GRO BA THOG MAR BYUNG BA CHA 'JOG

BYED DGOS, DE YANG BAR LAM BOD GZHUNG GI GLOG KHANG CHU 'DREN LAS BYED 'JAR MAN RI RIGS

AAB SHE NA THAR LHA SA'I SHAR PHYOGS ZHANG 'DAB KYI BRAG 'OG CIG NAS SNGAR SNGA MO'I DUR KHANG CHUNG

DU ZHIG BRNYES PA'I NANG NAS MI'I RUS PA DANG, DNGOS PO KHA SHAS THON PA DE DAG SUD DZA LAN dA'I

MI RUS BRTAG DPYAD KHANG NANG ZHIB 'JUG SKABS LO SUM STONG SNGON GYI MI'I RUS PA YIN TSUL BSHAD

GSUNGS, (Manasarowar)

SA CHA DE DAG LA GNAS SHING RGYU BA'I MI RIGS RNAMS KYANG 'TSO BA'I GNAS

@028 STANGS MI 'DRA BA BZHIR NGES SHING, STON 'BRAS RTZA BA NAS MA SMIN PA'I SA MTHO SA RNAMS SU SDOD PA

RNAMS NI 'BROG PA STE, 'TSO BA 'BRI GA-YAG DANG, RA LUG, RTA LA SOGS PA BSTEN NAS RI DVAGS

RKYANG 'BRONG, RGO BA DANG, RNA BA LA SOGS PA BSAD DE 'TSO BA SKYEL ZHING, SDOD YUL PHAL CHE BA

GA-YAG GI KHUL RTZID LAS GRUB PA'I GUR LA SDOD, GZHIS MI RGAN BYIS RNAMS GZHIS SA GCIG TU

SDOD PA TZAM LAS, DE BYINGS SGO ZOG RNAMS 'DED DE TZA KHA GANG BZANG LA SKYAS SPO ZHING 'GRO, YANG,

'BRU DANG, SRAN MA TZAM DAR BA'I SA KHAD MTHO BA'I YUL PA RNAMS LA SA MA 'BROG ZER ZHING, DE DAG

GI 'TSO BA NI, SA ZHING SKYE MTHA' PHRAN BU DANG, 'BRI GA-YAG, RA LUG, NYA DANG, NGANG PA DANG, CHU BYA'I SGO NGA SOGS LA BRTEN NAS SDOD, YANG, SA ZHING 'DEBS LAS THUB PA RNAMS LA YUL

PA'AM, ZHING PA ZER ZHING, 'BRU, GRO, SRAN MA, RGYA SRAN, PAD KHA LA SOGS PA DANG, LDUM

RA'I SNGO TSOD RNAMS DANG, SHING 'BRAS 'DEBS LAS DANG, BKAL 'THAG LA SOGS PA BYAS TE

'TSO BA SKYEL GYI YOD, YANG, RONG PA NI, SA RONG DMA' BO, TSA BA CHA ZHING, SA ZHING PHRAN BU LAS,

SHING NAGS KHO NA'I LAS KA BYAS TE 'TSO BA SKYEL BA RED, CHOL KHA GSUM YONGS RDZOGS SU RAGS

RTZIS BYAS NA, 'BROG PA BRGYA CHA BZHI BCU THAM PA DANG, SA MA 'BROG BRGYA CHA SUM CU, ZHING PA BRGYA

CHA NYI SHU TZA DRUG, ,RONG PA BRGYA CHA BZHI TZAM YOD PA RED,

MI 'BOR, SNGAR BOD RJE SRONG BTZAN SGAM PO DANG, KHRI SRONG LDE'U BTZAN GYI SKU DUS

SU MI 'BOR HA CANG CHEN PO YOD, DE YANG SRONG BTZAN SGAM POS RGYA NAG TU DMAG 'BUM PHRAG GNYIS CHOS 'BYUNG MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON MA 10-BA-5 SBU SHEL 444,

BTANG BA DANG, DE RJES KHRI SRONG LDE'U BTZAN SKABS RGYA NAG TU DMAG 'BUM PHRAG BZHI BTANG SPE LE KRE 27 (PELLIOT, P. 27) BA

DANG, DE BZHIN RDO RJE GDAN NAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I RING BSREL LEN SKABS RTA DMAG BYE BA

@029 PHRAG BCU SBA BZHED DANG, MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON JA 97-NA-1 GSUNGS KYANG, GSER SDONG DKAR CHAG 388-NA-1 NANG, SPRUL PA'I DMAG BYE BA BZHI BCU ZHES HE BAG SHIN TU CHE, BZHI BTANG BA SOGS KYI LO RGYUS LA GZHIGS TSE MI 'BOR HA CANG CHEN PO YOD PA GSAL

PO YOD KYANG, BOD SIL BU'I SKABS NAS RIM PAS MI 'BOR JE NYUNG DU SONG BA LTA BU ZHIG 'DUG,

DE YANG 'BROM STON RGYAL BA'I 'BYUNG GNAS KYI BSTAN RTZIS CHEN MOR BOD DANG, BOD CHEN PO YONGS

RDZOGS SU MI 'BOR 'BUM PHRAG DRUG CU THAM PA (SA YA DRUG) YOD TSUL GSUNGS YOD PA 'DZAM

GLING SPYIR BTANG MI 'BOR 'PHEL RGYAS LA GZHIGS TSE DA MTSAMS MI 'BOR LDAB LHAG NGES PAR

YONG DGOS RGYU YIN YANG, SA SKYA DANG, SNE GDONG, DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG PA'I SKABS SOGS

LA MI 'BOR 'DI TZAM ZHES MI RTZIS KYI GSAL KHA GNANG BA'I YIG CHA MA MTHONG RUNG, RAB BYUNG

15 PA'I LCAGS SPRE 1920 LOR RGYAL BSTAN CHAB SRID BSRUNG CHED DUS BSTUN GA-YUL MKHO'I

YO CHAS THON GSAR SGRUB BYED DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM KHONGS MI RE NAS tAm GNYIS RE BSDU

BZHES SKABS, BDAG GI MES PO RTZIS ZUR ZHVA SGAB PA BSTAN 'DZIN NOR RGYAS MCHOG NAS MI GRANGS

'BUM BZHI BCU SKOR BYUNG TSUL GSUNGS YOD CES RGAN PO'I NGAG RGYUN LA SHOD SROL LTAR MDO SMAD AA

MDO KHUL BSNAN NA MI GRANGS 'BUM DRUG CU ZER BA TSAD MA LTA BUR MNGON ZHING, BAR LAM RGYA DMAR

NAS MI BRTZIS BYAS PA'I GSAR SHOG CIG NANG, BOD RANG SKYONG LJONGS KHONGS SU MI GRANGS KHRI

NYIS BRGYA LNGA BCU YOD TSUL GSAL BA, 'BRI CHU PHAN DANG, MDO SMAD (AA MDO) KHUL BSNAN

NA DMA' MTHAR 'BUM PHRAG DRUG CU LHAG YOD CES BRJOD THUB BAM SNYAM,

SKAD DANG YI GE, PHYI RGYAL GYI SGRA'I BRTAG DPYAD MKHAS PA RNAMS KYIS BRJOD NA,

BOD SKAD DANG, SBAR MA'I (BUR MA) SKAD 'BREL BA YOD CAL SE SBEL 9 (PEOPLE OF TIBET, P.9) YOD TSUL ZER BA, 'DI NI SBAR MA PA

@030 RNAMS BOD KYI RIGS LAS MCHED PA KHONG CAG GI RGYAL RABS SU GSAL BA MA ZAD, LO BRGYA PHRAG

DRUG PA'I NANG NAS SBAR MA'I STOD RNAMS BOD KYI MNGA' 'OG TU LO MANG BSDAD GSHIS BOD PA'I SKAD

NAS SBAR MA'I SKAD DU 'BREL BA BYUNG BA ZHIG YIN PA DEB DKAR 7-BA-5, PA DANG, DE BZHIN SBAL TI SI THAN (BALISTAN)

YUL SKAD LA'ANG BOD SKAD DANG HA CANG 'BREL CHE YOD PA DE YANG LO BRGYA PHRAG DRUG PA DANG, BDUN

PA'I NANG DE DAG BOD KYI CHAB KHONGS SU GTOGS PA DANG, BOD PA'I DMAG MIS LO MANG SA SRUNG DU

BSDAD PA DEB 'DI'I SHOG GRANGS NANG GSAL PO YOD,

BOD SKAD DANG, BOD YIG GI 'BREL BA YOD PA'AM, KHYAB PA'I SA KHUL NI,

LHO 'BRUG DANG, 'BRAS LJONGS, LA DVAGS, MON PA, SHAR PA DANG, RTA MANG SOGS KYI SKAD LA

ZUR CUNG ZAD RE CHAG PA LAS, RTZA BA BOD SKAD RANG SMRA BA DANG, CHOS KYANG BOD YIG DBU CAN RANG

KLOG 'DON BYED PA DANG, SOG YUL DU'ANG MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS DANG, MTSAN NYID SOGS BOD

YIG RANG GI THOG NAS KLOG 'DON BYED PA SOGS DE LTA BU'I SA YUL HA CANG GI RGYA CHEN PO YOD PA RED,

DE BZHIN BOD CHOL KHA GSUM RTZA BA'I SKAD GCIG PA RANG YIN YANG, LUNG TSAN SO SOR SGRA GDANGS

KYI 'GYUR BA DANG, ZUR CHAG CUNG ZAD RE YOD PA'I DBANG GIS ZHIB CHA BYAS TE MA NYAN NA LAM SENG

GO RTOGS DKA' YANG, YI GE NI CHOL KHA GSUM GANG DU PHYIN YANG GO BRDA MI 'PHROD PA GTAN

NAS YONG MI SRID,

@034 BON CHOS THOG MA 'DI NAS BYUNG BA MNGON, THU KAN GRUB MTHA' SHES GYI ME LONG 164-BA-1, ZHES GSAL BA DANG, YANG RGYAL RABS KHA SHAS SU, PU

DE GUNG RGYAL, ( BYA KHRI BTZAN PO) GYI DUS SU ZHANG ZHUNG NAS BON GYI CHOS DAR TSUL GSAL BA BCAS

GANG LTAR BOD KYI NANG CHOS LUGS KYI THOG MA BON YIN PA RTZOD MA PA MED,

DE YANG BOD DU DAR BA'I NANG PA'I CHOS LA MDO DANG SNGAGS GNYIS YOD,

MDO PHYOGS LA RGYUD PA LAS, GSAR RNYING GI RNAM GZHAG MED, THEG PA CHEN PO GSANG SNGAGS KYI

CHOS LA RNYING MA DANG, GSAR MA ZHES BRJOD PA RED, DE'I TSAD NI, PAndITA SMRAi TI DZNYA NA KIRTI YAN

CHOD DU BSGYUR BA'I RGYUD RNAMS LA GSANG SNGAGS RNYING MA DANG, LO TZ'A BA RIN CHEN BZANG PO PHYIN

CHAD DU BSGYUR BA RNAMS LA GSANG SNGAGS GSAR MA PA ZHES GSUNGS PA'I SROL YOD PA LTAR, GSANG

SNGAGS RNYED MA NI, MNGA' BDAG CHEN PO KHRI SRONG LDE'U BTZAN GYI SKU DUS SANGS RGYAS GNYIS PA AO

@035 DE BLA CHEN DGONGS PA RAB GSAL LA DGE TSUL SLONG GI SDOM PA STZAL BA LAS KLU MES SOGS DBUS GTZANG

@036 GRAGS PA'I SROL GTOD, PHU CHUNG PA GZHON NU RGYAL MTSAN, PO TO BA RIN CHEN GSAL, SPYAN MNGA' BA

TSUL KHRIMS 'BAR TE BKA' GDAMS SKU MCHED GSUM NAS DER ZHING DEB SNGON CHA PA DANG, PHAN CHEN BSOD GRAGS KYI BKA' GDAMS CHOS 'BYUNG YID KI MDZES RGYAN, PA MDZAD PA YIN NO, ,

LAM 'BRAS PA'AM, SA SKYA PA NI, 'BROG MI LO TZ'A BA SH'AKYA YE SHES KYIS RGYA GAR

DU BYON NAS PAn CHEN SH'ANTI PA DANG, PRADZNY'A AINDRA RU TZE SOGS MKHAS PA SGO DRUG LA BTUGS SHING,

DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO DANG, LAM 'BRAS SOGS GSAN, RGYA BAL LA LO NGO BCU GSUM BZHUGS,

SLOB GNYER MTHAR PHYIN TE BOD DU BYON ZHING, MYU GU LUNG BTAB, PAn CHEN GA YA DHA RA YANG GDAN

RNAM THAR BLA MA 'PHAGS BOD KYI LO RGYUS, SOGS PAS DAR RGYAS SU MDZAD DO, ,

BKA' BRGYUD PA NI, SHANGS PA BKA' BRGYUD PA DANG, DVAGS PO BKA' BRGYUD

PA GNYIS LAS, DANG PO NI, MKHAS GRUB KHYUNG PO RNAL 'BYOR PAS RGYA GAR DU BYON TE PAn CHEN MEE TRI PA

DANG, RDO RJE GDAN PA CHEN PO, NI GU MA LA SOGS MKHAS GRUB MANG PO BSTEN, BOD DU BYON NAS CHOS

'KHOR RGYA CHER BSKOR TE BZHUGS YUL GTZANG GI SHANGS PHYOGS SU YIN PAS SHANGS PA BKA' BRGYUD

PAR GRAGS SHING, DE'I SLOB MA SME'U STON PA DANG, RMOG LCOG PA, ZHANG SGOM CHOS SENG, LA STOD

PA DKON MCHOG MKHAR SOGS SGRUB BRGYUD KYI BLA MA RNAMS NAS DAR RGYAS SU MDZAD PA DANG, GNYIS PA,

DVAGS PO BKA' BRGYUD PA NI, LHO BRAG MAR PA LO TZ'A BA CHOS KYI BLO GROS KYIS RGYA GAR DU LAN GSUM DANG

BAL POR LAN BZHI BYON, DPAL NA RO PA DANG, MEE TRI PA, SA RA HA LA SOGS PA BLA MA MANG PO BSTEN

@037 NAS BOD DU BYON, SLOB MA NAM MKHA'I SKAR TSOGS LTA BU BYUNG BA'I NANG NAS BKA' BABS BZHI LAS,

SGRUB BRGYUD KYI BKA' BABS GUNG THANG GI MI LA BZHAD PA RDO RJE, DE'I SLOB MA MNYAM MED DVAGS PO

LHA RJES BKA' PHYAG CHU BO GNYIS 'DRES DVAGS PO BKA' BRGYUD DEB SNGON NYA PA, CES MTSAN CHAGS, DVAGS PO BKA'

BRGYUD LA'ANG CHE BZHI, CHUNG BRGYAD, 'BRUG PA BKA' BRGYUD BCAS WA GHNdIS MDZAD PA BKA' BRGYUD CHE BZHI, CHUNG BRGYAD KYI NGOS 'DZIN BYED TSUL, BYUNG BA LAS, BKA' BRGYUD CHE

BZHI NI, 'BA' ROM PA DAR MA DBANG PHYUG LAS 'BA' ROM BKA' BRGYUD, PHAG GRU RDO RJE RGYAL PO

LAS PHAG GRU BKA' BRGYUD, KHAMS PA DBU SE'AM, KARMA PA DUS GSUM MKHYEN PA LAS KAM TSANG

BKA' BRGYUD, DPON SGOM TSUL KHRIMS SNYING PO'I SLOB MA ZHANG BRTZON 'GRUS GRAGS PA LAS TSAL PA

BKA' BRGYUD DE BZHI BYUNG, YANG CHUNG BRGYAD NI, DPAL PHAG MO GRU PA'I SLOB MA SKYOB PA 'JIG RTEN

MGON PO LAS 'BRI GUNG BKA' BRGYUD, THANG PA BKRA SHIS DPAL RGYAL LAS STAG LUNG BKA' BRGYUD,

GRUB THOB GLING RAS PA PADMA RDO RJE LAS GLING RAS BKA' BRGYUD, 'GRO MGON RGYA TSA KHU DPON LAS KHRO PHU

BKA' BRGYUD, CHOS RJE RMAR PA GRUB THOB LAS RMAR TZANG BKA' BRGYUD, YEL PA BKRA SHIS BRTZEd

PA LAS YEL PA BKA' BRGYUD, ZA RA YE SHES SENG GE LAS GA-YA' BZANG BKA' BRGYUD, SNYID BU GYER GOMS CHEN PO LAS SHUGS GSEB BKA' BRGYUD DE BRGYAD DO, ,'BRUG PA BKA' BRGYUD NI, GRUB

THOB GLING RAS PA PADMA RDO RJE'I SLOB MA CHOS RJE RGYA RAS PA YE SHES RDO RJE LAS 'BRUG PA BKA' BRGYUD BYUNG

ZHING, DE'I SLOB MA RGYAL BA RGOD TSANG PA LAS STOD 'BRUG GNAM GYI SKAR MA, GLING RAS PA'I SLOB MA RGYAL

BA LO RAS PA LAS SMAD 'BRUG SA YI DREGS PA, GLING RAS PA'I SLOB MA DBU CHE NYIS STONG BRGYAD BRGYA DBU CHE NYIS STONG BRGYAD BRGYAD PA'I SKOR LA, 'GRO MGON GTZANG PA RGYA RAS PA'I RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR DAD PA'I RLABS 'PHRENG NANG, DGA'

YES SOGS RNAL 'BYOR PA GSUM, GA-YAG RAS SOGS RAS PA GSUM, RAS ZHIG SOGS ZHIG PO BZHI, DAM PA GTER KHUNG PA SOGS DAM PA GSUM,

@038 BAR 'BRUG ,DBON RAS DAR MA SENG GE LAS GDAN SA BRGYUD PA BCAS BYUNG STE BKA' BRGYUD KYI

BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS SU MDZAD DO,,

ZHI BYED PA NI, PHA DAM PA SANGS RGYAS KYIS DAM CHOS SDUG BSNGAL ZHI BYED KYI

CHOS BSTAN, DE'I SLOB MA SKYO SH'AKYA YE SHES, RMA CHOS KYI SHES RAB, SO DGE 'DUN 'BAR, MA

GCIG LAB KYI SGROL MA, SKAM YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN SOGS SLOB MA BSAM GYIS DEB SNGON NA PA DANG, PA PA, MI KHYAB PA BYON TE DAR RGYAS MDZAD,

JO NANG PA NI, KUN SPANGS THUGS RJE BRTZON 'GRUS KYIS JO MO NANG DU DGON PA

BTAB CING, KUN MKHYEN DOL PO BA DANG, KUN SPANGS CHOS GRAGS, JO NANG KUN DGA' SGROL MCHOG

SOGS NAS DAR RGYAS SU MDZAD PA YIN NO,,

BKA' GDAMS GSAR MA'AM, ZHVA SER RI BO DGE LDAN PA NI, KHAMS GSUM

CHOS KYI RGYAL PO SHAR TZONG KHA PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PAS MDO KHAMS SMAD NAS DBUS SU BYON, BKA'

PHYAG SA SKYA LA SOGS PA'I BLA MA MANG PO'I ZHABS LA BTUGS NAS, GSAN BSAM SGOM GSUM

MTHAR PHYIN PA MDZAD DE, SPYOD PHYOGS THOGS MED KYI RJES ZHUGS BKA' GDAMS PA DANG, LTA BA

KLU SGRUB YAB SRAS LTAR BSKYANGS PAS BKA' GDAMS GSAR MA PA'AM, ZHVA SER RI BO DGE LDAN

(LUGS) PA'I SROL GTOD, GDAN SA CHEN PO DGA' LDAN RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING BTAB, LHA LDAN

SMON LAM CHEN MO'I MCHOD RGYUN SROL 'DZUGS MDZAD, KHONG GI SLOB MA RGYAL TSAB DAR MA RIN CHEN DANG,

MKHAS GRUB DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE 'DUN GRUB PA LA SOGS DGA' LDAN CHOS 'BYUNG BEEdUR SER PO, PAS

DAR RGYAS YUN RING DU GNAS PAR MDZAD PA YIN NO,,

GONG GI CHOS LUGS DE DAG GI MTSAN THOGS TSUL NI, DPER NA RNYING MA BA

@039 ZHES DUS RABS KYI SGO NAS MTSAN BTAGS PA DANG, SA SKYA PA, STAG LUNG PA, 'BRI GUNG PA, 'BRUG

PA; DGE LDAN PA ZHES CHAGS YUL GNAS KYI SGO NAS MTSAN BTAGS, KARMA BKA' BRGYUD, BU LUGS

PA ZHES SLOB DPON GYI SGO NAS MTSAN BTAGS, BKA' GDAMS PA, RDZOGS CHEN PA, PHYAG CHEN PA,

ZHI BYED PA LTA BU GDAMS PA'I SGO NAS MTSAN BTAGS PA YIN ZHES GSUNGS PA DANG, DE LTAR GONG GI

CHOS LUGS RNAMS KYI NANG NAS BON GYI CHOS LUGS TZAM MA GTOGS DE BYINGS BLA MA SO SO'I PHYAG

BZHES DANG, SLOB MA LAM LA BKRI BA'I RIM PA MDZAD TSUL LA BRTEN NAS CHOS LUGS MI 'DRA PA'I

MING THOGS PA TZAM LAS, DON SNYING STON PA SH'AKYA THUB PA'I BKA' SROL DRI MA MED PA KHO NA MDZAD PA

LAS, GZHAN LOGS SU MED PAS, DENG DUS PHYI RGYAL MI RIGS RNAMS NAS BOD KYI CHOS LUGS

RNAMS LA TSA GRANG LTA BU'I 'GAL ZLA YOD 'DRA'I MTHONG PHYOGS BYED PA MA ZAD, SANGS RGYAS KYI BKA'

LA BLA MA MKHAS PA RNAMS KYIS BCOS LHAD BYAS PAS BLA MA'I CHOS ZHES SMRA BA DE NI HA CANG GI NOR

'KHRUL CHEN PO ZHIG YIN PAS, DE'I SKOR ^ SKYABS MGON T'A LA'I BLA MA SKU 'PHRENG BCU BZHI PA CHEN

POS DPE DON DANG BCAS MDZUB STON GNANG YOD PA NI, MI 'GA' SHAS NAS BOD KYI CHOS DE BLA MA'I

CHOS RED CES, SANGS RGYAS KYIS GSUNGS PA'I CHOS MIN PA LTA BU BRJOD MKHAN YOD KYANG, DE 'DRA

MIN, GANG YIN ZHE NA, BOD KYI NANG PA'I CHOS LUGS THAMS CAD KYI 'BYUNG KHUNGS MDO DANG, RGYUD

SDE RNAMS THOG MAR GSUNG BA PO STON PA SANGS RGYAS KYIS GSUNGS, BAR DU RGYA GAR GYI PAndITA CHEN PO RNAMS KYIS MDO RGYUD KYI DGONGS DON RNAMS DPYAD GSUM RNAM PAR DAG PA'I RIGS PA'I LAM

LAS DRANGS TE BSHAD CING GTAN LA PHAB, THA MAR BOD GANGS CAN GYI RGYAL BLON BYANG CHUB SEMS

DPA' RNAMS DANG, SNGON GYI LO TZ'A BA BKA' DRIN CAN RNAMS KYIS NOR LONGS SPYOD LTA CI, LUS DANG,

SROG LA'ANG MI LTA PA'I DKA' SPYAD DANG, BRTZON 'GRUS DRAG POS RGYA BAL GYI YUL GRU DU MA CHU

BZHIN DU NYUL TE RTZOD MED YONGS SU GRAGS PA'I PAndITA DANG, GRUB THOB MANG PO MNYES PA GSUM

@040 GYIS MNYES PAR BYAS NAS GDAMS PA RNAMS GSAN ZHING, GSUNG RAB BOD SKAD DU BSGYUR BA DE RNAMS

YIN, DE DAG GZHI DANG, RTZA BAR BZUNGS NAS NYAN BSAM SGOM GSUM BYED PA MA GTOGS, DE DAG DANG

MI MTHUN PA'I CHOS BOD KYI BLA MAS RANG BZO BYAS PA GCIG KYANG MED, DPER NA BOD KYI NANG PA'I CHOS GA

'DRA ZHIG YIN RUNG, CHOS KYI GNAD DON SKOR DOGS SEL DANG, KHUNGS GTUGS DGOS PA CUNG ZAD

CIG BYUNG NA'ANG SANGS RGYAS KYI GSUNGS NGAM, RGYA GAR PAn GRUB GANG RUNG ZHIG GI GSUNG LA KHUNGS GTUGS

NAS BYED PA YIN NO, LEGS BSHAD BLO GSAR MIG 'BYED, ,ZHES GSUNGS YOD,

DE BZHIN BOD KYI NANG SPRUL SKU DANG, GDUNG 'DZIN, DBON CHOS MDZAD SOGS

'GA' ZHIG LAS, DGA' LDAN KHRI PA, MKHAN PO, BLA MA, SLOB DPON, DGE BSHES SOGS GA 'DRA

ZHIG YIN YANG, RANG GI SHES BYA YON TAN GYI THOG NAS MTHON POR SLEBS PA ZHIG MA GTOGS, RIGS

RUS MTHO DMA' DANG, 'BYOR RGUD LA SOGS PA'I RNAM DBYE RTZA BA NAS MED PA DANG, DES MTSAD, BOD

KYI NANG BON PO, KHA CHE, HIN DU, YE SHU PA SOGS CHOS LUGS GA 'DRA ZHIG BYED KYANG, RANG RANG SO SO'I

'DOD PA LAS, GZHUNG GI KHRIMS THOG NAS DGAG BYA GANG YANG MED DO, ,

SA MTHO DMA' DANG, GNAM GSHIS SKOR, BOD KYIS CHA RNAMS RI BO'I SGANG LA CHAGS PA'I THANG

LTA BU YIN PAS BYANG 'BROG PHAL CHER RGYA MTSO NAS GOM PA'I MTHO TSAD (PHI KRI) ZHES PA 14000 TZAM

GYI SGANG LA GNAS SHING, RONG PA DMA' SHOS RNAMS RKANG TSAD (PHI KRI) 3000 TZAM LA YOD PA RED,

'ON KYANG ZHING PA PHAL CHE BA NI GOM TSAD (PHI KRI) 7000 NAS 12000 TZAM GYI BAR LA SDOD KYI YOD, RGYAL

SA LHA SA NI RKANG TSAD (PHI KRI) 11000 SGANG LA CHAGS YOD PA RED,

GNAM GSHIS KYI SKOR LA, BYANG PHYOGS MTHO SA RNAMS GRANG LA, LHO PHYOGS

DMA' SA RNAMS DRO BAS TSA GRANG GI TSAD LA NGES PA MED KYANG, RGYAL SA LHA SA LTA BUR CHA BZHAG NA, DBYAR

@041 TSA TSAD MTHO SHOS PHE RAN HE KRI (85 FAHRENHEIT I SUMMER) ZHES PA'I TSAD

BRGYAD CU GYA LNGA DANG, DGUN DMA' SHOS PHE RAN HE KRI (4 FAHRENHEIT IN WINTER) GRANGS

BZHI'I BAR LA BABS PA RED, LHO PHYOGS HI MA LA YA'I RI BRGYUD LA DBYAR CHAD ZHOD CHE ZHING, DGUN

GANGS KYANG MANG PO BABS RUNG, SPYIR BTANG LO 'KHOR GCIG LA CHAR TSAD SOR (AIN CI) BCO BRGYAD NAS, DMA' TSAD SOR (AIN CI) BCU SKOR MTHO TSAD DANG, TSA TSAD, GRANG TSAD, CHAR TSAD RNAmS DE SNGON LHA SAR SDOD PA'I DBYIN JI DANG, RGYA GAR SKU TSAB CHO'I YIG CHAR

TSAD 'DZIN BYAS PA YIN, YIN, BYANG PHYOGS LA GANGS MTHO LNGA DRUG LAS MA BABS

KYANG, RLUNG POS MA DED NA 'PHRAL 'PHRAL BZHU MA THUB PAS SEMS CAN LA RTZA ZA MED PAS SKYON CHEN PO

BYED, DUS DE NI 'BROG PA RNAMS KYI DKA' NGAL CHE SHOS SHIG RED, GZHI RTZA RLUNG SKAM POR BRTEN

BRLAN GSHER MED PA'I SAR BRTZIGS PA'I BKAR KHANG NANG 'BRU DANG, GRO, SRAN MA SOGS LO LNGA BCU,

DRUG CU BAR NYAR TSAGS BYED THUB PAS GZHUNG DANG, DGON SDE CHE KHAG, SA BDAG 'BYOR LDAN

RNAMS NAS PHUGS GSOG BKAR 'BRU NYAR MKHAN SHIN TU MANG PO YOD, DE BZHIN MAR YANG KO BA'I LTANG

(KO BAS THUM BUR GTUMS PA'I) RGYAB STE BSIL SAR BZHAG NA LO 'KHOR GNYIS SAM, GSUM BAR

NYAR THUB PA DANG, SHA YANG SKAM SERN BZOS TE BSIL SAR BZHAG NA LO 'KHOR GNYIS TZAM NYAR THUB KYI

YOD PAR BRTEN YUL LA LO NYES LO KHA SHAS BYUNG YANG, MU GES GNOD SKYON CHEN PO MI YONG BA DANG, MI

PHYUGS YONG LA TSAD RIMS DANG, GNYAN RIMS DAG MANG PO MI YONG BA'I KHYAD CHOS CHEN PO YOD PA RED,

'DUG,

WA MO NAG PO SHIN TU DKON ZHING, GAL TE YOD NA GZHIS BDAG GI SGO ZOR

YIN ZHES RTZA CHER BYED, 'PHYI BA DKAR PO NI SGOM CHEN ZHES RNGON PAS DE BSAD NA, YUL LA MI SHIS

PA 'BYUNG BA DANG, GSOD MIR YANG MI RABS RGYUD BCAS STONG TSUL SOGS LO RGYUS SNYAN PO MANG PO

SHOD SROL 'DUG,

'BU SRIN NI, SBRUL DANG, SDIG PA RVA CAN, SDOM, RKANG BRGYA LAG BRGYA,

'BU CHA GA PA (AA TSAG TSAG PA) SI LI SBIS KHOG, SBIS KHOG, SHO MO KHOG KHOG, GROG MA, TZANG

PA KHA RAL, BYE MA MYU GU, RTA BLA, 'BUNG MA (MUG PA) SBRANG MA, SBRANG BU ( SHA SBRANG YANG ZER) DUG
