@045 RTZO KA, NE TZO, SPU SHUD, BDUD 'GONG, PHUG RON ('ANG GU) KHANG BYI'U, 'DAG BYI'U, KHUG RTA,

RMOS 'DEBS, AAB BYANG SA DAG NA AAB RA DANG MNYAM TSANG GCIG GI NANG LA SDOD PA'I BYI'U LA ZER, BYI'U, RI BYI'U, MTHEB BYI'U, GONG MO, SREG PA, BYA NGANG, BYA LONG, BYA BZHAR,

ZE MONG, 'UG PA, SRIN BYA, PAG BYI'U'AM, GA PHUG RON SOGS MANG PO ZHIG YOD, BYA RGOD DANG,

'UG PA, SRIN BYA SOGS GRONG KHYER GYI KHANG PA'I YANG THOG BABS PA DANG, SKAD RGYAB NA BKRA MI SHIS

PA'I MTSAN MAR NGOS 'DZIN BYED, BYANG PA RNAMS NAS BYA LONG DANG, BYA BZHAR GNYIS GCIG PHAN

GCIG GROGS BYED PA'I LO RGYUS MANG PO SHOD SROL YOD PA DANG, DE BZHIN BYA RGO BOS 'PHYI BA GNAS

SPOS SKABS 'KHUR TE 'GRO BA'I LO RGYUS KYANG SHOD SROL YOD,

GSHER LA GNAS PA NI, KHRUNG KHRUNG DANG, NGANG PA, DUR PA, BYA GAG, CHU SKYAR,

CHU BYA, SO TO ROG PO, NYA, SBAL PA, GANGS CHE MCHOG 'DUS PA RTZAL GYI 'BYUNG BA BRJOD PA GDUNG BA'I MUN SEL NANG, SNE GDONG PHYOGS SU GSHAM CHU THOG MAR THON PA'I DUS, SBAL, SRAM, RUS SBA, SDIG SRIN, 'JONG

MO SOGS GRANGS KYIS MI LANGS, PI LHA MO'AM, 'JU LAG CES GTZANG CHU CHEN PO'I NANG DU MI ZOd

LA GNOD 'TSE BYED PA'I SEMS CAN LUS KUN SEN MO 'DRA BAS KHEBS PA ZHIG YOD TSUL ZER BA DE NI RGYA GAR DANG, SBAR MA'I NAGS GSEB DANG, NYE BA'I RGYA MTSOR GNAS PA'I KOL KO KRAL

(CRODILE) ZHES PA ZHIG YOD PA DE MIN NAM SNYAM, LHA SA'I NUB PHYOGS 'DAM RA CHEN MO'I

NANG MTSO GLANG YOD PA DNGOS SU MTHONG MI MA BYUNG YANG, MTSAN MO GLANG GI SKAD RGYAB PA THOS PA DANG,

LCI BA BTANG BZHAG PA MTHONG MYONG MKHAN NI LHA KLU SKOR PA DANG, SKYID TSAL KLU SDING PA, 'JA'

MTSON CHU MIG GI GLING SRUNG PA SOGS NAS RTZE MTHUN GLENG, YANG DNGUL CHU DHRMA BHA DRA'I RNAM THAR NANG,

@046 LCAGS PHAG 1851 ZLA 1 TSES 5-6 LA PHUN TSOGS GLING GI LCAGS ZAM GYI 'OG TU ABAL

'BRUG SHIN TU CHE BA ZHIG ZHAG GNYIS GSUM BSDAD PA YUL MI MANG POS MTHONG TSUL GSUNGS DBYANGS CAN GRUB RDOR GYIS MDZAD PA RJE DHRMA BHA DRA'I RNAM THAR ZHVA SER BSTAN PA'I MDZES RGYAN, 'DUG PA

DER GZHIGS TSE BOD KYI GTZANG PO DANG, MTSO'I NANG SROG CHAGS KHYAD MTSAR 'GA' SHAS NGES PAR

DU YOD PAR SEMS, YANG GANGS KHROD DANG, GA-YA' KHROD LA MI RGOD CES MI 'DRA BA STOBS CHEN LUS

KUN SPUS KHENGS PA ZHIG YANG YANG YONG BA DNGOS SU MTHONG MYONG MKHAN GRO MO GE BSHES SKU GONG MA

NGAG DBANG SKAL BZANG RIN PO CHE'I ZHABS GRAS 'BROG DPON ZLA BA LDANG, RNAM RGYAL, LCI SHING 'THU

MI AA NE AA DAR SOGS YOD MIG GI MTHONG MYONG MKHAN SKOR GRO MO DGE BSHES RIN PO CHE'I MCHOG SPRUL RGYAL BSTAN 'JIGS MED NAS GSUNGS PA DANG, SKAD THOS PA DANG,

RKANG RJES MTHONG MYONG SKOR GRO SMAD SHAR RI KHYIM GSAR GONG 'THUS 'PHRIN LAS MTSO MO DANG, KHONG GI BU NGA'I GROGS PO BLO BZANG DON YOD

LAGS NAS KHO BOR GSUNG BYUNG, PA DANG, MI RGOD KYI SKAD THOS PA DANG, RKANG PA'I RJES MTHONG MYONG

BRJOD MKHAN YANG GRO MO STOD SMAD NANG MANG PO YOD PA DANG, DE BZHIN GA-YA' KHROD DANG, RDZA KHROD DU RDZA

MI ZHES PA'I MI 'PHAN PO'I NANG BZHUGS GANGS SKYA RIN PO CHE ZHU BA NAS, 'DAM SMAD KHANG DMAR DGON GYI MTSAMS PA BLO BZANG NYI MA LAGS BRGYUD RDZA

MI'I KA PA LA YIN ZHES SPRE'U'I KA PA LI 'DRA BA SMUG NAG CHUR CHUR ZHIG LA DNGUL GYI NANG MCHOD BTEGS KHEBS 'TSAG LDAN SPUS DAG

CHA TSANG ZHIG ZHU YIG TSIGS BCAD MA DANG BCAS SER SNGAGS MKHAN ZUR BSTAN 'DZIN BRTZON 'GRUS RIN PO CHER PHUL GNANG 'DUG

PA'I ZHU YIG NANG, RDZA MI'I KA LI NOR BU RIN THANG MED, ,'DI NI SHIN TU RNYED DKA'I KHYAD NOR YIN, ,ZHES KA LI DANG,

ZHU YIG NGO MA MJAL MYONG, CHUNG ZHIG KYANG YOD TSUL BRJOD MI YANG 'DUG,

BOD KYI GANGS RI MTHON PO 'GA' ZHIG NANG SENG GE DKAR PO, RAL PA SNGON PO

CAN YOD TSUL BRJOD SROL YOD, MTHONG MYONG BA NI NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS RGYA MTSO'AM (RIN CHEN

@047 TSANGS DBYANGS RGYA MTSO'I) RNAM THAR RNAM THAR SNYAN LHA'I TMBU RA'I RGYUD KYI SGRA DBYANGS 34-BA-4 PAR RJE 'DI 'O DE GUNG RGYAL GYI GANGS RI'I RTZER PHEBS SKABS

KHYI'I RJES 'DRA BA MTHONG, RJES DED TE PHYIN PAS, SKABS SHIG RGYANG NAS RA PHO SNGON PO 'DRA BA ZHIG MTHONG, NYE BAR SLEBS PA NA

SENG GE RAL PA CAN ZHIG 'DUG ,CES GSAL BA DANG, GZHAN BLA MA DANG, GRUB THOB 'GA' SHAS LA

MI MA YIN GYIS SENG GE'I 'O MA YIN ZHES PHUL TE RIN CHEN RIL BU DANG, BYIN RTEN KHAG NANGPHAB RGYUN BZHUGS

PA'I LO RGYUS MANG PO YOD,

BYA KHYUNG (GHA RU dA) ZHES PA'I 'DAB CHAGS MI GZUGS CAN CHEN PO ZHIG SNGAR

BOD LA BYUNG TSUL YIG CHA KHA SHAS LA GSAL BA TZAM MA ZAD, DE'I RIGS BRGYUD KYANG YOD PA'I LO RGYUS KONG SPRUL YON TAN RGYA MTSO'I RANG RNAM NOR BU SNA TSOGS MDOG CAN 6-BA-3,

DANG, DE GNAS PA'I BRAG PHUG KYANG GNAS BSHAD SHOD RGYUN ZHIG KYANG 'DUG ,DGON RNYING 'GA' SHAS

LA BYA KHYUNG GI SGO NGA YIN ZER BA'I SGO NGA CHEN PO RTEN KHROD LA BSGRIGS PA DAG 'DUG PA DE TSO NI AA PHE RI KA'I

NANG YOD AO SE KRE CI (OSTRICH) ZER BA'I BYA CHEN DE'I SGO NGA YIN PAR NGES SHING, KHYUNG GI LO RGYUS

LTAR BYAS NA SGO NGA DE TSO LAS BRGYA 'GYUR KHA SHAS KYI CHE BA ZHIG DGONGS NGES RED,

'BRUG CES BRIS CHA'I NANG YOD PA'I SEMS CAN DE'I SKOR LA, BYANG GNAM MTSO KHA

PA DANG, BYA RDO DGON GYI BLA GRVA, GNAM RU KHUL GYI 'BROG PA MANG PO BCAS KYIS DBYAR DUS GNAM MTSO

PHYUG MO'I NANG NAS SMUG PA DANG MNYAM DU 'BRUG NAM MKHAR 'GRO TSUL DANG, SKABS RE RGYANG RING PO'I

SPRIN GSEB NAS 'BRUG GI MJUG MA KHRA SHAR SHAR BA SNAR TE BSGUL BA'I TSE CHAR RLUNG 'DRES MA RGYAG TSUL

MTHONG MYONG MANG POS RTZE MTHUN BRJOD RKYEN DE DE SKOR DA DUNG ZHIB RTZAD BYED MUS, NYE DUS DIL MGO MKHYEN

BRTZE RIN PO CHE THEG MCHOG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN LA BKA' 'DRI ZHUS PAR, RDZA STOD KHUL LA RGYANG RING

POR SMUG PA DANG MNYAM DU 'BRUG GCIG SAL BABS PA DANG, GCIG NAM MKHAR 'GRO BA DUS

@048 GCIG LA GZIGS MYONG BA MA ZAD, RIN PO CHE RANG GI YAB DES DBYAR THAN PA CHE SKABS SHIG KHYIM GYI CHU

GSOG ZANGS CHEN NANG 'BRUG GZUGS CHUNG MTHE BONG TZAM ZHIG BSDAD PA GZIGS SHING, DE 'BYUNG BA

DANG 'THAB STE SKAD CIG LA 'UR SGRA DANG BCAS NAM MKHAR 'PHAGS 'GRO BA GZIGS PA RED CES DANG,

DES MA TSAD RIN PO CHE'I YAB LA 'JU MI PHAM RIN PO CHES KYANG, RGYUGS CHU CHUNG CHUNG ZHIG NANG, DENG

DUS RI MOR BRIS PA LTAR GYI BZO DBYIBS KUN TSANG BA LA CHE CHUNG TSON GANG TZAM BYAS PA'I 'BRUG CIG BSDAD

'DUG PA, DER NYIN MO BYIS PA DAG GIS GNOD PA BYAS DOGS SRUNG SKYOBS GNANG STE CHU KHA RANG LA

BZHUGS PA DGONG MTSAMS KHO GZUGS LDAB GCIG TZAM CHE RU PHYIN 'DUG ,MTSAN MO 'UG SGRA DANG

BCAS NAM MKHAR PHYIN PA'I LO RGYUS GSUNGS 'DUG, 'BRUG NI 'BYUNG BA'I RANG BZHIN ZHIG LA BRTEN

CHE CHUNG SKAD CIG MA GCIG LA SPRUL 'GYUR THUB PA YIN TSOD 'DUG ,CES NGA RANG LA DNGOS SU GSUNGS

BYUNG BA, DE LTA'I SROG CHAGS KHYAD MTSAR DAG RANG RE'U YUL DU YOD PA NI HA CANG GI NGO MTSAR BA'I

LO RGYUS 'DUG PAS DA DUNG ZHIB 'JUG NGES PAR DGOS SAM SNYAM,

YANG PHYI RGYAL GYI MTSAN RIG MKHAS PA RNAMS NAS, 'BRUG SKAD NI, SPRIN PA

DANG CHAR RLUNG DRAG TU 'THAB PAS GLOG DANG, SKAD THON PA LAS, 'BRUG CES PA'I SROG CHAGS

MED CES BRJOD PA LTAR, MNGA' BDAG KHRI SRONG LDE'U BTZAN SKABS KYI RGYAL PO BKA'I THANG YIG TU'ANG,

MTSO YI RLANGS PAS MKHA' LA SPRIN DU CHAGS : 'BYUNG BA TSA GRANG 'PHRAD PAS GLOG TU 'KHYUG: DE

NYID 'THAB PAS MKHA' LA 'BRUG SGRA SGROGS: DRAG CING NGAR NA BAR NAS THOG TU BABS: DPER

NA ME LCGS RDOL BRDABS PA BZHIN: BAR NAS ME DANG RIN CEN 'OD ZER 'PHRO: YAR RJE AO RGYAN GLING PAS DGE PA MTHAR RGYAS GLING NAS GTER NAS BZHES PA'I RGYAL PO BKA' THANG KHA ZHES GSAL POR

GSUNGS PAS 'BRUG SKAD NI SEMS CAN 'BRUG CES PA DE'I SKAD MIN PA RGYU MTSAN GSAL PO'I THOG NAS NGOS 'DZIN BYED THUB,

@049 GDAN SA THEL DU SANGS RGYAS 'PHAGS KYI TSEMS YIN ZHES PA'I 'GRAM SO

CHEN PO ZHIG DANG, YANGS CAN DGON DU SRIN PO'I BRANG YIN ZER BA'I BRANG KHOG RTZIB MA DANG BCAS PA HA

CANG CHEN PO ZHIG, 'BRI GUNG THEL DU MI RGOD KYI RKANG THUNG YIN ZER BA'I RKANG THUNG SHIN TU CHEN PO ZHIG

BCAS 'DUG PA, DE TSOR MTSAN RIG MKHAS PAS BRTAG DPYAD BYAS NA SNGAR SNGA MO'I BOD NANG YOD

PA'I SROG CHAGS KYI RUS PA YIN PA NGOS 'DZIN BYED THUB KYI RED,

RANG BYUNG GIS GTER, RANG RE BOD YUL NANG RANG BYUNG GIS GTER MI 'DRA BA SHIN TU

MANG PO ZHIG YOD PAR NGES, 'DIR CHE LONG TZAM BRJOD NA, GSER, DNGUL, ZANGS, LCAGS,

ZHVA NYE, SHA TSE (SHA DKAR) TI TSA, TSVA, BUL, TSVA LA, ZE TSVA, RDO SOL, RDO NAG, BTZAG, MTSAL

(COG LA) SPANG, MTHING, SA DKAR, CU GANG, SA SER, NGANG PA, LDONG ROS, BA BLA, SA DMAR,

RDZA SA, DKAR YOL BZO BYED KYIS, BAL SA, NE LA THOD KHRAG, CONG ZHI, RDO ZHO, RDO SMYON, RDO DKAR,

GA-YANG MTSUR, RDO RGYUS, RDO SGOG DRI CAN, ME RDO, RDO TING NGAM, SGRA SNYAN PO THON PA'I RDO, 'BRUG YUL MI RNAMS NAS 'BRUG GI RUS PA ZHES BRJOD PA DE NI RDO LA 'GYUR 'GRO BA'I RUS PA ZHIG 'DUG PA LO LTAR BLA PHYAG LAS KHUNGS SU KHRAL 'BUL BYED

DGOS, DE NI PHAL CHER SNGAR SNGA MO'I NYA'AM CHU NANG LA GNAS PA'I SEMS CAN CHEN PO ZHIG GI RUS PA YIN PAR NGES, RUS PA DE NI SHANGS RGYA MTSO SPANG

SGANG DGON GYI 'OG GAD PA CHEN PO ZHIG GI NANG NAS 'DZAD MED BRNYES BZHIN PA RED, RUS,

RDO DUNG RDO DUNG DKAR DANG, 'BU KYOG, BYI'U MGO, GA-YU SGONG DE DAG NI BYANG GI GNAM MTSO PHYUG MO NAS THON PAS DE TSO LO SA YA MANG PO'I SNGON GYI MTSO LA

GNAS PA'I SEMS CAN RDO LA 'GYUR BA DAG YIN, DKAR, RDO 'BU KYOG, RDO BYI'U MGO, RDO GA-YUL SGONG SOGS JI SNYED CIG THON BZHIN PA DANG,

DA DUNG THON RGYU NI BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA ZHIG YOD PA GZHIR BCAS SHING, SA GTER DE DAG GZHUNG

@050 DANG, SA BDAG SO SOS SKABS BSTUN DGOS MKHO LTA BUR PHRAN BU RE SDOG 'DON BYED PA LAS, RGYA

CHE'I LAS GZHI DANG BCAS SDOG 'DON NAM YANG MA BYAS KHAR, DE SNGON ZI KHRON DANG, ZI LING KHUL GYI

RGYA MI'I TSONG PA DAG GIS MDO STOD, MDO SMAD KHUL NAS GSER PHRAN BU SDOG 'KHYER BYAS PA LAS,

GZHUNG THOG NAS PHYI'I RGYAL KHAS SU LA'ANG SA GTER 'DON LAS KYI BKA' 'KHROL GNANG YOD PA MA RED,

AING LAN NAS SA GTER BRTAG ZHIB SLOB THON SMON GRONG MKHYEN RAB KUN BZANG

LAS BYA DANG BCAS DBUS PHYOGS SA KHUL 'GA' SHAS LA SA GTER YOD MED BRTAG ZHIG TU GTONG

GNANG MDZAD PA KHONG GIS GSER DANG, ZANGS, LCAGS SA GNAS 'DIR 'DUG GI SKOR THO DANG, SPUS

TSAD 'BUL GNANG MDZAD YOD PA DANG, GZHAN YANG DBYIN JI'I MI RIGS SA GTER MKHAS PA ZHIG NAS

DVAGS PO LHA GSOL KHUL DU GSER GYI GTER KHA RGYA CHE YOD TSUL DANG, DE YANG BOD GZHUNG NAS PHYI

RGYAL SA GTER 'DON LAS MKHAS PA DANG MA RTZA MNYAM SBREL LAM, YANG NA PHYI RGYAL SA GTER TSONG LAS

PAR LO DUS RGYAS DPYAD KYIS GNANG RJES BOD GZHUNG NAS RTZIS BZHES GNANG NA SKU KHE CHEN PO THON TSUL

SLOB STON ZHUS YOD TSOD KYANG, SA GTER 'DON LAS SOGS RGYA CHE BYAS NA NYE 'BREL RGYAL KHAB GZHAN

NAS GCIG LA GNYIS 'GRAN GYI BOD NANG PHYI RGYAL MI RIGS MANG PO YONG STE YUL GOMS GSHIS LUGS

LA SHUGS KYIS GNOD SKYON BYUNG DOGS LAS DON TSANG MA RGYAB BSGYUR GNANG BA YIN TSUL SHOD RGYUN 'DUG

PA MA ZAD, SNGA MO'I LUGS RNYING PHYOGS NAS BSHAD SROL MI 'DRA BA GSUM TZAM 'DUG PA, DANG PO,

SA GTER DE BZHIN MI MA YIN GYIS BDAG TU BZUNG BA'I DNGOS POR BRTEN SDOG 'DON BYAS NA, DE DAG

GI KO LONG PHRAG DOG BYAS TE YUL LA CHAR CHU DUS SU MI 'BEBS PA DANG, NAD YAMS, MU GE, 'KHRUG

RTZOD LA SOGS PA YONG GI RED, ZER BA DANG, GNYIS PA, SA GTER BTON NA YUL GYI SA BCUD

NYAMS TE ZHING 'BROG THON BSKYED DANG, DPAL 'BYOR LA GNOD TSUL ZER, GSUM PA LTAR NA, SA

GTER GAR YOD LUNG PA SO SO'I YUL MIS SHES KYANG, 'DON LAS BYAS NA SKAL PA BZANG PO'I JA

@051 CHANG, DUS TSOD NGAN PA'I KHRAL LA 'JAGS YONG ZHES SNGAR PHRAN BU THON PA'I GTER KHA YANG SA GSUB,

RDO GSUB BYAS TSUL SHOD SROL YOD, DPER NA, DBUS STOD PHAG MO KHUL NAS PHO BRANG GI SKU BTZAG

DANG, SNYE MO BAR 'KHOR KHUL NAS TSON SPANG, MTHING, SHANGS RGYA MTSO KHUL NAS ZHVA NYE, SBUS

SDE KHUL NAS RDO NAG, YANGS CAN DANG, RIN SPUNGS NAS SA DKAR, STOD SGER RTZE, 'BRONG PA, AE,

SDE DGE, NYAG RONG, SMU LI KHUL NAS GSER, CHAB MDO KHUL NAS LCAGS BCAS THON PAS

GTAN 'JAGS KYI KHRAL MO CHE BYUNG BA RED CES SHOD SROL YANG 'DUG ,'DI NI GZHUNG SGER GNYIS KA

NAS SNYING ZHEN MKHREGS 'DZIN BYAS TE YUL SPYI'I DPAL 'BYOR YAR RGYAS KYI MDUN LAM BKAG PA

ZHIG MIN NAM SNYAM, DENG GI DUS SU RGYA DMAR GUNG BRAN TANG NAS BOD YUL LA BTZAN 'DZUL BYAS RJES

SA GTER BRTAG DPYAD TSOGS PAS BOD YUL STOD SMAD BAR GSUM KUN TU NYUL NAS SA GTER MI

'DRA BA RNAM MANG THON RGYU YOD TSUL KHYAB BSGRAGS BYAS PAS MA TSAD, NAG TSANG DANG, KOR MO KHUL

NAS TSVA LA DANG, RDO SNUM, STOD DANG DBUS PHYOGS NAS RDO SOL MANG PO 'DON LAS BYED KYI YOD

PA'I GNAS TSUL GO THOS 'DUG GO,

GOMS GSHIS DANG, SPYOD LAM, SPYIR 'GRO BA MI RNAMS KYI GOMS GSHIS DANG, SPYOD

LAM 'DI DANG, 'DI'O ZHES MTHA' GCIG TU NGES BZUNGS KYIS BRJOD RGYU HA CANG GI KHAG PO ZHIG

YIN, DPER NA, PHA MA GCIG GI BU PHRUG LA'ANG RIG PA YAG NYES DANG, GSHIS KA DANG, SPYOD

LAM LEGS NYES, GZUGS SPYAD SOGS BZANG ZHAN RNAM PA SNA TSOGS SHIG YONG BA TSANG MA'I

MTHONG CHOD LTAR DE DAG RANG RANG GI SKYE BA SNGON MA'I BYAS 'BRAS LAS BYUNG BA GSUNGS YOD KYANG, 'DIR

BOD MI RNAMS KYI GOMS GSHIS SPYIR BTANG LTA BUR BRTZIS NAS BRJOD PAR BYA STE, BOD KYI LO RGYUS KHAG

LA PHA SPRE'U BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I RIGS LAS SNYING RJE CHE BA, GOM SRAN THUB PA, SHES PA BKRA BA,

GZUGS SPYAD LEGS PA, SHING 'BRAS LA DGA' BA SOGS DANG, MA BRAG SRIN MO'I RIGS LAS,

@052 'DOD CHAGS DANG, ZHE SDANG, SER SNA, PHRAG DOG, MIG SER SOGS CHE BA DANG, MDOG NGAN

LA; SHA KHRAG LA DGA' BA BCAS YOD TSUL GSUNGS SHING, THOG MA'I MI RIGS DRUG KYANG, 'GRO

BA RIGS DRUG SO SO NAS MCHED PAS GSHIS SPYOD KYANG MI 'DRA BA RE YOD TSUL SOGS MANG PO ZHIG

GSUNGSYOD, DE DAG LA SE DANG, RMU, LDONG, STONG STE NANG GI RUS CHEN BZHI DANG, DE'I STENG

DBRA DANG, 'BRU BSNAN PAS MI'U GDUNG GA-YA' SEL 381-NA-6 NANG GSAL YANG, BEE SER NANG, DGA', LDONG 'BRU, DBRA, NE BO, DPAL DANG BCAS LA MI'U GDUNG DRUG CES

CUNG MI MTHUN TZAM GSUNGS 'DUG PAS ZHIB 'JUG MDZOD, DRUG TU GRAGS PA BYUNG,

BYE BRAG DBUS GTZANG GI MI RNAMS CHOS LA DAD PA, MI GSHIS 'JAM PA, DRAN

SKYEN PA, PHYI THAG RING BA BCAS DANG, MDO STOD (KHAMS) KYI MI RNAMS DPA' NGAR CHE BA, DRANG

TSUGS THUB PA, BLO BRTAN PA, MDO SMAD (AA MDO) KYI MI RNAMS SHES PA BKRA BA, SPRO THUNG BA,

SDUG SRAN THUB PA YOD TSUL BRJOD PA DANG, RIGS ZHEN NGO BSTOD SPANGS PAS RANG BZHIN DRANG POR

BRJOD NA, BOD RIGS RNAMS LAS DON GANG 'DRA ZHIG BYED KYANG CHOS DANG 'BREL BA CHE BA DANG, BYIS

PA'I DUS NAS 'DRIS PA'I DBANG GIS CHOS LA RANG SHUGS KYIS MOS SHING, BLA MA DANG, DGE 'DUN,

DGE RGAN, PHA MA, RANG LAS RGAN PA RNAMS LA SRI ZHU DANG, PHU DUD BYED PA, RGYUD DRANG ZHING GYONG BA,

KHA DAN LA GNAS PA, CHOG SHES DANG, SNYING RJE CHE BA, SDIG PA LA SHUGS KYIS 'DZEMS PA, LAG

PA SHOG PA, PHYI THAG RING BA, SPYOD LAM DAL BA BCAS YOD PA NI NGES PAR BRJOD THUB,

BOD KYI MI RNAMS RTAGS DANG, RTEN 'BREL, GZA' TSES, RMI LAM SOGS BZANG

NA DGA' MOS DANG, NGAN NA RNAM RTOG CHEN PO BYED, DGA' BSU DANG, RTEN 'BREL GYI SKABS SU BSANGS BSANG GTONG BA DANG, DKAR THIG 'THEN PA RGYA GAR NAS DAR ZHING, BSANG BTANG NA SDIG GRIB BSANGS KYI RED CES PA'I YID CHES BYED PA DANG,

DKAR THIG NI DGA' STON SOGS LA RGYAN SPROS LTA BU RED, GTONG

@053 BA; DKAR THIG 'THEN PA SOGS BYAS YONG, DAR LCOG 'DZUGS PA NI BON PO'I LUGS YIN PAR GRAGS, 'JUGS PA NI RLUNG RTA DAR BA DANG, BSTAN

PA DAR BA'I DAR LCOG CES BOD MI'I THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I RTAGS MTSAN ZHIG YIN PAS, KHANG PA'I YANG

THOG DANG, RI MTHON PO, LA TSAD, BRAG GA-YANG GZAR PO, SHING MTHON PO SOGS LA 'DZUGS SHING,

LHAG PAR RTEN 'BREL CHEN PO BYED PA'I TSE KHAMS MTHUN GYI DAR LCOG 'DZUGS PA DANG, DAR GYI LNGA LDI

'THEN PA, BKRA SHIS KHRA 'BREL 'PHYANG BA, SGO 'GRAM DU DAR CHEN 'DZUGS PA SOGS BYED, KHA

BTAGS NI LHA GOS SNGAR RGYA GAR BAS RTEN MJAL SKABS DANG, BLA MA DANG, DGE 'DUN LA BSNYEN BKUR RAM YON 'BUL SKBS NA BZA' RE 'BUL SROL YOD PA LTAR, RJES SU

BOD LA RIM PAS NA BZO'I DOD LA KHA BTAGS 'BUL BA'I SROL DAR BA MIN NAM SNYAM, KHA BTAGS LA'ANG SPUS LEGS ZHER GYI RNAM GRANGS SHIN TU MANG, SNGA MO'I

NANG MDZOD MA RIG GNYID SANGS MA, DKON MCHOG RIN CHEN MA, BAR THON NYID BDE MA, 'DOM 'KHOR MA, PHYIS THON 'PHRIN LAS DAR RGYAS MA SOGS DANG, DE BZHIN AA SHE,

BAR MDZAD, ZUM PHYI, PHYI MDZOD, BSOD NAMS KHA BTAGS SOGS PHYI MA PHYI MA SPUS ZHAN PA YOD, SAM, LHA RDZAS ZHES RTEN 'BREL GYI RDZAS SHIG TU NGOS 'DZIN GYIS GTZUG LAG KHANG

SOGS LA RTEN MJAL BAR 'GRO BA DANG, BLA MA DANG, DPON PO MJAL BA, BYA DGA' DPA' RTAGS

SPROD PA, CHANG SA SOGS KYI RTEN 'BREL DANG, 'GRU PA THON PA, GSHIN PO'I PHUNG PO PHYIR THON

YAN BYA BA LEGS NYES BZANG NGAN TSANG MAR MED THABS MED PA ZHIG YIN,

GRONG GSEB BAM, YUNG TSAN PHAN TSUN NAS NGO SHES 'DRIS CAN THUG PA DANG,

LAS DON GCOD PAR YONG PA YIN NA SMROS CI DGOS, MTHA' NA GNAS BSKOR BA DANG, LAM NOR

NAS YONG PA YIN NA'ANG KHA STONG PAR MA GTONG ZHES JA 'AM, CHANG DANG RTZAM PA SBYIN PA'I SROL BZANG

YOD, NGO SHES SHIG KHYIM LA YONG PA'I TSE JA PHOR PA'AM, DKAR YOL GANG 'THUNG NA GANG 'THUNG

DGAR LA'ANG MI BYED CES, DO 'AM, GSUM DBU TSUGS KYIS 'DREN,

BOD MI RNAMS LAS KA LEGS PA DANG, GRA 'GRId PA ZHIG BYUNG NA DKON MCHOG

@054 GI THUGS RJE YIN ZHES DGA' GUS BYED PA DANG, RKYEN NGAN NAM, MI 'DOD THOG BABS SHIG BYUNG NA LAS

RED ZER ZHING, SKYE BA SNGON MA'I BYAS 'BRAS TSE 'DIR SMIN PAR YID CHES BYED, DE LA BRTEN NAS DGA'

SDUG DANG, 'BYOR GUD SOGS GANG LA'ANG CHOG SHES CHEN PO BYED PA'I RGYU MTSAN ZHIG 'DI YIN, DKON

MCHOG GSUM LA MCHOD PA DANG, SMON LAM 'DEBS PA DANG, BSNYEN SGRUB BYED PA, KHA 'DON DGE

SBYOR BYED SKABS BCAS PAR SMOS CI DGOS, MDOR NA ZLOS GAR KHRAB PA, SLONG MO BYED PA, DO PO

'OR 'DREN SOGS SHUGS LAS BYED PA, AAR GA BCAGS PA, GYANG BRDUNG PA, ZHING LAS BYED PA,

BRO BRDUNG BA SOGS KYI GZHAS TSIG TSUN LA MA nI SOGS CHOD DANG 'BREL BA SHA STAG YOD,

YANG PHAN TSUN DGA' MIN ZHE BZHAG GIS MI BSAD BYUNG BA YIN NA, SHI MKHAN DE'I

BU TSA RIGS RGYUD NAS GSOD MKHAN NGO MA'AM, MA MTHAR DE'I BU TSA TSUN LA DGRA SHA LEN PA ZHES GSOD

THUB PA'I 'BAD BRTZON BYAS TE PHAN TSUN MI THOG MANG PO GSOD RES BYED PA'I GOMS SROL ZHIG YOD,

DGRA SHA LEN THUB NA MI DE RGOD POR BRTZI MTHONG BYED PA DANG, MA THUB NA RUS 'DRUD PA ZHES MI DES GANG

YANG MI 'BYON PA WA MO LTA BUR DMA' 'JOG BYED, SROL DE NI PHAL CHE BA MDO STOD SMAD GNYIS KYI

NANG YONG GI YOD PA RED, DE BZHIN SNGAR LUNG TSAN PHAN TSUN DGRA SHA LEN RES KYIS LO RGYUN RING PO'I

BAR BDE 'JAGS MED PAR SKABS RE LUNG PA STONGS PA'I LO RGYUS KYANG YOD, DE NI YUL KHRIMS KYIS

NYES CAN LA GNYA' GNON MA THUB PA'I NYER LEN GYIS LAS DON DE 'DRA MI BYED DKA' MED BYUNG BA

ZHIG YIN PAR SEMS,

YANG BYANG RIGS DANG, MDO KHAMS PHYOGS SU MDZUB MO DMAR BKUGS KYI MNA' SHAG CES MNA' DANG BCAS PA'I GROGS PO BYAS PA YIN NA, DE LA SKYID SDUG LEGS NYES

GA RE BYUNG YANG RANG NYID LA BYUNG BA DANG KHYAD PAR MA MCHIS PA'I NYAMS SNANG BYED, MNA' SHAG BYAS

PA'I GROGS POR DGRA BYUNG NA DE'I DON LA RANG GI SROG KYANG BTANG BA'I LO RGYUS MANG PA YOD,

@055 PHYI RGYAL GYI MIS BRIS PA'I DEB CUT OF THIS WORLD, BY LOWELL THOMAS, JR., P. 150 AND

LIFE IN FORBIDDEN LHASA, BY HEINRICH HARRER. KHA SHAS NANG, BOD MIS GUS ZHABS

DANG, DGA' BSU BYED DUS LCE RING PO BSNAR TSUL DANG, LAG PA GNYIS KYI MTHE BONG KER TSUL

SOGS BRIS 'DUG PA DE TSO NI KHYAD MTSAR MTSAR LTA BUR BRIS PA MA GTOGS, LCE RING PO DE 'DRA

BSNAR BA'I SROL MED, LUNG TSAN 'GA' SHAS LA GUS ZHABS BYED SKABS DBUGS YAR 'THEN TE

LCE RTZE RKAN LA BTUGS TE KHA GDANGS TZAM BYED SROL 'DUG ,DE'I SKOR DNGOS 'BREL JI LTAR YANG

SGRUNG GTAM ZHIG YOD PA DEB 'DI'I SHOG GRANGS333 NANG BRIS YOD, MTHE BONG GNYIS KER BA NI

GUS ZHABS BYAS PA MA RED, SKU MKHYEN ZHES 'U THUG GIS RE 'DUN BYED PA'I BRDA ZHIG RED, YANG

'GRIGS SHAG DANG, 'THUS SHAG ZER DUS SKABS RE MTHE BONG KER BA'I SROL YOD KYANG, DE TSO

RNAM 'GYUR STON STANGS NAS HA GO THUB KYI RED,

RJES MJUG DANG, PHUNG PO SKYEL STANGS, MI SHI BA'I RJES MJUG DANG, PHUNG PO SKYEL

STANGS SKOR, BOD RJE GNYA' KHRI BTZAN PO NAS, GRI GUM BTZAN PO YAN NAM MKHAR SMU THAG LA GSHEd

PAS PUR MED PAR GRAGS SHING, GRI GUM BTZAN PO BLON PO LONG NGAM GYIS BKRONGS TE PUR CHUR

BSKYUR BA KONG BYE LAG NAS THON TE DER BANG SO BYAS PA'I BANG SO'I THOG MA BYUNG, PU TE GUNG RGYAL

NAS GLANG DAR MA'I BAR RGYAL THOG RIM PA'I PUR LA GSER GYI BYUGS TE DNGUL LAM, RDO, RDZA'I PUR

SGAM MAM, GA'UR BCUG ,BANG SO'I NANG RU'U MIG DGU PA'I DBUS KYI KHRI LA BZHAG STE MTHA'

SKOR NA RGYAL PO'I DKOR NOR BKANG NAS BANG SOR BZHUGS SHING, DE LA LO DUS KYI MCHOD PA SOd BYED RGYAL PO'I PHUR BANG SOR BZHAG PA NI SNGAR AI CIB SOGS LA SHIN TU DAR RGYAS BYUNG BA BZHIN BOD KYI CHOS RGYAL RNAMS KYI BANG SO'I NANG LA'ANG

RGYAN SPROS CHEN PO YOD TSUL RGYAL PO BKA'I THANG YIG KHA 34- BA- 4 PAR GSAL YOD, PA'I

@056 SROL YOD, 'BANGS RNAMS KYI PHUNG PO NI, LA LA MER BSREGS PA DANG, LA LA CHUR SBYANG,

PHAL CHE BA SAR SBA BA SOGS BYED, SAR SBA BA RNAMS LA RO SGAM SOGS YOD PA'I YIG CHA MA

MTHONG, RJES SU BLA MA CHE KHAG GI SKU PUR DMAR GDUNG MDO BSKAL PA BZANG PO LAS, SKU GDUNG NI RIL BU GCIG TU BYA'O ZHES GSUNGS, MCHOD RTEN GYI NANG BZHUGS SU GSOL BA

DANG, YANG NA ZHUGS SU PHUL BA'I GDUNG RUS SAM, GDUNG THAL RNAMS MCHOD RTEN DU BZHUGS

PA DANG, LA LA LHA SKU BZHENGS PA DANG, STZTSA RGYAG PA, GDUNG THAL SNAG TSAR BSRES TE 'BUM

DANG, BKA' 'GYUR SOGS SKYA CHOS BRI BA SOGS BYED, MI MANG SKYA BO'I NANG RUS CHEN DMIGS

BSAL CAN 'GA' SDE DPON MDO MKHAR BA (RAG KHA SHAG) NI BOD KYI RUS CHEN BCO BRGYAD KHONGS GA ZI'I GDUNG BRGYUD YIN ZHES GDUNG

RTEN DU 'JOG SROL YOD, SHAS DMAR GDUNG NGAM, GDUNG RTEN DU 'JOG SROL LAS, DE BYINGS LA LA MER

BSREGS PA DANG, PHAL CHE BA SHA DUM BUR GTUBS SHING, RUS PA RNAMS BRDZOGS TE BYA RGOD LA

BSTER BA'I SROL YOD, DE NI CHOS PHYOGS NAS BYA RGOD LTOGS PAR LUS SBYIN PAR BTANG BA'I

YID SMON BYED PA DANG, BYA RGOD LA STER SA DER DUR KHROD CES ZER BA RED, YANG 'GOS NAD KYIS

SHI BA DANG, KHRIMS THOG NAS BSAD PA YIN NA SAR SBA BA LAS BYA GTOR SOGS BYAS MI CHOG,

NAD PA DBUGS KYI RGYU BA MA CHAD GONG DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I RING BSREL

SOGS BYIN RTEN KHYAD PAR CAN KHAR SBYIN PA DANG, RNA BAR SANGS RGYAS DANG, BYANG CHUB SEMS

PA'I MTSAN SNGAGS 'DON PA, BDE BA CAN GYI SMON LAM DANG, BAR DO THOS GROL LA SOGS

PA BSGROGS TE GSHIN PO'I LAM STON BYED, DBUGS KYI RGYU BA CHAD PA DANG, CHOS 'BREL

THOG PA'I BLA MA ZHIG NAS 'PHO BA 'DEBS PA DANG, BLA MKHYEN GYIS GSHIN RTZIS LA BRTEN

NAS THABS DANG, GTO BCOS BYED, GSHIN PO'I DON DU BDUN PHRAG GCIG GAM, GNYI

@057 GSUM GYI RING BSUR GTONG BA DANG, RGYUN GYI BZA' BTUNG BSGRIGS PA'I SROL YANG YOD,

RNAL 'BYOR GYI DBANG PHYUG MI LA BZHAD PA RDO RJE LA PHYI BDUD 'DUL PHUG TU BZHUGS SKABS LA KHA BAS BCAD DE 'TSO CHAS MED PAR ZLA BA

MANG POR BZHUGS PAR GNYA' NANG RTZAR MAR GYI YON BDAG RNAMS NAS RJE BTZUN GSHEGS PAR THAG BCAD DE THUGS DGONGS RDZOGS PA'I MCHOD

PA PHUL BAS RJE BTZUN LA BZA' BTUNG MANG PO DRANGS PA'I THUGS NYAMS SHAR BAS RJE BTZUN GYIS 'JIG RTEN PA RNAMS KYIS DGE RTZA BGYIS PA

BAR DOR PHAN PA 'DUG ,CES MGUR 'BUM 112-NA-5 NANG GSAL BA LTAR GSHIN POR DMIGS TE BSUR DANG, BZA' BTUNG

BSGRIGS NA DER PHAN THOGS YOD PAR YID CHES BYED PA RED, LHA

KHANG KHAG LA DKAR ME DANG, BLA MA KHAG LA BSNGO ZHU GTONG, RJES MJUG NAS MGO 'KHRU BYED PA

DANG, SKYES RTAGS BZHENGS PA SOGS BYED, BDUN TSIGS ZHES

SPA BZHED NANG, KONG JOS, GSER GYI LHA SH'AKYA MU NE SPAS PA BRNYED NAS NE NE MO'I LHA LA ZHABS TOG CIG GSOL ZER NAS MCHOD PA BTZUGS, BLON PO

SHI TSAD LA ZAS SKAL MED PAS NGED RGYA NAG POR CHOS DAR BAS MI SHI BA LA BDUN TSIGS DANG, DGE KLOG BTZUGS, ZHES GSAL, ZHAG BZHI BCU ZHE DGU'I BAR

BDUN PHRAG SO SOR DE'I CHED DU DMIGS TE DKON MCHOG LA MCHOD PA 'BUL BA DANG, DGE 'DUN

LA BSNYEN BKUR ZHU BA, 'DANG GTONG BA ZHES YUL MI DANG, NGAN SLONG LA SPYIN PA GTONG BA SOGS

BYED, GSHIN CHOG BYED MI'I RGYUN PA RNAMS NAS BLA MA DANG, CHOS PA TSAD LDAN GYI PUR LA CHO GA

DANG MTHUN PA'I LHAR BSKYED DE DBANG CHAS GA-YOGS SHING, MCHOD PA 'BUL BA SOGS BYED CING,

DE MIN PHAL BA LA RGYUD SDE NAS GSUNGS PA LTAR LHO SGO'I CHO GAS SDIGS PA SBYONG BA SOGS BYED, PHUNG

PO BYA GTOR DU 'GRO SKABS KYANG BTEGS TE 'GRO PA'I SROL YOD, 'GA' SHAS KYIS 'DI NI LUGS

SROL LTA BU ZHIG YIN PAR CHA BZHAG TE CHO GA SOGS GANG YANG MA BTANG BAR RO LA DBANG CHAS

GA-YOGS PA DANG, LHA SA'I SBRANG PO'I RO BSKYEL AOM KHANG BLO BZANG GI PHUNG POR DBANG CHAS GA-YOG STE BTEGS PA'I LO RGYUS LTA BU RED, DUNG RGYAS BSU BA SOGS BYED PA DE NI DON MA RTOGS PAR SEMS, ZHAG BZHI

BCU ZHE DGU SONG PA'I NYIN DGE STOBS BDUN TSIGS SNGON MA LAS RGYA CHE BYED SROL YOD KYANG, DUS

@058 PHYIS 'GA' ZHIG NAS DE'I NYIN BLO DKAR BA RNAMS 'DZOMS TE SKYES RTAGS LA SNYAN SHAL 'BUL BA DANG,

MCHOD 'BUL BYAS PA'I RJES SU SPRO SKYID LTA BUR CHANG 'THUNG DANG, GLU GZHAS GTONG BAS 'DI NI AA KHU

STON PA'I BZA' ZLA SHI BAR SDUG BSNGAL BYAS PA'I SGRUNG LTA BU ZHIG 'DUG,

SNGAR BDE CHEN DU, AA KHU STON PA ZHES SPYOD PA KHYAD MTSAR BYED PA ZHIG YOD, DE'I BZA' ZLA SHI BAS GRONG PA KHYIM MTSES TSOS CHAD 'KHUR TE AA KHUR SEMS GSO

BYED PAR YONG BAS, AA KHU NI HA CANG GI SEMS SDUG CHEN PO BYED PAR KHONG TSOS, AA KHU, SEMS KHRAL DE 'DRA MA BYED CES SEMS GSO'I SKAD CHA BSHAD PAR,

AA KHUS, DA NGA RGYUN RING POR BYED KYI MIN, ZHES LAB PA, KHONG TSO'I BSAM PAR AA KHU SEMS SDUG CHEN POS MA GA-YOGS PO SHI RGYU YIN ZER 'DUG BSAM PA RED,

JA YUN KHA SHAS KYI RJES LA, AA KHU CHANG GIS BZHI STE TSE RING SGROL MA'I RO LA BYA RGOD DPUNG GDANG SHIG

SHIG, AA KHU STON PA'I MDUN LA JA CHANG DPUNG GDANG SHIG SHIG, CES SKAD SANG MTHON POS GZHAS BTANG ZHING, ZHABS BRO RGYAB PAS, KHONG TSOS AA KHU DE 'DRA MA BYED, MI LA NGO TSA, LAB PA NGAS DA GIN NAS KHYOD TSOR, NGA RGYUN

RING PO BYED KYI MIN, ZHES LAB MA BYUNG NGAM, LAB PA'I SGRUNG GTAM BSHAD SROL YOD PA LTAR RED,

TSES DGU DANG, BCU DGU, NYER DGUR RES GZA' NYI MA 'KHEL BA'I NYIN MI

SHI NA NYI MA DGU 'KHRID CES KHYIM TSANG DE'I RJES MJUG LA NGAN PAS THABS DANG, GTO BCOS RGYA CHEN PO

BYED, YANG PHUNG PO 'GRO SKABS KHA BA BABS NA, DUR LAM KHA BAS BKAG PA ZHES KHYIM DER MI SHI

MANG PO MI YONG ZER, BYANG 'BROG PA TSO'I NANG LA MI SHI NA PHUNG PO DANG, RGYUN PA (CHO GA BYED MI)

BZHAG TE NANG MI RNAMS PHYOGS GZHAN ZHIG TU GZHIS SPOS 'GRO BA'I LUGS SROL YOD, YANG LUNG

PA LA LAR PHUNG PO PHYIN PA'I RJES SU SHID 'DON PA ZHES GLUD BRDZONG DANG, BZLOG PA, BGEGS SKROD

SOGS BYED SROL DANG, MI SHI NAS LO 'KHOR MTSAMS LO DUS KYI MCHOD PA'AM, 'DANG GTONG

BA ZHES DKON MCHOG LA CI 'BYOR GYI MCHOD PA 'BUL BA DANG, NGAN SLONG LA 'BRU DANG, JA THUG GI SBYIN

PA GTONG BA'I SROL BZANG PO ZHIG KYANG YOD DO, ,

GNYEN SGRIGS CHANG SA, 'JIG RTEN MTHUN 'JUG GNYEN SGRIGS KYI CHANG SA RGYAG RGYU 'DI

BU PHRUG TSO'I MI TSE GCIG GI KHYIM 'TSO 'DZIN STANGS GAL CHER BRTEN PHA MA'I 'GAN 'KHUR CHE SHOS SHIG

@059 LA BRTZIS TE BU LA MNA' MA DANG, BU MOR MAG PA BSU 'OS RIGS MTHUN NANG BRTAG DPYAD ZHIB NAN

BYAS THOG ,BU'AM, BU MO KHA SHAS PHAN TSUN GYI PHA MA DANG, MOL BSDUR BYAS TE MING, LO RTAGS

RNAMS BLANGS TE RTZIS MKHAN GYIS BAG RTZIS KYI GZHUNG LAS BRTAGS TE BZANG BA GNYIS SAM, GSUM JI

THON BLA MA'AM, YANG NA CHOS SKYONG LA BRTAG LUNG ZHUS TE BZANG SHOS DE BU DANG, BU MOR DRI SKOR MOL

BSDUR MA BYAS PAR PHA MA PHAN TSUN NANG DON THAG GCOD BYED PA DANG, DE YANG BU LA MNA' MA LEN PAR

MTSON NA CHANG SA'I BYED SGO'I THOG MA SLONG CHANG ZHES BU'I PHA MA'I PHYOGS NAS MDZAD SGO DANG BCAS BU MO'I

PHA MAR NU RIN ZHES KHA BTAGS DANG BCAS DNGUL DANG, LAG RTAGS PHRAN BU SPROD SROL DANG, DE'I

NYIN PHAN TSUN PHA MA GNYEN DPANG DANG BCAS PHYIN CHAD MDZA' MTHUN RGYUN 'KHYONGS BYED SGO'I SKOR LUGS

SROL LTAR GYI GNYEN YIG BZHAG PA LAS, BU MOR SKAL BA CHE CHUNG BU MO'I PHA MAS BLOS DPYAD MA

GTOGS SKAL THOB CHE CHUNG LA RTZOD SROL MED,

CHANG SA DNGOS GZHI NI, BLA MKHYEN GYIS RTZIS 'BRAS DANG BSTUN GZA' TSES

BZANG BA ZHIG NYIN 'KHOS 'BYOR LA GZHIGS PA'I RTEN 'BREL RGYAS BSDUS CI RIGS BYED, BAG MA

'GRO SKABS KYI THOG MAR GNOD SRUNG SRID PA HO 'KHYER BA DANG, BAG MA'I BZHON PAR RGOD MA RTI'U

SKYES RGYU YOD PA ZHIG NGES PAR GRA SGRIG BYED, DE YANG BU MO'I KHYIM GYI LHA LAS BKROL BA, LAM

GYI BGEGS BSKROD PA, MDA' BSHAD, 'BEBS BSHAD, SGO BSHAD, GA-YU BSHAD, BU'I

KHYIM GYI LHA LA 'DOG PA, KHYIM STENG DU BU MO'I KHAMS MTHUN GYI DAR 'DZUGS SKABS DAR BSHAD

SOGS SNYAN BRJID CHAGS PA'I BSHAD PA DANG, SNGAR SROL GYI RTEN 'BREL MANG PO BYED, CHANG SA

RGYAB NAS GNYEN 'PHRAD KYI MDZAD SGO MA BYAS BAR MNA' MAS RANG BZHIN DU RANG GI PHA KHYIM LA 'GRO MI

CHOG ,GNYEN 'PHRAD ZIN NA NAM BSKYOD LA DGAG BYA MED, BU MO RNAMS MNA' MAR 'GRO SKABS

MCHI MA GTONG BA DANG, SKAD 'BOD KYIS DU BA RED, 'DI NI LA LAS LUGS SROL LTA BU RED BSAM

@060 YANG, DE 'DRA MA RED, RANG GI PHA MA'I KHYIM BZHAG STE NANG MI GSAR PA ZHIG GI NANG LA, NGO SHES

DANG MTHONG MYONG RTZA BA NAS MED PA'I BU ZHIG GI KHYIM THABS SU DBANG MED KYIS 'GRO DGOS TZANG SEMS

SKYO PO ZHIG GTAN GTAN YONG GI YOD PA'I RKYEN GYIS MCHI MA DANG, NGU 'BOD DBANG MED DU SHOR GYI

YOD PA RED, DE LA BRTEN NAS MNA' MA DANG MNYAM DU BAG ROGS ZHES GROGS MO ZHIG NYIN SHAS

SDOD PAR 'GRO SROL YANG YOD, BAG MA 'GRO SKABS CHU SNA DANG, PHUNG PO 'GRO BA THUG NA MGRON CHEN

LA GROGS CHEN THUG PA ZHES RTEN 'BREL DANG, LA NYE BZANG BAR BYED PA DANG, YANG DE'I NYIN GANGS

BABS NA BAG LAM KHA BAS 'GAG PA ZHES NGAN PAR BRTZI BAR BYED,

DENG DUS LO GZHON PHAL CHE BAS PHA MA'I NGAG BKOD LTAR RIGS MTHUN YIN MIN

DANG, BLA LHAR BRTAG LUNG, RTZIS 'BRAS SOGS GANG LA YANG MA BSTUN PAR BU DANG, BU MO GNYIS

PHAN TSUN 'DOD MTHUN GYI CHANG SA RGYAG MKHAN MANG PO YOD PA DANG, BSU SKYEL GYI RTA RAGS BCAS

DAL BUS 'GRO SKABS MNA' MA DGA' 'DZUM NGANG DGA' GROGS MTHONG BA LA RINGS TE SRAB DKRUG

DANG, YOB DKRUG BYED KYIN 'DUG SOGS DGOD BRO'I LO RGYUS SHOD RGYU YOD PA DANG, PHAL CHE BA

CHANG SA YANG DUS BSTUN STABS GANG BDE BDE ZHIG RGYAG MKHAN YOD PA RED, YANG SKYES PA DANG,

BUD MED LA SKYES RGYAL DMAN GYI THA SNYAD ZHIG DANG, MI CHOS GTZANG MA BCU DRUG NANG BUD MED LA BLO

MA BLTA ZHES DANG, SNGAR GZHUNG GI CHAB SRID LAS DON NANG ZHUGS SROL MED PA SOGS BLO PHAM SKYE

GZHI'I BYA BA RE ZUNG MA GTOGS, SNGAR RANG RE'I KHYIM MTSES RGYAL KHAB KYI BUD MED DANG MI 'DRA BA

CHANG SA RGYAB NYIN LHA 'DOG GI DAR 'DZUGS SKABS DAR BSHAD NANG, NYIN MA DA NYIN NAS KHYIM 'DI'I

PHYI NANG STENG SHOD TSANG MAR NANG MI PHO MO RGAN GZHON TSANG MA DANG 'DRA MNYAM GYI DBANG CHA YOD TSUL KHYAB

BSGRAGS BYED SROL YOD PAS MA TSAD, PHYI 'GRO NANG SDOD, MI MANG 'DU 'DZOMS, SPRO SKYID SOGS

LA CI BDER BSKYOD CHOG PA'I RANG DBANG CHA TSANG DANG, YANG CHES SNGA MO'I RGYA GAR GYI LUGS SROL

@061 RGYA GAR NA CHES SNGA PO'I RGYAL PO SKYA SENG BU LNGAS MNA' MA GCIG BLANGS PA'I LO RGYUS DANG, RGYAL PO DAG GIS BTZUN MO

MANG PO BSTEN PA'I LO RGYUS SOGS YOD,

LAS BYUNG ZHES BUD MED GCIG GIS SKYES PA BU SPUN GNYIS SAM, GSUM MNYAM MTHUN BYED PA DANG,

DE BZHIN SKYES PA GCIG GIS BUD MED GNYIS SAM, GSUM NYAR BRTEN BYED PA'I SROL YANG YOD,

DENG DUS NI, BUD MED RANG NYID KYIS SHES BYAS 'BYON NA GZHUNG GI CHAB SRID SOGS LAS DON CHE PHRA

GANG LA'ANG PHO MO, SER SKYA 'DRA MNYAM ZHUGS CHOG PA'I KHRIMS THOG NAS DBANG TSAD KYANG YOD PA RED,

LUS RTZAL DANG, SPRO BAG PHEBS PA'I RTZOD MO'I RIGS DANG, ZLOS GAR, BOD KYI MI RNAMS SNGAR SNGA MO'I

LUGS BZHIN PHO RTZAL SNA DGU LA DO SNANG CHE ZHING, DE LA BSHAD SROL MI 'DRA BA GNYIS YOD, DANG

PO LTAR NA, MTHEB KYIS SHA NON PA, RKYAL GYIS CHU CHOD PA, YANG RTZAL BYA LTAR LDING BA ZHES LUS KYI

RTZAL GSUM, LO RGYUS KYI DGE THON PA, GTAM GYIS BZHAD GAD SLONG BA, GSHAGS KYIS PHA ROL

GNON PA STE NGAG GI RTZAL GSUM, MDZANGS SHING GLO 'GYU BA,

MDZANGS SHING GLO 'GYU BA NI, TSIG MDZOD LAS, SHES RAB CAN GYI BYA SPYOD, CES GSAL, DPA' LA BSRAN TSUGS PA, KHA GSAL

ZHING GTING MI DPOGS PA STE YID KYI RTZAL GSUM MO, YANG GNYIS PA LTAR NA, GTAM YIG RTZIS

GSUM, MDA' RDO MCHONGS GSUM, BANG RKYAL SBE GSUM ZHES GSUNGS PA'I SROL YANG 'DUG,

SBE KA RGYAG PA, THAG PA 'THEN PA SOGS SHUGS 'GRAN BSDUR DANG, CHU CHEN LA NYA LTAR RTZED PA,

MCHONGS NI BTEGS BU MTHON PO ZHIG NAS GOM TSAD SUM CU NAS, BZHI BCU'I BAR MCHONGS PA

MCHONGS DANG, RDO DBYUGS PA NI GDAN SA'I NANG GRA GZHON RDOB RDOB SNANG BA SKYID PO DGIS RTZES PA'I SKAD GRAGS CAN ZHIG RED,

DANG, THAG RING POR BANG RGYUGS PA, LJID CAN GYI RDO CHEN BTEGS PA, RDO RGYANG RING POR

'PHEN PA, GNAD DU BSNUN PA, RGYAB DANG, SGAB 'OG NAS RDO RGYANG RING POR 'PHEN PA, RDO SGOR

RTZED PA SOGS 'GRAN BSDUR SNA TSOGS BYED PA RED,

@062 MDA' RTZED NI, SKYES PA RNAMS KYI DBYAR KHA'I RTZED MO SKYID SHOS SHIG YIN, DE

YANG MDA' MDE'U CAN RGYANG RING POR 'PHEN PA, 'BEN LA BSNUN PA, MDE'U'I TSAB TU SPI SHU ZHES

RLUNG SHUGS KYIS SGRA SNYAN PO THON PA'I MDAS, BAR SNANG LA 'PHYANG BA'I 'BEN LA BSNUN PA'I 'GRAN

BSDUR SOGS BYED,

RTA RGYUGS KYI RTZED MO NI, BOD LJONGS YONGS LA SHIN TU DAR KHYAB CHE, DE YANG

RTA THOG NAS MAL LE BZHI'AM, LNGA'I RGYANG THAG RING POR BANG RGYUGS TE MGYOGS TSAD KYI AANG KI LEN

PA; RTA STONG PAR RGYUGS PA'I MGYOGS TSAD LEN PA, 'GROS BSDUR BA, RTA BANG RGYUGS BZHIN

PA'I THOG NAS 'BEN LA ME MDA' DANG, MDA', MDUNG BSNUN PA, RTA RGYUGS BZHIN PA'I STENG NAS

LUS LDEM POR BSGYUR TE SA NAS KHA BTAGS LEN PA, RTA STENG DU 'GRENG BA, BABS SHING BZHON PA,

RTA'I SBO 'OG TU MI MNGON PAR GAB PA SOGS KYI LUS RTZAL 'GRAN BSDUR DANG, RTA THOG NAS ZHAGS

PA 'PHANGS TE RTA DANG, LUG SOGS BZUNG BA, MDUNG RING GI 'PHRUL 'KHOR SOGS KYI 'GRAN

BSDUR YANG BYED PA RED,

DBYAR CHAR PA MA BABS PA'I TSE CHAR 'BEBS ZHES LHA SA'I GRONG KHYER NANG MI

MANG NAS CHU SHO'I RTZED MO DANG, DE BZHIN AA MDO'I SA KHUL DU'ANG CHAR 'BEBS SKABS MDA' RTZED

BYED PA'I SROL DANG, STON DUS SHOG BYA'I 'GRAN BSDUR, DGUN DUS 'KHYAG RTZED DANG, GANGS RTZED,

KHA BSKYEL SOGS KYI RTZED MO BYED PA DANG, RGYUN DU SA LAM RNAM GZHAG ,MIG MANG, RGYAL PO RGYAL

SGRIGS, AAB CUG SOGS RTZED PA DANG, BRDAB SHO RGYAG PA,

BRDAB SHO NI SNGAR SNGA MO'I RTZED MO ZHIG YIN, RJE BTZUN MI LA'I YAB MES KYANG SHO RTZED PAS YUL NAS BUD PA RNAM THAR DU GSAL,

SPAG CHEN DANG,

SPAG CHEN DANG, SHON, M'A CHANG RNAMS NI RGYA NAG NAS DAR ZHING, SHOG SPAG TAG SE DANG, SHOG BYA GNYIS RGYA GAR NAS DAR BAS RANG RANG RTZED

MO'I SKABS KYI MING 'BOD STANGS NAS GSAL PO SHES THUB, DANG, SHON RTZED PA, ZA

@063 MAS ZHES DUNG RTZE SA LA BSKYUR BA'I RTZED MO, DUS PHYIS SHOG BU'I TAG SE, THU SBAS CU, M'A CHANG

ZHES PA RTZOD SROL DAR TE LAS KAR 'THUS SHOR DANG, LHAG PAR RGYAN MTHON PO RTZED PAS RANG GI

DPAL 'BYOR LA GNOD RKYEN CHEN PO BYAS PA DANG, LA LA RANG GI SROG GCOD DGOS PA SOGS BYUNG

BAS KHRIMS THOG NAS DGAG BYA GNANG DGOS PA YANG BYUNG BA RED, BU MO RNAMS KYIS THE BED DANG, THAG

MCHONG, AAB 'THOR SOGS RTZED MO'I RIGS MI 'DRA BA MANG PO RTZED SROL YOD PA RED,

GZHAN YANG, ZLOS GAR DANG, RKANG BRO GLU GZHAS SOGS LA, ROL MO'I CHA

BYAD BCO BRGYAD, GLU DBYANGS KYI NGES PA BDUN, GAR GYI CHA BYAD DGU

DE DAG SO SO'I NGOS 'DZIN ZHIB PA KLONG BRDOL GSUNG MA 3-BA-5 NANG GSAL, SOGS GSUNG RGYUN MANG LA,

ZLOS GAR DANG, GLU GZHAS, ZHABS BRO RTZED RGYUR CHOL KHA RANG RANG SO SOR DAR KHYAB CHE LA MI 'DRA BA

YANG SHIN TU MANG BAS 'DIR MDOR TZAM BSTAN NA, ZLOS GAR RAM, LHA MO, BKRA SHIS GZHAS PA,

GAR, RAL PA SOGS RTZED SKABS SNGAR GYI RGYAL RABS LO RGYUS DANG, GTAM BRJO SOGS KHRAB

STON BYED PA RED, GLU'AM, RNAM THAR LA'ANG 'GYUR KHUG SNA TSOGS PA DANG, RKANG PA DANG, LAG

PA'I STANGS STABS, MIG DANG, MCHU, BZHIN RAS KYI RNAM 'GYUR, LUS KYI 'KHYER BZO SOGS

'BYUNG KHUNGS MTHA' YAS, GZHAS LA'ANG, GZHAS CHEN, RTA THUNG, 'JAGS RGYANG (LJAGS BRKYANG)

SBAD, SGOR GZHAS, CHANG GLU, NAG MA, SNGAR MNGA' RIS DANG, LA DVAGS PHYOGS NAS DAR PA'I GZHAS DE LA KHA CHE SOS NAG MA ZER BA RED, BRO GZHAS, SKAD RA, NGAL RTZOL SKABS GTONG BA'I

GZHAS, TSOGS GLU, NYAMS MGUR GYI GLU DBYANGS SOGS BRJOD KYIS MI LANGS, GRONG GSEB LA

LAR YUL TSAN PHAN TSUN 'GRAN BSDUR DANG, PHO MO 'GRAN BSDUR GYIS SGOR GZHAS DANG, BRO BRDUNG

BA; SKAD RA SOGS NYIN MTSAN GNYIS SAM, GSUM BSTUD MAR BYED PA'I LUGS SROL YANG YOD,

GA-YER KHA DANG, RNGA DANG, SBUB CHAL, GSHANG, SGRA SNYAN, PI WANG, GLING BU SOGS DANG BSTUN

@064 TE GZHAS DANG, ZHABS BRO RGYAG PA'I SROL YANG YOD, RJES SU RGYA NAG PHYOGS NAS H'O CIN DANG, DA'I

CIN, YANG CIN SOGS ROL MO'I YO CHAS MI 'DRA BA YANG KHA SHAS DAR BA RED,

SDE SRID SANGS RGYAS RGYA MTSO NI DE 'DRA'I RIGS LA THUGS SNANG CHE BAS, KHONG

GIS, SNGAR MNGA' RIS SKOR GSUM LA BOD CHOS RGYAL GYI GDUNG DRI MA MED PA DAG BZHUGS PA'I

DUS KHA CHE 'BROG PA TSO LAS GLU GAR GYI RIGS DAR ZHING, GTZANG SDE SRID SKABS KHYI GU DON GRUB, DGA'

YU NI, JO BZANG SOGS CHED DU BOS TE GAR ROL GYIS SROL 'GO GTOD PA DANG, RJES SU ROL MO

MKHAS PA GU TI YANG 'BYOR PAS, RANG BZHIN NYAMS 'CHAR GYI RNAM PAR MIN PA'I ROL MO'I GDANGS

DANG BSTUN PA'I LUS KYI RNAM 'GYUR NYER GCIG TU PHYE BA DANG, ROL MOR BYANG CHUB PA GU TI'I BU BKRA

SHIS DANG, TSE BRTAN SOGS NAS MDO 'DAR MA, SUR GLING, TAMBU RA, PI WANG SOGS 'BUD

BRDUNG BKROL BA'I ROL MO GTONG LUGS MI 'DRA BA SLOB SBYONG DAR KHYAB BYUNG ZHING, RJES SU DGA' LDAN

PHO BRANG PA'I MDZAD CHEN KHAG DANG, GZHUNG SGER SPRO SKYID LA SOGS PAR GTONG BA'I SROL MDZAD, DE

LA YANG, RAG CES PA'I GLU DBYANGS KYI RTA MI 'DRA BA BRGYAD, GAR SNA NYI SHU RTZA GCIG, RMA BYA, DRED

MONG GI GAR NYI SHU RTZA GSUM, GLU MI 'DRA BA BRGYA DANG BDUN CU DON BZHI, GSHAM GYI BSGYUR KHA LDAB

PA THE BAS NANG GSES RNAM GRANGS NYIS BRGYA DRUG CU RE GCIG, PHEBS RNGA RTA DKA' ZHING, RING BA RTA

THOG SOGS KYI GRAS LNGA BCU NGA GSUM, KHA BSGYUR LDAB PA THE BAS NANG BSRES DRUG CU RE GSUM, PHEBS

RNGA 'JAM ROL GRAS BZHI BCU ZHE GSUM, KHA BSGYUR LDAB PA THE BAS BDUN CU DON DRUG SOGS DBYE BA

MANG PO MDZAD PA DANG, BYA SGO BA BLO BZANG DBANG PHYUG DANG, KHANG 'OG DNGOS GRUB CAN GYI YI GE

DANG, TSIG GI PHAN PA BSGRUBS TE GLU GAR GYI RTZA TSIG RNAMS RAB BYUNG 12 PA'I SA 'BRUG 1688 LOR

ZHIB PAR MDZAD DBE THER MIG YID RNA BA'I DGA' STON, 'DUG PA MA ZAD, SGRA SNYAN GYI RGYUD THEBS RNAMS KYANG YI GE'I LAM DU 'GOD GNANG

@065 BKA' DRIN CHE 'DUG PAS, DENG DUS RANG RIGS 'GA' SHAS KYIS, NGA TSO BOD PA TSOR PHYI RGYAL DANG

MTHUN PA'I SGRA DBYANGS RI MO'I THOG NAS SLOB PA'I DEB CIG MED TSUL DANG, YANG BYIS PA'I KLOG DEB

DANG, SGRUNG YIG SOGS RI MO'I LAM DU MED TSUL BRJOD MI 'GA' SHAS BYUNG BAS, DE TSE NI RANG NYID

MTHONG RGYA CHUNG BA'I SKYON LAS, GONG DU BRJOD PA'I LTAR SDE SRID RIN PO CHE NAS RI MO'I THOG NAS SGRA SNYAN

SLOB PA'I DEB THER DANG, DE BZHIN DGON PA KHAG LA RTA DBYANGS DANG, ROL MO DANG, DUNG TSIG, CHO

GA'I GZHUNG DANG MTHUN PA'I PHYAG RGYA RNAMS KYANG RI MO'I THOG YOD PA MA ZAD, SMAN GYI CHA BYAD DANG, THIG

RTZA NGO SPROD, RTZA SHING, LO MA, 'BRAS BU BCAS KYI NGOS 'DZIN TSANG MA RI MO'I THOG YOD PA DANG, DE

BZHIN RIN SPUNGS SA SKYONG DON YOD RDO RJE'I SKABS BRIS PA RNAL 'BYOR GYI DBANG PHYUG MI LA BZHAD PA RDO

RJE'I RNAM THAR SHOG LHE SO SOR RI MOR BZHUGS PA DANG, GE SAR SGRUNG YIG LA LAR DPA' BRTUL

DANG, YUL LJONGS RNAMS SHOG LHE SO SOR BRIS PA, DRI MED KUN LDAN DANG, 'GRO BA BZANG MO SOGS

KYI RNAM THAR YANG YI GE DANG, RI MO SPEL MAR YOD PA SOGS SNGAR CHES SNGA MO'I DUS NAS RANG RE'I

YUL DU SHES RIG LA DAR RGYAS PHUN SUM TSOGS PA BYUNG STE NYE 'BREL RGYAL KHAB RNAMS LA NGOM CHOG PA

YOD KYANG, BAR SKABS SHIG NAS GSAR RTZOM BYED MI MED KHAR, RNYING PA GANG YOD RNAMS LA'ANG

YAR RGYAS GTONG MA THUB PA'I THOG, DEB GZHI DE DAG KYANG SA 'OG GI GTER BZHIN GNAS PAS

MTHONG MA THUB PA DANG, DON GNYER CAN YANG MED CING, DENG DUS RGYA GAR PHYOGS LA NI DPE CHA'I MTHUN

RKYEN SHIN TU ZHAN PAS BLO PHAM GYI RANG BZHIN DU 'DUG,

GAR DANG, 'CHAM SOGS PHAL CHER RGYUD KYI DGONGS PA BSTUN PAS, GAR

LA'ANG, SA CHOG GI GAR DANG, MCHOD 'PHRENG GI GAR, RIGS MA BCU DRUG GI GAR SOGS DANG,

'CHAM LA'ANG ZHI KHRO LHA TSOGS DANG, BSTAN SRUNG DAM CAN RGYA MTSO'I 'CHAM SROL DANG, RGYU MTSAN

MI 'DRA BA SHIN TU MANG BAS 'DIR RE RE BZHIN SPRO BAR MI NUS SO, ,GAR 'CHAM LA NUB PHYOGS PA MANG

@066 POS BRIS PA'I DEB NANG GDUG 'DRE'I GAR ZHES BRIS 'DUG PA DE DAG NI RGYU MTSAN MA SHES PAS

MA DAG PA ZHIG RANG YIN PAR SEMS SO, ,

GYON CHAS, BOD RJE MANG SRONG MANG BTZAN SKABS KYI LO RGYUS NANG, BOD MI RNAMS

DBYAR PHYING PA'I PHYU PA DANG, DGUN PAGS PA'I SLOG PA GYON ZHING, DE YANG PHU THUNG RTZE PHRA LA RTZA BA

SBOM PA YOD TSUL GSAL BA DANG, MNGA' BDAG KHRI SRONG LDE'U BTZAN GYI NA BZA' YIN ZHES PA ZHIG

BSAM YAS KYI NANG RTEN DU YOD PA DE NI SNA BU GZHI SER PO LA, RAM TSOS SNGON POS SPRIN PA THO RE BA,

PHU THUNG PHRA LA RING PO YOD PA ZHIG NGAS MJAL MYONG BA DANG, LHA SA DANG, BSAM YAS GTZUG LAG KHANG

DU BZHUGS PA'I LDER SKU DANG, BRIS SKU PHAL CHE BAR NA BZA' LTE BA TSOS GZHI SER PO'AM, DMAR

PO DANG, STENG GYON NAM KHA GYON DKAR PO, PHU THUNG CHEN PO BYAS PA DANG, STENG GYON LA SKU 'CHING

MED PA, ZHABS LHAM SNA KER BZHES PA DAG

PHYI RGYAL GYI MKHAS PA PHAL CHE BAS SNGAR GYI BRIS CHA DANG, LDEB BZO RNYING PA LA BLTAS TE GYON CHAS DANG, RGYAN CHA JI 'DRA YOD PA

DBYOD NUS TSUL BSHAD YOD PA DANG, MKHAS DBANG DGE 'DUN CHOS 'PHEL

MCHOG GIS, DEB DKAR 7-NA-3 YANG 19-BA-3, GIS, DE DUS PHYI'I RGYAL KHAB GYI KHROD NA BOD DANG MDZA' 'BREL CHE BA NI TA ZIG PA

TA ZIG ZHES PA YAR KHYEN GYI NUB DANG, AAB GHAN NE SE THAN GYI BYANG PHYOGS SU DENG DUS TA SE KEN (TADZHIKISTAN)

BYA BA DE YIN, RNAMS YIN

LA; TA ZIG YUL NI SKABS DER NANG PA'I BSTAN PA DAR BA MA ZAD, TSHES RIG YON TAN GYI CHA LA YANG

KHONG RNAMS 'GRAN ZLA BRAL GSHIS, BOD KYI RJE BLON RNAMS KYANG PHAL CHER TA ZIG PA'I SROL LUGS

GNANG BA YIN NAM SNYAM STE, SRONG BTZAN GYIS DAR DMAR PO'I THOD BZHES PA SOGS KYANG BSHAD LA,

ZA 'OG GI BER DANG PHYAGS LHAM SNE 'KHYIL GYON PA SOGS KYANG TA ZIG GI SROL DANG 'DRA ZHES GSUNGS

@067 PA DANG, YANG MNGA' RIS LA DVAGS SU CHOS RGYAL GYI GDUNG RGYUD DU GRAGS PA DA LTA BAR YOD PA RNAMS

NAS, LO GSAR GYI TSE SNGON GYI CHAS YIN ZER NAS ZHVA DMAR BTZAN ZHVA'I DBYIBS CAN RTZE MO MTHO ZHING PHRA

BA'I YAS ZUR DU TSE DPAG MED KYI SKU BRNYAN ZHIG DAR DMAR GYIS BCINGS PA'I LHAG MA MDUN NAS

BSNOL BSGRIGS TE GYON PA SOGS DANG, YANG DE GA'I GSHAM NA, RGYA NAG GI SGROS LAS MCHED PA'I

BOD KYI LO RGYUS SKAD RIGS GZHAN DU BRIS PA ZHIG SNANG BAR, BOD KYI RGYAL MO MTSAN MI GSAL BA ZHIG

GI SKOR BRIS TE, RGYAL MO DES STOD THUNG SNGO NAG PHU DUNG GI KHA SA LA REG PA TZAM DU RING BA ZHIG GYON, SMAD

LA DAR NAG PO'I GSHAM THAB GYON, SKRA LA LHAS MA CHUNG DU MANG DU BYAS SHING, RNA BA LA AA LONG BTAGS,

LHAM ZO YI BYA BA GYON, DGUN DUS SU PAGS PA'I GYON PA PHYI LA TSEM DRUB SNA TSOGS YOD PA ZHIG GYON,

ZHES DANG, RANG GI MIS RANG YUL GYI LUGS SROL 'DI 'DRA'O ZHES ZHIB TU BRIS PA ZHIG SHIN TU RNYED

DKA' BA 'DI YUL KUN TU 'DRA BA YIN TE, DPER NA, DA LTA BOD KYI MIS BRIS PA'I LO RGYUS KUN LA

BLTAS KYANG, LHA SA'I GRONG NA, BUD MED RNAMS PANG GDAN KHRA BO DANG, SPA PHRUG ZUR GSUM ZHIG

GYON, SKYES PA RNAMS PAGS ZHVA RNA LEB BZHI YOD PA ZHIG GYON SOGS BRIS PA SRID MTHA' TZAM YIN

LA; DA NAS LO LNGA BRGYA SONG TSE, DA LTA'I SROL LUGS 'DI KUN KYANG MI BRGYUD RNAMS LA SHIN TU

LKOG TU SONG STE, YUL KHAMS GZHAN GYI MI'I NGAG SGROS RNYED PA RNAMS BSAGS NAS RAGS TZAM

ZHIG LAS DPYOD MI THUB PA SOGS YIN NO, ,ZHES DANG, ^ RGYAL MCHOG LNGA PA CHEN PO'I RANG RNAM

NANG, BAR LAM SDE GZAR RIM LANGS THOG ,RGYA HOR BOD SOGS KYI CHA LUGS BDE CHAS DANG, 'GA'

RES HOR MIN, BOD MIN SOGS CHAS GOS YA MA GZUGS RANG SNANG GANG DRAN BYAS PAS BOD KYI CHAS

GOS 'DI 'DRA ZHIG YOD CES LO BRGYA TZAM GYI RJES LA THA SNYAD TZAM LAS, STON RGYU DKA' BAS DE'I

PHYIR SDE SRID BLO BZANG MTHU THOB NAS DON GNYER MDZAD DE RIN CHEN RGYAN CHA'I GOS RGYAN RNAMS GO SGRIGS

MDZAD TSUL GSAL BA BCAS RGYU MTSAN DE DAG LA BRTEN NAS NGAS KYANG SER SKYA PHO MO'I SNGAR LUGS GYON

@068 CHAS JI YOD DANG, 'GYUR BA BYUNG TSUL LA ZHIB 'JUG DANG BCAS CUNG ZAD BRJOD PAR SPRO ZHING,

DE YANG KHRI SRONG LDE'U BTZAN GYI SKU TSE'I SMAD TZAM DANG, MU NE BTZAN PO'I SKABS

NAS, AA RAB DANG BOD GNYIS TSONG DANG, DRAG PO'I 'BREL BA BYUNG BA GSHAM DU BRJOD RGYU'I LO

RGYUS NANG GSAL POR BRIS YOD PAS RGYAL PO'I NA BZA'I SKOR YANG TA ZIG SOGS DANG 'BREL BA NGES

PAR YONG SRID PA DANG, SDE SRID BLO BZANG MTHU THOB KYIS SNGAR GYI RGYAL BLO NA RNAMS KYI NA BZA'I SKOR

LA ZHIB 'JUG GIS GO BSGRIGS MDZAD PA'I RIN CHEN RGYAN CHA NI, DE YANG, PHO RNA GA-YU CAN LA PHO

LHA 'KHOR ZHES PA RGYU MTSAN DU BYAS TE, SNGAR SDE SRID PHAG MO GRUB PA DANG, BYANG PA RIGS LDAN,

RGYAL MKHAR RTZE PA, RIN SPUNGS PA SOGS SDE DPON KHUNGS BTZUN RNAMS KYIS SNGAR BOD RJE CHOS

RGYAL SKU DUS KYI CHAS GOS LA GZHI BCOL TE GSER GA, SOG RNA, SOG SGOR, RNA RGYANGS, SHAL

DKAR DMAR, RTZI GOS, RTZE BER, GTZUG ZHVA, PHOR SHUBS, KO LHAM RDOG DU KLU LA'I GOS BZANG KHA 140-BA-3, GCIG MA BCAS

YIN PAS GOS RGYAN DE DAG 'DRA PAR KHAG NAS NGOS 'DZIN THUB NA LAS, RGYA GAR SA KHUL DU GOS

RIN THANG CAN DE 'DRA BA NI NAM YANG RNYED DKA' BA ZHIG YIN,

YANG PHAG GRU DANG, RIN SPUNGS, GTZANG STOD SDE PA'I SKABS DRUNG DRAG SKYA BO

RNAMS NAS DENG SANG GZIM CHUNG PA'I RGYA LU CHAS ZHES SNAM BU'AM, THER MA NAG PO'I SMAD GOS SUL

CAN, SNAM BU'I PHU STOD 'JA' LDAN, SNAM GZAN, 'KHUR PHRA THIG KHUG, PHOR SHUBS, RTZE

SAG, GSER HRIL SNYUG KHROG, KO LHAM RDOG GCIG MA, ZHVA MO 'BOGS DO NI SOG PO'I SKAD DE GTZUG ZHVA'AM, GTZUG RGYAN LA ZER BA RED, CHEN DANG, YANG ZHVA ZHES THUGS

KHOG GI SKYAG LTA BU'I ZHVA MO DE DAG DRUNG 'KHOR SKYA BO TSE'I RGYUN CHAS LAS GOS DE RANG YIN PA MA ZAD,

DE NI GNA' DUS KYI BOD CHAS RANG YIN PA BSHAD SROL YOD PA DANG, LO GSAR SOGS GZHUNG GI

@069 MDZAD SGO GAL CHE'I RIGS LA BKA' BLON SKYA BO RNAMS NAS KYANG RGYA LU CHAS BZHES GYON GNANG DGOS

PA RED, SNAM BU'I RGYA LU SNGAR MI DRAG RNAMS LA RGYA LU ZER ZHING, DE'I CHAS GOS YIN PAS NA RGYA LU CHAS ZHES GRAGS PA RED, CHAS DE LA DUS PHYIS RGYAS SPROS BYAS TE GOS CHEN MTSON KHRA DANG, RGYA GSER

DAG LAS PHO STOD DANG, MDUN CHAB, 'KHUR KHRA, THIG KHUG, PHOR SHUBS, 'JA' RKED, GZAN

DPAL LDAN SA SKYA'I SKABS JING GI ZI KH'ANG DUS KYI SOG PO'I CHAS DANG 'BREL BA

BOD PA TSOS SHES TE DE DAG LA 'BREL BA BYAS PA RED CES GSUNGS YOD, PO'I CHAS GOS LAS 'BREL BA BYUNG BA GSAL POR SHES SLA ZHING, DE YANG JING GI ZI KH'ANG NAS, GU SHRIR KH'ANG BAR MI LO PHYED BZHI BRGYA LHAG TZAM SONG BAS SOG

@070 LTAR, BDAG CAG GI STON PA SH'AKYA THUB PA'I NA BZA'I BZO DBYIBS LA, YUL GYI GNAM GSHIS LA

BRTEN NAS SNAM BUS BZOS PA DANG, RJES SU RGYAS SPROS BYAS TE GOS CHEN SOGS BTANG BAR SEMS,

CHOS GOS DANG, SNAM SBYAR GYI TSOS GZHI DMAR SER GANG RUNG DANG, GZAN DANG, GSHAM THAB TSOS

GZHI DMAR PO YIN YANG, CHOS LUGS KHA SHAS KYIS GSHAM THAB DKAR PO BZHES SROL YANG YOD,

BDAG CAG GI STON PA NYAN THOS DANG BCAS PAS ZHABS LHA MA DANG, DBU ZHVA BZHES PA SOGS BRIS

'BUR GYI SKU BRNYAN RIGS MA MJAL YANG, 'PHAGS PA'I GNAS BRTAN BCU DRUG GI NA BZA' PHU THUNG

DANG LDAN ZHING, GZHAN RGYA BAL GYI PAn GRUB RNAMS KYIS PAn ZHVA SNA RING DANG, RAS SRAB MO'I RDUL

ZHVA 'OB ZHU, SGOM ZHVA, JO ZHVA, BYANG CHUB SEMS ZHVA, GCOD ZHVA, THANG ZHU, SA ZHVA (ZHU) ZHVA NAG, SGRO RTZE

MA SOGS BZO DBYIBS MI 'DRA BA SNA TSOGS SHIG DAR BAS PHAL CHE BA RGYA BAL GYI BZO DBYIBS DANG, THANG

ZHU NI SNGAR 'BAR MA'I NANG BLA CHEN DANG, MI DRAG TSOS GYON GYI YOD PA DANG, KARMA PA DUS GSUM MKHYEN

PA DGUNG PO BCU DRUG SKABS MKHAN PO MCHOG GI BLA MA LAS RAB BYUNG GI SDOM PA BZHES PA'I TSE YE SHES

DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DANG, BYAMS CHEN CHOS RJE'I DBU ZHVA NAG PO DE NI RGYA RGYAL T'A MING YUNG LO'I SKABS

@071 GYI YIG CHA NI MTHONG RIGS MA BYUNG, PHYAGS LHAM SHA SU MA DANG, RAS ZON, 'GAG LHAM RDOG

GCIG MA SOGS DANG, MDO STOD SMAD KHUL DU SHA SU MA DANG, RAS ZON 'BYOR DKA' BAS SHOL TZE

AIN SAL KA LA, SPE RI KRI SBI t'A NI (ENCYCLOPEDIA BRITANNICA) ZER BA'I DEB

KYI GYON CHAS LO RGYUS NANG, KO L'O ZER BA'I GYON PA DRIL BU'I DBYIBS 'DRA BA LA PHU THUNG MED PA DE THOG

@072 KH'ANG GIS 'PHAGS PA RIN PO CHER PHUL BA'I 'JA' SA'I NANG GOS CHEN GYI 'PHYAM TZE MU TIG GI PHRA BTAB

'JON SON ZHES PAS BRIS PA'I RI MO'I LO RGYUS (HISTORY OF ART,

BY H.W. JOHNSON) DEB KYI SHOG GRANGS 245 NANG, RI MO MKHAN SGRO MI NI KO WI NI DZIN SE

(DOMRNICO VENEZIANS) ZER BAS SPYI LO 1440 NANG BRIS PA'I RI MO DANG, YANG

DEB DE KHA'I SHOG GRANGS 365 NANG RI MO MKHAN AEL GHE RE KO (EL GRECO) NAS SPYI

LO 1586 LOR BRIS PA'I RI MO DE GNYIS NANG KO L'O ZER BA'I BLA CHEN TSO'I NA BZA' BZO DBYIBS DANG,

RGYU CHA, TSOS MDOG DANG, DENG DUS BOD KYI BLA CHEN RNAMS KYIS BZHES PA'I GOS BER GNYIS HA

CANG GI MTHUN PO 'DUG ,DGE 'DUN BYINGS TSOS BZHES RGYU'I ZLA GAM NI SNAM BU DMAR SER GYIS BZOS

PA DE LA RGYAN SPROS SOGS MED KYANG, TSOGS CHEN DGE BSKOS SOGS DMIGS BSAL CAN LA LAR

ZLA GAM GYI RGYAB SGROG LU DANG, SGROG GDAN ZER BA RGYAB PA'I SROL YANG YOD, YIG CHA 'GA' SHAS

LA ZLA GAM RDUL LEN CHED DU YIN GSAL BA DANG, MING NI ZLA BA PHYED PA LA ZLA GAM ZHES TSIG MDZOD

RNAMS SU GSAL BAS BZO DBYIBS LAS THOGS PAR SEMS,

MI DMANGS KYI GYON PA NI, SNAM BU DANG, PAGS RIGS, GOS CHEN, RAS

SOGS RGYU CHA BZANG ZHAN DANG, GNAM GSHIS LA BSTUN TE SRAB MTHUG SNA TSOGS GYON ZHING, BZO

DBYIBS GONG PA CAN LA PHYU PA DANG, SLING TZE CAN TSAL PHYU MA GNYIS RANG YIN ZHING, RKED 'CHING YANG

ZUR LTABS DANG, RGYAB SUL GNYIS 'CHINGS SROL YOD, MDO STOD SMAD GNYIS LA TSAR SLOG SRAM

DANG, GZIG RGYAN CAN GYON PA DANG, BYANG 'BROG KHAG GCIG DBYAR DGUN MED PA LUG PAGS KYI

SLOG PA KHO NA GYON MI YANG YOD, RGYA GAR BA RNAMS KYIS SNGAR GYI STENG GYON ZHIG LA CHU GA (CHUGA)

ZER 'DUG PA DE'I SGRA LAS GOS LA PHYU PA ZER BA 'DI BYUNG BA MIN NAM SNYAM YANG, TSIG MDZOD

@073 LA LAR CHU DGE BSHES CHOS GRAGS KYI BRDA DAG TSIG MDZOD NANG CHU SKYOB BYED BA LA RIGS KYI GOS CHU PA ZHES GSAL, PA ZHES KYANG BRIS 'DUG,

BUD MED KYI GOS RGYAN NI HA CANG MI 'DRA BA MANG, SNGAR SNGA MO'I BRIS CHA DANG,

BAR LAM LO LNGA BCU, DRUG CU'I SNGON THON GYI PAR, DENG DUS NGA TSOS MIG LAM DU GYUR PA'I RGYAN GOS

KYI BAR LA 'GYUR BA HA CANG CHEN PO BYUNG YOD PA DANG, DPER NA RDZONG GZHIS GCIG NAS, RDZONG GZHIS

GZHAN GNYIS DBAR LA'ANG RGYAN GOS DANG, SKRA 'JOG SROL LA'ANG 'GYUR BA CUNG ZAD RE YONG, CHOL

KHA SO SO'I RGYAN GOS LA NI MI 'DRA BA HA CANG CHEN PO YOD, 'ON KYANG BUD MED KYI GZAB GYON STENG BRTZOGS

SOGS MA YIN PA'I RGYUN GOS PHYU PA NI PHU THUNG YOD MED DANG, CHA THUL CHE CHUNG LAS BZO DBYIBS NI

GCIG PA RANG YIN, PANG GDAN DANG, RGYAB GDAN GNYIS SNGAR NANG GI AA MA TSOS GOS KYI ZON

SKYOR LTA BUR 'CHINGS PA PHYIS RGYAN CHA ZHIG TU NGOS BZUNGS KYIS PANG GDAN GYI PHRA DPYAD DANG, ZUR

BKAG SGROG GDAN, RGYAB GDAN LA RGYAN SOGS KYI RGYAS SPROS DANG STOD BYAS PAR NGES, GTZANG MO

RNAMS GA-YU BYUR MU TIG SOGS KYI SPA PHRUGS PA SGOR HA CANG GI MTHON PO BZOS TE KHYIM GYI SGO'I NANG

LA YANG MTHAR DKA' BA DANG, DBUS MO RNAMS KYI SKRA PHO ROG GI GSHOG PA KER BA LTA BU'I STENG DU

GA-YU BYUR MU TIG SOGS KYI SPA PHRUG ZUR GSUM PA, DBUS STOD 'BRI GUNG PA RNAMS SPA PHRUG SGOR

MO'I STENG DU GTZUG GA-YU LAG MTHIL TZAM PA, SHAN TSA BA RNAMS BYUR CHUNG DANG, DUNG BSGRIGS

KYIS GTZUG ZHVA MAR BKAG LTA BU, BYANG 'BROG PA RNAMS BYUR CHUNG GI DPRAL MTSAR SGOR MO DANG,

LHAS CHUNG GI SKRAR 'GO SNAM TSOS BSGRIGS KYIS RGYAB GDAN LA DNGUL DANG, DUNG SOGS KYI BRGYAN PA,

MDO STOD BUD MED KYI GTZUG TU SPOS SHEL DANG, BYUR RU DGAR BA, LA LAS SKRA MTSAMS SU GZI

DANG, GA-YU BYUR, GTZUG GA-YU SOGS BSTAR BSGRIGS BYED PA DANG, LA LAS SKRA RTZER STONG SKUD

KYI TSA LO CAN DANG, YANG CHA PHRENG DANG, SA DAM, SMU LI SOGS KYI BUD MED TSOS RNA RGYAN DANG, SKE

@074 RGYAN LA BYU RU'I SDONG PO YAL GA DANG BCAS 'PHYANG BA, MDO SMAD PAS MGO RGYAN LA BYU RU PADMA ZER BA,

LHAG TSAR tAM KHA RI TZE GANG ZER BA STONG CHAB YOD PA, LA LAS RGYAB GDAN (MA GDAN NAM WA RI)

GSER, DNGUL, DUNG SOGS RGYAG PA DANG, GOS 'TSEM DRUB MA DANG, PHAR CIN GYI RI MOS

PHYUG PA, STONG SKUD DMAR PO'I 'DZAR LDAN, 'GU LOG PA'I BUD MED RNAMS KYI RGYAB GDAN (MA GDAN)

LA SPOS SHEL DANG, BYU RU, DNGUL TSAGS PHOR GZUGS DAG GIS BRGYAN PA, SKRA SHUBS (C'A SHUBS)

GOS RAS PHAR CIN CAN LA ME LONG CHUNG DUS BRGYAN PA SOGS 'DIR CUNG ZAD TZAM LAS, RE RE BZHIN BRIS

KYIS MI LANGS, SNGAR DBUS GTZANG GI BUD MED TSOS LAG PA GA-YAS LA DUNG 'KHOR GYON YANG, PHYIS

PHAL CHE BAS MI GYON PA SOGS DE MTSUNGS CHOL KHA SO SOR YANG 'GYUR BA SNA TSOGS SHIG BYUNG YOD PA

GZHIR BCAS PAS, DA LTA'I GNAS SKABS SU RANG RIGS GZHIS LUS SPUN ZLA RNAMS NI RGYA DMAR GYI

BTZAN 'OG TU 'TSUD PAS RANG YUL GYI CHAS GOS JI BZHIN GYON RGYU LTA BZHAG, RGYA MI'I CHAS GOS MI

'DOD BZHIN DU GYON DGOS PA DANG, BYES 'BYOR RNAMS KYANG YUL GYI GNAM GSHIS DANG, MI 'KHYUR

'DRIS BDE BA'I PHYIR RANG YUL GYI CHAS GOS GYON RGYU DKA' BA BCAS, DA MUS LO BRGYA PHRAG GNAS NA,

RANG YUL GYI PHO MO'I CHAS GOS DANG, RGYAN CHA, SKRA 'JOG STANGS TSUN JI '[DRA YOD LKOG GYUR DU 'GRO

NGES PA NI RGYU MTSAN GSAL PO'I THOG NAS BRJOD THUB PAS, DA LTA GYON MYONG LO RGAN RNAMS YOD

SKABS 'DIR CHOL KHA SO SO DANG, BYE BRAG LUNG TSAN SO SO'I NANG THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I RGYAN GOS, ZHVA

LHAM, MDOR NA BUD MED KYI SKRA 'JOG STANGS TSUN PAR 'BYOR NA RAB DANG, DE MIN BRIS CHA TSUN

GZHIS BYES GZHON SKYES 'TSAR LONGS CAN RNAMS KYI DON LA GSOG 'JOG BYED DGOS PA NI GAL GNAD

SHIN TU CHE BA MTHONG YANG, DENG DUS AA MI RI KA'I LUNG PA LA LAR, SHES YON GYI CHU TSAD MTHON POR

SLEBS PA'I KHUL GYIS GNA' RABS KYI MI RNAMS GCER BU RANG DU SDOD PA LAS, GOS RGYAN SOGS MED

PAS DENG DUS GOS RGYAN SOGS KYI SPROS RGYAS BYAS PA 'DI DON MED RED CES PHO MO TSANG MA NGO TSA'I SGRIB

@075 GA-YOGS TZAM MED PAR GCER BUR SDOD PA'I SGRIG 'DZUGS (NUDIST COLONY) ZHIG BYED

KYI YOD PA DE LTA BUR YID CHES BYAS PA YIN NA NI, NGAS BRIS PA RNAMS LA DON MED PAR MCHIS SO,,

LHA KHANG DANG, KHANG KHYIM GYI BZO BKOD, DANG THOG MI RNAMS SA PHUG DANG, BRAG GI SKYIBS,

SHING DANG, RTZVA'I 'PHRAL SEL GYI CHAR SKYOB DAG TU SDOD KYANG, RJES SU BOD RJE GNYA' KHRI BTZAN POS

MKHAR GYI THOG MA YUM BU GLA SGANG DANG, BOD RJE GRI GUM BTZAN POS PHO BRANG PHYING DBAR STAG RTZE BRTZIGS

PA NAS BZUNGS KHANG PA BZO RGYU'I 'GO TSUGS PAR SEMS SHING, DE YANG LHA KHANG PHAL CHE BA NI, SNGAR

RGYA GAR NANG LO BRGYA PHRAG DANG PO DANG, GNYIS PA'I SKABS KYI BRAG BRKOS DANG, BAL YUL NANG SPYI

LO BRGYA PHRAG DRUG PA'I NANG GI BRAG BRKOS LA KHANG PA'I SGO DANG, KA BA, GDUNG MA, 'PHYAM, KA GZHU,

SBE LOG, PADMA CHOS BRTZEGS, BAD PHUR SOGS TSANG MA BAR SKABS BOD KYI GTZUG LAG KHANG KHAG

DANG, PHO BRANG KHAG LA SHING BRKOS YOD PA DE TSO DANG, PHAR BKAB TSUR BKAB BYED THUB PA YOD PA

DANG, DPER NA LHA SA'I RA SA 'PHRUL SNANG GI GTZUG LAG KHANG, BI KRA MA SHI LA'I LHA DEB DKAR 32-BA-5, KHANG DANG,

DPAL GYI BSAM YAS, AO TAN PU RI'I GTZUG LAG KHANG GSUNG RAB RIN PA CHE'I MDZOD 114-NA-3 RDZOGS LDAN GZHON NU'I DGA' STON 35-BA-6, LAS DPE BLANGS PA YONGS GRAGS DANG,

GTZANG KHANG KHAG LA LCAGS 'PHRUL GYI SGO SOGS RGYA BAL GYI LHA KHANG RNYING PA JI LTA BA YOD PAS DE DAG NI

RGYA GAR DANG, BAL YUL NAS DPE BLANGS PA RED CES GSAL POR BRJOD CHOG CING, RGYA PHIBS 'GA'

SHAS KYI BZO DBYIBS DANG, SGE KHUNG GI KHRA MA SOGS RGYA NAG NAS DPE BLANGS PA'ANG JI SNYED CIG YOD,

SNGAR GYI RDZONG RDZONG NI SNGAR DGRAS GLAG MI 'TSOL BA'I MKHAR BTZAN PO DAG LA ZER ZHING, PHYIS SA GNAS KYI KHRIMS DPON SDOD YUL LA ZER, RNYID DANG, SDE DPON KHAG GI KHANG PA NI, RI DE'U ZHIG GI STENG DU

BRTZIGS TE, DE YANG 'OG TU SGO PHYUGS KYI RVA BA DANG, 'BRU GZAN SOGS 'JOG YUL GYI MDZOD DANG,

@076 DE'I STENG DU GA-YOS KHANG, ME KHANG, SDOD KHANG, DE'I STENG LHA KHANG DANG, MGON KHANG SOGS BYED,

SGO RNAMS KYI YAS THEM DMA' LA, MAS THEM MTHON PO BZO BA NI RO LANGS YONG MI THUB PA'I THABS RED

CES GLENG, SGE KHUNG DANG, DU 'GRO RNAMS CHUNG BAS NANG DU DKAR CHA DANG, NYI RGYAG CHUNG YANG, YANG

STENG GI DKYIL DU DKAR KHUNG BTON PA DE LA RGYA MTHONGS ZER, KHYIM GYI LHO PHYOGS RNAMS DRO BAS MI RNAMS

SDOD PA DANG, BYANG PHYOGS RNAMS BSIL BAS SHA KHANG DANG, CHANG KHANG, BAL KHANG SOGS BYED,

YANG STENG DU BUD SHING DANG, SKYA TSER SOGS BRTZIGS PAS BUD SHING SKAM PA DANG, BTZAN CHA GCIG

LCOG LTA BU YIN KYANG, RJES SU SPEN BAD BZOS TE KHANG PA'I MDZES RGYAN LTA BU CHAGS PA RED, RAB

GSAL DANG SGO MCHOR LA CHAR SKYOBS SBRA YOL DANG, RGYAL SGO'I STENG DU MDOS DANG, RIGS GSUM

MGON PO'I SKU BRNYAN 'JOG PA, SGO'I ME LONG LA NYI ZLA DANG, GA-YUNG DRUNG BRIS PA, SGO STENG DU RA LPAGS

DKAR PO 'PHYANGS PA SOGS GNOD PA MI YONG PA'I THABS YIN ZER, 'BANGS KHYIM RNAMS NI RDZONG DE'I

GSHAM DU GRONG CHUNG RE CHAGS TE RDZONG GRONG DE GNYIS LA RTZE DANG, ZHOL GYI THA DE 'DRA BA'I RDZONG GOG 'GA' SHAS YOD PA LAS, PHAL CHE BA GO DAN KH'ANG GI SKABS BSHIGS PAR GRAGS, SNYAD BYED, RJES SU RIM

PAS YAR RGYAS PHYIN TE KHANG PA RGYAG YUL SA CHA KHAD YANGS 'KHOS SNYOMS THOG ,KHANG PA SGO DANG, SGE

KHUNG, RAB GSAL SOGS MTHONG RGYA CHE ZHING BKOD LEGS, SGO DANG, SGE KHUNG GI GA-YAS GA-YON LA

NAG RTZI, SGO YOL DANG, GSHAM BU, RAB GSAL SHEL KHRA CHU KHEBS CAN GYI KHANG PA THOGS SA GNYIS

SAM, GSUM BYAS PA'I YANG STENG DU LHA RTEN DANG, BSANGS BUM, RGYAL MTSAN MI SKYA'I KHANG PA'I NANG LA ^ RGYAL BA'I BKA' 'GYUR RIN PO CHE YOD NA RGYAL MTSAN 'DZUGS PA DANG, SNGAGS PA DANG, GTO MKHAN GYI KHANG PA YIN NA

RNGA THUG 'DZUGS PA RED, DAR LCOG DANG DAR CHEN 'DZUGS PA NI BON GYI SROL YIN ZER YANG, BOD MI DRAG ZHAN TSANG MAS THUN MONG DU SPYOD PA'I

GSHIS LUGS BZANG PO ZHIG YIN, DANG, THUG, DAR LCOG,

SGO 'GRAM DU SHIN TU RING BA'I MA nI JO DAR 'DZUGS PA SOGS BOD MI RANG GI THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I GSHIS

@077 LUGS MANG PO DANG, KHANG PA RGYAB MTHO LA MDUN DMA' BA, KHANG PA'I NGO PHAL CHER NYI MA RGYAG SA'I

PHYOGS SU STON PA, SGO PHYUGS KYI RVA BA RNAMS MA KHANG LAS THA DAD DU BZO BA DANG, MTHA' SKOR DU LCANG

GLING DANG, LDUM RVA, RTZAM 'THAG CHU 'KHOR, SNUM BRTZIR KHANG SOGS YOD, KHANG PA RAB RDO DANG,

MTHA' MA GYANG DANG, SA PHAG GIS BRTZIGS SHING, RONG SA RNAMS SU SHING GIS BZOS PA YANG YOD,

LHA KHANG DANG, PHO BRANG KHAG LA SA RTZI DKAR DMAR SER GSUM GANG RUNG DANG, MGON

KHANG DANG, BTZAN KHANG LA SA RTZI DMAR PO, KHANG PA BYINGS LA SA RTZI DKAR PO GSOL BA'I SROL YOD KYANG,

SA SKYA SOGS DGON RNYING LA LAR SA RTZI DKAR PO DANG, SER PO, NAG PO SNAM BU BRKYANGS PA LTA BU SPEL

MAR GSOL BA'I SROL YANG YOD, DGON PA PHAL CHE BA GRONG LAS MAL LE GCIG GAM, GNYIS KYI SA

KHAD 'GYANGS SAR CHAGS SHING, RI KHROD DANG, YANG DGON NI DE LAS HA CANG RGYANG RING ZHING, RI MTHO

DBEN PA DAG LA CHAGS YOD PA RED, LHA SA'I YUL LJONGS KYI DBUS SU, GRU 'DZIN GNYIS PA'I GZHAL

MED KHANG PHO BRANG CHEN PO PO T'A LA NI, SNGAR SRONG BTZAN SGAM PO'I SKU DUS PHO BRANG DKAR PO'AM, MA RU

(DMAR PO) BRTZEGS PA'I SHUL DU, KUN MKHYEN LNGA PA CHEN POS RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SHING BYA

1645 LOR RMANG BTING PA NAS, PHO BRANG PHYI RGYA LO 'KHOR GSUM GYI KHONGS SU GRUB KYANG, RTEN

DANG BRTEN PA BCAS LO 'KHOR BZHI BCU ZHE LNGA'I KHONGS SU LEGS PAR GRUB CING, BSRA ZHING BRTAN PA,

MTHO LA RGYA KHYON CHE BA, PHYI NANG GANG SAR BZO BKOD PHUN SUM TSOGS PAS 'DZAM GLING SA CHEN 'DI'I

MDZES PA'I RGYAN GCIG LTA BU YOD DO, ,

RGYAL SA LHA SA'I GRONG KHYER, ^ RGYAL MCHOG LNGA PA CHEN POS, GANG DE'I DBUS 'GYUR

@078 BYED PO YIS, ,PHAN BDE'I MGRON RNAMS RING NAS 'GUGS PA BZHIN, ,BGRANG YAS RGYAL BA'I RANG

SNANG YE SHES TSOGS, ,GZHAL MED BA GAM DAM PAR LEGS GRUB LA, ,LHA LDAN SPRUL PA'I GTZUG

LAG KHANG BZANG ZHES, ,MKHA' LA DBANG PO'I GZHU BZHIN MNGON PAR BKRA, ,ZHES YONGS SU BSNGAGS

PAR MDZAD PA'I GANGS LJONGS SA YI LTE BA LHA SA'I GRONG KHYER NI, CHOS TSIG GI DBUS 'GYUR RDO RJE

GDAN NAM, BOD RGYAL YONGS KYI RGYAL SA LTE BA YIN ZHING, DE'I CHAGS TSUL RGYAS PA NI MA nI BKA'

'BUM, BKA' CHEMS KA KHOL MA, 'DZAM GLING RGYAN GCIG GI DKAR CHAG SOGS LA GSAL YANG,

'DIR RAGS TZAM BKOD PA, LHA SA NI CHOS KYI RGYAL PO SRONG BTZAN SGAM PO'I SKU DUS NAS CHAGS SHING,

THOG MAR SA 'DIR NGAM SHOD DAM, 'AM SHOD, 'OM SHOD ZER, DA LTA'I RA SA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG

CHAGS PA'I SA DER 'O THANG GI MTSO CHUNG ZHIG DANG, SHING GLA BA DANG, 'OM BU'I TSAL ZHIG YIN PAR

GRAGS, RJES SU RIM PAS GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG, GRONG KHYER CHAGS PAS SKYID MO SHOD DAM, SKYID SHOD,

LHA'I YUL SA LA 'PHOS PA LTAR SNOD BCUD DGE MTSAN PHUN SUM TSOGS PAR BRTEN LHA SA ZHES SA

GSUM NA YONGS SU GRAGS PA DE BYUNG BA RED,

LHA SA'I MTHA' SKOR NA, NYANG BRAN GYI RI LA GDUGS ,SE RA'I RI LA RGYAL MTSAN,

RA KHA'I BRAG LA NYA, RDZONG BTZAN GYI RI LA BUM PA DANG, DPAL BE'U, GRIB KYI RI LA DUNG DKAR, JO

BO MDO MKHAR BA GNAS PA'I SHUN GYI BRAG LA PADMA SOGS KYI BZO DBYIBS RANG BYON DU GSAL ZHING,

GNAM LA 'KHOR LO RTZIBS BRGYAD DANG, SA LA PADMA 'DAB BRGYAD KYIS RNAM PAR MDZES SHING, DE YANG

SPOR THANG RTZIS KYI LUGS LTAR, RGAS MO 'PHRENG 'GO'I RI LA SHAR GYI RGYA STAG KHRA PO, SKYID CHU NI

LHO'I GA-YU 'BRUG SNGON PO, SHUN GYI RI LA NUB KYI BYA DMAR PO, PHA BONG KHA'I BRAG NI BYANG GI RUS SBAL

SER PO (NAG PO) ZHES NGOS 'DZIN MDZAD YOD PA DANG, NYANG DOG DBAR SE RA'I RGYAB RI GLANG PO CHE GA-YUL DU BZHUGS PA LTA BU SOGS RI DPYAD PHUN SUM TSOGS PA YOD,

@079 LHA SA'I GRONG KHYER GYI DBUS SU SRONG BTZAN SGAM POS BZHENGS PA'I RA SA

'PHRUL SNANG GI GTZUG LAG KHANG THOG SA BZHI PA, RTZE MOR GSER GYI RGYA PHIBS DANG, BYA 'DAB,

MDA' GA-YAB BCAS LA RLUNG DRIL GYIS 'KHOR RA 'KHOR YUG TU BSKOR BA, RGYA PHIBS DANG, MDA'

GA-YAB KYI ZUR RGYAN CHU SRIN GYI KHA LAS DUS MA YIN PA 'BYUNG RGYU'I RTAGS MTSAN DU CHU YANG YANG BABS

PA; ZUR GYI LCOG BZHI SOGS LA GANYDZI RA DANG, RGYAL MTSAN, THUG SOGS KYIS RNAM PAR MDZES PA,

GTZUG LAG KHANG GI RTEN GYI GTZO BO NI, RGYA BZA' 'UN CIN KONG JO'I RTEN SKAL DU GDAN DRANGS SHING,

SANGS RGYAS NYID KYIS RAB GNAS MDZAD PA'I JO BO SH'AKYA MU NE DANG, SRONG BTZAN SGAM PO'I THUGS DAM

GYI RTEN DU BZHENGS PA THUGS RJE CHEN PO RANG BYON LNGA LDAN GYIS GTZOS SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN BSAM GYIS MI

BCU GSUM PAS NYAMS GSO MDZAD PA'I DKAR CHAG DAD SNANG 'BUM PHRAG 'CHAR BA'I 'O MTSO'I RDZING BU, SHING, GTZUG LAG KHANG GI 'DAB SBYAR DU ^ RGYAL BA'I GZIM

TU 'DOD RGU DPAL 'BYOR GYI BANG MDZOD LA MNGA' DBANG 'BYOR BA BLA BRANG 'PHRAL BDE, BYANG DU DRAG PO

RA CHEN MO, NANG GI 'KHOR YUG SHAR LHO BYANG BCAS LA MA nI LAG SKOR BRGYA PHRAG BRGAL BA BCAS YOD,

@080 CAN GYI SPYI LO BRGYA PHRAG DGU PA'I NANG RGYA BOD DBON ZHANG MTHUN PA'I CHINGS KYI YI GE GSAL BAR BRKOS

PA DANG, SKYABS RJE BDUD 'JOMS RIN PO CHES RGYA GAR BAS MCHOD RTEN RNAmS LA KA nI ZER BA RED CES GSUNGS, SGO BZHI DANG, ^ MI DBANG BSOD NAMS STOBS RGYAL GYIS BZHENGS PA'I MA nI 'KHOR CHEN, DE

@081 SHAR SKYA RING, GTZUG LAG KHANG GI LHO SGO'I 'GRAM DU SMON LAM DANG, TSOGS MCHOD CHEN MO'I SKABS

SU ^ RGYAL MCHOG SKU 'PHRENG NA RIM DANG, DGA' LDAN KHRI PA NA RIM NAS BKA' CHOS GNANG YUL GSUNG

CHOS RVA BA, DE'I MDUN DU RGYAL MCHOG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO GSER KHRI MNGA' GSOL SKABS GSAR

'DZUGS MDZAD PA'I BSKAL BZANG DAR CHEN, SA SBOG SGANG BRGYUD JO BO'I DBU SKRA NAS NUB PHYOGS

GZHUNG LAM DU GU SHRIR BSTAN 'DZIN CHOS RGYAL GYIS MDO KHAMS BE RI RGYAL PO CHAM LA 'PHAB PA'I GTAM

SNYAN DAR 'PHYAR SKABS SDE PA BSOD NAMS CHOS 'PHEL NAS BTZUGS PAR GRAGS PA'I BYUS YAG DAR

CHEN, BE RI CHAM LA 'PHAB PA'I SKOR DEB 'DI'I SHOG GRANGS 416 NANG GSAL,

GZHAN YANG LHA SA'I KLU SBUG RGYAL SGO'I BYANG BRGYUD DU SMAN DANG, SKAR RTZIS KYI

SLOB GRVA CHEN PO 'GRO PHAN GLING DANG, DUS PHYIS GSAR DU SGRIG 'DZUGS GNANG BA'I 'BYOR MED RGAS

'KHOd DANG, ZHA LONG RNAMS KYI SKYOBS GSO KHANG, BSTAN RGYAS GLING BAN TSANG GRVA TSANG CHAGS SHUL,

DE'I BYANG PHYOGS SU BZHI SDE TSAL PA KHRI DPON DGA' BDE BZANG POS GTZUG LAG KHANG DU MCHOD 'BUL BA BZHI GRA'I 'GRO KHUNGS SU BTZUGS PA BZHI SDER GRAGS, GRVA TSANG DANG, TSE SMON GLING GRVA TSANG, GTZUG LAG KHANG GI BYANG DU RGYAS

BTAB RVA MO CHE'I GTZUG LAG KHANG NANG BAL BZA' KHRI BTZUN GYI RTEN SKAL DU GDAN DRANGS PA'I JO BO MI

BSKYOD RDO RJE DANG, GSANG CHEN RGYUD STOD GRVA TSANG, DE DANG NYE BAR TSE DPAG LHA KHANG DANG, RJE 'BUM

LHA KHANG, DE'I SHAR PHYOGS SU DPAL LDAN SMAD RGYUD GRVA TSANG DANG, RME RU 'DI NI BZHI SDE NAS RAB BYUNG 12 PA'I NANG YA BRAL DU PHYIN ZHES BEE SER 116-BA-1 NANG GSAL ZHING, 'GA' SHAS KYIS NI CHOS RGYAL SKABS KA RU DANG,

RME RU ZHES YOD TSUL YANG BRJOD SROL 'DUG, GRVA TSANG, DE'I NYE 'DABS

SU YE SHU'I CHOS SPEL KA SPU CAN GYI LHA KHANG CHAGS PAR GRAGS PA'I AA TI LCANG GSEB, THAL PHUNG

@082 SU TSA KHUNGS ZHES BTZUN MA'I DGON PA DANG, DE'I NUB PHYOGS SU LHA SAR GTAN SDOD KA SMIR MI RIGS KYI

LHA KHANG, DE DANG HA CANG THAG NYE BAR BAL PO'I GZHUNG TSAB LAS KHANG, LHO NUB PHYOGS SU SNGAR

MAN JU'I AAM BAN SOGS ZHI DRAG DPON RIGS RNAMS KYI SDOD GNAS YA MON SOGS YOD,

LHA SA'I GRONG KHYER GYI SHAR PHYOGS SU SNGAR KHAMS PA JA TSONG PA RNAMS SBRA GUR PHUB

STE SDOD PA'I SBRA NAG ZHOL DANG, SHAR LHO'I PHYOGS SU WO PA GLING PA ZHES RGYA RIGS KHA CHE'I CHOS LUGS

PA SHA DANG, SNGO TSAL GYI TSONG LAS BYED MI RNAMS KYI GRONG TSO, NUB PHYOGS SU PHYING GUR NANG ZHES SNGAR

SOG PO'I DPON RIGS DANG, 'GRUL PA RNAMS PHYING PA'I GUR PHUB STE SDOD YUL BCAS LA DENG DUS GRONG

KHYIM GYIS KHENGS SHING, GRONG GI GSANG LAM PHAL CHER LA BZA' BCA' DANG DNGOS RIGS KYI TSONG KHANG

DANG, ZA KHANG, CHANG KHANG, GSER DNGUL, ZANGS LCAGS, KO BA SOGS KYI BZO RIGS DAG

GIS KHENGS BSDAD YOD PA MA ZAD, BAR 'KHOR NANG DANG, 'ONG STOD ZHING KHA SOGS SA STONG TSANG

MAR SKYAS KHROM DANG, SHA TSAL, SHING 'BRAS SOGS BZA' BCA'I KHROM DANG, DE DAG DANG NYE BAR

RTA DREL DANG, BONG BU, GZAN PA, LCI BA SOGS TSONG MKHAN RNAMS KYIS KHENGS SHING, DER SNGA

DRO'I RING 'KHRUG CHA CHEN PO YOD,

PHYOGS BZHIR SNGAR SRONG BTZAN SGAM PO'I SKU DUS BZHENGS GNANG MDZAD PA'I RIGS

GSUM MGON PO'I LHA KHANG DANG, RJES SU RIM PAS GSAR BZHENGS ZHI KHRO'I LHA KHANG, SNYUNG GNAS LHA KHANG,

TSES BCU LHA KHANG, MA nI LHA KHANG SOGS MANG PO YOD, DE BZHIN DAR PO GLING DANG, KARMA SHAR, SPRO BDE KHANG

'BAR, BDE CHEN RAB BRTAN, 'BRANG RGYAS SHAG, RAG KHA SHAG, SNE'U SHAG, BYUS SDING SDE PA BSOD NAMS CHOS 'PHEL DANG, SKYID SHOD STAG RTZE BA SOGS DGA' LDAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG RNAMS GROS TSOGS KYIS MTHA' MA LA MO TSANGS PA'I LUNG DON BZHIN

HOR SOG GI YUL DU RGYAB GNYER 'TSOL BA'I SKABS KYI GROS TSOGS BYED SA'I GNAS KHANG YIN PAR GRAGS, GNAS, DGA' LDAN

@083 KHANG GSAR SOGS LO RGYUS CAN GYI GZHUNG SGER KHANG PA DANG, GZHAN YANG SDE DPON, YAB GZHIS, MI

DRAG, TSONG RIGS 'BYOR LDAN BCAS PA'I SGER GYI KHANG PA YANG SHIN TU MANG PO DANG, SGER GYI SLOB GRVA

'GA' SHAS DANG, GLOG BRNYAN STON KHANG BDE SKYID 'OD SNANG SOGS KYANG YOD PA RED,

GRONG KHYER GYI GSANG LAM GU DOG LA, LAM GZHUNG KHAG KYANG, MDZES PO DANG,

GTZANG SBRA SOGS YAG PO MED KHAR, SMON TSOGS GNYIS KYI TSOGS CHU KHAG GCIG GTZANG PO NAS

LCAGS MDONG NANG 'DREN PA TZAM LAS, DE BYINGS 'THUNG CHU PHAL CHE BA KHRON PA'I CHU LA BSTEN DGOS PAS

GTUN KHUNG CHU MIG, RDO SGOR SGOR CHU MIG, RAG KHA CHU 'KHOR CHU MIG SOGS LO RGYUS CAN GYI KHRON PA

MANG PO YOD, GTZUG LAG KHANG GI GZIM SGO'I 'GRAM DANG, SGER GYI KHANG PA 'GA' SHAS LA MA

GTOGS CHU GLOG GI GSAL BZHU MED PAS PHAL CHE BAS SNUM DANG, PAD SNUM GYI BZHU MAR KHO NA BED

SPYOD BYED PA RED, GRONG KHYER GYI BTZOG PA RNAMS CHUS 'DED CHED SA 'OG TU CHU YUR 'GA' SHAS YOD

PAR SMON GRONG ZAB PA, GSAR BYUNG ZAM PA, SKAS THUNG ZAM PA, 'DOD 'JO ZAM PA, RA MO CHE'I

RDO ZAM, GA-YU THOG MAN JU'I AAM BAN ZHIG GIS LHA SA DANG, ZHOL GYI BAR CHU CHEN LA DBYAR DUS RGYU 'GRUL DKA' BAS RGYANG GRAGS SNGA YOD PA'I GA-YUL RTZI'I ? CAN GYI

ZAM CHEN BSRA BRTAN YID DU 'ONG BA ZHIG RGYA BOD MCHOD YON 'BREL BA GONG 'PHEL 'BYUNG CHED RGYAB TSUL GYI GONG MA'I MDZOD NAS RGYA DNGUL SRANG KHRI PHRAG MANG PO

BLANGS PA RJES SU RDZUN KHUNGS BRDOL TE AAM BAN KHRIMS THOG BSAD PA'I LO RGYUS SHIG BSHAD SROL YOD, ZAB PA SOGS DNGOS SU MTHONG RGYU YOD DANG, MED PA'I ZAM PA 'GA' SHAS YOD

KYANG, CHU 'GRO YAG PO MED PAS BAR 'KHOR NANG LO LTAR ZLA 3 NANG RDZAB BSHANGS BYED SKABS BTZOG

PA TSANG MA PHYIR BTON PAS NYIM KHA SHAS DRI NGAN GYIS KHYAB 'GRO BA RED, LHA SA'I GLING 'KHOR GYI PHYI LA

RJES SU GSAR CHAGS GRONG KHYIM BSKOS MDZES HA CANG GI MANG PO YOD, GRONG KHYER PHYI NANG DANG, GTZANG

CHU'I 'GRAM DU GZHUNG DANG, SGER GYI GLING KHA MANG PO YOD PA MI DMANGS RNAMS CHU BRGAL BA DANG, SPRO SKYID

BTANG BAR BSKYOD NA SUS KYANG DGAG BYA BYED MI MED,

@084 GTZUG LAG KHANG NAS NUB PHYOGS RGYANG GRAGS GSUM TZAM BRGAL BA'I SAR GRU

'DZIN GNYIS PA'I GZHAL MED KHANG PHO BRANG CHEN PO PO T'A LA DANG, MDUN GYI LCAGS RI'I NANG BYAMS

KHANG DANG, RGYAL BA'I BKA' 'GYUR RIN PO CHES DBUS GSUNG RAB MANG PO'I PAR SHING BZHUGS YUL

GANGS CAN PHAN BDE'I GTER MDZOD DANG, PAR SHING BZHUGS YUL RNYING PA DGA' LDAN PHUN TSOGS GLING, ZHOL

GNYER LAS KHUNGS, NAS KHANG CHEN MO, BOD LJONGS DMAG SPYI LAS KHUNGS DANG, GO MDZOD RDO RJE

GLING, 'DOD 'JO'I DPAL SKYID, CHIBS RVA MDO SBUG DANG, MDZO MO RVA, NAG CHEN BTZON PA 'JUG

YUL, LCAGS RI'I PHYI NANG GNYIS KAR GRONG KHYIM YANG MANG PO YOD, ZHOL GYI LCAGS RI CHEN MOR SHAR,

LHO; NUB GSUM LA SGO CHEN RE YOD PA'I YA GYAL LHO PHYOGS GZHUNG SGO NAS THAD DRANGS RGYA LAM GYI BZHI

MDOR, BOD RJE KHRI SRONG LDE'U BTZAN SKABS, RGYA NAG TU DMAG DRANGS SHING, RGYA RGYAL KHRI LAS PHAB

CING, LO LTAR BOD LA DPYA KHRAL 'BUL DGOS SOGS GSAL BA'I GZI BRJID CAN GYI RDO RING YIG CHA DEB 'DI'I SHOG GRANGS 180 NANG GSAL, RDO RING DANG,

DE DANG NYE BAR GOR BOD SDE GZAR SKABS MAN JU ^ GONG MAS BOD LA DMAG ROGS BTANG SKOR 'KHOD PA'I

RDO YIG MAN JU'I RDO YIG DEB 'DI'I SHOG GRANGS 650 NANG GSAL, GNYIS, DE'I NUB PHYOGS SU MONG BZA' KHRI LCAM GYIS BZHENGS PA'I BRAG LHA KLU SBUG GI LHA

KHANG KHYAD PAR CAN, RI DE'I RGYAB MDUN GNYIS KYI BRAG 'OG NAS RGYUN CHAD MED PA'I YAN LAG BRGYAD DVANGS SHING BSIL LA 'JAM PA DANG, ,DRI ZHIM MNGAR LA YANG BA DANG, ,LTO BA MGRIN PAR MI GNOD PA'I, ,CHU PO YAN LAG BRGYAD

LDAN YIN, ,ZHES GSUNGS, BRGYAD

DANG LDAN PA'I BDUD RTZI'I SMAN CHAB, PHO BRANG PO T'A LA DANG, LCAGS PO RI GNYIS KYI SBREL MTSAMS SU

LO RGYUS CAN GYI BRAG SGO KA nI'I MCHOD RTEN GSUM SBREL LHA SA'I NUB PHYOGS KYI RGYAL SGO LTA BU MDZES

SHING YID DU 'ONG BA, PHO BRANG NAS NUB NGOS RGYANG GRAGS KYI SAR RJE BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS KYI GNAS RI

@085 BONG BA RIR 'JAM DBYANGS KYI LHA KHANG DANG, RGYA LUGS GE SAR GYI LHA KHANG, DE'I 'DABS ZHOL DU BRTAN

BZHUGS CHOS 'KHOR GLING ZHES KUN BDE GLING GRVA TSANG, DE NAS RGYANG GRAGS GNYIS TZAM GYI NUB PHYOGS

SU ^ RGYAL DBANG SKU 'PHRENG RIM PA'I DBYAR BZHUGS GNANG YUL NOR GLING SKAL BZANG PHO BRANG, DE'I GNAS BSHAD RAG TZAM DEB 'DI'I SHOG GRANGS 606 NANG GSAL, KUN

BDE GLING DANG, NOR BU GLING KHA'I BAR NA RGYA GAR GZHUNG TSAB LAS KHANG BDE SKYID GLING KHA, RTZE PHO

BRANG CHEN PO'I RGYAB PHYOGS SU KLU RGYAL MAL DRO GZI CAN GNAS PA'I KLU KHANG DANG, SA GA ZLA BA'I DUS

CHEN NYIN GRONG KHYER GYI MI RNAMS KO GRU BTANG STE SPRO SKYID BYED SA'I SKYID TSAL BCAS YOD,

LHA SA DANG, LCAGS PO RI, BONG BA RI, RTZE PHO BRANG BCAS YONGS SU BSKOR

BA LA GLING 'KHOR ZER ZHING, DER SKOR BA BYED MI RGYUN CHAD MED PA YOD, SKOR MI TSOS RDO HRIL GYI

MAndAL PHUL BAS SKAL BZANG RDO PHUNG DANG, DMAG ZOR RDO PHUNG SOGS RDO PHUNG 'GA' SHAS YOD,

DMAR ZOR RDO PHUNG GI 'GRAM DU SHING RIGS GSUM MGON PO ZHES RGYAL LCANG GI SDONG PO CHEN PO ZHIG LA

YAL GA GCIG SE BA'I SDONG PO ME TOG DANG, 'BRAS BU DUS SU SMIN PA, YAL GA GCIG GRO BA'I

SDONG PO BYAS PA'I NGO MTSAR CAN ZHIG DANG, LCAGS PO RI'I SKOR LAM GYI BRAG LA SANGS RGYAS DANG, BYANG

CHUB SEMS PA'I SNANG BRNYAN DANG, GZUNGS SNGAGS SOGS BRAG BRKOS MANG PO MJAL RGYU YOD,

LHA SA NAS NUB PHYOGS SU DPAG TSAD TZAM GYI SA NA GDAN SA CHEN PO DPAL LDAN

'BRAS DKAR SPUNGS PHUR LCOG NGAG DBANG BYAMS PAS MDZAD PA'I GDAN SA BZHI DANG, RGYUD GRA RNAM GNYIS KYI DKAR CHAG PAD DKAR 'PHRER BA, PA, RGYANG GRAGS GCIG TZAM GYI MDUN NA DAN BAG RIN CHEN SGANG GI GRONG SDE, DE'I

SHAR NGOS SU GNAS CHUNG SGRA DBYANGS LCOG BYANG CHUB DPAL LDAN PA'I RNAM THAR NANG GNAS CHUNG DANG, CHOS SKYONG GI LO RGYUS, GLING, LHA SA DANG, 'BRAS SPUNGS KYI BAR NA SPYANG (RKYANG) THANG

NA KHA DANG, SDE BZHI'I 'DAM RVA CHEN MO, LHA KLU DGA' TSAL DANG, 'JA' TSON CHU MIG SOGS DANG,

@086 LHA SA NAS BYANG PHYOGS SU RGYANG GRAGS BZHI TZAM GYI SA NA GDAN SA CHEN PO SE RA THEG CHEN GLING, LHA SA

DANG, SE RA'I DBAR NA GRA BZHI GLOG 'PHRUL KHANG NGO MTSAR MTHA' KLAS RIG 'PHRUL GTER MDZOD KHANG

DANG, KHA DANG GRA BZHI DMAG SGAR, LHA SA'I MTHA' 'KHOR GYI RI BRGYUD RNAMS SU SHIN TU DBEN ZHING,

BAG PHEBS YID DU 'ONG BA'I DGE 'PHEL, LHA LUNG, DGON PA GSAR GONG 'OG, BRAG RI, 'JOG PO,

PHA DPAL 'BYOR LHUN RUB KYI MDZAD PA PHA BONG KHA'I GNAS BSHAD SOGS RI KHROD SO SOR DKAR CHAG DANG GNAS BSHAD RE YOD BONG KHA BYANG CHUB SHING GI NAG KHROD, CHU BZANG, GDUGS YU DGON NAM, BKRA SHIS CHOS GLING,

RTAG BRTAN, SE RA RTZE, SE RA CHOS SDING, RA KHA BRAG, KE'U TSANG SHAR NUB, PHUR BU LCOG, SPANG LUNG,

MKHAR RDO (MTHONG) GNAS NANG, RI SKYA, RAG, GAR PA, TSE MCHOG GLING SOGS RI KHROD KHAG MANG

PO DANG, DGA' RU DGON DANG, NEL CHUNG RI SOGS BTZUN MA'I RI KHROD KYANG 'GA' SHAS YOD, DE

BZHIN RA MA SGANG GI PHUR SKAR CHUNG RDO JRE DBYINGS KYI LHA KHANG, GSANG NE'U THOG, GSANG MDAR LO TZ'A

PA BLO LDAN SHES RAB KYI SKU 'BUM, NYIN TSOGS PHYED TZAM GYI SA NA'U SHANG RDO BKRA SHIS DGE 'PHEL,

SKYID CHU'I BYANG NA MA NYES THANG 'OR SGROL MA LHA KHANG DANG, JO BO'I SKU 'BUM, RA BA STOD, STAG LUNG BRAG,

AO RGYAN SANGS RGYAS GNYIS PA'I SGRUB CHU GZHONGS PA LHA CHU, SKYOR MO LUNG DANG, RA TSAG, DGA' BA

GDONG SOGS GNAS RNYING KHYAD PAR CAN RNAMS KYANG RKYANG THAG RING PO RANG MED,

LHA SA'I SHAR PHYOGS SKYID CHU GTZANG PO'I 'GRAM DU JO BO'I RAGS ZHES BYA BA YOD,

DE NI GTZANG PO DES GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG, GRONG KHYER LA GNOD PA MI 'BYUNG BA'I CHED THOG MAR MYANG NYI

MA'I 'OD ZER GYIS RDZU 'PHRUL GYI RAGS RDO GYEN LA 'DED DE JO RAGS THOG MAR BSKYON PA DANG, DE RJES

ZHIG PO BDUD RTZIS CHU RAGS ZHABS 'DEGS LAN BZHI MDZAD, LHA RJE DGE BA 'BUM NAS JO BO'I RAGS

RDO'I ZHABS 'DEGS KHA YAR MDZAD DE SKU GSHEGS PA'I TSE SKU SMAD RAGS RDO'I DKYIL DU BZHUGS

PAR GRAGS, RGYAL MCHOG BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS LHA LDAN SMON LAM CHEN MO'I RJES 'BREL DGE 'DUN

@087 RNAMS NAS LO LTAR RAGS KYI NYAMS GSOR RAGS RDO SKYEL RGYU'I SROL 'DZUGS MDZAD PA'I CHU RAGS

BYIN CAN DANG, DE DANG NYE BAR SKU 'BUM THANG NI, RVA LO TZ'A BA RDO RJE GRAGS KYIS SKU 'BUM PHRAG DUS

GCIG TU SPRUL TE CHOS STON PAS SKU 'BUM THANG DU GRAGS YE SHES SENG GES MDZAD PA'I RVA LO'I RNAM THAR KUN KHYAB SNYAN PA'I RNGA SGRAGS SHING, SNGAR RVA LO'I SKU DMAR GDUNG BZHUGS

PA'I MCHOD RTEN ZHIG LDAN GYI MDAR GTZANG CHU'I 'GRAM DU BZHUGS PA RJES SU CHU 'KHYER GYIS DMAR GDUNG

'BRAS SPUNGS SNGAGS PA GRVA TSANG GI 'JIGS BYED GZUNGS BZHUGS SU BZHUGS PAR GRAGS,

SKYID CHU'I GTZANG PO BRGAL TE SHAR PHYOGS DPAG TSAD TZAM GYI SA NA, 'GRO BA'I

MGON PO ZHANG GA-YU BRAG PA'I GDAN SA TSAL GUNG THANG DANG, SKU 'BUM 'JOG RI NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHRIN LAS KYIS MDZAD PA GUNG THANG DANG, SKU 'BUM CHEN PO'I DKAR CHAG, CHEN MO, DE'I BYANG PHYOGS SU

YER PA LHA RI SNYING PO'I MGUL SER BYES SLOB ZUR BLO BZANG NOR BUS MDZAD PA YER PA'I GNAS BSHAD, GUNG THANG NAS SHAR PHYOGS SU BDE CHEN RDZONG DANG, RJE TZONG KHA PAS

PHYAG BTAB PA'I GSANG SNGAGS MKHAR TSE RING MGON POS MDZAD PA GSANG SNGAGS MKHAR GYI LO RGYUS, DE NAS DPAG TSAD KHA SHAS BGROD PA'I SHAR PHYOGS SU GDAN

SA CHEN PO DGA' LDAN RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING BCAS YOD PA RED,

LHA SAR GTAN SDOD MI RIGS STONG PHRAG LNGA BCU NAS, DRUG CU'I BAR DANG, BOD

ZLA DANG PO'I NANG SMON LAM CHEN MO'I SKABS 'BRAS SE DGA' GSUM GYI DGE 'DUN DANG, PHYOGS MTHA'

NAS 'BYOR BA'I GNAS SKOR BA SOGS MI GRANGS 'BUM GCIG NAS, CHIG 'BUM NYIS KHRI TZAM YONG

GI YOD PA RED, LHA SA'I NANG GNAS SDOD MI RIGS MCHOG DMAN BAR PA BCAS PA RNAMS SHIN TU

BAG PHEBS SHING, 'CHAR 'PHAR KUN TU CHOS DANG 'BREL BA'I DUS CHEN DANG, DGONG DRO BAR

'KHOR NANG ROL MO DANG BCAS GLU GZHAS GTONG BZHIN 'GRO BA DANG, SPRANG PO RNAMS KYANG SNGA DRO LTO SLONG

@088 DU 'GRO BA TZAM LAS, DGONG MTSAMS NAS RA RO'I NGANG DU SDOD PA SOGS MI RNAMS LUS DAL, SEMS

SKYID, ZAS BCUD CHE, RANG RANG 'TSO THABS 'BAD RTZOL CHEN PO BYED MA DGOS PAR RANG BZHIN LHUN

GRUB TU BYUNG BA SOGS NGO MTSAR KHYAD CHOS CAN ZHIG YOD KYANG, SPYI LO 1950 LOR RGYA DMAR GUNG BRAN

TANG NAS DRAG PO'I BTZAN 'DZUL BYAS RJES LHA SA'I GRONG KHYER YAS MAS KUN TU RGYA MI'I LAS BYED KYI SDOD

KHANG, DMAG SGAR KHAG, SMAN KHANG, SLOB GRVA, GZHAN YANG MGRON KHANG, BZA' KHANG, BZO GRA

CHUNG KHA KHA SHAS, 'GRUL 'KHOR BABS TSUGS KHANG SOGS BTZUGS TE LHA SA'I GRONG KHYER SNGON MA

LAS LDAB GNYIS SAM, GSUM TZAM GYI RGYA BSKYED CHE RU PHYIN YOD SKAD MA ZAD, GRONG KHYER YAS MAS KUN

TU RLANGS 'KHOR RGYU 'GRUL DANG, GRONG KHYER NANG CHU GLOG GI GSAL BZHU SOGS 'DZUGS BSKRUN RGYA CHE BYAS YOD KYANG, DE DAG TSANG MA RGYA MI'I DMAG MI DANG, RGYA RIGS LAS BYED PA, GZHIS CHAGS SU

'BYOR PA'I RGYA MI RNAMS KYI KHE PHAN SGRUB BYED TZAM LAS, SA CHA'I BDAG PO BOD MI RANG LA PHAN PA YOD PA

MA RED, DPER NA, LHA SA'I GRONG KHYER DUM BU KHA SHAS LA BGOS TE YUL GYI BDAG PO BOD MI RNAMS GRONG

KHYER NANG PHAN TSUN LA SPUN MCHED THUG PA DANG, LAS DON SOGS LA 'GRO DGOS NA RGYA MI'I LAS

KHUNGS NAS LAG KHYER ZHUS TE CHU TSOD DUS BKAG GI 'GRO BA LAS, RANG DBANG RTZA BA NAS MED CING, RTAG

TU NGAL RTZOL DANG, 'THAB 'DZINGS, SKYON BRJOD TSOGS 'DU SOGS KYIS BDE BA'I GO SKABS SKAD

CIG TZAM YANG MED PAS LHA SA'I GRONG KHYER DE YANG BOD MI'I BTZON KHANG CHEN PO ZHIG CHAGS YOD PA

DANG, MI 'BOR YANG RGYA MI'I ZHI DRAG GI LAS BYED DANG, GZHIS CHAGS PA 'BUM PHRAG GNYIS TZAM

GTAN SDOD BYAS TE GONG DU BRJOD PA DANG, RIM PAS BRJOD RGYU'I BOD KYI CHOS DANG, SHES RIG,

GOMS GSHIS DANG 'BREL BA'I LHA KHANG, SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN SOGS GCES NOR YOD RGU TSANG MA

RTZA MED DU BTANG BA DNGOS SU MIG MTHONG BYUNG BA'I BOD MI BROS 'BYOR BA RNAMS NAS BRJOD DANG, RJOD

BZHIN PA NI SHIN TU YID MUG PA'I GNAS TSUL ZHIG CHAGS YOD,

@089 DPAL 'BYOR DANG, TSONG GI 'BREL BA, BOD KYI DPAL 'BYOR GYI GNAS GZHI LTE BA NI, SA

ZHING DANG, 'BROG LAS KHO NA YIN ZHING, SA ZHING LA CHA BZHAG NA, SA RAB 'BRING MTHA' GSUM LA

BSKOR BAS SA RAB LA LAR BRE KHAL ZHES SON BRE GCIG LA STON 'BRU RU'I KHAL GCIG GAM, NYI SHU SKOR

THANG BYUNG BA DANG, SA 'BRING LA BRGYAD SKOR ZHES SON RU'I KHAL GCIG LA STON 'BAB 'BRU RU'I KHAL BRGYAD, SA

MTHAR LNGA SKOR ZHES SON 'BRU KHAL GCIG LA STON 'BAB RU'I KHAL LNGA YONG BAR CHA 'JOG BYED PA RED,

SA DMA' SA LA LAR LO RE STON THOG THENGS GNYIS SKYE BA LAS, PHAL CHER LA LO 'KHOR STON THOG THENGS

GCIG RANG LAS MED, SA KHUL 'GA' SHAS LA STON NYAL LANGS ZHES LO GNYIS RER THENGS RE LAS

MED PA'ANG YOD,

DE BZHIN 'BROG LAS LA SKYES MA'AM, BZHO MA, YAR MA GNYIS LA BZHO

RAB 'BRING MTHA' GSUM DU DBYE BAS BZHO MA RAB LA LO 'KHOR MAR 'DEGS KHAL BCU GNYIS DANG,

'BRING LA BRGYAD, MTHA' MAR LNGA DANG, YAR MA RAB LA LO 'KHOR MAR 'DEGS KHAL BRGYAD, 'BRING

LA LNGA, MTHA' MAR GSUM LA CHA 'JOG BYED PA DANG, DE MTSUNGS LUG BZHO MA BCU DANG, 'BRI BZHO

MA GCIG GI 'BAB 'DRA MTSUNGS CHA 'JOG BYED PA'I SROL YOD,

ZHING 'BROG DBAR LA TSONG LAS BYED TSUL DANG, PHYOGS MTHA'I GRONG GSEB KHAG

NAS RGYAL SA LHA SA LTA BUR TSONG BYED TSUL NI, TSONG GI THANG GZHI LO RE'I STON 'BRAS DANG, DKAR CHU

BZANG ZHAN LA BRTEN NAS 'PHAR CHAG BYED PA, DPER NA, BYANG 'BROG PAS STON KA ZHING PA'I SAR YONG

STE MAR 'DEGS KHAL RER 'BRU RU'I KHAL BZHI RE DANG, TSA KHAL GNYIS RER 'BRU RU'I KHAL GCIG RE, BUL RU'I KHAL LNGA RER 'BRU KHAL GCIG RE LTA BUR CHA SKOR GYIS SPROD LEN BYED PA DANG, DE BZHIN 'BROG

PAS PHYUR BA, BAL, KHU LU, RNGA MA, RTZID PA, RA LUG GI PAGS PA, PHYING PA, GRO MA SOGS BTZONG

PA DANG, ZHING PA'I SA NAS 'BRU DANG, RTZAM PA, GRO ZHIB, SNAM BU, JA, PHYI'I RAS ZOG ,LCAGS CHA,

@090 MNGAR CHA LA SOGS PA NYO SGRUB BYED, YANG 'BROG PA TSOS TSA BAL SOGS 'GEL BYED DU GA-YAG MANG

BYED PA RED,

@091 LCAGS RIGS, MKHREG SA, YIG CHAS KHRUS RDZAS, MU ZI, HA YANG GI YO CHAS, TSON RIGS, SHEL

CHAS, 'PHRUL CHAS KYI RIGS SOGS DANG, BOD NAS RGYA GAR LA BAL DANG, RNGA MA, KHU LU, PAGS

RIGS, GLA RTZI, NYI MA KHA CHU, RTZA DREL, PHAG SPU SOGS DPER NA BOD DANG, RGYA GAR TSONG GI 'GRO LAM KA SBUG GCIG PU NAS ZLA BA GCIG NANG LA PHAR 'GRO TSUR YONG SKOR, KA SBUG MTHAR PHYIN LAGS KYI

GSAR SHOG LO 16 AANG 6-7 SPYI LO 1948 ZLA BA 4-5 PA, BOD SA BYI ZLA 2-3 PA'I GSAR 'GYUR SHOG LHE 7 PA'I NANG SPYI LO 1947
