ZLA 6 TSES 1 BOD SA BYI ZLA 4 TSES 24 GSAR SHOG SHOG LHE 7 PA'I NANG SPYI LO 1947 ZLA 12 TSES 1 NAS TSES 31 BAR ZLA BA GCIG NANG BOD NAS RGYA GAR DU BAL RNGA PAGS

RIGS MON DO 11672 'BYOR ZHES GSAL BA LTAR DE 'DRA BA'I TSONG LAM GZHAN YANG MANG PO YOD PA RED 'GRO BA RED,

DE MTSUNGS BA BAL YUL NAS BOD LA SKU 'DRA LI MA, ZANGS DANG, RAGS KYI YO

CHAS, 'BRAS, BSIL PHAN, SMAN KHROG SOGS YONG BA DANG, BOD NAS BAL YUL LA TSVA DANG, SNAM

RIGS, LUG SOGS 'GRO, 'BRUG YUL NAS 'BRAS, AA SHOM, PAR SHOG, BSIL PHAN, 'BRU

RAS, SHING 'BRAS SKAM PO, RGYA TSOS DANG, DMAR BTZOD, SBA DANG, SNYUG MAS LHAS PA'I DNGOS

PO'I RIGS 'BYOR ZHING, BOD NAS 'BRUG LA TSVA, SNAM RIGS, JA, SHA TSIL DANG, NYA SKAM, BAL DANG,

LUGS LPAGS SOGS 'GRO, DE BZHIN LA DVAGS NAS LE NA ZHES RAS ZOG DANG, SHING 'BRAS SKAM

PO; SMAN KHROG SOGS 'BYOR PA DANG, BOD NAS JA DANG, TSVA, SNAM RIGS, LUG, BAL

LA SOGS PA 'GRO BA RED, RGYAL KHAB DE DAG TU DNGUL BRJES 'DZA' THANG GTAN 'BEBS DANG, DNGUL

KHANG SOGS BRGYUD DE DNGUL GYI SPROD LEN BYED SROL RIGS MED, TSONG PA SO SOS YUL DUS LA

GZHIGS PA'I DNGOS PO DANG, DNGUL GYI 'DZA' THANG 'PHAR CHAG BYED PA RED, ME MDA' DANG, RDZAS

NGAN RIGS, THA MI KHA, GA-YA' PHIN LA SOGS 'GRO 'ONG LA DGAG CHA CHEN PO YOD PA LAS, DE MIN

TSONG ZOG GA RE 'DON GTONG BYAS KYANG GZHUNG GI DGAG CHA MED PA DANG, NANG YONG GI JA DANG, PHYI 'GRO'I

@092 BAL RNGA, PAGS RIGS, TSA SOGS LA SGO KHRAL NANG YONG GI JA ZLA NYI SHU ZUR GYI KHRAL DANG, PHYI 'GRO'I BAL RNGA MON DO RER RGYA GAR SGOR MO GCIG RE, PAGS RIGS CHE CHUNG LA GZHIGS PA'I SGO KHRAL, TSA MON DO RE LA TAm DKAR RE BCAS BSDU SROL YOD, SNE SEL LAS, DE MIN TSONG KHRAL, LAM KHAL SGO

KHRAL KHE 'BAB KYI KHRAL SOGS RTZA BA NAS YOD PA MA RED, SPYI LO 1950 LOR RGYA DMAR BOD LA

BTZAN 'DZUL BYAS PA NAS LO RE ZUNG TSONG RGYA CHE TZAM BYUNG BA LAS, DE NAS KO RLON GYI ZHVA MO LTAR JE DAM

DU PHYIN TE SPYI LO 1959 LO NAS BAL YUL MA GTOGS RGYA GAR DANG, 'BRUG BOD DBAR TSONG GI 'BREL

BA RTZA BA NAS BCAD PA RED, 'GRIM 'GRUL DANG, SKYEL 'DREN, SNGAR BOD NANG 'GRIM 'GRUL BYED RGYU HA CANG GI KHAG

PO ZHIG YIN ZHING, DE YANG 'BYOR LDAN RNAMS RTA DANG, DREL SNA LO (MDZO DANG GA-YAG GI ZHON PA)

RNGA BONG SOGS BZHON TE 'GRO BA DANG, DNGOS ZOG RNAMS RTA DREL, RNGA MONG, BONG BU, GANG, GA-YAG,

RA LUG SOGS LA BKAL TE 'GRO ZHING, MI DMANGS PHAL CHE BA RKANG THANG DANG, ZA NYAL YANG RGYAB TU

'KHUR TE 'GRO BA RE, GZHUNG GNAS NAS BSTAN SRID KYI ZHABS BRTAN DANG, MI SER GYI BDE RTZAR

DMIGS TE RGYA LAM DOG SAR GSAR BZO DANG, NYAMS GSO, BCA' PHRENG DOG PO RNAMS LA NYAMS

GSO YANG YANG GNANG BA LAS, 'KHOR LO 'GRO GTONG THUB PA'I LAM NI YOD PA MA RED,

BYANG PHYOGS DANG, KHAMS PHYOGS SA 'GOL KHAG LA RKUN MA DANG, JAG PA,

BYE 'DAM SOGS KYI NYE 'GAN YANG CHEN PO YOD, 'ON KYANG GZHUNG GIS LA 'PHRANG DANG, DBEN SA KHAG

LA 'JIGS SKYOB MGRON KHANG DANG, GNAS CHEN KHAG LA TSUL PA ZHES 'JIGS SKYOB GNAS KHANG

CHABS SBRAGS MANG PO 'DZUGS GNANG MDZAD YOD PAS MA TSAD, MDO STOD SMAD GNYIS KYI TSONG PA RNAMS 'GO 'DON 'JIGS SKYOB GCIG 'THUS SU SGAR DPON, AA PHRUG, GO LAG DANG BCAS BSKO BRDZONG

DANG, GZHAN YANG SPEL LO NAM SHAR LA GNAS CHEN TZA RI RONG BSKOR, LUG LO NAM SHAR LA MA CHAGS

@093 SEN MO RDO'AM, GNAM MTSO PHYUG MO'I MTSO BSKOR, RTA LO NAM SHAR LA GANGS DKAR TE SE'I GANGS

BSKOR BCAS LA GNAS BSKOR BA'I CHED 'GO 'KHRID BSKO GZHAG DANG, LAM SGROL DANG, JA TSUL, CHANG

TSUL SOGS GNANG GI YOD PA RED,

RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I NANG GRUB THOB THANG STONG RGYAL POS BOD DANG, LHO 'BRUG NANG

GTZANG PO CHE KHAG LNGA BCU RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR KUN GSAL NOR BU'I ME LONG, NGA GSUM LA LCAGS THAG GI ZAB PA RE BSKYON PAS PHAN THOGS CHEN PO BYUNG BA

DANG, GZHUNG SGER KHAG NAS CHU CHEN KHAG LA KO BA DANG, MI ZOG SUM CHU SKOR SHONG THUB PA'I SHING GI

GRU LCAGS ZAB DANG, GYER PA, NYANG PO SOGS GTZANG PO'I GRU KHAR SHING GI GRU CHUNG DE DAG RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I NANG SA SKYA'I DPON CHEN

AAG LEN NAS RGYA'I BZO BO MKHAS PA BKUGS NAS BZOS PAR GRAGS ZHES DU KLU LA'I GOS BZANG KA 13-NA-2 PAR GSAL BA DANG,

GRU SHAN LA RTA MGO RGYAG DGOS PA'I RGYU MTSAN MA MTHONG YANG, RTA MGO SNGAR NAS RGYAG SROL YOD PA NI, RDO RJE 'DZIN PA TSAR CHEN BLO

GSAL RGYA MTSO GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYI RNAM THAR SLOB BSHAD BSTAN PA'I NYI 'OD 76-BA-3 NANG, DE NAS SHA RA'I GRU LCAGS THON PAS, DE'I

GRU SHAN GYI RTA MGO'I NGOS LA RIN SPUNGS NAS SDE PA'I BKA' SHOG LCAGS LEB LA GTONG RIS BRIS PA GSER CHUS BYUGS PA LA, GRU 'DI DGE RGYUN LA

BTZUGS PA DANG, MNYAN PAR GZHIS ZUR DU BYIN YOD PAS, ZA 'DOD KYI GTZER BA BYUNG NA NGO BSRUGS MED PA'I ZHU BAS SLEBS KYIS, PHYIS 'DOMS

PA'I KHRIMS LUGS BYED ZER GZER GYIS BSDAMS NAS RGYAB 'DUG CING MNYAN PA DE RNAMS KYANG SNGA GONG DANG MI 'DRA BA'I NGO GNONG BA BYAS, LTOGS

PAR 'DUG, CES GSAL BAR ZHIG DUS DE TZAM LA'ANG RTA MGO RGYA SROL YOD PA 'DUG GO, SHAN RTA MGO CAN BTZUGS TE 'GRUL PA 'DON SGROL LA GLA CHA LEN PA DANG, MDO STOD RONG SA LA LAR

DGA' DANG, SKAD GNYIS SMRA BA BEE RO TZA NA GNYIS KYIS BSGYUR TE GTAN LA PHAB, MCHOD YON BKA'

DU GNANG, DES GA-YU THOG GSAR MA YON TAN MGON PO LA GSUNGS NAS RGYA CHER SPEL BAR MDZAD, BDUD

SUM CU SO GNYIS, PHYI MA RGYUD LE'U NYI SHU RTZA LNGA DE DAG LA RGYUD BZHIR GRAGS PA DANG, CHA LAG BCO BRGYAD

'GRO MGON CHOS RGYAL 'PHAGS PA'I (1235-1280) SLOB MA TSA BA RONG PA

BSOD NAMS 'OD ZER ZHU BA RTEN GSUM BZHENGS PA LA SHIN TU MKHAS PA ZHIG BYUNG BA DES SKU RTEN BZHENGS

TSUL YON TAN 'BYUNG GNAS ZHES BYA BA ZHIG DANG, GZHAN YANG BU STON THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA, BRAG

NAG PA, STAG TSANG LO TZ'A BA SHES RAB RIN CHEN SOGS KYIS LHA SKU DANG, MCHOD RTEN SOGS KYI CHA

PA'I GNAS KUN LA BYANG CHUB PA ZHIG BYUNG BA KHONG GIS RIG PA BZO'I GNAS KYI LAS TSOGS 'DOD RGU'I

PRA PHAB CES PA ZHIG KYANG MDZAD YOD, RGYAL MCHOG GSUM PA BSON NAMS RGYA MTSO'I (1543-1588)

SKU DUS SPRUL SKU 'PHRENG KHA BA DPAL LDAN BLO GROS BZANG PO ZHES SMAN LUGS RI MOR SHIN TU MKHAS GRAGS

ZHIG BYUNG BA KHONG GIS LHA SKU'I CHA TSAD MDO RGYUD GSAL BA'I ME LONG ZHES PA ZHIG KYANG GSUNGS YOD, KLONG

RDOL BLA MA RIN PO CHES SPRUL SKU RI MKHAR BA DANG, SPRUL SKU 'PHRENG KHAB KLONG RDOL GSUNGS MA 7-NA-6, ZHES SO SOR GSUNGS KYANG, AA KHU

SHES RAB RGYA MTSOS, GTZANG STOD RTA NAG RI MKHAR SPRUL SKU 'PHRENG KHA BA DPAL LDAN BLO BOD KYI DPE RGYUN DKON PA'I DPE THO, BLO GROS ZHES

GCIG RANG YIN PA LTA BU GSUNGS 'DUG PAS ZHIB 'JUG BYED DGOS 'DUG,

^ RGYAL MCHOG LNGA PA CHEN PO'I (1617-1682) SKU DUS LHO BRAG BSTAN 'DZIN

NOR BU DANG, ZUR CHEN CHOS DBYINGS RANG GROL, SNA RTZE STAG LUNG DPAL MGON DANG, SDE SRID

SANGS RGYAS RGYA MTSOS RGYAL BA'I 'KHRUNGS RABS SMAD BYUNG SKAL PA MA GRA TSAR BRIS MKHAN DBU CHEN SMAN

THANG PA MGON PO TSE DBANG, PHO BRANG PHUN TSOGS, LHA SA RAGS KHA BA 'JAM DBYANGS DBANG PO

@110 SOGS RI MOR MKHAS GRAGS TSANG MA SMAN LUGS YIN PAR BZHED CING, SPRUL SKU CHOS DBYINGS RGYA

MTSO ZHU BA'I RI MO MKHAS PA DE YANG, PHAL CHER MKHYEN RIS DANG, SMAN RIS GNYIS SU MED PA

ZHIG GI THOG ,SKABS RE BZO KHYAD DPE GSAR DAG KYANG GNANG GI YOD PA 'DRA ZHING, KHONG NI RGYAL

MCHOG LNGA PA CHEN PO'I SKU DUS BYUNG ZHING, PO T'A LA'I TSOMS CHEN GYI LOGS BRIS SU BOD DU 'GRO BA MI BYUNG

TSUL DANG, ^ RGYAL BA'I 'KHRUNGS RABS RNAMS SPRUL SKU CHOS DBYINGS RGYA MTSO SOGS KYIS BRIS PA

DANG, BKA' 'GYUR LHA KHANG DU LAM RIM BLA BRGYUD BRIS RTZIS LA MA DPE BYI'U'I RI MO ZHIG GTAD PA'I

DE LUGS KYIS BRIS 'DUG PA, SPRUL SKU BA RNAMS MA GOMS PA'I SKYON GYIS LUGS GNYIS GANG LA'ANG

MA GTOGS PA'I BRIS GSAR DU K'U LA'I GOS BZANG KA 142-NA-, BYUNG ZHES GSAL BAS SMAN MKHYEN GNYIS LAS ZUR KHYAD CIG GNANG STE KAR BRIS KYI SROL DE MDZAD PA MIN NAM SNYAM YANG KAR BRIS SKOR ZHIB CHA RIM PAS 'OG TU GSAL ZHING, PAn

CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN GYI RANG RNAM DU, SPRUL SKU CHOS DBYINGS RGYA MTSO ZHU BA'I PIR THOG MKHAN POS

SHING BYA 1645 DBEN DGON NYAMS GSO'I LOG BRIS DANG, ME PHAG 1647 BKRA SHIS LHUN POR

RGYAL BA BLO BZANG DON GRUB DANG, MKHAS GRUB BA SANGS RGYAS YE SHES KYI RNAM RANG GI SPYOD TSUL GSAL BA STON PA 134-BA-1, RNAM THAR RAS BRIS RNAMS BRIS

ZHES GSAL,

BLA MA SANGS RGYAS LHA DBANG NI, ^ SKYABS RJE YONGS 'DZIN KHRI BYANG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN

POR DGONGS SKOR ZHUS PA'I BKA' LAN DU, KARMA PA BRGYAD PA MI BSKYOD RDO RJE'I (1507-1550) DNGOS

SLOB TU GYUR ZHING, SMAN LUGS RNYING MA'I RI MO'I RJES 'BRANG BLA MA SANGS RGYAS LHA DBANG ZHES LDAN KHOG

TU BYUNG ZHING, DE'I NYING SLOB LTA BUR LHA BZO RTA MGRIN MGON PO SOGS BYUNG ZHES PHEBS PA DANG, 'BRAS

LJONGS RUM STENG DGON DU KARMA GRVA TSANG GI MKHAN PO KHRA MGU RIN PO CHER KAR BRIS SKOR BKA' 'DRI ZHUS

PAR, KARMA SGAR BRIS SAM, KAR BRIS NI, KARMA PA BRGYAD PA MI BSKYOD RDO RJES RI MO'I THIG RTZA NYI MA

@111 CHEN PO ZHES PA MDZAD CING, BCU PA CHOS DBYINGS RDO RJE PHYAG BRIS LEGS PAS RGYA DKAR NAG GI BRIS

LAS SHING DANG, ME TOG, KHANG BZANG SOGS DPE BZHES TE KARMA SGAR BRIS SAM, KAR BRIS ZHES

PA'I SROL MDZAD PA MIN NAM BSAMS KYI YOD PA DANG, DE YANG KAR BRIS DANG, GZHUNG BRIS KYI DBYE BA

NI; KAR BRIS KYI ZHI BA RNAMS ZHAL DANG, SPYAN CHUNG BAS ZHI NYAMS CHE ZHING, GZHUNG BRIS KYI ZHI BA RNAMS

ZHAL DANG, SPYAN CHE BAS KHRO NYAMS CUNG ZAD YOD TSUL BRJOD SROL YOD CES GSUNGS BYUNG BAR BRTEN

KARMA PA BRGYAD PA MI BSKYOD RDO RJE'I RNAM THAR DU ZHIB SKABS RI MO'I SKOR ZHIB PA ZHAL MA GSAL YANG,

BCU PA CHOS DBYINGS RDO RJE (1604-1674) DGUNG LO CHUNG DUS NAS PHYAG BRIS LEGS PO YOD PA'I

THOG ,LHO BRAG CHU KHYER GYI SPRUL SKU TSE RING LA SMAN RNYING GI RI MO GSAN SBYONG MDZAD, BOD YUL DU SI THANG

LAS SNGA BA KLU MES KYI THUGS DAM RTEN YER PA RVA BA MAR GRAGS PA'I GNAS BCU'I BRIS THANG DANG, SI'U

SPYAN RAS GZIGS SEMS NYID NGAL GSO'I SKU THANG, SNAR THANG DU MCHIMS NAM MKHA' GRAGS KYIS

'PHAGS PA'I GNAS BRTAN BCU DRUG GDUGS TSOD DU SPYAN DRANGS PA'I LUGS KYI GNAS BCU SOGS LA

DPE MDZAD DE BRIS THANG SHIN TU MANG PO PHYAG BRIS MDZAD PA DANG, RGYA NAG DANG NYE BA'I 'JANG YUL SOGS

SU YUN RING BZHUGS TE RGYA BRIS DANG NYE BA'I RI MO'I BRIS SROL MDZAD PA'I LO RGYUS DANG, RGYAL RONG TSA KO

RGYAL POS GDAN DRANGS, 'BO GANGS DKAR DU 'BRUG LO'I LO GSAR GNANG, SKABS DER RJE 'DIS SNYAN

NGAG DANG, RI MO 'BRI BA NI BOD YUL DU KHO BO LAS LHAG PA MI YONG, KHO BO SPYAN RES GZIGS DGYES

PA'I MI ZHIG YIN, 'DZAM BU'I GLING 'DIR RI MO BRI BAR 'ONGS PA YIN GSUNGS RAB 'BYAMS NOR BU ZLA BA CHU SHEL 'PHRENG BA 184-NA-7, PA SOGS PHYAG BRIS

MKHAS PA'I ZHAL BZHES GNANG 'DUG PA NAS KARMA SGAR BRIS SAM, KAR BRIS NI BRIS MKHAN GZHAN NAS

MDZAD PA'I YIG CHA'I KHUNGS SKYEL MA BYUNG PHYIN, RJE 'DI PAS SROL GTOD MDZAD PAR CHA 'JOG BYED

THUB BAM SNYAM, CHOS DBYINGS RDO RJE'I PHYAG BRIS MTSAN BYANG 'KHOD PA'I MI LA BZHAD PA RDO RJE DANG, TSE RING

@112 MCHED LNGA'I ZHAL THANG BRIS RNYING CHUNG DU GNYIS LHO BRAG NYI LDE DGON GYI NANG RTEN DU BZHUGS PA DE DANG, BAR

LAM LDI LI'I BOD KHANG NANG, GNAS NANG DPA' BO RIN PO CHE'I RTEN GRAS GRUB THOB BRGYAD BCU'I ZHAL THANG

KAR BRIS 'GRAN ZLA MED PA ZHIG MJAL BA, DE TSOR SA STONG CHE ZHING, YUL LJONGS DANG, RI DANG NAGS

TSAL SOGS MANG LA, GSER BRIS ZHIB TSAGS CHE BA DANG, TSON PHAL CHE LJANG SHAS DANG, SKYA SHAS CHE

BAS MJAL TZAM NYID NAS SMAN LUGS DANG DBYE BA LAM SENG 'BYED THUB PA ZHIG YOD,

KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PAS MDO SMAD BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU, SHING KHYI

1715 LOR BKRA SHIS SGO MANG GI CHOS SDE CHEN PO PHYAG BTAB PA'I TSE KHANG BZO'I RDO SHING DANG, RTEN BZHENGS

KYI BZO BO MKHAS PA RNAMS DBUS GZHUNG LA SKYABS ZHUS KYIS GTONG GNANG MDZAD KHONGS LHA BRIS MKHAS PA

BDE CHEN GSANG SNGAGS MKHAR PA'I TSE 'PHEL ZER BA ZHIG BYUNG STE DES MDO SMAD AA MDO RIB GONG KHUL DU

SMAN LUGS KYI BRIS RGYUN SPEL KHYAB RGYA CHE BYAS YOD PA DANG, BYA BTANG TSOGS DRUG RANG GROL GYI LHA BRIS

SLOB DPON GLING RGYA'I LHA BZO BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS ZHES SKAD GRAGS CAN ZHIG BYUNG BA DANG, RGYAL MCHOG

DGU PA'I SKU DUS MDO SMAD RNGA PA DANG, 'GU LOG KHUL DU LHA BRIS MKHAS PA GUR KHU DBON ZHES SKAD

GRAGS CAN ZHIG KYANG BYUNG BA'I LO RGYUS 'DUG ,BAR SKABS LHA BRIS MKHAS PA 'BRAS SPUNGS KLU 'BUM

DGE BSHES, RGYAL RTZE LCOG RO NAS KHYUNG PA, LHA SAR ZUR 'PHYONGS DBU CHEN ZAM GDONG SKAL BZANG,

SKAS GDUNG DBU MDZAD, 'PHAGS LHA'I DKON GNYER YE SHES RGYA MTSO, DGA' GLING SHAR DPAL 'BYOR,

DPAL 'BYOR RGYAL PO, CHAB MDO PHUR BU LHA BZO DANG, TSE DPAG LHA BZO SOGS BRIS PA SKAD GRAGS

CAN MANG PO BYUNG BA RED, BRIS SKU'I CHA TSAD KYI SKOR LA BYANG BDAG PA RNAM RGYAL GRAGS BZANG, SDE SRID

SANGS RGYAS RGYA MTSO, JO NANG PA TA RA NA THA, SI TU CHOS KYI 'BYUNG GNAS, KONG SPRUL YON TAN RGYA

MTSO SOGS NAS KYANG MDZAD YOD PA SO SO'I GSUNG 'BUM LA GZIGS NA MKHYEN PAR 'GYUR RO, ,

BOD NANG BZOS PA LI MA'I SKU CHE SHOS SHIG NI MNGA' BDAG 'OD SRUNG

@113 GIS BZHENGS SI TU BSTAN PA'I NYIN 'BYED KYI RANG RNAM DRI BRAL SHEL GYI ME LONG 65-BA-2, PA'I SNE GDONG BYA SA'I RNAM SNANG THOG TSAD GNYIS MA DE YIN NAM SNYAM, DE LUG MKHAN

BZO BO'I MING SOGS MA SHES KYANG, LUG BLUG YUL NI SHEL BRAG GI RGYAB RI DER THAB RGYAB SHUL DANG,

LUG KONG SOGS KYI SHUL YOD TSUL GNAS BSHAD DU SHOD SROL YOD, BKA' GDAMS GDUNG RTEN

PHAL CHE BA JO BO RJE'I (982-1054) SKU DUS TZAM LA RGYA GAR SHAR NUB NAS BYUNG ZHING, 'BROM STON

RGYAL BA'I 'BYUNG GNAS KYI DNGOS SLOB SPYAN SNGA BA TSUL KHRIMS 'BAR GYIS JO BO'I 'BRAL SPANG PAD

PO 'DUG,

KARMA PAKshI'AM, CHOS KYI BLA MAS (1206-1283) ZANGS RAG RAM PA ZANGS

ZANGS KYI THUB SKU DANG, BYAMS CHEN SOGS SKU TSAD THOGS GCIG NAS BZHI LNGA BAR YOD PA BRJOD

RJE TZONG KHA PA'I (1357-1419) SKU DUS SPRUL SKU SLE'U CHUNG PA ZHU BA'I LHA BZO

MKHAS PA DES GTZOS BOD KYI BZO RIGS MKHAS PA MANG POS BZO THIG DANG, CHA TSAD SOGS PHAL PA'I

RIG BCOS MA YIN PAR RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I BKA' SLOB LTAR, SH'A RI'I BU DANG, TSANGS PA AE

dA'I BUS ZHUS PA SOGS CHA TSAD KYI YI GE DANG, BDE MCHOG SDOM 'BYUNG RGYUD KYI LE'U GCIG NAS LHA'I

PHYAG TSAD, DE'I RGYA 'GREL RATNA RKSHI TAS GTAN LA PHAB PA, DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED DMAR NAG GI

RGYUD KYI LHA SKU'I CHA TSAD RNAMS GZHI LA BZHAG STE, DGA' LDAN YANGS PA CAN GYI RTEN GYI GTZO BO THUB PA

TSUL KHRIMS MA DANG, DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I LHA SUM CU RTZA GNYIS KYI BLOS BLANGS, DPAL

'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG LHA DRUG CU RTZA GNYIS KYI DKYIL 'KHOR LUG 'PHUD LA RANG BYON DU PHEBS PA DPA' BO

KHAndA KA PA LA 'JA' TSON MA SOGS YI DAM DANG, SANGS RGYAS, BYANG SEMS KYI GSER SKU DANG,

PA SPRUL SKU STAG RTZE BAS GTING SKYES KYI JO BO NGO MTSAR CAN DANG, RAB BRTAN KUN BZANG 'PHAGS KYIS

@115 PO PO T'A LAR GSER GDUNG 'DZAM GLING RGYAN GCIG DANG, DGE LEGS 'DOD 'JOS GTZOS RGYAL DBANG

SKU 'PHRENG NA RIM GYI GSER GDUNG THOG TSAD MA BZO BKOD PHUN SUM TSOGS SHING RIN THANG BRAL BA'I PHRA

RGYAN GYIS PHYUG PA DAG DANG, DE BZHIN BKRA SHIS LHUN PO SOGS LA'ANG PAn CHEN SKU 'PHRENG RIM PA'I

DNGUL GDUNG KHAG DANG, LHAG PAR KUN GZIGS PAn CHEN CHOS KYI NYI MA (1885-1937) MCHOG

'DUG GO,

GZHUNG GI SGRIG 'DZUGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I CHU RTA 1642 LOR BOD GZHUNG

@119 RGYA DMAR GUNG BRAN TANG NAS DRAG PO'I BTZAN GNON MA BYUNG BAR, BOD LJONGS YONGS RDZOGS KYI CHOS SRID

GNYIS KYI BDAG PO'AM, RGAL KHAB KYI DBU 'DZIN, SKU'I DBANG TSAD MTHO SHOS NI ^ SKYABS MCHON

T'A LA'I BLA MA YIN, KHONG DGONGS DON DU GSHEGS PA NA, SKU TSAB LTA BUR DGA' LDAN KHRI

PA'AM, BLA SPRUL CHE KHA'I KHONGS NAS BLA MA ZHIG BOD LJONGS SPYI TSOGS NAS 'OS 'DEBS BYAS TE RGYAL

TSAB BAM, YANG NA SDE SRID BSKO GZHAG BYAS NAS DES T'A LA'I BLA MA'I YANG SRID GSAR PAS LUGS

GNYIS KYI THUGS 'GAN MA BZHES BAR T'A LA'I BLA MA DANG 'DRA BAR CHOS SRID GNYIS KAR DBANG LUNG YONGS

SU RDZOGS PA YOD, RGYAL TSAB BAM, SDE SRID PHYAG THOG RING GZHUNG DANG THUGS 'DOD GCIG PA YIN

KHUL YIN KYANG, PHYIS PHYAG GRON RNAMS GZHUNG DANG, PHYAG 'BAB RNAMS SKU SGER LA BZHES KYI

MED DAM SNYAM,

GZHUNG GI CHAB SRID LA GAL GNAD CHE SHOS, LUS LA CHA BZHAG NA SGAL RUS LTA

BU'AM, 'GRO KHUNGS TSANG MA'I MIG PA LTA BU NI BKA' SHAG YIN, DER BKA' BLON SER MO BA GCIG

DANG, SKYA BO GSUM YOD, BKA' BLON TSO DANG GDAN THOB GCIG PA SKU BCAR SPYI KHYAB MKHAN PO GAL

CHE'I SKABS BKA' SHAG TU MNYAM TSOGS GNANG BA LAS, RGYUN DU T'A LA'I BLA MA'I SKU SGER DANG, CHOS

PHYOGS YIG TSANG GI DBU 'DZIN, RGYAL KHAB NAGS TSAL GYI BDAG GNYER BCAS GNANG BA RED, BKA'

SHAG LA ZHI DRAG PHYI NANG GI LAS DON TSANG MA'I THAG GCOD SKOR SNYAN ZHU 'BYOR RIGS LA BKA' BLON RNAMS

SHAG LA ZHI DRAG PHYI NANG GI LAS DON TSANG MA'I THAG GCOD SKOR SNYAN ZHU 'BYOR RIGS LA BKA' BLON RNAMS

MOL BSDUR GYIS GAL CHE'I RIGS T'A LA'I BLA MA'AM, RGYAL TSAB LA DGONG SKOR PHYAG RTAGS ZHU BA

LAS, DE BYINGS TSANG MA THAG GCOD CHOG PA'I DBANG TSAD YOD, DUS PHYIS GZHUNG ZHABS SHOD SKOR

GYI ZHI DRAG PHYI NANG LAS TSAN DAN,G RDZONG BSKO 'BEBS SOGS KYI 'OS SGRIG DANG, GYOD

DON BCAS LA ZHIB 'JUG BKA' BSDUR DANG, MGO 'DREN GNANG RGYU 'DI BKA' BLON TSO'I PHYAG LAS THUGS

GAL CHE SHOS SHIG CHAGS PA RED CES GLENG, YANG CHAB SRID KYI LAS DON GAL CHE YUL GNYAN 'DRA BYUNG

@120 TSE DRUNG RTZIS LA BKA' BSDUR DANG, DES KYANG BLOS MA 'KHYUD TSE BOD LJONGS TSOGS 'DUR 'DRI SKOR

GNANG RGYU DE RED, BAR LAM ZHIG NAS BKA' BLON MNYAM RUB KYI LAS DON GNANG RGYU DE LA LEGS BCOS

ZHIG GNANG STE PHYI SRID, NANG SRID, DRAG PO, DPAL 'BYOR 'DU 'GOD SOGS BKA' BLON SO SOR

DMIGS BSAL 'GAN 'KHUR GNANG BA RED,

BOD LJONGS DGON KHAG DANG, CHOS PHYOGS LAS DON CHE PHRA, GZHUNG ZHABS

SER MO BA (RTZE SKOR) RNAMS KYI 'GRO KHUNGS LAS TSAN, RDZONG GZHIS GNYER SDOD, RTZE SKOR ZHABS GSAR

BA BCAS KYI 'OS SGRIG SOGS SER MO BA YONGS KYI SPYI KHYAB RTZE YIG TSANG LAS KHUNGS SU RTZE SDE DRUNG CHE BA

BZHI YOD, MKHAN DRUNG CHE BA BZHI'I NANG GI BGRES SHOS DER SKABS RE T'A BLA MA'I GO GNAS KYANG

GNANG SROL YOD,

RGYA KHYAB RDZONG GZHIS KHAG GI GZHUNG 'BRU DANG, DKAR SHE SOGS YONG SGO KHRIMS

SHUGS RNAMS LA RTZIS ZHIB KYIS BYAS BYUNG RNAM DBYE MI DMANGS KYI DBUS SU THON SKOR GRAL RIM SGRIG

PA SOGS DPAL 'BYOR GYI LAS DON PHAL CHE BA DANG, YONG SDUD, BKAR RGYA, BKAR 'JUG, SHOD

SKOR ZHABS GSAR 'OS SGRIG SOGS GZHUNG ZHABS SHOD SKOR YONGS KYI SPYI KHYAB RTZIS KHANG LAS KHUNGS

SU, RTZIS DPON BZHI YOD, SNGAR RTZIS KHANG GI LAS DON RNAMS YUL LUNG DPAL 'BYOR YAR RGYAS

LA PHAN PA'I BYED SGO'I LAS 'GAN CHE ZHING, LUGS SROL DE DAG KYANG DUS SKABS DANG MTHUN PA'I GAL

GNAD SHIN TU CHEN PO ZHIG YIN YANG, BAR SKABS RTZIS DPON RNAMS 'PHAR MA'I LAS DON KHO NAR

DAG STE BKAR YONG RNAMS SNGAR LAM GYI 'GRO KHUNGS LTA BU DANG, THON SKOR GRAL THO NI SNGAR SROL MA

NYAMS TZAM DU ZLOS GAR KHRAB STON BYED PA LTA BU LAS, NGO THOG THON 'BAB KYI RTZIS BYED YUL MED PA

ZHIG BYAS 'DUG,

MKHAN DRUNG BZHI DANG, RTZIS DPON BZHI RNAM KUN RANG RANG 'KHUR 'KHRI'I LAS

@121 DON LA ZHUGS KYANG, CHAB SRID KYI BDE DON GAL CHE'I SKABS DRUNG RTZIS BRGYAD SBREL BKA' SHAG TU

LHAN TSOGS LA 'GRO DGOS PA DANG, TSOGS 'DU RGYAS BSDUS TSANG MA'I 'GO 'DZIN LTA BU DANG, ^ GONG

SRID BKA' SHAG DANG, TSOGS 'DU'I BAR GYI ZAM PA LTA BU'AM, SKABS RE BANG CHEN LTA BU, SKABS

RE LAG PA TSA DUS RKAM PA LTA BU'I MTHONG TSUL YANG YOD PA RED, DNGOS GNAS BYAS NA BKA' SHAG GI

'OG TU CHAB SRID KYI KA BA LTA BU ZHIG LA'ANG CHA 'JOG BYAS CHOG GAM SNYAM

BOD LJONGS SOGS 'DU BSDUS PA ZER BA'I DMIGS BSAL ZHING NGOS 'DZIN BYED

YUL MI 'DUG CING, TSOGS 'DU PHRAG BSDUS RGYAS PA NI, DRUNG RTZIS BRGYAD SBREL THOG ,GZHUNG

ZHABS MKHAN SDE CHE CHUNG GI 'THUS MI, DZA T'A THA'I GSUM GYI 'THUS MI, SHOD SKOR ZHI DRAG RIM PA

BZHI PA'I 'THUS MI, GZHUNG LAS KHUNGS KHAG GI 'GAN 'DZIN 'THUS MI, 'BRAS SE GNYIS KYI

MKHAN PO DANG, DGA' LDAN 'THUS MI, RTZE SHOD DRUNG SPYI'I 'THUS MI BCAS KHYON MI GRANGS DRUG CU

SKOR ZHIG YOD PA LAS, PHYOGS 'GAL TSOGS PA SOGS YOD PA MA RED,

BOD LJONGS TSOGS 'DU RGYAS 'DZOMS SAM, TSOGS 'DU CHEN MO NI, DGA'

LDAN KHRI PA GDAN ZUR, SKU'I YONGS 'DZIN CHE CHUNG, SHAR BYANG CHOS RJE, HO THOG THU NAS TSOGS CHEN

SPRUL SKU YAN GYI BLA SPRUL, GDAN SA GSUM GYI MKHAN PO LAS ZUR, RGYUD GRVA STOD SMAD KYI MKHAN PO,

'BRAS SPUNGS PHO BRANG SDE PA DANG, SE RVA GZIM KHANG SDE PA, GZHAN YANG BKA' BLON RNAMS DANG, SKU BCAR

SPYI KHAB MKHAN PO SOGS SKU NGO'I GDAN THOB YOD RIGS PHUD, DRUNG RTZIS BRGYAD SBREL THOG ,DE BYINGS

LHA YOD GZHUNG ZHABS SER SKYA ZHI DRAG LAS TSAN YOD MED LA MA LTOS PAS TSANG MA DANG, RU BRGYA, DRUNG

GTOGS YAN NGO YOD, RME GZHIS SOGS GLING KHAG NI, SKU BCAR PHAN BDE LEGS BSHAD GLING, RME RU, BZHI SDE, BSTAN RGYAS GLING, TSE SMON GLING, KUN BDE GLING,

TSE MCHOG GLING, GNAS CHUNG SGRA DBYANGS GLING RNAMS SO, KHAG GI GNYER BA, DBUS GTZANG 'TSO CHEN, BKRA

@122 SHIS LHUN PO DANG, RMAR MDZO GSANG GSUM, SDE DGE, CHAB BRAG SOGS KYI MI SER 'GO PA KHAG

BCAS HA LAM MI GRANGS LNGA BRGYA NAS, DRUG BRGYA'I BAR ZHIG YOD,

TSOGS 'DU RGYAS 'DZOMS KYI 'THUS MI RNAMS DGOS GAL SKABS TSES CHA DANG,

TSUGS YUL BCAS BRDA KHYAB BYAS PA MA GTOGS, 'THUS MI BSKO GZHAG SOGS GNANG LAM MED,

TSOGS 'DU HRAG 'DUS RGYAS PA NI, GZHUNG DON GAL CHE PHAL CHER LA YANG YANG TSUGS DGOS PAS,

BOD LJONGS CHAB SRID KYI LAS DON CHE KHA'I THAG GCOD BYED SA ZHIG YIN, DE'I TSOGS 'THUS RNAMS

SPYI MOS 'OS 'DEBS BYED SROL MED LA, TSOGS 'THUS TSANG MA DUS GCIG 'PHO 'GYUR YANG BYED

LAM MED PAS, RANG RANG LAS TSAN 'PHO LEN SKABS TSOGS 'THUS RANG SHUGS KYIS 'PHO LEN YONG

BA DANG, SKABS RE TSOGS 'THUS DMIGS BSAL GYIS 'PHO 'GYUR DANG, GSAR BSKO DGOS PA

SOGS BYUNG TSE RTZE SKOR YIG TSANG LAS KHUNGS DANG, SHOD SKOR RTZIS KHANG LAS KHUNGS NAS 'OS NGES

BABS 'BREL BRTAG DPYAD KYIS 'OS DANG GNYIS BKOD DE BKA' SHAG TU PHUL NA BKA' SHAG NAS DE

LA 'GYUR BCOS DGOS MIN ZHIB GZIGS KYIS T'A LA'I BLA MA RIN PO CHER PHUL TE BSKO GZHAG PHYAG

RTAGS ZHU BA RED,

TSOGS 'THUS DE TSOS, SNGON NAS GO SGRIG BYAS PA'I TSOGS 'DU'I GROS

GZHI'I NANG MA 'KHOD PA'I CHAB SRID SKOR DANG, GZHUNG DANG MI DMANGS KYI BDE DON, YUL LUNG YAR

RGYAS SOGS GZHUNG GIS LAS DON NOR 'KHRUL YOD RIGS LA THAD KAR SKYON BRJOD BYED RGYU'I SROL MA DAR

BA'I DBANG GIS NOR 'KHRUL YOD RIGS LA DMIGS 'DZUGS 'GREL BRJOD MA BYAS PA RANG RANG LHAG BSAM

BZANG PO YIN TSUL GYIS YUL LUNG YAR RGYAS GTOD RGYU'I BSAM 'CHAR 'JAM MKHAS GANG BSHAD RNAMS

LEGS CHA KUN BTUS KYIS TSIG THOR 'GOD RGYU TZAM RED, GAL TE SU ZHIG NAS GZHUNG LA DNGOS SU SKYON

BRJOD BYAS PA YIN NA, MI DE NGO LOG PA'AM, LOG SMON CAN YIN PAR NGOS 'DZIN BYED MDOG KHA PO

@123 RED, GROS GZHI'I NANG 'KHOD PA'I RIGS LA'ANG, RGYAL SPYI'I SKOR LA BSAM BLO GTONG RGYU NI, RANG

GZHAN TSANG MAR THOS RGYA DANG, MTHONG RGYA'I CHU TSAD DMA' BAS GYA TSOM GYI BSAM 'CHAR BRJOD RGYU KHAG

PO YIN PA DANG, NYE 'BREL KHYIM MTSES RGYAL KHAB RGYA DKAR NAG DANG, BAL YUL, 'BRUG YUL

SOGS KYI SRID DON GNAS STANGS LA BRTEN NAS RANG YUL LA PHAN GNOD JI YONG GNAS TSUL SHES RTOGS

THUB MKHAN YANG HA CANG NYUNG NYUNG ZHIG RED, GANG YIN ZHE NA, RGYAL KHAB DE TSO'I NANG LA PHYIN TE DPON

RIGS DANG 'BREL BA BYED RGYU LTA BZHAG ,DE TSO DANG 'BREL BA'I LO RGYUS DANG, SA MTSAMS SKOR GYI

YIG CHA, CHINGS YIG RNAMS SA 'OG GI GTER BZHIN GNAS PAR BRTEN SLOB SBYONG MED PAS RANG BZHIN

'OL TSOD BSAM TSUL SHOD RGYUR KHAG PO YOD PA DANG, DE TZAM MA ZAD RANG YUL GYI GNAS STANGS SKOR LA

CHA MTSON NA YANG, GNAD CHER SLEBS PA MANG POS YUL GYI GNAS TSUL PHRA ZHIB SHES KYANG RANG GI GNAS

STANGS LA 'PHO 'GYUR 'BYUNG DOGS MDZES ZON KHO NAS PHOG THUG DANG PHAN GNOD MED PA'I BKA' MOL

MKHAS PO ZHIG GSUNGS TE BZHUGS KYI YOD PA RED, RANG ZON SPANGS TE GSUNG MKHAN SRID TSAB ZUR PA

KLU KHANG PA 'DRA BA 'GA' SHAS LAS MED, TSOGS 'THUS PHAL CHE BA NI SHING 'GO LHAGS SHUGS

CHE SA LA NYE BA LTA BU ZHIG YOD, RANG YUL CHAB SRID KYI 'GRO PHYOGS GANG YIN MI SHES MKHAN GYI TSOGS

'THUS KYANG RE ZUNG YOD 'GRO, YANG SU ZHIG NAS RANG GI PHAN PA SGRUB DGOS PA ZHIG YOD NA DER

DMIGS BKAR GYIS GNAS LUGS GANG YANG MA BSHAD PAR, CHOS PHYOGS LA GNOD PA YOD TSUL

SGO NAS LAM STON CUNG ZAD CIG BYAS PA YIN NA, GDAN 'THUS TSOS SKAD CHA DE'I 'PHYAM RTZA RDO BSNON YANG

DAG PA GNANG RGYUR THE TSOM DBYIN JI'I SKAD YIG GI SLOB GRVA BTZUGS NA NANG PA'I LTA SPYOD LA SKYON BYED TSUL DANG, RKANG RTZED GRU GU NI SANGS RGYAS KYI DBU LA RDOG RGYAG BZHU BA'I

TSUL RED CES GDAN 'THUS ZHIG GIS TSOGS 'DU'I DBUS SU GSUNGS PA'I LO RGYUS LTAR RED, TSOM MED,

TSOGS 'DU'I LAS 'GAN NI, LAS DON GANG 'DRA ZHIG LA GROS TSOGS DGOS

@124 KYANG, BKA' SHAG NAS TSOGS 'DU'I GROS GZHI DRUNG RTZIS BRGYUD GNANG BA DANG, YANG NA, BKA' SHAG,

DRUNG RTZIS THUN MONG NAS GROS GZHI BZOS TE DRUNG RTZIS NAS TSOGS 'DUR GSUNG MOL GYIS TSOGS 'THUS RNAMS

NAS DE LA ZHIB GROS BYAS TE DON TSAN DGONGS 'CHAR MTHUN RIGS RNAMS TSIG THOR BKOD DE GDAN SA GSUM

DANG, RTZE SHOD DRUNG SPYI'I SPYI THAM PHAB STE DRUNG RTZIS NAS BKA' SHAG TU PHUL BA, BKA' SHAG NAS ZHIB

'JUG GIS DGONGS MTHUN BYUNG NA, ^ GONG SA MCHOG LA PHUL TE CHOG MCHAN STZAL BA DANG, LAS DON

THOG 'GRO BA RED, YANG BKA' SHAG NAS, TSIG THO DER DGONGS 'CHAR BCOS BSGYUR GNANG 'OS

YOD NA SBYAR SHOG THOG BSKYON TE SNYAN ZHUR PHUL BA T'A LA'I BLA MA RIN PO CHES DE LA DGONGS 'CHAR BSGYUR

BCOS GNANG 'OS KYANG SBYAR SHOG GNANG STE TSIG THO DE SLAR YANG TSOGS 'DUR SGROGS SBYANG GIS DGONGS

'CHAR SBYAR SHOG LA TSANG MAS SPYI MOS BYUNG TSE TSIG THE'I YIG DKYUS SU PHAB STE SKYON THAM RGYAG DGOS PA DANG,

GAL TE SBYAR SHOG LA TSOGS 'THUS RNAMS KYIS MOS MTHUN MA ZHUS NA SBYAR SHOG RNAMS BKOG STE SNGON MA'I

TSIG THO DE RANG LA CHOG MCHAN ZHUS TE LAS DON YED LAS, TSOGS 'DU'I GROS CHOD LA RANG BZHIN BSGYUR

BCOS GNANG BA'I SROL MED, YANG SKABS RE TSOGS 'THUS RNAMS DGONGS 'CHAR MA MTHUN PAS THAG

GCOD BYED DKA' BYUNG TSE 'OS SHOG BSDUS TE MANG MOS LA THAG GCOD BYED PA'I SROL YANG YOD, YANG SKABS

RE SRID DON GAL CHE'I THAG GCOD DKA' BA BYUNG NA, LHA MGON LA GTZAN BRTAG GAM, YANG NA GNAS

DGA' SOGS LA LUNG ZHU PHUL TE THAG GCOD BYED PA RED, CHOS SRUNG RNAMS DUS GSUM GSAL BAR GZIGS

PAS BSUL BA YONG MI SRID KYANG, DGE SKYON BSAM BLO'I SPYOD YUL DU GYUR PA ZHIG YOD RUNG, NGAN KHAG

'KHYER MA THUB PAS CHOS SRUNG RNAmS LA LAG PA 'PHYID PA LTA BU ZHIG KYANG BYED KYI YOD PA RED, TSOGS

'DU'I 'GROS GZHI DANG MA MTHUN PA'I LAB BRJOD 'DRA BYUNG TSE DRUNG RTZIS NAS STANGS 'DZIN BYED PA RED, BAR

SKABS RANG GIS MTHONG TSUL DANG, MYONG TSUL RNAMS CUNG ZAD BRIS DGOS DON NI, DENG DUS RANG CAG

GZHIS BYED RNAMS DKA' NGAL CHE ZHING, MI MTHONG DANG, CHA 'JOGS CHUNG BA'I SKABS 'DIR YAR THON

@126 SER SKYA ZUNG 'BREL BYAS PA YANG MANG PO YOD, DE DAG NI RGYAL KHAB NANG GI LAS TSAN KHAG RED,

^ RGYAL BA'I YONGS 'DZIN CHE CHUNG, RGYAL SPRUL HO THOG THU DANG, HO THOG THU, KARMA PA, SPRUL SKU RNAM

KLAS PAS RE RE BZHIN 'DIR BRIS KYIS MI LANGS SO, ,

GZHUNG GI 'BAB YONG CHE SHOS NI SA ZHING GI DPYA KHRAL DANG, DE 'OG DKAR SHE'I KHRAL,

SHO KHRAL, NAGS TSAL GYI KHRAL SOGS PHAL CHE BA DNGOS MDOG RANG DANG, LA LA DNGUL GYI KHRAL YANG

'BAB PA RED, KHRAL 'BAB DE DAG NAS 'GRO KHUNGS CHE SHOS NI CHOS PHYOGS DANG, DE 'OG RGYAL BSTAN

BYED PA'I PHOGS SOGS LA 'GRO BA RED, SHES RIG NI CHOS PHYOGS LA 'THUS PA LTA BUS SMAN RTZIS KHANG

DANG, RTZE RIG GNAS SLOB GRVA, 'DOD 'JO'I DPAL 'KHYIL DANG, NGO MTSAR THANG BRIS (ZUR 'PHYONGS)

PA SOGS LA RGYUN PHOGS DANG, AE DANG SNYE MOR RDZONG YONGS THOG NAS DBU CAN BRIS RKOS SLOB PHRUG PAR

PHOGS THOB DKRIG CAR, RDZONG GZHIS LA LAR SLOB GRVA'I MTHUN RKYEN PHRAN BU GNANG BA LAS SHES RIG YAR

RGYAS KYI CHED DU DMIGS BSAL RGYA CHE GANG YANG YOD PA MA MTHONG, LAS BYED PA'I PHOGS KYANG MANG CHE

BA ZHABS RTEN PHA GZHIS YOD PAR BRTEN PHOGS THOB DNGOS MDOG RGYA CHE MED, RJES SU RDZONG GZHIS KHAG GI

GSAR PA BZO GNANG MDZAD YOD PA RED,

RGYAL KHAB KYI RTZA KHRIMS SAM, RTZA 'DZIN GYI YIG GZHI, DRANG THIG MTHONG BA 'DZUM SHOR LAS, ,MGO

MTHO YANG RENGS SU MI 'JUG CING, ,SGAB DMA' YANG YAL BAR MI 'DOR BA, ,LAS YIN MIN SPU RIS

'BYED PA DE, ,BLO GTAD SA DPON GYI YANGS RTZE YIN, ,ZHES DANG, KUN GZIGS LNGA PA CHEN POS, BRAN

'KHOR RNAMS LA BSLAB BYA NAN TAN BSKYED, ,CUNG ZAD NONGS LA BLO KHOG YANGS BYA ZHING, ,SHES BZHIN KHYAD

@128 DU GSOD PA'I RENGS PO DAG ,DRAN 'DZIN LEGS NYES SPANG BLANGS BYED PAR RIGS, ,ZHES DANG, SDE

SRID RIN PO CHES, NYI MA'I 'OD ZER GYIS GDUNGS MTSO CHEN DANG, ,MNYAM PA'I GZUGS SU SNYING RJE

CHEN POS KHRO, ,NANG NA KHA BA LTAR BSIL PHYI ROL DU, ,RTZUB PA NYID KYIS 'GRO BA SKYONG BAR BYED, ,CES

JI SKAD GSUNGS PA LTAR, 'PHAGS PA SPYAN RAS GZIGS DNGOS BOD RJE SRONG BTZAN SGAM PO'I DUS

BOD LJONGS YONGS LA LHA CHOS DGE BA BCU DANG, MI CHOS GTZANG MA BCU DRUG GZHI TZAR BZUNGS PA'I

BOD KYI KHRIMS YIG DRUG NI, KHRI RTZE 'BUM BZHER GYI KHRIMS, 'BUM GSER THOG SHA BA CAN GYI KHRIMS,

RGYAL KHAMS DPER BLANGS KYI KHRIMS, MDO LON ZHU BCAD KYI KHRIMS, DBANG CHEN BCAD KYI KHRIMS, KHAB

SO NANG PA'I KHRIMS TE DRUG MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON JA 18-BA-5 NAS 21-BA-BAR DE DAG SO SO'I NGOS 'DZIN 'GREL BSHAD DANG BCAS

GSAL YANG, KHRI RAL PA CAN SKABS YIN TSUL RDZOB LDAN GZHON NU'I DGA' STON 42-BA-6 NANG GSAL, DRUG DANG, DE YANG SRONG BTZAN SGAM POS, NGAN PA BSTOD NA GNYIS KA PHUNG, ,

DE BAS KHENG PO RJER MI DBYUNG, ,DPA' LA STAG GIS MA BSTOD NA, ,DPA' BAR BYA BA'I RU MA MED, ,

MDZANGS LA YIG TSANG MA BSTOD NA, ,PHYIN CHAD MDZANGS NGAN SHAN MI PHYE, ,LEGS LA BYA DAGS MA BSTOD

NA; ;SLAN CHAD LEGS PA SU YIS BYED, ,SNGAR MA WA ZHUS MA DMAD NA, ,DPA' DANG SNGAR MA SHAN MI PHYE,,

NGAN LA NAN TUR MA BYAS NA, ,NAM YANG DRAN SHES REMS MI 'GYUR, ,NYES LA CHAD PAS MA BCAD NA, ,PHYIS

NAS NYES BYED RGYUN MI CHAD, ,LUS SKYES PHA MA MNAR BA NA, ,'PHRAL PHUGS GNYIS KAR LA YOGS SDIG ,

RANG GI MCHAN GYI BU MNAR NA, ,PHYI ROL DGRA YIS ZHE KHA 'BYED, ,BZA' GROGS MNAR NA PHYI NANG GI, ,TSIS

DANG SO NAM YAL BAR CHOR, ,ZHES DANG, YANG SRONG BTZAN SGAM PO'I BKA' GDAM MDZANGS YIG

NANG, RGYAL KHRIMS GSER GYI GNYA' SHING DE, ,SPYOD NGAN STA GRIS MA GSHAG CIG ,CHOS KHRIMS DAR

GYI MDUD PA DE, ,DUG LNGA'I SNYUNG BUS MA GSED CIG ,BLON PO KHRIMS KYI SGRO BA DE, ,'KHON BCUGS

RU PA RNAMS KYI THOG MAR RNAM SRAS MDUNG DMAR CAN PHYAG MTSAN BZHI PA'I 'PHYAG DAR ZHIG 'KHYER YOD

^ SKYABS RJE YONGS 'DZION RDO RJE 'CHANG NAS SA YOS 1934 LOR GTZANG KHUL GNAS GZIGS SU CHIBS

BSGYUR SKABS CHED GNYER RTEN MJAL GNANG BA, LHA SRAS KYI 'PHYAR DAR 'JANG YUL MA DANG, 'JANG 'DRA

MA ZHES GNYIS 'DUG PA GCIG LA RNAM SRAS SER CHEN RTA BDAG BRGYAD DANG, GZHAN MA DER RNAM SRAS

CHA DANG, DAR CHA SNA TSOGS 'KHYER BA ZHIG 'DUG PA LAS, MDUNG DMAR CAN PHYAG MTSAN BZHI PA ZHIG

MI 'DUG ,CES PHEBS PA LHA SRAS MU RUB BTZAN PO'I SKABS KYI DMAG GI RU DAR NI 'JANG YUL MA DANG,

'JANG 'DRA MA ZHU BA DE GNYIS YIN 'DUG PA DE'I LO RGYUS ZHIB PA DU K'U LA'I GOS BZANG NANG GSUNGS YOD,

RJES SU DPAL LDAN SA SKYA PA DANG, PHAG GRU, RIN GTZANG SOGS KYI DMAG

DPUNG BSKYOD SKABS RU DAR DANG, RTEN THUGS SOGS YOD PA LO RGYUS LA LAR GSAL YANG, DNGOS

^ RGYAL MCHOG LNGA PA'I GSUNG 'BUM TZA PA'I SHOG GRANGS 216-BA-1 POR GSAL, GSUNGS, GANG LTAR YANG 'DI NI CHU GLANG BDAG CAG GI STON PA THUGS RJE CAN SH'AKYA'I RGYAL PO

MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS NAS LO 777 DANG YE SHU MA SHI KA'I 'DAS LO 233 BOD LA DAM PA'I

CHOS THOG MA DBU BRNYES KYI LO DANG PO YIN PAS, RJES SU BOD GZHUNG GI SHOG DNGUL DU'ANG

GANGS LJONGS CHAB SRID DBU BRNYES KYI LO ZHES RTZIS GZHIR BZUNG BA YIN NO,,

DE NAS RGYAL THOG BZHI'I RJES SU RGYAL PO GNAM RI SRONG BTZAN DANG, BCUN

MO THO GAR NI, LI YUL GYI NUB PHYOGS SA DMAR KAN KRA ZER BA DE YIN ZHES PHYI RGYAL GYI MI BOD KYI LO RGYUS LA

MKHAS PA PHAL CHER GYIS BZHED KYANG, 'GA' RES LI YUL GYI NANG, KHO TAN GYI NYE 'GRAM DU YOD

CES GLENG,, BZA' TSE SPONG GI SRAS SU ME GLANG 'DAS LO 617 LOR SBRA STOD TSAL GYI PHO BRANG MI

'GYUR BYAMS PA GLING DU SRAS KHRI SDE STONG BTZAN NAM, SRONG BTZAN SGAM PO BU STON 111-BA-4 DEB DMAR 16-BA-3, LO TSIGS BCAS SU GSAL, 'KHRUNGS, RGYA'I

DEB YIG NANG SRONG BTZAN GYI MTSAN DU RJE BTZUN LUNG BTZAN ZHES BRIS SNANG, SRONG BTZAN SGAM

PO 'KHRUNGS PA'I LO PHYI MAR RGYA'I RGYAL PO THANG GI MI RGYUD DANG PO THANG KA'O TZUNG RGYA'I RGYAL KHRIR 'KHOD,

DE NAS LO SHAS KYI RJES SU BOD KYI RGYAL POS BLON PO MGAR STONG BTZAN GYIS

GTZOS RTA PA MANG PO (BAL PO'I YI GE'I THOG BRIS PA'I) BKA' SHOG DANG, SKYES BCAS

BSKUR TE BAL YUL DU BRDZANGS NAS BAL RGYAL AAM SHU WRMA'I (ZHI BA'I GO CHA'AM YONGS GRAGS

@147 'OD ZER GO CHA) SRAS MO SBIR TI KU tI, dE BE BTZUN MOR SLONG DU BTANG BAR, BOD RGYAL

PO'I BKA' SHOG GI DON LAB SKRAt TE SRAS MO BSTER BA KHAS BLANGS, SRAS MO'I RTEN SKAL DU

SANGS RGYAS 'OD SRUNG GIS RAB GNAS MDZAD PA'I BYAMS PA CHOS 'KHOR MA DANG, JO BO MI

BSKYOD RDO RJE LA SOGS PA DANG, RIN PO CHE SOGS NOR GYI SKYES MANG PO BSKUR, BOD YUL DU

PHYAG PHEBS SHING RGYAL PO'I BTZUN MOR MNGA' GSOL, BTZUN MO SBIR TI KU tI, dE BER, BOD

PA RNAMS KYIS BAL BZA' KHRI BTZUN ZHES ZHU ZHING, BTZUN MO DES LHA SA DMAR PO RI LA RGYAL

PO'I PHO BRANG RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I KHANG BZANG LA 'GRAN PA ZHIG BRTZIGS,

RGYAL POS THON MI SAm BHO tAS GTZOS BOD PHRUG RIG PA CAN BCU DRUG GSER

GYI SKYES DANG BCAS TE RGYA GAR LA YI GE'I GZHUNG LUGS SLOB RGYAL RABS 'GA' SHAS SU BAL BZA' MA BSUS PA'I SNGON DANG, 'GA' SHAS SU BAL BZA' BSUS PA'I RJES LA

YI GE SLOB PAR BTANG ZHES GSAL BA TZAM LAS, DUS TSES GSAL PO ZHIG DA BAR MA RNYED CING, DKON MCHOG 'JIGS

MED DBANG POS MDZAD PA'I BSTAN BSGYUR DKAR CHAG NANG, BTZUN MO GNYIS BSUS PA'I RJES LA THON MI SAm BHO tA RGYA GAR DU

YI GE SLOB PAR BTANG BA'I LO RGYUS 'DUG PA MA ZAD, DEB DMAR 17-NA-1 POR DE DANG CHA 'DRA BA GSAL, PAR BTANG BAS, RGYA GAR BYANG

PHYOGS KASMIR KHUL DU SLOB DPON (BRAM ZE LI BYIN) BHA RA MAN, LI SBI KA RA DANG, (LHA RIG

PA'I SENG GE) dE BA SBI RDA YA SIDHA LAS YI GE'I RIG BYED MTHA' DAG ZHIB PAR BSLABS, BOD

MI GZHAN RNAMS TSA BAS 'DAS, SAm BHO tA BOD DU PHYIR THON NAS BHA RA MAN DANG, GUPTA'I DUS

RGYA GAR BYANG PHYOGS SU CHES CHER DAR BA'I YI GE SHA RA RDA DANG, NA GA RA GNYIS LA GZHI BYAS

TE BOD YIG BRTZAMS, THON MI SAm BHO tAS LO TZ'A BYAS TE RGYA GAR GYI SLOB DPON KU SA RA DANG,

BRAM ZE SHANG KA RA SOGS KYIS LHA THO THO RI GNYAN BTZAN SKABS PHYAG TU SON PA'I GNYAN PO GSANG

BA'I DON CHA TSANG BA BOD YIG TU BSGYUR, YONGS GRAGS 'CHAD NYAN MA BYUNG YANG, RGYAL PO RANG

@148 GIS SKAL LDAN MANG POR LKOG CHOS SU THUGS RJE CHEN PO ZHI KHRO'I GDAMS PA PHOG STE NYAMS SU

BLANGS SHING, SAD MI BDUN RAB TU MA BYUNG PHAN, NYANG BRAN PHA BONG KHAR THUGS RJE CHEN PO'I

RNAL 'BYOR SPYOD PA'I RAL PA CAN BRGYA PHRAG RGYUN DU BYUNG BAR BSHAD,

YANG, RGYAL POS BLON PO MGAR STONG BTZAN DANG, SAm BHO tA LA SOGS PA

RTA PA MANG PO RGYA NAG RGYAL PO THANG THA'I TZUNG GI SRAS MO WIN CANG KONG JO (MTSO NANG GI PADMO) BTZUN

MOR SLONG BAR BTANG, SKABS DER THU LU HUN ('A ZHA 'AM GRU GU) GYI RGYAL PO THO KI KI NAS

KYANG RGYA RGYAL LA KONG JO SLONG BAR BTANG BA BOD KYI RGYAL POS GSAN TE THUGS 'KHRUGS NAS THU LU HUN LA DMAG BTANG STE YUL DE'I RGYAL PO MTHAR MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON MA 10-BA-5 DANG, 'DAS LO 1950 LOR BHAL tI MOR PAR KHANG NAS BTON PA, dE SE

MA'ON, MAR tIN GYIS BRIS PA, CHING GE SE KH'AN SHUGS RGYAS PA DANG, RGYA NAG NUB PHYOGS BLANGS PA ZER BA'I DEB KYI

SHOG GRANGS 53 NANG LA, LO BRGYA PHRAG BZHI PA'I STOD DU GRU GU HUN GYIS DBANG BSGYUR BYED PA'I MTSO SNGON GYI BYANG PHYOGS

SA CHA DE DAG 'DAS LO 672 LA BOD PAS BLANGS TE GRU GU HUN RNAMS RGYA NAG LA BROS, (GRU GU HUN NAM THU LU HUN LA

BOD PAS 'A ZHA ZER) ZHES BRIS 'DUG, SKROD BTANG, DE NAS BOD KYI RGYAL POS CANG

DANG, CANG SA'I RGYAL SRAS DMAG DANG SBRAGS, WIN CANG KONG JO DANG, RTEN SKAL

DU SANGS RGYAS RANG NYID KYIS PHYAG NAS MDZAD PA'I JO BO SH'AKYA MU NE'I SKU DANG, DAR ZAB,

SHEL CHAS LA SOGS PA'I DNGOS SKYES RGYA CHE'I BRDZONG BA DANG BCAS TE BOD KYI SA MTSAMS

DE DAG RE RE LA PHEBS PA'I RTAGS DANG, MTSAN MA BKOD PA'I LO RGYUS YOD KYANG, RDZOGS LDAN GZHON NU'I

DGA' STON LA NI, LHA SA'I PHYOGS SO SOR 'KHOD PA'I SKYE BO LA SPRUL PA'I DBANG GIS MTHONG SNANG MI 'DRA BA SNA

TSOGS BYUNG YANG, DON DU BYANG PHYOGS NAS THON TE, KLU GNAS PA'I SA STENG DU DAR GYI YOL BA BCAD DE JO BO

BZHUGS, MCHOD PA'I ROL MO DKROL BAS BAL MO BZA' CI YIN SNYAM NAS PHO BRANG GI RTZE NAS GZIGS PAS,

KONG JO DPON GA-YOG BYON PA MTHONG ZHES BSU BA SOGS GANG YANG MA BYUNG BA LTA BU BCAS GSUNG SROL MI 'DRA BA

MANG ZHING, YANG KA 'KHOL MA'I NANG MGAR GYI KONG JO'I LUS SLAS PAS LDAN MA'I BRAG LA RGYAS PA'I 'BUM BRIS,

YIN NA, PHRAN GYIS BRJOD PA'I RGYAL RABS 'DI DANG CUNG MTHUN PAR 'DUG ,'ON KYANG RANG LUGS 'DI'O ZHES KHA MTSON GCOD PA DANG, CHOS 'BYUNG GZHAN LA MA DAG PA'I RGYU MTSAN

@157 ZHIG NI PHA BONG KHA'I RI KHROD DU MJAL RGYU 'DUG ,

DMAR PO MER BSREGS PA DANG, JO BO SH'AKYA MU NE RGYA BZA'I ZHAL CHEMS LTAR LHO SGO ME LONG

RABS DANG, TUNG HVANG GI YIG CHA'I NANG NGES PAR 'KHOD DGOS RGYUR ZUR TZAM YANG GSAL

MED PA'I KHAR, SKABS DE'I DUS SU BOD KYI DRAG PO'I STOBS SHUGS JI TZAM YOD PA

'BYOR BA'I LO RGYUS DE NI MA DAG DE'I SKOR DEB DKAR 8-NA-4 PAR GSAL BSHAD KYANG GNANG 'DUG, PAR SEMS, YANG DMAG GI SBIR GRAGS SHIG NI BYUNG BA MIN

RGYA RGYAL RANG YANG SRAS MO BSKYAL BAR SHA PHAN SHAN BAR PHEBS, SRAS MO'I MTSAN MTHONGS

MI 'DUG,

GSHEGS ZER, 'GA' RES GNYAGS KHRI BZANG YANG ZOR GYIS BKRONGS ZER, GANG LTAR

@168 'DI LA THE TSOM CHEN PO ZHIG YONG GI 'DUG PAS, LO TSIGS RNAMS LA BSKYAR ZHIB NAN TAN

ZHIG BYED DGOS PA YIN,

RGYA BZA' CIN DRENG KONG JO BOD LA BZHUGS SKABS KHONG LA YID MTHUN SKYO

ROGS MED KHAR, BTZUN MO CHE BA RNAMS KYIS PHRAG DOG BYAS PA'I RKYEN GYIS THUGS MI SPRO BA

BYUNG STE, KHONG GIS BOD KYI RGYAL PHRAN 'A ZHA'I DPON KO HI PHI WANG LA GSANG BA'I 'PHRIN YIG

BTANG BA'I NANG, NGA BROS YONG RGYUR KHYED KYIS SKYABS BCOL LEN DOGS ZHES GSAL YANG,

KO HI PHI WANG NAS BOD RJE THUGS 'KHRUG DOGS 'JIGS SNANG GIS SKYABS BCOL LEN MA

NUS, RGYA SKAD DU SHI'I THA'I GOO (THA'I RGYAL KHAB) ZER BA'I BOD KYI MTHUN PHYOGS 'JANG GI

RGYAL PO KO LO PHANG LA'ANG RGYA BZAS 'PHRIN YIG GONG BZHIN BTANG BAR YANG KHAS LEN MA BYAS

KYANG, KO LO PHANG GIS DE'I SKOR RGYA NAG RGYAL POR GNAS TSUL BZHIG BTANG ZHING, GNAS

TSUL DE 'BYOR MA THAG PAR RGYA'I RGYAL PO HA LAS TE, GAL SRID BU MOS BROS YONG PA YIN NA,

RGYA BOD GNYIS DBAR DMAG 'KHRUG YONG NGES SNYAM PA'I BLO 'TSAB SHIN TU CHE BA'I NGANG NAS

BOD DU DMIGS BSAL BANG CHEN CHED GNYER GYIS BU MO KHYOD SKYID SDUG LEGS NYES JI 'DRA ZHIG

BYUNG YANG, NGA DANG, NGA'I LUNG PA'I DON DU BOD RANG LA SDOD ROGS ZHES YI GE NAN TAN

ZHIG BTANG PAR BRTEN RGYA BZA' CIN DRENG KONG JO BOD LA MA BZHUGS MTHU MED BYUNG 'DUG ,RGYA

BZA' 'DI THUGS SEMS 'KHRUGS PA'I RKYEN GYIS BOD NANG SA BKRA LEGS PA 'GA' SHAS

MED PAR BZOS PA RED ZER BA'I LO RGYUS KYANG YOD, DE NAS MI RING BAR CHU RTA 742 LOR

SRAS KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN 'KHRUNGS, KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN GYI 'KHRUNGS LO'I SKOR LA BKA' THANG SHEL BRAG ,GSER 'PHRENG, ZANGS GLING, SBA BZHED BCAS NANG SHING RTA

YIN PAR BZHED PAS ZHIB 'JUG MDZOD, RGYA BZAS NGA LA BU SKYES DUS, NGAS SA BKRA LEGS PA

@169 'GA' ZHIG MED PAR BZOS ZIN PAS 'GYOD CING, 'ON KYANG SA BKRA NYAMS PA GSO BA'I

THABS YOD GSUNGS TE NYAMS GSO GNANG, RGYA BZA' 'DIS SNGAR RGYA BZA' WIN CANG KONG

BAL BZA'I RTEN SKAL JO MO MI BSKYOD RDO RJE LO 'GA'I SNGON LA BON LA DGA' BA'I BLON PO DAG

GIS MANG YUL PHYOGS SU BSKYAL BA DE GDAN DRANGS NAS RGYAS BTAB RVA MO CHE GTZUG LAG

LUNG RGYA BSKYED BYED KYI YOD PA'I STABS KYIS SA LUG 719 NANG RGYA RGYAL HUNG SONG GIS

DE NAS BSAM YAS GTZUG LAG KHANG RAB GNAS DANG BCAS GRUB PA

DANG, RGYAL PO'I DGONGS PA BZHIN SAD MI BDUN RAB TU BYUNG BA SOGS THAMS CAD

@178 RIN CHEN SNA LNGA TSANG BA BOD KYI YUL: 'BRU SNA LNGA LA LONGS SPYOD

MGO NAG RJE: TSA GRANG MOS SNYOMS NYI MA DBUS KYIS: BOD KYI RGYAL POR SKYES PAS

NGA RE DGA': ZHIB MOR BSAGS PA'I LAS NI RDZAS 'BYUNG ZHING: NYIN MTSAN

BSAM PA'I LAS NI BLO 'BYUNG STE: YA RABS MDZANGS PA'I LAS NI PHYAG RIS 'BYUNG:

RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN NGA RE DGA': MES PO THO RI GNYAN BTZAN CHOS DBU BRNYES:

SRONG BTZAN SGAM POS CHOS KYI SROL YANG BTOD: KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN CHOS KYI GZHI ZHIG

BTING: BZANG PO'I YAR 'THEN YOD PAS NGA RE DGA': ZHES SOGS NAS,

BOD KYI LHA 'DRE MI GSUM DAM LA BTAGS: BSAM YAS MI BAS

LHA 'DRES BRTZIGS PA MTHO: NGA YI BSAM YAS DBU RTZE RIGS GSUM 'DI: BRTZIGS

PA MI 'DRA SKYES PA 'DRA STE DGA': PHA MA'I NGOR YANG SDIG PA'I LAS MI BYED: SROG GI

PHYIR YANG DAM PA'I CHOS MI SPONG: TSE 'DI'I DON DU RGYAL SRID CHOS BZHIN SKYONG: PHYI

MA'I DON DU LHA CHOS BYAS PAS DGA': PHYI YI RGYAL SRID PHYUGS LUG BZHIN DU SKYONG:

NANG GI RGYAL SRID BU TSA BZHIN DU SKYONG: BAR GYI RGYAL SRID BRAN 'KHOL BZHIN DU SKYONG:

RGYAL PO'I MNGA' THANG CHOS LA SPYOD PAS DGA': ZHES SOGS GSUNG GLU BZHES 'DUG, BTZUN MO BKA'I THANG YIG TU GSAL,

LCAGS STAG 750 NANG NAS BOD DANG, RGYA NAG GI SA MTSAMS SU

DMAG 'KHRUG YANG YANG BYUNG STABS, BOD RJE KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN GYIS CHU YOS 763

LOR BLON PO ZHANG RGYAL LHA SNANG DANG, ZHANG MCHIMS RGYAL GZIGS SHU THENG, STAG SGRA

KLU GONG, LHA BZANG DPAL RNAMS LA ('A ZHA'AM GRU GU) THU LU HUN NAS DMAG 'BUM

PHRAG GNYIS DANG BCAS RGYA NAG PHYOGS SU DPUNG 'JUG DGOS PA'I BKA' BSTZAL BA BZHIN,

@179 KHONG TSOS RGYA'I GRONG KHYER CING COR DMAG BRGYAB NAS, SA GNAS DE'I SPYI KHYAB KO HI ZER

BAS BOD LA 'GO 'BUL ZHUS, MI RING BAR BOD DMAG GIS SPIN CA'O NANG YOD PA'I

GRONG KHYER PHAN SI HUN YANG BLANGS, CHU YOS 763 NAS SHING SPRE 804 BAR RGYA

NAG LA DBANG SGYUR BYED MKHAN RGYA'I RGYAL PO THA'I TZUNG NAS BLON CHEN KO DZU KI RGYA DMAG KHYON

CHE DANG BCAS BOD DMAG GI GDONG LEN DU BTANG YANG, GDONG LEN MA THUB PAR PHYIR

BROS BYAS, CING CO GRONG KHYER GYI SPYI KHYAB KO HI NAS SA SNE LAM RGYUS BYAS PAS, BOD

DMAG RNAMS CHU RUD DRAG TU RGYUGS PA LTA BU'I DRAG SHUGS DANG, MYUR SHUGS CHEN PO'I

NGANG NAS RGYA NAG GI RGYAL SA C'A RNGAN PHYOGS SU BSHAR YONG GI YOD PA'I SHUGS KYIS, RGYA'I

GONG MA'ANG RANG GI RGYAL SA NAS SSHEM CU PHYOGS SU BROS, BLON CHEN KO DZI YI RANG GI NANG

MI DANG, MI DMANGS MANG PO BCAS LHO PHYOGS NAN SIN KU ZHES PAR BROS,

BOD DMAG RNAMS RGYA'I RGYAL SAR 'BYOR NAS, KONG HU'I RGYAL SRAS

CHING HUNG (GA'O WANG) ZHES PA KEM SHING KONG JO'I MING PO YIN PA ZHIG YOD PA DE RGYA NAG

GONG MAR BSKOS, BKRIS ZHES PA'I GO MING BTAGS, RGYA'I GONG MA GSAR PA NAM BYUNG

LA KHRI LO SPO BA'I SROL LTAR, RGYA NAG RGYAL YONGS LA GONG MA BKRIS KYI KHRI LO YANG KHYAB

BSGRAGS BYAS, RGYA NAG NAS LO LTAR BOD LA DPYA KHRAL 'BUL RGYU'I CHOD DON YI GE BLANGS,

DE NAS NYIN BCO LNGA'I RJES SU BOD DMAG RNAMS RGYA NAG GI RGYAL SA NAS PHYIR THEN SPE LO tA SHOG GRANGS 30 BYAS SO,,

GONG GI GNAS TSUL DE BOD RJE KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN GYI SKU DUS LHA SA'I PO T'A

LA'I ZHOL GYI RDO RING LHO NGOS SU BRKOS 'DUG CING, LO RGYUN RING POR SONG RING 'GA' RES

RDO GZHUS TE YIG 'BRU MA GSAL BA BZOS PA'I RIGS LA KUR RTAGS RE YOD PA LAS,

@180 BYINGS DAG CHA DANG BCAS PA 'DI LTAR,

RDO RING GI LHO NGOS SU, ` BTZAN PHO KHRI LDE GTZUG RTZAN GYI RING LA'A,

` NGAN LAM KLU KHONG GIS, GLO BA NYE BA'I RJE BLAS BYAS PHA, 'BAL LDONG TZAB DANG, LANG

MYES ZIGS BLON PO CHEN PHO BYED BYED PA LAS, GLO BA RINGS NAS, BTZAN PO YAB KHRI LDE

GTZUG RTZAN GYI SKU LA DRAD TE, DGUNG DU GSHEGS SO, ,BTZAN PO SRAS KHRI SRONG LDE

BRTZAN GYI SKU LA NI DRAD DU NYE, BOD MGO NAG PO'I SRID NI 'KHRUG DU BYED PA LAS, KLU

KHONG GIS, 'BAL DANG, LANG GLO BA RINGS PA'I GTAN GTZIGS BTZAN PHO SRAS KHRI SRONG

PHYOGS SU THOG MA DRANGS PA'I DMAG DPON DU, BKA' STZA LAD GYIS KYANG, DGRA'

THAB MKHAS LA GROS GYIS SONG DE, RGYA'I KHAMS SU GTOGS PA'I 'A ZHA DANG POR BSDUS,

CHEN PO GSOLD NAS, KENG SHIR DRANG BA'I DMAG DPON CHEN PHOR, ZHANG CHIMS RGYAL

NANG PA'I CHOS KYI RTEN GDAN 'DREN PA'I CHED DU, RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE

BTZAN GYIS BHA TA HOR (GHA MI NYAG) YUL DU DMAG BTANG STE, YUL DE'I SGOM GRVA

BCOM PA'I KA CA'I RJES SU RGYAL PO PE HAR 'BRANGS TE BYUNG BA BSAM YAS KYI DKOR

PO MA SKYES DGRA'I SKAL BA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I RING BSREL YUL DE'I BRE KHAL

MGOS KYI NYANG STOD GNAS RNYING GI GDAN RABS RIN PO CHE'I GTER MDZOD KHA 3-NA-2 PAR MON SKYER CHU LHA KHANG TSUN, SKAR LA

@190 SLEBS PAR, YUL DE'I RGYAL PO BRED NAS MTHA' 'KHOB RGYAL PO'I RTA PA 'DI 'DRA NA,

DPUNG BU CHUNG (RKANG DMAG) DANG, SHING RTA PA DANG, GLANG PO'I TSOGS CI 'DRA BA

'GYUR ZER NAS, PHO BRANG GI SGO'I YA KLAD LA BOD KYI RGYAL PO'I LHAM BTAGS NAS, DE'I

'OG NAS PHAR 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA 'DZUL TE, NGA'I RGYAL KHAMS NI BTZAN PO KHYOD KYI

'OG TU 'DZUL ZHING, DPYA DANG SKYES LO TANG DU 'BUL LO ZHES 'DUS SO, DE NAS

GANG+GA BRGAL TE MA GA DHAR DMAG DRANGS PAS, MA GHA DHA PA THAMS CAD KYIS NOR RNAMS

AO TANTA PU RIR BSKYAL, MI RNAMS RGYA GAR SHAR PHYOGS SU BROS, GA-YUL SPROD MA

DGOS PAR RDO RJE GDAN DU BYANG CHUB KYI SHING LA MCHOD PA BYAS, MCHOD RTEN KHA PHYE BA'I

NANG NAS SANGS RGYAS SH'AKYA THUB PA'I RING BSREL BRE DRUG SPYAN DRANGS TE SNGAR LTAR RGYAS

BTAB, CHU BO GANG+GA'I 'GRAM DU BOD KYI MI BZHI BSKOS NAS 'DI TSUN CHAD BOD KYI SA YIN

PAS 'DIR RDO RING GYIS SHIG CES BKA' BSTZAL, BYE KHUNG DU LCAGS KYI KA BA BTZUGS,

BOD DU 'BYOR DUS DMAG NYUNG DU ZHIG LAS MED PA LA RGYA GAR YUL BZANG BAS BSDAD PA MIN

@199 CHE YANG, YUM GYIS DUG PHUL TE GSHEGS PAS RGYAL SRID LO GCIG DANG, ZLA BA DGU

LAS MA BSKYANGS, YUM GYIS DUG 'BUL DGOS DON NI, ME LONG MAR, YAB GRONGS

PA'I DUS, PHO YONGS BZAS RGYAN MA BKROL, MYA NGAN MA BYAS ZER BA SNYAD BTAGS

NAS, YUM TSE SPONG BZA' PHRAG DOG SKYES TE GSHED MA BSKOS NAS GSOD DU BTANG BAS,

SRAS RGYAL POS BSKYABS PAS YUM LOG LTA SKYES TE SRAS LA GSOL NGAN DRANGS TE GSHEGS

ZHES LO RGYUS PHAL CHER MTHUN PAR GLENG, BRJOD DANG BRJOD RGYU'I RGYAL RABS LO RGYUS PHAL

CHE BAR SRAS 'KHRUNGS PA'I LO RGYUS KHO NA LAS, SRAS MO 'KHRUNGS PA DANG, DES BYA BA

BZANG NGAN GNANG BA'I LO RGYUS GANG YANG MI 'DUG PA SRAS MO MA BYUNG BA NI GA LA YIN, DE

LA YANG NGES PAR ZHIB 'JUG CIG DGOS GAL CHE BAR SNYAM,

MU NE BTZUN PO LA SRAS MED PAS SKU MCHED GSUM PA MU TIG BTZAN PO

RGYAL POR 'OS KYANG, YAB KHRI LDE SRONG BTZAN DANG, BKA'I BLON PO RNAMS BSAM YAS

KYI BAR KHANG NANG BKA' GROS LA BZHUGS PA'I SKABS, SRAS MU TIG BTZAN POS

TSOMS KYI SGO BRDUNGS PA ZHANG GI BU DBU RING GIS NANG NAS SGO PHYED TZAM PHYE STE, DA LTA

RGYAL BLON RNAMS BKA' GROS KYI SKABS YIN PAS, RE ZHIG NANG DU PHEBS MI CHOG BYAS

PAR THUGS KHROS NAS CHU GRI BSNUN TE ZHANG GI BU DBU RING BSAD PAR, BLON PO 'GOS

KYIS ZHAL LCE DGA' GSUM DANG, SDUG GSUM BCAD PA'I DON BZHIN, LHO BRAG TU

LO DGU SPYUGS PAS RGYAL PO GNANG MA THUB, KHO BO LO GZHON SKABS SU MU TIG BTZAN

PO SPYUGS PA'I GNAS DE MJAL BAR BSKYOD PA, LHO BRAG MKHAR CHU NA, RI KLUNG

THAMS CAD NAGS TSAL STUG POS KHYAB CING, SHIN TU GZAR ZHING DOG PA'I CA PHRENG

BRGYUD BRAG RI MTHON PO GA-YANG SA CAN ZHIG GI LDEBS SU PHUG RING ZHES PA'I BRAG GI PHUG

@200 PA CHE CHUNG GSUM MJAL, DE'I GNAS 'DZIN PAS MU TIG BTZAN PO BZHUGS PA'I

SKABS KYI LO RGYUS SNYAN PO DANG, SEMS SKYO PO MANG PO ZHIG KYANG BRJOD BYUNG,

RGYU MTSAN GONG SMOS DES RKYEN SRAS BZHI PA KHRI LDE SRONG BTZAN NAM, SAD

NA LEGS MJING YON RGYAL PO'I KHRIR PHEBS, NYAMS MYONG CAN GYI BLON PO BRAN KHA

DPAL GYI YON TAN DANG, NYANG GTING 'DZIN BZANG PO, ZHANG MDO KHRI SHER, NGAN

LAM KHRI RGYAL BZHIS ZHABS 'DEGS ZHUS, BLON PO DANG PO GNYIS LA BAN DE ZHES ZER

BA NI KHONG GNYIS RTEN RAB TU BYUNG BA YIN, RGYAL PO DES DGE BA BCU'I KHRIMS BCAS

SHING, YAB MES KYIS BZHENGS PA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG RNAMS LA MCHOD PA RGYA CHEN PO

PHUL BA DANG, RGYA GAR NAS SLOB DPON BI MA LA MI KRA, DZNY'A NA SE NA, BAL PO H'Um KA RA

SOGS SPYAN DRANGS, CHOS MANG DU BSGYUR, (LHA SA'I NYE 'GRAM) SKYID SHOD DU

DKAR (SKAR) CHUNG RDO RJE DBYINGS KYI LHA KHANG BZHENGS, BLON 'BANGS THAMS CAD LA

DAM PA'I CHOS MI ZHIG CING, DKON MCHOG GSUM BLA MAR BYA BA'I BKA' KHRIMS

BSGRAGS SHING, MNA' BOR, BKA' GTZIGS KYI YI GE MANG PO BRIS TE RGYAS BTAB

NAS MDZOD DU BZHAG CING, RDO RING LA'ANG BKA' GTZIGS DANG, RDO RING GI YI GE ZHIB PA MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON JA 128-BA-1 NANG YOD,

DBYIN YIG NI TOMBS, P. 100-104 AND P. 151-155 LA'ANG BRKOS, RGYAL KHRIMS CHOS BZHIN DU

BSKYANGS PAS 'BANGS RNAMS BDE BA LA 'KHOD DO, ,

SNAR THANG BKA' 'GYUR DKAR CHAG TU, RGYAL PO DE'I SKU DUS BNDE DPAL BRTZEGS DANG, CHOS KYI SNYING PO SOGS KYIS PHANG THANG KA MED KYI GTZUG LAG

KHANG NA BZHUGS PA'I GSUNG RAB RNAMS SHLOO KA DANG, BAM GRANGS, THEM BYANG SOGS

@201 BKOD PAR DKAR CHAG PHANG THANG MA ZHES BKA' 'GYUR GCIG TU BSDUS PA'I THOG MA DANG,

DE RJES BNDE DPAL BRTZEGS, KLU'I DBANG PO, YE SHES SDE SOGS NAS STONG THANG

LDAN DKAR NA BZHUGS PA'I GSUNG RAB RNAMS BSGRIGS NAS DKAR CHAG LDAN DKAR MA

MDZAD CES GSAL, SAD NA LEGS KYIS RGYAL SRID LO BCU DRUG BZHES PA'I RING LA, RGYA

DANG DMAG 'DREN RES LAN KHA YAR BYAS PAS MA TSAD, BOD DMAG TSOS NUB PHYOGS

SU'ANG 'BREL BA RGYA CHE BYED BZHIN PA RED,

WAL tA, LA'I PH'AR GYIS BRIS PA'I DEB NANG, 'DAS LO 715

TZAM LA BOD KYI RGYAL PO DANG, AA RAB KYI KA LI BA CES PA NI, KHUL DE TSE'I RGYAL PO LA ZER BA YIN, KA LE, (ARAB CALIAPHS) GNYIS

'BREL BA BYED PA'I DON LA DRAG PO'I MTHUN PHYOGS BYAS NAS, AI RAN PHEER GHAN NA'I

(IRANIAN ERGHANA) RGYAL PO DE KHONG GNYIS KYIS BSKO GZHAG BYAS PA

RED CES BRIS 'DUG ,'ON KYANG BHAG d'A dA (BAGDAD) NANG LA, AAB BHI SI dA KA

LIB (ABBASSID CALIAPHS) TSO'I KHONGS NAS, KA LIB SKAD GRAGS CHE

SHOS HA HUN AAL RA SHID (HARUN AL- RASHID)...... KYIS SHAR

PHYOGS LAS NUB PHYOGS GAL CHE BA LTA BUR MTHONG STE BOD PA DANG MNYAM 'BREL BYA RGYUR DO

SNANG CHER MA BYAS PAR BSKYUR BZHAG KYANG, BOD LA SKYABS BCOL TE SDOD MKHAN KA LIB

KYI DRAG PO'I SHUGS DE KHO RA SAN (KHORASAN)... DANG, PHEER GHAN NA DENG SANG

TUR KI SI THAN GNYIS LA SKYABS BCOL TE BSDAD PA LTA BU ZHIG RED, KA LIB KYI SRID

BYUS KHAG GNYIS LA BYAS TE SRID DON GYI THOG NAS NUB PHYOGS LA GAL CHEN POR BRTZI BZHIN

YOD PA DANG, DRAG PO SHAR PHYOGS LA BSNYES PA LTA BU BYAS PA'I RKYEN GYIS AA RE BE'I

@202 GONG MA'I STOBS SHUGS NYAMS NAS, AI RE SI (IRISIDS) DE TSOS MO RO KO'I

(MOROCCO) NANG LA RANG DBANG RANG BTZAN BYAS TE THON PA DANG, DE BZHIN AAG LA

WId (AGHLAWIDS) DE TSOS TU NI SI YAN, KE'AR WAN (TUNISIAN

KAIRWAN) GYI NANG LA RANG BTZAN BYAS TE THON PA RED, SKABS DE DUS YO ROB NANG

SKAD GRAGS YOD PA'I RGYAL PO SHA LA MIL (CHARLEMAGNA) ZER BAS RGYAL

SA AE SE LA SHA PAL (AIX-LA CHAPELLE) NAS BHAG dA SER GZHUNG

TSAB CIG BTANG 'DUG ,BHAG dA SE'I (KA LIB HA HUN AAL RA SHID) RGYAL

POS NUB PHYOGS NAS GZHUNG TSAB BLANGS PA SOGS BYAS PA'I RKYEN GYIS SHAR PHYOGS KHA CHE

KHO RA SAN GYI RGYAL POS HA HUN AAL RA SHID LA NGO LOG BYAS SHING, DER BRTEN HA HUN

AAL RA SHID KHONG RANG GIS NGO LOG PA TSO GNON PA'I PHYIR DMAG 'KHRID DE BSKYOD PAR,

DMAG THOG DE GA'I NANG KHONG RANG TU SE (TUS) ZER BA'I GRONG KHYER DER GRONGS 'DUG ,DE

SKABS BOD PA TSOS RGYANG NAS LTA BZHIN BSDAD PAS, TUR KI SI THAN GYI RTZOD RNYOG LANGS

SKABS BOD PAS ROGS RAM MA BYAS PA'I RA SPROD BYED KYI YOD CING, HA HUN GRONGS RJES

RGYAL PO GSAR PA AAL MA MUN (AL-MAIMUN) NAS BOD DANG SNGAR 'DRIS YOD

PA DRAN TE, SNGA MA BOD DANG CHINGS YIG BZHAG PA DE TSO RGYUN MTHUD LAG LEN BSTAR ROGS

TZANG NAS KHRI ZLA BA DRUG BYAS, RGYAL PO GSAR PA YON TZUNG KHRIR 'KHOD PA'I SKABS DANG,

BDAG RAL PA CAN KHRIR PHEBS PA BCAS LA RGYA BOD GNYIS KA NAS SKU TSAB MI SNA PHAR TSUR

CHED BTANG GIS GSHEGS PA'I SEMS GSO DANG, GSAR PA KHRI PHEBS LA KHRI SKYES

LEGS 'BUL 'BUL RES BCAS BYAS PAR BRTEN, PHAN TSUN 'BREL BA JE CHE DANG,

BYA RGYU'I SGO DOD CING, DBON ZHANG ZHES PA NI, RGYA MI'I SKAD LA, SHANG CI'U ZER BA, SNGAR
