@208 BTANG 'DUG ,YI GE DE TSO TSANG MAR BSNGAGS BRJOD DANG, GZENGS BSTOD CHEN

PO'I YIG BZOS DANG, DPE YANG KHYAD MTSAR PO, SKABS RE TSIG 'JAM PO

DANG, SKABS RE TSIG RTZUB PO YANG 'DUG PA DANG, PHYAG RTAGS KYANG RGYA CHEN PO

PHUL BA BCAS YI GE TSANG MA TSOGS CHE BAS 'DIR YIG DON SNYING PO BTUS TE BRIS YOD,

YI GE DANG PO NI, BOD KYI NANG BLON CHEN PO BRAN KA DPAL GYI YON TAN LA BTANG BA,

RGYA BOD GNYIS DBON ZHANG GI 'BREL BA YAG TU GTONG THABS LA KHYED NAS DGONGS BZHES

GNANG BA LTAR, NGA TSOS KYANG DE LA SNYING NAS MOS MTHUN ZHU BZHIN YOD, PHAN TSUN

GNYIS KA CHINGS YIG GSAR PA 'JOG RGYU'I RGYAL SGO PHYE BA LTA BUR, SNGON LA BOD PAS

BAR LAM DBANG 'DZIN BYAS PA'I RGYA NAG GIS CHA CIN CHA'O DANG, YUN CHA'O, AAN LO

CHA'O GSUM PHYIR SPROD GNANG ROGS ZHU RGYU DANG, SPYI LO 787 LOR CHINGS GROS BYED

SA NAS 'JUS PA'I SKU TSAB CEN SHU CU'U DANG, LU'U PA YE GNYIS NAS, NGA TSOS

SHES GSAL SHU CU'U GRONGS TSAR BA DANG, LU'U PA YE GSON POR YOD 'DUG PA SHI

BA'I RUS PA DANG, 'TSO BSDAD NGO MA BCAS NGA TSOR RTZIS SPROD GNANG ROGS ZHES BRIS 'DUG,

YI GE GNYIS PA DE, SA MTSAMS LA BZHUGS PA ZHI DRAG GNYIS

KYI SPYI KHYAB ZHANG CHE BTZAN LA PHUL BA'I YI GE'I RDO DON, NGA TSO DANG MNYAM DU MTHUN

'BREL NGO MA GNANG 'DOD YOD NA, SA MTSAMS GSAR PA ZHIG LA SA RTAGS RGYAG

DGOS, LHAG PAR RNYOG KHRA YOD PA'I SA CHA GSUM PO DE TSO TSANG MA SLOG DGOS, DE

MA BSLOGS BAR SA MTSAMS GSAR PA'I RTAGS KYANG RGYAG MI THUB, DON RTZA CHUNG NGUR

MKHREGS BZUNG GNANG NA RGYA CHEN PO DANG, RGYUN RING PO'I LAS DON YANG CHUD ZOS 'GRO

RGYU, LUNG PI CI BTZAN GDONG PHYAG BRIS 'BYOR BYUNG, CHINGS DON GAL PO CHE LA BRTEN

@209 PAS ZHIB TSAGS BYAS BA TE LTA DGOS LA SONG, DUS YUN RING TZAM 'GOR SONG YANG,

DA CHA KHONG TSO MNYAM DU 'DI GA'I NGO TSAB GNYIS BCAS GTONG GI YOD, SHU'U CU'U DANG,

LU'U PA YE'I RO SGAM DANG, DE BYINGS 'TSO BSDAD RNAMS 'BYOR BYUNG, DON DAG GZHAN

PA'I SKOR GONG NAS BTZAN PO LA PHYAG BRIS YOD PA DE'I NGO BSHUS SHIG KYANG 'DI NANG PHUL

BAR GZIGS ROGS, SNYAN ZHU DE TSO 'KHYER MKHAN LI'I THEN GTONG GI YOD, KHONG

RANG ZHIB 'JUG LAS KHUNGS KYI GTZO 'DZIN GZHON PA YIN, KHONG GI GDONG PHYAG RTAGS

KYANG PHUL YOD, CES GSAL BA LTAR, LAS DON GAL CHE RNAMS RGYA BOD KYI RGYAL PO

RNAMS GNYIS THAD KAR YIG 'BREL GNANG GI YOD 'DUG PA DANG, YI GE SNGON MA'I

NANG LA BLTAS NA, BOD PAS GSON BZUNG BYAS PA'I RGYA DPON SHU'I CU'U GRONGS PA'I

RUS PA DANG, LU'U PA YE NGO MA RTZIS SPROD DGOS ZHES 'KHOD KYANG, YI GE GNYIS

PA'I NANG LA GNYIS KA GRONGS PA'I RO SGAM DANG, DE BYINGS 'TSO BSDAD RNAMS 'BYOR

ZHES 'KHOD 'DUG,

YI GE GSUM PA NI, THA'O ZER BA'I SA CHAR BOD KYI DRAG PO'I SPYI KHYAB

GUNG LUNG LA BTANG BA'I YI GE'I SNYING DON, KHYED KYIS GLO BUR DRI BA DANG, CHO MED

KYI RNAM 'GYUR STON STANGS DE LA GA-YO SGYU CUNG ZAD MED DAM, RTZVA KHA YANG YANG MER

BSREGS GTONG BA GANG GI DON YIN GSUNGS PAR, RTZVA KHA RNYING PA MER BSREGS

GTONG BA 'CHAR CAN YIN, YANG KHYED KYIS SA MTSAMS KHRIS LAS SRUNG BAS

RTZIG PA BRGYAB PA DE GANG GI CHED DU YIN GSUNGS PAR, RTZIG PA DE RGYA MIS

BRTZIGS PA YIN LA, RTZIG PA DE RGYA MI'I SA CHA'I SGANG LA BRTZIGS YOD CES DANG,

KHYED KYIS GZHI RTEN MED PA'I DOGS PA BZOS NA RNYOG KHRA LANG RGYUR, THAG RING PO'I

@210 DGONGS BZHES GNANG ROGS, YANG KHYED KYIS GSUNGS GSAL, RGYA MI'I MI SER

GYIS YANG YANG NGO LOG RGYAG GI YOD PA DE THAD, NYE CHAR SU'U DANG, SHU'I MI NGAN

SDOD MA TSUGS KHA SHAS KYIS NGO LOG BRGYAB YOD PA DANG, DE TSO DA LTA NGA TSOS GNON

THUB MA SONG YANG, GONG MA'I SHUGS TZAM MA STON PA'I THOG NAS ZING CHA DE RTZA MED BZO THUB PA BYED KYI YIN, BOD NAS DMAG ROGS ZHU RTZIS MED, NGA CUNG LA YEN SA

MTSAMS 'DIR MA NOR BAR BSKO GZHAG GNANG ZHING, NGA RANG RGYA NAG GI DMAG DPON

NANG LA SKAD GRAGS YOD PA ZHIG MIN RUNG, RGYA NAG GI NANG LA MI 'BYON THANG CAN RTZA BA

NAS MED PA YANG MIN, NGAS KHYED LA THAD KAR 'DI LTAR ZHUS PA DE NI KHYED KYI THUGS

DOGS SEL CHED YIN, PHAN TSUN MTHUN LAM BZANG DU GTONG BA'I PHYIR DANG, 'BYUNG

'GYUR ZHI BDE'I 'CHAR GZHI LEGS PO BZO THUB PA'I DON DU, KHYED NGA GNYIS PHYOGS

SO SO NAS SHUGS NUS STON THUB PA SHOG ,CES BRIS 'DUG ,DE DUS BOD PHYOGS

NAS RGYA MI'I MI SER NGO LOG PA MTHAR SKROD GTONG RGYUR BOD NAS ROGS RAM DGOS MIN

DRI BA ZHIG BYAS MED DAM SNYAM PA 'DUG,

YI GE BZHI PA NI, THA'O KHUL GYI SPYI KHYAB LUNG BTZAN PO LA PHUL BA

'DI LTAR, KHYED KYI PHYAG BRIS DANG, PHYAG RTAGS 'BYOR BAS DGA' PO BYUNG, KHYED

KYI BTZAN POS ZHI BA'I DON GCOD PA GTONG GNANG MDZAD PA BZHIN, GONG MAS NGA TSOR

YANG BOD PHYOGS SU ZHI BDE'I NGANG LA GNAS THABS ZHU DGOS KYI BKA' PHEBS BYUNG, TANG

KHUD PA TSOS MGO GNYIS MA BYED KYI YOD PA DE KHYED TSOS MKHYEN GYI AE YOD, NGA TSOS SHES

GSAL LTAR NA KHO TSOS KHYED TSO BSLU THABS BYED KYI MED DAM, BYED KYI MED DAM SNYAM PA

'DUG ,GNAS TSUL GSAL PO 'GA' SHAS 'DUG KYANG, 'DI NANG TSANG MA ZHU MI THUB,

@211 KHO TSO'I DMAG BYUS NGA TSOS SHES KYI YOD, DA LAM NGAS KHYED LA ZHU RGYU NI, TANG KHUD

DU PHEBS SKABS, SU LA'ANG DBU MA 'KHOR BA GNANG ROGS ZHU RGYU DANG, KHO TSOS

DGONGS SEL ZHUS NA DGONGS PA MA DVANGS BA ZHIG KYANG GNANG ROGS ZHU RGYU, NGA TSO

PHYOGS GNYIS KA'I MTHUN LAM MED PAR 'GRO RGYUR, SA GZHI SNYOMS PO'I THOG LA

GOM PA SPO GNANG GIS, LAM PHYOGS RDUGS POR MA PHEBS PA'I RE BA ZHU BZHIN YOD,

PHAN TSUN ROGS RAM THOG NAS MNYAM 'BREL ZHU BA MA GTOGS, NGA TSOS BOD PAR GYONG

GANG 'DRA ZER GTONG THUB KYI RED, NGA TSOS BOD PA'I SA NAS KHE BZANG GANG 'DRA ZER ZA

SHES KYI RED, 'DI 'DRA'I MNO BSAM GTONG DU 'JUG PA DE NI NGO TSA BA ZHIG RED, RGYA

NAG LHO NUB DANG, LHO PHYOGS SU NGO LOG YOD PA DE TSO'I THAD LA, NGA TSOS BOD PA'I

SA NAS ROGS RAM ZHU 'DOD MED, YANG BSKYAR ZHU RGYUR, KHYED KYIS AUR GAR DRAG

PO'I DON GCOD PA GTONG GNANG LA RGYAL PHAM GANG 'DRA BYUNG YOD DAM, MDZAD DKA'

MED NA DE SKOR NYAN 'DOD YOD, PHYAG BRIS PHEBS GSAL, AUR GA'I BRTZON PA'I

SKOR LA, SNGON CHAD BYUNG MA MYONG BA'I LAS DON GSAR PA DANG, DE'I SKOR NGA TSO'I

GONG NAS BKA' GANG YANG MED STABS, NGAS RANG BZHIN BDAG NYAR MA THUB PAR KHO

TSOR LOG RGYUGS ZHES BRJOD PA YIN, KHO TSO SA MTSAMS SU 'BYOR SKABS ZHIB

'JUG GNANG ROGS, KHO TSO'I GDONG PHYAG RTAGS GZHUNG KHRA DANG BCAS PHUL YOD,

CES 'KHOD 'JUG ,TANG KHUD PA ZER BA 'DI RNAMS MTSO SNGON PO'I BYANG PHYOGS DANG,

NYING SH'A LHO PHYOGS KHUL SDOD PA TANG KHUD MI NAG GAM, BOD MI NAG ZER BA'I BOD RIGS

MI NYAG PA RNAMS YIN ZHING, RJES SU JING GE SE KH'AN SKABS GTONG TE TSO KHAG GNYIS

SU GYES NAS, TSO KHAG CIG KHAMS DAR RTZE MDO DANG NYE BA'I KHAMS MI NYAG CES PA DE

@212 TSO YIN PAR GRAGS SO, ,YI GE 'DI TSO'I BABS LA BLTAS NA, DE SKABS RGYA NAG

NANG LA NGO LOG YOD PA RNAMS GNON RGYU'I CHED DU BOD NAS DRAG PO'I ROGS RAM DGOS

MIN DPUNG NGOMS YANG YANG BYED KYI YOD PA'I RTAGS THON GYI 'DUG ,SKABS DE'I DUS

AUR GZHES SOG PO'I PHYOGS SU'ANG DMAG CIG RGYAG GI YOD PA'I RNAM PA GSAL PO

'DUG ,'ON KYANG BOD PHYOGS NAS YI GE DE DAG LA LAN 'PHRIN GANG 'DRA ZHIG BTANG BA

GSAL PO MA SHES PAS, LO RGYUS LA DO SNANG CAN RNAMS NAS YIG CHA 'DI GRAS KHUNGS

DAG 'TSEL ZHIB LA 'BAD RTZOL GNANG ROGS ZHU RGYU,

GONG GI YI GE DANG, BRTZON PA RTZIS SPROD SOGS LO 'KHOR GNYIS

LHAG TZAM GYI 'BREL BA DANG, RGYA BOD KYI CHOS PA TSOS ZHI BA'I MTHUN 'GYUR BCAS BYAS

PA'I NYER LEN GYIS SA MTSAMS GU GU RME RUR ZHI DRAG DPON RIGS KHAG TSANG 'DZOMS KYIS

BKA' MOL ZHIB LHINGS GNANG BA'I 'BRAS BUR, BOD KYI BTZAN PO (RGYAL PO) MNGA'

BDAG KHRI RAL PA CAN RGYAL KHRIR PHEBS NAS LO DGU, RGYA NAG GI RGYAL PO SHUN SHU HE'U

TIG (SA YE TZUNG) RGYA RGYAL GYI KHRIR 'KHOD NAS LO GSUM, CHU MO YOS LO'I ZLA 2

TSES 14 SPYI LO 823 LOR CHINGS BYAS TE PHAN TSUN GNYIS MOS BYUNG BA'I GNAS

TSUL RNAMS RGYA BOD GNYIS KA'I YIG THOG BRIS TE RDO RING LA BRKOS NAS, SA MTSAMS

GU GU RME RUR RDO RING GCIG ,BOD KYI RGYAL SA LHA SA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG GI MDUN DU RDO RING

GCIG ,RGYA'I RGYAL SA C'A RNGAN GYI PHO BRANG KENG SHI'I MDUN DU RDO RING GCIG BCAS BCUGS

PA'I LHA SA'I RDO RING GI SHAR NGOS SU, ` 'PHRUL GYI LHA BTZAN PO KHRI GTZUGS LDE

BTZAN DANG, RGYA RJE BUN BU HE'U TIG H'ANG DE GNYIS CHAB SRID GCIG TU MOL TE MJAL

DUMS MDZAD PA'I TSE, BOD RGYA GNYIS KYI TSUL CI 'DRA BA DANG, MJAL DUMS MDZAD

@213 PA'I GTAN TSIGS RDO RING LA BRIS PA'O, ,'PHRUL GYI LHA BTZAN PO 'OD LDE SPU RGYAL,

YUL BYUNG, SA DOD TSUN CHAD, GDUNG MA 'GYUR BAR BOD KYI RGYAL PO CHEN PO MDZAD

PA YANG, GANGS RI MTHON PO'I NI NGOGS, CHU BO CHEN PO'I NI 'GO, YUL MTHO,

SA GTZANG, ZHES, GNAM GYI LHA LAS MI'I RGYAL POR GSHEGS TE, GTZUG LAG

CHEN POS NI YUN GYI SRID BTZUGS, CHOS KHRIMS BZANG PO NI MI'I LUGS BSRANG,

BYAMS PA'I BKA' DRIN GYIS NI NANG GI TSIS SBYAR, DGRA THABS MKHAS PAS NI PHYI'I

DGRA BTUL TE, CHAB SRID NI PHYIR ZHENG CHE, DBU RMOG NI SLAR ZHING BTZAN PAS NAM

ZHAR GTZUG MI 'GYUR, BYIN MI NYAMS PA'I GA-YUNG DRUNG GI RGYAL PO CHEN PO YIN, DE'I

PHYIR, LHO PHYOGS KYI RGYA GAR DANG, NUB PHYOGS KYI RA ZHIG DANG, BYANG PHYOGS KYI

GRU GU NO RMEL LA SOGS PA, GA-YAS GA-YON GYI RGYAL PO SDE CHEN POR BYA BA KUN KYANG,

'PHRUL GYI LHA BTZAN PO'I DBU RMOG BTZAN PO DANG, LUGS BZANG PO LA MI PHYOGS MI

GUS PA NI MED DE, PHAN TSUN DGYES SHING, BKA' STZAL DA TO COG NYAN PA YIN,

SHAR PHYOGS NA RGYA 'DUG PA, PHYI'I RGYA MTSO CHEN PO'I BAR, NYI MA SHAR LOGS KYI

RGYAL PO STE, LHO BAL GZHAN DANG MI 'DRA BAR, SRID DANG LUGS BZANG, GTZUG

LAG CHE BAS, BOD DANG YANG 'THAB KYI ZLA, GNYEN GYI SDE, DANG POR RGYA RJE LI RGYAL

SAR BZHUGS NAS, 'PHRUL GYI LHA BTZAN PO KHRI SRONG BTZAN DANG, RGYA RJE THE'I RDZUNG

BU SHENG HVANG DE GNYIS CHAB SRID GCIG TU MOL NAS, CANG KVAN GYI LO LA, KUN SHENG

KONG CO BTZAN PO'I KHAB TU BLANGS, PHYIS 'PHRUL GYI LHA BTZAN PO KHRI LDE GTZUG BTZAN

DANG, RGYA RJE PA LANG KHA'I 'GRAN SHENG B'UN SHIN B'U HANG DE DANG CHAB SRID GCIG TU MOL TE,

GNYEN RTZOGS, KENG LUNG GI LO LA MA SHANG KONG CO BTZAN PO'I KHAB TU BLANGS NAS, DBON

@214 ZHANG DU GYUR TE DGYES PA LAS, BAR 'GA', PHAN TSUN SO SO'I BLON POS GNOD BA

DAG BRDUL GYIS KYANG, GNYEN PA'I CHAB GANG DU BYA BA, THUGS DKYEL CHEN PO DAG

GI TSE, DMAG STONG GIS PHAN THOGS PAR BYAS PA DANG, PHAN TSUN THUGS NONGS BYUNG NGO

COG LA, DGYES GNANG DAG KYANG MA CHAD PAR BSRINGS TE, 'DI LTAR NYE ZHING GNYEN

PA YIN NA, DBON ZHANG GI TSUL KHO LA LTAR THUGS YID MA PHEBS PA LAS, BTZAN

PO YAB LHA 'PHRUL KHRI LDE SRONG BTZAN GYI ZHAL SNGA NAS, BSGAM DKYEL CHEN POS NI PHYI

NANG MED PAR PHYOGS BRGYAD KHYAB STE, MTHA' BZHI'I RGYAL PO KUN DANG YANG, MJAL

ZHING 'DUN PAR MDZAD NA, RGYA LA LTA ZHIG, GNYEN BRTZEGS MA YIN PAS, LHAG

PAR CHAB SRID GCIG TU DGYES TE, PHAN TSUN DBON ZHANG DGONGS PA MTHUN NAS, RGYA

RJE ZHENG SHING BUN B'U HANG TE DANG MJAL DUMS SU MOL TE, BKA' 'KHON RNYING PA NI

SBYANGS SHING BSAL, DGYES PA GSAR PA NI SLAR ZHING BSDUR, DE TSUN CHAD

BTZAN PO DBON NI SKU TSE GCIG ,RGYA RJE ZHANG NI GDUNG RAB GSUM GYI BAR DU, BKA'

'KHON GYI GCUGS PA NI MA BYUNG, DGYES PA'I SRI ZHU NI PHAN TSUN PHRAD DE, PHO NYA

CES PA LAS, BKA' 'PHRIN SNYAN PA DANG, DKON NOR BZANG POS NI RGYUN DU 'GRUL

NA; MJAL DUMS KYI MDO CHEN PO GTZIGS PA BCA BA YANG MA GRUB, DBON ZHANG MOL

BA'I RJES KYANG TSAR MA PHYIN PAR THUGS NONGS KYI STZAL TE, BAR GYI GCUGS RNYING PA

PHRAN TSOGS KYI DOGS 'PHRIG GIS LEGS PA CHEN PO'I SKU DON PHYI LCIG SHE DAG TU GYUR

NAS, DGRA CHOS KYI THABS DANG, DMAG BTZAN PO DAG KYANG MI BRTUL DU MA RUNG STE,

DGRA ZUN GYI TSUL DU GYUR GYIS KYANG, YONG NYE ZHING GNYEN LA, 'PHRUL GYI LHA BTZAN

PO KHRI GTZUG LDE BTZAN GYI ZHAL SNGA NAS, MKHYEN PA NI 'PHRUL GYI TSUL CHAGS, MDZAD

@215 PA NI LHA'I LUGS DANG MTHUN TE, BKA' DRIN CHEN POS PHYI NANG GNYIS SU SNYOMS

SHING, DBU RMOG BTZAN, BKA' LUNG GNYAN TE, RGYA RJE B'UN BU HE'U TIG HVANG DE

DANG DBON ZHANG GNYIS, 'PHRUL GYI DGONGS PA NI MTHUN, LEGS PA'I CHAB SRID

NI GCIG STE, BOD RGYA GNYIS RABS KHRIR, BDE ZHING SKYID PA'I MJAL DUMS CHEN

PO MDZAD NAS, RGYAL YUL DU NI KENG SHI'I NUB PHYOGS, SANG SHI'I DRUNG DU, BOD

CHEN PO'I LO'I MING, SKYID RTAG LO NI MNGA' BDAG RAL PA CAN RGYAL KHRIR PHEBS LO DE YIN ZHES

BOD RJE LHA BTZAN PO'I GDUNG RABS TSIG NYUNG DON GSAL NANG GSAL BA MA ZAD,

(LI FANG-KUEI, P.4) NANG LA'ANG GSAL 'DUG GO, LO BDUN, RGYA CHEN PO'I LO'I MING, CANG KENG

LO DANG PO, LCAGS MO GLANG GI LO'I DGUN ZLAR BA'I TSES BCU LA, DKYIL 'KHOR

LA 'DZEGS TE RGYAS GTZIGS GZUNG NGO, ,BOD YUL DU NI, PHO BRANG LHA SA'I SHAR

PHYOGS, SBRA STOD TSAL DU, BOD CHEN PO'I LO'I MING, SKYID RTAG LO BRGYAD, RGYA

CHEN PO'I LO'I MING, CANG KENG LO GNYIS, CHU PHO STAG GI LO'I DBYAR ZLA 'BRING PO'I

TSES DRUG LA, DKYIL 'KHOR LA 'DZEGS TE, BOD KYIS GTZIGS GZUNG NGO, ,

GTZIGS KYI RDO RINGS LA BRIS PA 'DI YANG, BOD CHEN PO'I LO'I MING, SKYID RTAG LO

DGU, RGYA CHEN PO'I LO'I MING, CANG KENG LO GSUM, CHU MO YOS KYI LO'I DPYID

ZLA 'BRING PO'I TSES BCU BZHI LA, RDO RINGS LA YI GER BRIS SO, ,RDO RINGS 'DI

'BRI BA'I SPYAN YANG, RGYA'I PHO NYA THABS CUNG SHING YOD PA DE TZE'O DANG, THABS TZAN

SHAN DE B'U YOD PA, LI KRI'U LA SOGS PAS BYAS SO, ,GTZIGS KYI RDO RINGS 'DI

'DRA CIG ,RGYA'I YUL KENG SHIR YANG GTZUGS SO,,

@216 'DI'I BRJOD BYA 'GA' SHAS GO DKA' BAS CUNG ZAD GO BDER

BRIS PA, ` SPRUL PA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO KHRI GTZUG LDE BTZAN (RAL PA CAN) DANG,

RGYA RJE BUN B'U HE'U TIG HANG DE (SA YON TZUNG) GNYIS CHAB SRID GCIG TU MOL TE MJAL

'DUM MDZAD PA'I TSE, BOD RGYA GNYIS DA LTA'I GNAS TSUL DANG BSTUN TE MOS MTHUN

BYUNG BA'I DON GNAD RDO RING LA BRIS PA'O,, ` SPRUL PA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO 'OD LDE

SPU RGYAL (GNY'A KHRI BTZAN PO) DUS NAS, BOD YUL BYUNG STE, RIGS RGYUD

NYAMS PA MED PA BOD KYI RGYAL PO MDZAD PA YANG, GANGS RI MTHON PO'I 'GRAM, CHU

PO CHEN PO'I 'GO, BSIL ZHING SA GTZANG BA'I LHA'I YUL NAS MI'I RGYAL POR PHEBS

TE; MKHAS PA'I YON TAN GYIS NI RGYANG RING POR GZIGS SHING, CHOS DANG MTHUN

PA'I KHRIMS LUGS BZANG POS SKYE RGU'I LAM STON, BYAMS PA'I BKA' DRIN GYIS NI YONGS SU BSKYANGS, DGRA THABS LA MKHAS PAS PHYI'I DGRA RNAMS BRTUL, CHAB SRID

NI JE RGYAS JE 'PHEL DANG, STOBS DANG 'BYOR PA NAM YANG MA NYAMS PAR RTAG TU BRTAN

PA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO YIN GSHIS, DES NA, LHO PHYOGS KYI RGYA GAR DANG, NUB PHYOGS

KYI RA ZHIG (AA RAB) BYANG PHYOGS KYI GRU GU NEL MOL (SHAR TUR KI SI THAN) LA SOGS

PA GA-YAS GA-YON NYE 'GYANGS KYI RGYAL KHAB KUN NAS KYANG, SPRUL PA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO'I

MNGA' THANG DANG, LUGS SROL BZANG POR MI GUS PA MED PAS, PHAN TSUN SEMS

DGA' BAS BKA' STZAL BA NYAN NO, ,SHAR PHYOGS NA RGYA NAG RGYAL PO YOD PA, DE NI

PHYI'I RGYA MTSO CHEN PO'I BAR NYI MA SHAR PHYOGS KYI RGYAL PO STE, LHO BAL SOGS GZHAN

DANG MI 'DRA BAR, MDZAD SPYOD BZANG, SHES BYA'I GNAD LA'ANG MKHAS PAS, BOD

DANG DGRA YA BYED THUB PA DANG, GNYEN YA YANG BYED THUB, DANG PO RGYA RJE LI RGYAL SAR

@217 BZHUGS NAS, SPRUL PA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO KHRI SRONG BTZAN (SRONG BTZAN SGAM PO) DANG,

RGYA RJE THE'I DZUNG BU SHENG HVANG DE GNYIS THUGS YID GCIG TU MTHUN NAS, CANG KVEN GYI LO

LA; KUN SHENG (MUN SHING) KONG CO BOD RJE'I BTZUN MOR BZHES, RJES SU SPRUL

PA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO KHRI LDE GTZUG BTZAN (MES AAG TSOM) DANG, RGYA RJE SA LANG KHA'I

'GRAN SHING B'UN SHIN B'U HVANG DE GNYIS DGONGS PA MTHUN TE, GNYEN BYAS NAS, KENG

LUNG GI LO LA MA SHANG (CIN DRENG) KONG CO BOD RJE'I KHAB TU BZHES NAS, DBON ZHANG

DU GYUR TE MTHUN PAR GNAS TSE, BAR 'GA', PHAN TSUN SO SO'I BLON PO'I BYED LAS

KYIS MTHUN LAM LA GNOD PA'I RKYEN BYUNG YANG, DGONGS PA ZAB BRLING CHE BAS DMAG

STONG GIS PHAN THOGS BYAS PA DANG, PHAN TSUN NOR 'KHRUL BYUNG RIM BZHIN SKYON SEL YANG

BAR MA CHAD PAR GNANG BA, 'DI LTA BU'I GNYEN NYE BA YIN NA, DBON ZHANG RANG BZHIN

THUGS LA MI 'JUG PA LAS, BTZAN PO'I YAB KHRI LDE SRONG BTZAN (SAD NA LEGS)

DGONGS PA MKHYEN RLABS CHE BA'I SNYAN GRAGS PHYI NANG KUN LA KHYAB STE, MTHA' BZHI'I RGYAL

PO KUN DANG YANG MJAL ZHING 'DUMS PAR MDZAD NA, RGYA NAG LA NGES PAR GNANG DGOS

TE; SNGA RJES GNYEN DANG 'BREL BA MA ZAD, MDZAD PA MTHUN ZHING, PHAN TSUN DBON

ZHANG DGONGS PA MTHUN NAS, RGYA RJE ZHENG SHING BUN B'U HVANG DE DANG MTHUN LAM YAG PO BYUNG

STE; 'KHON 'DZIN RNYING PA RNAMS MED PAR BZOS, MTHUN LAM GSAR PA CHAGS TE,

DE TSUN CHAD DBON PO BOD RGYAL PO'I SKU TSE'I BAR DANG, ZHANG PO RGYA NAG RGYAL PO'I GDUNG

RABS GSUM GYI BAR DU, 'KHON RTZOD RIGS MA BYUNG ZHING, PHAN TSUN MTHONGS DANG,

MTHUN LAM SKU TSAB GDONG, SNYAN PO'I ZHU YIG DANG, DKON NOR GYI PHYAG RTAGS

RGYUN DU 'BUL RES MDZAD KYANG, GROS CHINGS BZO BA NI MA BYUNG BAS, DBON ZHANG

@218 GNYIS KYIS MA 'GRUB PA'I LAS KA BYUNG BA DES, BAR LAM 'KHON 'DZIN RNYING PA

PHRAN BU LANGS PA'I RKYEN GYIS MDZAD PA BZANG PO'I PHYAG RIS PHYI BSHOL KHO NAR GYUR

PAS, DGRA 'THAB DANG, DMAG 'KHRUG KYANG LAN MANG PO BYUNG STE MI BDE BA CHEN

PO YONG NYE YANG, SPRUL PA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO KHRI GTZUG LDE BTZAN (RAL PA CAN) NI,

SPRUL PA LTA BU'I MKHYEN PA RGYAS SHING, LHA'I LUGS DANG MTHUN PA'I MDZAD SPYOD BZANG

PO'I BKA' DRIN PHYI NANG TSANG MAR KHYAB CING, DBU 'PHANG MTHO, BKA' GNYAN

PAS, RGYA RJE BUN BU HE'U TIG HVANG DE (SA YON TZUNG) DANG, DBON ZHANG GNYIS

CHAB SRID SKOR LA DGONGS PA MTHUN TE, BOD RGYA GNYIS MI RABS KHRI PHRAG BAR, BDE

ZHING SKYID PA'I MTHUN SGRIG BZANG PO MDZAD NAS, RGYA NAG GI YUL DU, PHO BRANG KENG

SHI'I NUB PHYOGS, SANG SHI'I MDUN DU, BOD CHEN PO'I LO'I MING SKYID RTAGS ZHES,

BOD RJE RAL PA CAN BOD RGYAL GYI KHRIR PHEBS NAS LO BDUN, RGYA NAG PO'I LO'I MING CANG

KENG ZHES, RGYA RJE B'UN BU HE'U TIG RGYA RGYAL GYI KHRIR PHEBS NAS LO DANG PO, LCAGS MO

GLANG LO'I ZLA BA BCU PA'I TSES BCU NYIN TSOGS 'DU MDZAD DE, RGYA RNAMS KYIS GSHAM

GSAL CHINGS DON LA YID MTHUN BYAS SO, ,BOD KYI YUL DU NI, LHA SA'I PHO BRANG GI

SHAR PHYOGS, SBRA STOD TSAL DU, BOD CHEN PO'I LO'I MING SKYID RTAGS ZHES, BOD

RJE RAL PA CAN BOD RGYAL GYI KHRIR PHEBS NAS LO BRGYAD, RGYA CHEN PO'I LO'I MING CANG

KENG ZHES, RGYA RJE BUN BU HE'U TIG RGYA RGYAL GYI KHRIR PHEBS NAS LO GNYIS PA, CHU PHO

STAG LO'I ZLA BA LNGA PA'I TSES DRUG NYIN TSOGS 'DU MDZAD DE, BOD PA RNAMS KYIS

GSHAM GSAL CHINGS DON LA YID MTHUN BYAS SO, ,CHINGS DON RDO RING LA BRIS PA 'DI

YANG, BOD CHEN PO'I LO'I MING SKYID RTAGS ZHES, BOD RJE RAL PA CAN BOD KYI RGYAL

@219 KHRIR PHEBS NAS LO DGU, RGYA CHEN PO'I LO'I MING, CANG KENG ZHES, RGYA RJE B'UN

BU HE'U TIG RGYA RGYAL GYI KHRIR PHEBS NAS LO GSUM PA, CHU MO YOS KYI LO'I ZLA BA GNYIS

PA'I TSES BCU BZHI NYIN RDO RING LA YI GE BRIS TE BRKOS SO, ,

YANG, RDO RING GI NUB NGOS SU, ` BOD KYI RGYAL PO 'PHRUL GYI

LHA BTZAN PO DANG, RGYA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO RGYA RJE HVANG DE, DBON ZHANG GNYIS CHAB SRID

GCIG TU MOL NAS, MJAL DUMS CHEN PO MDZAD CING, GTZIGS BCAS PA, NAM

ZHAR YANG MI 'GYUR, LHA MI KUN GYIS SHES SHING DPANG BYAS TE, TSE TSE RABS RABS

SU; BRJOD YOD, ZHIR RTZIGS KYI MING, RDO RINGS LA BRIS PA'O,, ` 'PHRUL GYI

LHA BTZAN PO KHRI GTZUG LDE BTZAN GYI ZHAL SNGA NAS, RGYA RJE B'UN B'U HE'U TIG HVANG DE, 'PHRUL

DBON ZHANG GNYIS, BSGAM DKYEL CHEN POS NI, 'PHRAL YUN GNYIS KYI LEGS

NYES CI YANG MKHYEN, THUGS RJE CHEN POS NI, BKA' DRIN GYIS DGAB PA LA PHYI NANG

MED PAS, MANG PO KUN BDE ZHING SKYID PAR BYA BA LA NI DGONGS PA GCIG, YUN RING

POR LEGS PA'I DON CHEN PO LA NI BKA' GROS MTHUN TE, GNYEN PA'I SRI ZHU NI BSDUD,

KHYIM MTSES DGYES PA'I TSANG KHA NI RTZEG MAR MOL NAS, MJAL DUMS CHEN PO MDZAD DE,

BOD RGYA GNYIS, DA LTAR SU MNGA' BA'I YUL DANG MTSAMS BSRUNG ZHING, DE'I SHAR

PHYOGS THAMS CAD RGYA CHEN PO'I YUL, NUB PHYOGS THAMS CAD NI, YANG DAG PAR

BOD CHEN PO'I YUL TE, DE LAS PHAN TSUN DGRAR MI 'THAB, DMAG MI DRANG, YUL

GYI MI MANGS RNAMS YID MI CHES PA ZHIG YOD NA, MI GZUNG ZHING, GTAM DRIS TE,

PHYIR BTANG NGO, ,CHAB SRID GCIG CING, MJAL DUMS CHEN PO 'DI LTAR MDZAD PAS,

DBON ZHANG DGYES PA'I BKA' PHRIN SNYAN PAS KYANG 'DUL DGOS TE, PHAN TSUN GYI PHO NYA

@220 'DONG BA YANG, LAM RNYING PAR BYUNG NA, SNGAR LUGS BZHIN BOD RGYA GNYIS KYI BAR,

TZANG KUN YOG TU RTA RJES LA, RTZING ZHUNG CHEG TU RGYA DANG 'PHRAD PA MAN CHAD NI RGYAS PHU

DUD BYA, RTZENG SHU HYAN DU PHRAD PA YAN CHAD NI, BOD KYIS PHU DUD BYA STE, DBON

ZHANG NYE ZHING GNYEN PA'I TSUL BZHIN DU, SRI ZHU DANG BKUR STI'I LUGS YOD PAR SBYAR

TE; YUL GNYIS KYI BAR NA DUD BRDUL MI SNANG, GLO BUR DU DNGANG BA DANG, DGRA'I

MING MI GRAG STE, SA MTSAMS BSRUNG BA'I MI DANG YANG, DOGS SHING 'JIGS PA

MED PAR, SA MAL NA BAG BRKYANG STE, BDE BAR 'KHOD CING, SKYID PA'I BKA'

DRIN NI RABS KHRI'I BAR DU THOB, SNYAN PA'I SGRA SKAD NI GNYI ZLAS SLEBS SO COG TU KHYAB

STE; BOD BOD YUL NA SKYID, RGYA RGYA YUL NA SKYID PA'I SRID CHEN PO SBYAR NAS, RTZIGS

BCAS PA 'DI, NAM ZHAR MI 'GYUR BAR, ` DKON MCHOG GSUM DANG, 'PHAGS

PA RNAMS DANG, NYI ZLA DANG, GZA' SKAR LA YANG DPANG DU GSOL TE, THA TSIG

RNAMS KYANG BSHAD, SROG CHAGS BSAD DE, MNA' YANG BOR NAS, RTZIGS BCAS

SO; ;RTZIGS 'DI BZHIN DU MA BYAS SAM, ,BSHIG NA, BOD RGYA GNYIS GANG GIS SNGAR

NYES PA LA BSDIG CING, LAN DU BSKU SGYU BYAS KYANG RTZIGS BSHIG PA LA MA GTOGS SO,,

'DI LTAR BOD RGYA GNYIS KYI RJE BLON GYI ZHAL GYIS GSHEGS, MNA' BOR, RTZIGS KYI YI

GE ZHIB MOR BRIS NAS RGYAL PO CHEN PO GNYIS KYIS NI PHYAG RGYAS BTAB, BLON PO RTZIGS

'DZIN PA LA GTOGS PA RNAMS KYIS NI LAG YIG TU BRIS TE, RTZIGS KYI YI GE SO SO'I

PHYAG RBAL DU BZHAG GO,

'DI BZHIN GAL GNAD CHE BAS BLO GSAR RNAMS NAS GO RTOGS BDE

PHYIR BRJOD DON CUNG ZAD GO BDER BRIS PA, ` BOD KYI SPRUL PA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO DANG,

@221 RGYA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO RGYA HVANG DE DBON ZHANG GNYIS, CHAB SRID KYI SKOR LA, ZHI BA'I

CHINGS SGRIG MDZAD RGYU DGONGS PA GCIG TU MTHUN PA DE DAG ,NAM DU YANG MI 'GYUR

BAR, LHA MI KUN GYIS SHES SHING DPANG PO BYAS TE, MI RABS NAS MI RABS KYI

BAR GTAM RGYUD BRJOD RGYU YONG BA'I PHYIR, CHOD DON GYI YI GE RDO RING LA BRIS PA'O, ,

` SPRUL PA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO KHRI GTZUG LDE BTZAN (RAL PA CAN) DANG, RGYA RJE

BUN BU HE'U TIG HVANG DE (SA YON TZUNG) DBON ZHANG GNYIS GCIG TU MOS NAS, BONG

RGYA PHAN TSUN GYI CHAB SRID LA LEGS NYES TSANG MAR GZIGS TE, THUGS RJE CHEN PO'I

DRIN GYIS PHYI NANG MED PAR KHYAB, MI MANG KUN BDE BA DANG, SKYID PA'I BYA BA LA NI

YUN RING PO NAS DGONGS PA MTHUN TE GNYEN PA'I SRI ZHU DANG, YUL KHYIM MTSES

MTHUN PA'I PHYIR SLAR YANG CHOD DON BYED PAR BKA' GNANG NAS, MJAL DUM CHEN

PO 'DI MDZAD CING, BOD RGYA GNYIS, DA LTA RANG RANG GI LAG TU YOD PA'I YUL DANG,

SA MTSAMS BSRUNG ZHING, DE'I SHAR PHYOGS THAMS CAD NI RGYA NAG GI YUL, NUB

PHYOGS THAMS CAD NI YANG DAG PA BOD CHEN PO'I YUL YIN PAS, DE LAS PHAR TSUR

DGRAR MI 'DZIN, DMAG MI DRANGS, YUL MI'I NANG LA YID MA CHES PA'I MI ZHIG

YONG NA, MI DE BZUNG ZHING GTAM DRIS TE PHYIR LOG TU BTANG NGO, ,BSAM GROS

GCIG MTHUN GYI MJAL DUM CHEN PO 'DI LTAR MDZAD PA'I MTHU LAS, DBON ZHANG

THUGS MTHUN PA'I PHAN TSUN GYI GTAM SNYAN DANG, SKYES BSKYAL BA'I 'GRUL MI RNAMS

LAM RNYING PA NAS BYUNG STE SNGAR LUGS BZHIN BOD RGYA GNYIS KYI BAR, TZANG KUN YOG TU

RTA RJES LA, ZHES PA 'DI BSAM DKA' YANG, 'OL TSOD TZAM BYAS NA, TZANG KUN

YOG CES GSER YIG PA'AM, MTHUN LAM GYI YI GE 'BUL MI'I BZHON RTA DANG, 'GEL

@222 KHAL, SDOD SGRIG SOGS GANG DGOS PA THAMS CAD, STZE ZHUNG CHEG CES PA'I

SA GNAS MAN RGYA DANG 'PHRAD PA MAN CHAD RGYAS SNE LEN BYED CING, RTZENG SHU HYAN ZHES

PA'I SA GNAS NAS BOD DANG 'PHRAD PA YAN CHAD BOD KYIS SNE LEN BYAS TE, DBON

ZHANG THUGS NYE ZHING, DGA' BA'I TSUL GYI SRI ZHU DANG, BKUR STI'I LUGS JI

YOD MDZAD CING, YUL CHEN PO GNYIS KYI BAR MI BDE BA RDUL TZAM MED PAR, GLO

BUR DU DNGANGS SKRAG YONG GZHI DANG, DGRA BYED PA'I MING TZAM MI GRAGS PAR RANG RANG

GI SA MTSAMS BSRUNGS TE, DOGS PA DANG, 'JIGS PA MED PAR SA MA MAL DU

BAG PHAB STE, BDE BAR GNAS SHING, SKYID PA'I BKA' DRIN NI MI RABS KHRI

PHRAG GI BAR DU THOB PA DANG, SNYAN PA'I GRAGS PA NI NYI ZLAS GAR SLEBS BAR KHYAB STE,

BOD MI RNAMS BOD KYI YUL DU SKYID PA DANG, RGYA MI RNAMS RGYA NAG GI YUL DU SKYID

PA'I CHED DU CHOD DON BYAS PA 'DI NAM YANG MI 'GYUR ZHING, MI BSHIG PA'I THABS

SU; DKON MCHOG GSUM DANG, 'PHAGS PA'I LHA NYI ZLA, GZA' SKAR LA

SOGS PA DPANG DU BTZUGS NAS, THA TSIG RNAMS KYANG BSGRAGS, SROG CHAGS

BSAD NAS MNA' YANG BOR TE CHOD DON BYAS SO, ,CHOS DON 'DI LA MA GNAS PAR

BSHIG NA, BOD RGYA GNYIS SUS SNGA 'GAL BYAS PA LA DKON MCHOG GIS CHAD PA GNANG

NAS, THABS SHES JI LTAR BYAS KYANG CHOD DON 'DI BSHIG MI CHOG GO ,'DI LTAR

BOD RGYA GNYIS KYI RGYAL PO DANG, BLON PO RNAMS NAS ZHAL CHAD DANG, MNA' BOR TE

CHOD DON GYI YI GE BRIS PA'O, ,DE LA RGYAL PO CHEN PO GNYIS KYIS PHYAG THAM PHAB BO, ,

DBANG CHA YOD PA'I BLON PO RNAMS KYIS LAG BRIS SU BYAS PA'I CHOD DON GYI YI GE RE YANG

RGYAL PO SO SO'I YIG TSANG DU BZHAG GO ,ZHES PA'I DON DANG, YANG RDO RING DE'I BYANG

@223 NGOS SU BOD KYI BLON PO CHEN PO MJAL 'DUM GYI GTZIGS 'DZIN PA LA GTOGS PA MI BCU

BDUN GYI LAS KA DANG, MING RUS RNAMS 'KHOD YOD CING, RDO RING DE'I LHO NGOS SU,

RGYA'I BLON PO CHEN PO MJAL 'DUM GYI GTZIGS 'DZIN PA LA GTOGS PA BCO BRGYAD KYI LAS

KA DANG, MING RUS LA SOGS PA BOD RGYA'I YI GE SHAN SBYAR DU BRKOS NAS YOD DO, ,

GONG GSAL RDO RING GA YIG KHAG GNYIS PO SHIN TU GAL GNAD CHE BAS,

NGA RANG LA LHA SA'I RDO RING NGO MA NAS BSHUS PA'I YIG CHA YOD KYANG, RDO RING BTZUGS TE

LO CHIG STONG BRGYA LHAG SONG BAS, YIG 'BRU 'GA' SHAS NYAMS 'DUG PAR KUR RTAGS

RE BKOD DE, RJES SU CHOS 'BYUNG DANG, RDO RING GI YIG CHA MTHONG NGO COG ,LHAG

PAR 'DAS LO 1914 SHING STAG SIM LA'I CHINGS SKABS RGYA NAG TU BCA' BZHUGS

DBYIN JI'I GZHUNG TSAB BRGYUD BYUNG BA, RGYA NAG CANG SNGAN (SHI'I RNGAN) DU YOD PA'I

RDO RING GI NGO BSHUS, GZHAN YANG PHYI RGYAL KHAG GI DEB KHAG RICHARDSON, PP. 244-245. FOR A COMPREHENSIVE STUDY OF

BOTH TIBETAN AND CHINESE VERSIONS OF THE TREATY, SEE

LI FANG-KUEI, "THE INSCRIPTION OF THE SINO-TIBETAN

TREATY OF 821-822", T'OUNG PAO, PP. 44, 1-3 (1956). KHAG THON PA'I YIG CHA

MANG POR GO BSDUR GYIS YIG 'BRU NYAMS PA RNAMS KHUNGS 'JUG THUB THABS 'BAD

BRTZON BYAS KYANG, BLO GDENGS 'KHEL PO ZHIG RANG MA BYUNG MUR, 'BRAS LJONGS

GDAN SA PA'I 'BA' NYAG AA MTHING MCHOG NAS SUS BRIS ZHAL GSAL MED PA'I RDO RING

KHAG GI YIG BSHUS SNGAR SNGA MO'I LAG BRIS MA, 'BRU SKYON GTAN NAS MED PA ZHIG

GA-YAR PO GNANG BYUNG BA DE GA'I GSHAM DU, DE LTAR NA RDO RING CHU YOS LO LA BTZUGS

@224 NAS, DA LTA'I CHU STAG BAR LO LNGA BRGYA DANG DGU BCU RTZA DGU 'GRO'O, ,ZHES RDO RING

NAS NGO BSHUS BYAS PA'I LO TSIGS KYANG 'KHOD 'DUG PAR BRTZIS PA'I TSE, YI GE DE RAB

BYUNG BDUN PA'I CHU STAG, SPYI LO 1422 LOR BRIS 'DUG PA, DA LTA'I RAB BYUNG

BCU DRUG PA'I SA SPRE, SPYI LO 1968 BAR LO LNGA BRGYA DANG BZHI BCU ZHE DRUG SONG BA'I

LAG BRIS MA'I YIG RNYING KHUNGS DAG DES YIG 'BRU NYAMS PA RNAMS KHUNGS SO SOR

THE TSOM DANG, DKA' TSEGS MED PAR BCUG CHOG PA ZHIG BYUNG BAR BRTEN SOM NYI'I DRA

BA YONGS SU CHOD CING, YID BRTON 'PHER NGES RTZA BA BRTAN PA GSER GYIS GZHI DANG

'DRA BA YIN PAS TSANG MAS BLOS 'GEL GNANG CHOG PA ZHIG YIN ZHING, RNYED PAR DKA'

BA'I YIG CHA DE LA BRTEN NAS NGAS SNGON BRJOD NANG DU'ANG GDAN SA PA'I 'BA' NYAG AA MTHING

LA DMIGS BSAL GYIS THUGS RJE CHE ZHES ZHUS PA'I GNAD DON DE LTAR LAGS SO, ,

DE LTAR BOD DANG, RGYA'I CHOS PA DANG, ZHI DRAG GI BLON PO BCAS

TSANG MA 'DZOMS NAS, RTA DANG, BONG BU DANG, SPRE'U LA SOGS PA'I SROG CHAGS

BSAD, DE DAG GI NANG KHROL RNAMS MDUN DU SPUNGS NAS BAN DE'AM, SNGAGS BON

ZHIG NAS CHO GA BTANG STE YUL DE'I LHA KLU GNYAN PO DANG, NYI ZLA, GZA' SKAR LA SOGS

PA DPANG POR BTZUGS TE, MNA' BSKYAL NAS, GANG GTZIGS 'DI LAS 'GAL BA

BYAS NA, DA LTA SROG CHAGS BSAD PA 'DI BZHIN DPANG DU GSOL BA'I LHA KLU GNYEN PO

RNAMS NAS 'GAL BA PO'I BLA SROG RGYU NOR LA CHAD PA GCOD CIG, CES MNA' BOR BA'I

SROL YOD PA BEE DKAR NANG GSAL BA LTAR BYAS YOD PA MA ZAD, RGYA NAG SOGS PHYI RGYAL

KHAG LA'ANG SNGAR SROL DE 'DRA BA BYED KYI YOD PAR GRAGS,

SA MTSAMS KYI RDO RING SKOR LA CUNG ZAD ZHIB 'JUG BYAS PAR, DE SNGON

@225 RGYA NAG NAN CIN DU MJAL MYONG BA, AA MDO 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I SKU MCHED AA

PHA AA LOR GU GU RME RU'I RDO RING DE GZIGS MYONG MIN DRI BA ZHUS PAR, KHONG GIS NGA'I PHA

DES BOD SHING SGO CAN GYIS MTSAMS ZHES RME CHU'I GTZANG PO'I CHU KHA NAS YAR TZAM RI ZUR

ZHIG GI NANG DU RDO RING DE 'GYEL TE, MTHA' SKOR RTZVA MANG PO SKYES 'DUG ,DE'I 'GRAM NA

GYANG RO 'GA' SHAS DANG, LHA KHANG HA CANG GI GOG GCONG CAN ZHIG NANG BOD RGYA'I MI'I

BZO 'DRA BA'I SKU YANG 'DUG PA, YUL MI TSOS DE DAG CHINGS BYED MI'I BOD RGYA'I BLON

PO'I 'DRA SKU RED CES GLENG GI 'DUG ,DE NAS LO 'GA'I RJES SU PHA RAN SI'I CHOS SLOB

PA'AM, BLTA SKOR BA KHA SHAS KYIS RDO RING DE'I YI GE BSHU BZHIN 'DUG ZER, RJES

SU DE PHYOGS PHEBS DUS RDO RING DE YANG MI 'DUG ,YUL MI TSO'I BRJOD TSUL LTAR NA

PHA RAN SI'I YUL DU 'KHYER BA MIN NAM ZER ZHES GSUNGS BYUNG, 'DI NI ZANGS CHU'I KHAR

HOR TSANG SHING SGO CAN ZHES BOD SDE NANG TSAGS KYI SA MTSAMS SHIG LAS, RGYA BOD KYI SA

MTSAMS MA YIN, YANG, CO NE KHUL GYI NYAMS MYONG CAN 'GA' SHAS NAS GSUNGS

NA; CO NE RGYAL SA ZHES PA NAS KLU CHU'I GYEN DED TSA LAM GCIG TZAM NA, WA TSAL PHYOGS

SU 'GRO BA'I LAM NAS CHU CHUNG ZHIG 'BAB PA DE KLU CHUR 'DRES 'GRO BA'I SA KHUL DE'I SPYI

MING LA SLA SA ZER, DE'I RI GDONG YAR TZAM NA RME RU GU ZER BA'I SA ZHIG YOD, DER RDO

RING ZHIG DANG, GYANG RO MANG PO'I SHUL YOD PA DE LA SNGAR CHINGS BYED SA YIN ZER ZHING,

RDO RING DE'I THAD KHAR AA KHU GU GE ZER BA'I BRAG KHUNG ZHIG YOD, LUNG PA DE BRGYUD PHYIN NA TSA

LAM RING TSAD ZHIG NAS WA TSAL ZER BA'I MKHAR GRONG ZHIG LA SLEBS YONG ZER BA, SA MING

'DRA TSAD PAS CHINGS KYI BKA' MOL GNANG SA ZHIG YIN NA LAS, RGYA BOD SA MTSAMS KYI

RDO RING 'DZUGS SA NI MIN PAR NGES, NGAS NI GU GU RME RU ZHES PA DE SIM LA'I CHINGS YIG

@226 GI YIG CHA GZHIR BZHAG NGOS 'DZIN BYED KYI YOD KYANG, SUM PA MKHAN POS NI RGYA BOD

SOGS BOD LA DRIN CHE ZHES, GU GU'I DANG, RME RU ZHES MI MTHUN TZAM GSUNGS PA GU RU BLA MA DE WA NAS SA RA NA THAR PAR DU BSGRUN PA'I DPAG BSAM LJON BZANG 9/23

BU RME RU ZHES BYA BAR BOD RGYA'I SA MTSAMS BYAS TE, DER BOD BTZAN PO'I GTZUG LAG

KHANG ZHIG DANG, RGYA RJE'I GTZUG LAG KHANG ZHIG BRTZIGS, GNAM LA NYI ZLA ZUNG CIG,

SA LA BTZAN PO DBON ZHANG LAS MED DO ZHES DANG, BAR BGROS NAS PHA BONG LA NYI ZLA'I

GZUGS BYAS, PHYIN CHAD BOD BOD YUL NA BDE, RGYA RGYA YUL NA BDE, SA MTSAMS

RME RU MAN LA BOD KYIS DMAG MI DRANG, GAL TE DRANGS NA RGYA RJE'I PHO BRANG MDUN GYI RDO RING

GI YI GE LAN GSUM KLOG PAS BOD THAMS CAD PHUNG BAR 'GYUR, RME RU YAN LA RGYA'I

DMAG MI DRANG, GAL TE DRANGS NA LHA SA'I RDO RING GI YI GE DE LAN GSUM KLOG PAS RGYA

THAMS CAD PHUNG BAR GYUR CIG CES BTZAN PO DBON ZHANG GIS BDEN PA BTZUGS TE DMOD

BOR ZHES CUNG MI MTHUN TZAM GSUNGS SHING, RDO RING GI YIG CHA NGO MA NI GZIGS MED

PA ZHAL GYIS BZHES 'DUG ,RDO LA NYI ZLA BRKOS PA ZHES SBA BZHED DANG YIG CHA 'DI

LAS GZHAN LA MED PA ZHIG 'DUG PAS, LO RGYUS DES 'GA' ZHIG GIS, STONG

'KHOR GYI NYE 'GRAM ZHIG LA RDO NYI ZLA ZHES PA NYI ZLA'I GZUGS BRNYAN YOD PA'I RDO ZHIG

SNANG BA, DE LA GU GU RME RUR NGOS 'DZIN BYED MI YANG MANG PO 'DUG PAS, DE NI RGYA

BZA' PHEBS SKABS BYUNG BA'I LO RGYUS SHIG BSHAD SROL YOD PA LAS, CHINGS KYI RDO

RING 'DZUGS PA'I SA NI MIN PAR NGES, RME RU GANGS DKAR NAS 'BAB PA RME CHU ZER

@227 BA'I GTZANG PO DE MAR TZAM NAS 'JU LAG CHU ZHES MING 'GYUR 'GRO BA'I MTSAMS KYI BYANG

PHYOGS SU RME RU BA DAN NAM, RGYA SKAD DU T'A THUNG ZER BA'I RTZVA THANG CHEN PO ZHIG YOD PA'I

SA DER, SNGAR RGYA BOD KYI CHINGS PA RNAMS 'DU SA RED ZER BA'I SA KHRI RGYA CHEN PO ZHIG

YOD 'DUG PA DE GU GU RME RU MIN NAM ZHES AA MDO'I NANG LO RGYUS LA NYAMS SNANG CAN

'GA'I GSUNG SGROS LAS THOS PA TZAM LAS, RGYA BOD SA MTSAMS RDO RING 'DZUGS

SA'I SA YUL DNGOS GNAS 'DI ZHES DA BAR NGES GTAN 'KHEL BA ZHIG MA BYUNG BAS 'DI

THOG ZHIB 'JUG ZHIG KYANG NGES PAR GNANG DGOS 'DUG GO,

MNGA' BDAG RAL PA CAN GYIS BLON PO DGA' YE SHES DAR RGYAS DPYA

KHRAL BSDU BA DANG, SA MTSAMS LA BLTA BA'I PHYIR MDO SMAD KYI PHYOGS SU MNGAGS PA,

DA LTA MDZO DGE STOD NA YOD PA'I SA CHA GLING NGOS BYA BA YANGS SHING RGYA CHE BA, RMA CHU, RME CHU,

SKA CHU GSUM STE, CHU KLUNG GSUM 'BAB PA, SPANG LJONGS YID DU 'ONG BA MTHONG STE

DER BDAG GI YUL BZUNGS TE BOD KYI 'GO 'DZIN DANG, RGYA'I KHA GNON BYA'O GSUNGS

NAS GZHIS CHAGS, DER 'KHOD BOD RGYA'I MI RIGS RNAMS NAS RGYAL PO'I BLON POR

BRTEN DPON PO ZHES ZHE SA DANG, BKUR GZOS CHEN PO BYAS TE MDZO DGE STOD SMAD KYI

DPON DU GYUR, DE'I RGYUD PAR SPYANG THA'I DANG, DNGO TH'I ZHES PA GNYIS BYUNG STE, DE

GNYIS BLO RNO ZHING GRUNG BAS, MDZO DGE STOD SMAD KYI SA CHA PHYUGS SKYONG BA'I SAR BZANG

YANG, ZHING SA DANG LDAN PAS GNAS SHIG 'TSOL BAR DGONGS TE CO NE'I PHYOGS RTA MGO

PHU BYA BAR YUL BZUNGS TE CO NE'I DPON GYI RGYUD PA RNAMS CO NE'I BSTAN 'GYUR DKAR CHAG YID BZHIN NOR BU'I PHRENG BA, BYUNG BA DANG, AA MDO'I

PHYOGS KYI MI RIGS PHAL MO CHE NI SNGAR CHOS RGYAL SKU DUS SU DBUS GTZANG NAS SA SRUNG

@228 DU YONG BA'I MI RGYUD LAS BYUNG BA LO DEB THER RGYA MTSO STOD CHA 65/12 DANG, DEB DKAR 5-NA-5 RGYUS MANG PO'I NANG GSAL YOD DO, ,

DE NAS BTZAN POS SNGAR YAB MES GONG MA RNAMS KYIS BKAS BCAD

PA'I KHRIMS GZHI BZHAG THOG ,KHRI RTZE 'BUM GZHER GYI KHRIMS, GSER THANG SHA BA

CAN GYI KHRIMS, RGYAL KHAMS DPE BLANGS KYI KHRIMS, MDO LON ZHUS BCAD KYI

KHRIMS, DKON MCHOG GI CHOS KHRIMS, JO MO MNGA' BDAG GI KHRIMS DANG DRUG TU

DBYE BAS, NGAN LA CHAD PA GCOD CING, BZANG LA BYA DGA' BSTER, MTHO BA'I

GNYA' NAS GNON CING, DMA' BA THABS KYIS SKYONG BA'I SROL BZANG PHYOGS KUN TU

KHYAB STE KHYIM NA BAG GRO, MI NI KHONG DAL, PHYUGS NI LO DANG ZLA BA NA SDUD, MI

NYAL MI MAS SLONG, 'BRI YAN SNA MED, SGO LA KHYI MED, RJE BYAMS, 'BANGS

GUS, GROGS GZHUNG BZANG, GNYEN SHA TSA, PHO NI DPA' BO DANG, MO NI MDZANGS

LA CHAS BZANG, BOD 'BANGS BYING SA BDE ZHING SKYID PA'I DPAL LA LONGS SPYOD CING GNAS

SO, ,RGYAL PO DBU SKRA BSIL BA SOGS LA MI MNYES PAS DBU SKRA RAL PAR CHAGS TE

BTZAN PO RAL PA CAN MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON JA 133-NA-1 DU MTSAN THOGS, RGYAL PO DGUNG LA BZHUGS, GA-YAS

GA-YON LA DGE 'DUN GYI STAN BZANG PO BSHAMS, DBU RAL TSAN GNYIS SU BYAS PA'I

SNE LA DAR YUG BTAGS PA DGE 'DUN GYI STAN GYI STENG DU BKRAM PA LA DGE 'DUN

BZHUGS TE DBU GTZUG TU 'KHUR BAS DGE 'DUN DBU SDE GNYIS ZHES GRAGS, RAB

TU BYUNG BA RNAMS LA 'BANGS MI KHYIM BDUN BDUN RE PHUL,

RGYAL PO'I THUGS DAM GYI RTEN DU, BAL BO, LI YUL, (YAR KHEN)

@229 RGYA NAG BCAS NAS GSER DNGUL, LCAGS ZANGS, SHING LA SOGS PA'I BZO BO

MKHAS PA MANG PO 'BOD DE LHA SA'I NUB PHYOGS RTA TSUGS GCIG (KI LO MI tAR BZHI BCU)

TZAM GYI SKYID CHU DANG NYE BA'I SAR, 'U SHANG RDO DPE MED BKRA SHIS DGE 'PHEL GYI GTZUG

LAG KHANG THOG RTZEGS DGU THOG ,'OG GI THOG SA GSUM RDO RTZIGS DANG, BAR GYI THOG

SA GSUM SO PHAG ,STENG GI THOG SA GSUM SHING LAS GRUB PA, BZO KHYAD PHUN SUM

TSOGS PA, RTEN DANG BRTEN PAR BCAS PA LEGS PAR GRUB, 'DI RJES SU LHA KHANG THOG

SA GSUM THOG CIG LAS, DGU THOG MJAL RGYU MI 'DUG ,DUS SKABS GANG 'DRA ZHIG LA

NYAMS CHAGS SONG BA'I YIG CHA NGES GSAL ZHIG RNYED SON MA BYUNG ZHING, YANG CHOS

RGYAL 'DIS LHA SA'I PHYOGS SU SHAR DU DKAR RU DANG, RME RU, LHOR DGA' BA DANG, DGA'

BA'I 'OD, NUB TU BRAN KHANG DANG, BRAN KHANG MTHA' MA LA SOGS PA BZHENGS, YAB

MES KYI THUGS DAM GYI RTEN LHA SA, BSAM YAS, KHRA 'BRUG LA SOGS PAR ZHIG GSO

DANG, BKUR STI BLA NA MED PA MDZAD DE BOD 'BANGS THAMS CAD CHOS DANG, SRID KYI

DPAL 'BYOR BDE SKYID LA LONGS SU SPYAD PAS LHA THO THO RI NAS, RGYAL PO 'DI'I BAR LA

SKYID PA'I GDUNG RABS PHYED DANG BCU GSUM ZHES MU NE BTZAN PO YUN THUNG BAS PHYED DU BYAS

SHING, MES AAG TSOM NAS 'DI'I BAR SHIN TU SKYID PA'I GDUNG RABS LNGA ZHES GRAGS SO, ,

DE LTAR RGYAL POS CHOS LA ZHABS TOG RGYA CHE BA SOGS KYIS NAG

PHYOGS SU GTOGS PA'I BLON PO RNAMS NAS CHOS KHRIMS BSHIG PA'I GROS BRTZAMS TE,

SRAS GTZANG MA RAB TU BYUNG BA DE GRO MOR SPYUGS, 'GA' SHAS KYIS MON SPA GROR ZER,

SBAS STAG SNAS BLON PO BRAN KHA DPAL GYI YON TAN NAM, BAN DE CHEN PO DANG, BTZUN

MO DPAL GYI NGANG TSUL MA NAL BSHAM ZHES PHRA MA BCUG STE BAN DE CHEN PO BYANG THANG DU

@230 BAN DE CHEN PO'I DMAR GDUNG SNYE THANG RGYA GRONG NA YOD, BKUMS, GZHI MED KYI PHRA MA DER BTZUN MO YID MUG STE PHO BRANG GI YANG STENG NAS

LCEBS TE 'DAS, BTZAN PO KHRI RAL PA CAN DGUNG LO SUM CU SO DRUG TU PHEBS PA ME PHO

'BRUG 836 LOR DABS TO RE DANG, COG RO LEGS SGRAS PHO BRANG ZHA MAR PHO BRANG ZHA MA NI LA GRO KA TSAL DGON DU YOD, NYI MA LA BZHUd

PA'I SKABS SU GSANG STABS SU YONG NAS ZHAL LTAG PAR GCUS NAS BKRONGS NEL PA'I CHOS 'BYUNG LA NI, SEMS CAN SPYI MTHUN BSOD NAMS ZAD PA'I RKYEN BYAS, SBAS STAG SNA CAN GYIS PHRA MA BCUG BYAS TE, BLON PO CHEN PO

BRAN KHA DPAL GYI YON TAN DANG, MNGA' BDAG GI BTZUN MO COG RO BZA' DPAL GYI NGANG TSUL LA CHAD PA PHAB STE BSAD PA'I MI SHA LA COG ROS MNGA'

BDAG BKRONGS ZHES GSUNGS, YANG STAG SNA'I CHOS 'BYUNG LA NI, COG RO LEd SGRA LHA SDENG CAN GYI MAL GRO ZHAM MA'I LHA KHANG RDO SKRAS LA BZHUd PA LA RAL GRI RTZAL NAS BRKONGS SO,,

BOD KHAMS CHOS BZHIN BDE BAR SKYONG LA BSTAN PA STOBS KYIS 'DZIN

PA'I MNGA' BDAG KHRI RAL PA CAN DE BKRONGS PA NAS BZUNGS, BOD KHAMS SEMS CAN

RNAMS KYI BSOD NAMS NI SNUM ZAD KYI MAR ME BZHIN DU GYUR, DGE BA BCU'I KHRIMS NI SOG

HRUL GYI PHON THAG BZHIN DU GZHIGS, CHAB SRID KYI PHAN BDE NI NAM MKHA'I 'JA' BZHIN DU

YAL, BZANG BYED KYI BSAM BLO NI MDANGS GSUM GYI RMI LAM BZHIN DU BRJED, LOG

PHYOGS KYI SPYOD PA NI RLUNG TSUB DRAG PO BZHIN DU LANGS, NAG PHYOGS LA DGA' BA'I BLON

PO RNAMS BGROS TE SRAS DAR MA RGYAL PO'I KHRIR MNGA' GSOL, SBI RGYAL TO RE DANG, SBAS STAG

SNA CAN, NYA NAM RGYA TSA KHRI SRUNG BCAS NAS NANG BLON BYAS, BTZAN PO THUGS GSHIS RTZUB CING, BZANG

PO'I SPYOD PA LAS RGYAB KYIS PHYOGS PAS 'BANGS RNAMS KYIS RGYAL PO LA GLANG ZHES DUD 'GRO'I

MING DU 'BOD PA DE NAS BZUNG GLANG DAR MAR GRAGS, LO GSUM BAR DKAR PHYOGS

CHOS LA BRNAGS PA TZAM LAS, BLOS MI 'KHYUD PA'I GNOD PA CHE BA RANG MA BYUNG ZHING, 'ON

@231 KYANG SA RTA 838 LO TZAM NAS RGYAL PO'I THUGS LA GDON GSOL TE BLON PO RNAMS DANG BCAS

CHOS KHRIMS BSHIG PAR BGROS TE, LHA SA DANG, BSAM YAS, KHRA 'BRUG, 'U SHANG

SOGS KYI SKU RTEN LA LA CHUR SKYUR, LA LA BYE 'DAM DU SBAS, LA LA KHRI 'OG TU MNAN,

GSUNG RAB 'GA' SHAS LHA SA'I BRAG LA SBAS SHING, PHAL CHE BA ME DANG CHUR SBYANGS, LHA

KHANG RNAMS KYI SGOR ZHAL BA BYAS TE BTZUN PA CHANG 'THUNG BA'I RI MO BRIS, GTZUG LAG KHANG DU

BSHAS RA BZOS, BTZUN PA RAB RNAMS BSAD, 'BRING RNAMS PHAB, MTHA' MA RNAMS

LA MDA' DANG, GZHU BSKUR NAS KHYI RA BYED DU BCUG, BAN DE NYANG TING 'DZIN BZANG PO

DANG, SMRA RIN CHEN MCHOG GNYIS NAS 'DUL KHRIMS MA BTANG BAS BU STON CHOS 'BYUNG, 118-NA-3 DE LTAR BZHED KYANG, BDUD 'DZOMS RIN PO CHE'I RNYING MA CHOS 'BYUNG 1-4-NA-3 NANG NYANG TING

'DZIN BZANG PO LHA SA BRAG LHA KLU PHUG TU 'JA' LUS SU YAL ZHES GSUNGS, BSAD, RGYA GAR NAS

GDAN DRANGS PA'I PAndI TA LA LA SPYUGS, LA LA RANG YUL DU BSKRAD, LO TZ'A BA PHAL CHER

YUL GSHES SU BROS, CHOS BSGYUR 'PHRO RNAMS DANG, 'U SHANG RDOR RAB GNAS MA GRUB

PAR LUS, THABS DU MA'I SGO NAS RAB TU BYUNG BA'I RTAGS MING TZAM MED PA BZOS TE

SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA RMANG NAS BSHIG PAR BRTZAMS KYANG, GTZANG RONG NA SNUBS CHEN

SANGS RGYAS YE SHES YOD PA THOS TE PHO NYAS BKUGS TE GSOD PAR BRTZAM PA'I TSE, KHONG

GIS SDIG MDZUB KYI RTZER LCAGS KYI SDIG PA RVA CAN MGO DGU PA GA-YAG SHAS TZAM ZHIG BSTAN

PAS RGYAL PO BSKRAGS TE DKON MCHOG SNGAGS PA'I RTEN LA NGA MI BOD ZER ZHING, SNGAGS PA

GOS DKAR CAN LA GNOD PA MA BYUNG BA KHONG GI DRIN YIN PAR GLENG, DE'I TSE DPAL GYI CHU BO

RIR SGRUB PA LA BZHUGS PA GTZANG RAB GSAL DANG, GA-YO DGE BA BYUNG, RMAR SH'AKYA MU NE

GSUM NAS BTZUN PA KHYIR BYED DE PA MTHONG STE, RGYAL POS CHOS KHRIMS BSHIGS PA MKHYEN NAS,

@232 KARMA SHA TAm SOGS 'DUL BA'I DPE CHA DRE'U'I RGYAB KHAL GCIG BKAL TE NYIN MO RIL YIB CING

MTSAN MO 'GRUL BYAS TE MANG YUL MNGA' RIS SU BRTOL, DER YANG BZHUGS MA NUS PAR,

NUB BYANG GAR DE DUS YUL DER KHA CHE'I CHOS KYI DBANG SHUGS DAR MA THAG PAR SONG GAR LOG CES 'BOD CING, RJES SU KHA CHES MAG DHA BCOM PA'I

TSE YANG, GAR LOG PAS MA GA DHA BCOMS ZHES GTAN TSIGS RNAMS SU GSAL BA DANG, CHEN PO HOR GYI RGYAL RABS NANG, LI YUL GYI

MI RNAMS GAR LOG GIS BZUNG PHYIN CHAD LI DANG BOD KYI 'GRUL YANG CHAD CES GSAL, GAR LOG ,(LI YUL LAM YAR KHYEN) NAS THON TE HOR YUL DU PHEBS KYANG,

842 LOR YER PA'I BRAG PHUG NA LHA LUNG DPAL GYI RDO RJE SGOM DU BZHUGS YOD PAR DPAL

KYI SDOM PA ZHUS PA'I LO DUS DE RANG LA CHA 'DZIN BYED PA LAGS SO, ,

SKABS DE'I DUS SU, BAL PO SLE RU RTZE (PADMA RU RTZE) BYA BA'I LO TZ'A

MKHAS PA ZHIG GIS RGYA GAR NAS PAndI TA PHRA LA RING BA DANG, PAndI TA SMRI TI GNYIS GDAN

DRANGS TE 'ONGS PAS, LO TZ'A BA LAM DU 'PHO LOG NA NAS SHI, PAndI TA GNYIS KYIS BOD

SKAD MI SHES PAS YUN RING POR 'KHYAMS SHING, SMRI TIS RTA NAG TU LO MANG PO LUG RDZI

MDZAD DGOS PA SOGS 'O BRGYAL CHE BA BYUNG YANG, PHYIS SU DPYAL LO TZ'A BA BSOD NAM RGYAL

MTSAN GYIS SMAN LUNG DU SPYAN DRANGS TE CHOS ZHUS, KHAMS SU DPYAL LO TZ'A BA BSOD NAM RGYAL

MTSAN GYIS SMAN LUNG DU SPYAN DRANGS TE CHOS ZHUS, KHAMS SU BYON NAS LDAN KONG THANG DU MNGON

PA MDZOD KYI BSHAD PA BTZUGS PA SOGS 'GRO DON RGYA CHEN PO MDZAD, PHRA LA RING BAS RONG PA

CHOS BZANG LA GRONGS 'JUG BYAS PAS, RONG PAS CHOS MANG PO GTOL SHES SU BYUNG ZER,

LHA BLA MA YE SHES 'OD KYIS CHAB SRID GCUNG SRONG NGER BTAD DE KHONG NYID

KYIS PAndI TA MANG PO GDAN DRANGS NAS MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS LA DAG THER MDZAD DANG MDZAD BZHIN

YANG, DA DUNG THUGS MA 'TSIMS PAR KHONG GI SKU TSE'I SMAD DU, RGYA GAR BZHENG GSHOL NA RGYAL

PO'I SRAS SU 'KHRUNGS PA JO BO RJE AA TI SHA'I SNYAN PA GSAN NAS SPYAN 'DREN PAR 'DOD DE LO

TZ'A BA RGYA BRTZON 'GRUS SENG GE LA BOD PHRUG MANG PO ROGS SU BTANG, GSER LING PA CHEN

PO GCIG DANG, SIL MA MANG PO BSKUR NAS, ZHU YIG TU, KHYED KYI THUGS RJE'I

PHYOGS RIS MI MNGA' ZHING, ,SANGS RGYAS BSTAN LA THUGS NI SEMS BYED NA, ,KHA BA

CAN 'DIR SNGON NI PHUN TSOGS KYANG, ,DENG SANG DUS NA SEMS CAN BSOD NAMS NYAMS,

@242 DE YI STOBS KYIS BOD KYI RGYAL PO NGA, ,MYA NGAM THANG LA TSAD PAS GDUNG PA NA, ,CHU YI

'DU BYED YID LA BYED PA LTAR, ,NYIN DANG MTSAN DU MGON PO KHYOD BSAM NA, ,BDAG

LA THUGS KYIS BRTZE BAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,ZHES BRIS NAS RGYA BRTZON SENG LA GDAN ZHU'I

GNAD RNAMS LEGS PAR MNGAGS NAS BTANG, KHONG NGO 'KHOR RNAMS BI KRA MA LA MKHAS DBANG RGAN BSTAN 'DZIN RGYAL MTSAN GYI ZHAL NAS, BI KRA MA SHI LA ZHES BOD SKAD LA RNAM PAR GNON PA ZER, DE'I SHUL NI

GANGG'A'I 'GRAM DU PA THAR GHdA ZER BA DE RED GSUNGS, SHI LA

BYA BA'I DGON PAR 'BYOR, JO BO MJAL TE ZHU YIG DANG, GSER RNAMS PHUL NAS

BOD DU BYON PA'I ZHU BA BYAS PAS ZHAL GYIS MA BZHES PAR GSER TSUR BSTZAL, LO TZ'A BA

BOD DU LOG ,GSER RNAMS LHA BLA MAR BTAD, JO BO SPYAN MA 'DRONGS PA'I LO RGYUS RNAMS

ZHUS PAR, LO TZ'A BAS DKA' BA DANG BSDOS, LUS SROG THED LA BOR NAS BYON PA THUGS

LA BTAGS, JO BO SPYAN MA 'DRONGS PAR THABS MED GSUNGS, LO TZ'A BA SLAR RGYA GAR DU

SLOB GNYER 'PHRO SKYONG BAR BZHUD, LHA BLA MAS JO BO SPYAN DRANGS PA'I CHED DA DUNG GSER

MANG PO SGRUB PAR DGONGS TE BYON PAS GAR LOG GI RGYAL POS BOD KYI RGYAL PO YIN PA SHES

NAS BTZON DU BCUG ,GCUNG SRONG NGER SRAS LHA LDE DANG, 'OD LDE, ZHIB 'OD GSUM

YOD PA LAS, ZHI BA 'OD RAB TU BYUNG STE MTSAN LHA BLA MA BYANG CHUB 'OD ZHU BA DES KHU BO YE SHES

'OD 'JUS PA'I GTAM GSAN PA DANG, KHONG GIS RTA PA BRGYA DANG BCAS GAR LOG GI YUL

DU BYON, THUGS LA BOD NAS DMAG BSKUL TE 'THAB NA THUB SRID DE, SDIG PA'I RKYEN DU

'GRO BAR SNANG LA, GAL TE RANG NYID LA BAR CHAD BYUNG NA, JO BO YANG SPYAN MI 'DRONGS, KHU

BO YANG BRTZON NAS 'DON MI THUB PA 'DUG ,DE BAS KHO LA THABS KYIS BSTUN NA LEGS PAR

DGONGS NAS LAB SNA 'BREL BA DANG, GAR LOG RGYAL PO NA RE, KHYOD NANG PA SANGS RGYAS

@243 PA'I RGYAL PO YIN PAS BOD LA PAndI TA GDAN 'DREN RGYU BSHOL LAM, YANG NA, GSER

RGYAL PO'I LUS KYI LJID DANG MNYAM PA SPROD 'DAM KHA GYIS, DE MIN RGYAL PO MI GTONG ZER

BAS, DBON POS GSER SPROD PA LA 'DAMS NAS, DBUS GTZANG GI RAB TU BYUNG BA RNAMS

LA GSHAM THAB KYI KHRAL DANG, BOD KHAMS GLING DGU'I 'BANGS LA GSER GYI KHRAL MO CHE THENGS

GSUM BSDUS, PHYAG RDZAS YOD RGU GSER DU BSGYUR NAS KHUL BO BLU BAR GAR LOG GI YUL GANG DU YOD RTZAD DPYOD BYA PHYIR HIL PHUG TOB MAN GYI DBYIN DEB ("DIE QARLUG IN DERTIBETISCHEN

LITERATUR", ORIENS, P.3 (LONDON, 1950) PP.190-208) ...... NANG LA YANG KHYEN PHYOGS SU

NGOS 'DZIN BYAS 'DUG CING, PA RANG GIS KYANG DE LTAR YIN PAR SEMS SO,, LOG GI YUL DU

PHEBS, GSER RNAMS BTEGS PAS SKU LUS KYI LJID LONGS KYANG, DBU'I LJID TZAM

ZHIG MA LONGS PAS KHU BO GTONG DU MA NYAN PA NA, BYANG CHUB 'OD KYIS KHU BO GANG DU BZHUGS

PA'I BTZON KHANG GI SGO DRUNG DU BYON NAS, KHU BO LA BOS TE, BKA' DRIN CHEN PO, SNGON GYI

LAS THOG TU BABS PA YIN PAS, NGAS KHO LA DMAG BRGYAB NAS BZLOGS NA NI SKYE BO TSAN PO

CHE PHUNG LA BTANG NAS NGAN SONG DU 'GRO DGOS PAR SNANG, PAndI TA GDAN 'DREN RGYU DE BSHOL

NA CHOS BLOS GTONG DGOS PA DE MA NUS NAS, KHYED KYI SKU LJID DANG MNYAM PA'I GSER SPROD PA

LA 'DAMS NAS GSER BTZAL BAS DBU'I LJID TZAM MA LONGS STABS KHOS GTONG MI NYAN PAS,

NGAS GSER DBU TZAM RNYED PA DANG BLUR 'ONG GIS, DE'I BAR SNGON GYI LAS DGONGS SHING, DKON

MCHOG LA GSOL BA 'DEBS PA DANG, SNYING PO CHE BRANG 'OG TU BCUG PA'I BSOD NAMS

MDZAD DGOS PA YIN, ZHES ZHUS PAS, KHU BO YE SHES 'OD KYIS DBON PO'I GSUNG NGO

MKHYEN TE BZHAD SHIG MDZAD, KHYED LA'ANG GCES PHRUG SNUM BZAN MA'I BAG CIG YOD,

BKA' SPYAD DANG, SNYING RUS MI NUS SNYAM PA YIN TE, NGA SHI YANG KHYOD KYIS YAB MES KYI

@244 SROL SKYONG THUB PAR SNANG, KHYOD KYI DE GO BA CHE, NGA LA DES CHOG, NGA'I BSAM PA LA BOD

'DIR CHOS KHRIMS SKYON MED CIG MA TSUGS BAR NGA SHIN MI RUNG BA 'DUG SNYAM PA YIN TE, DA

KHYOD KYIS BYED THUB PAR 'DUG ,NGA NA SO YANG RGAS, LUS KUN ME GTZAS BSDAMS PAS

SHES PA YANG MI GSAL, 'DIR DA LAM MA SHI YANG TSE LO BCU LAS MED, DE TZAM GYI PHYIR

GSER MANG PO BTANG NA DKON MCHOG THUGS KHREL, NGAS SNGAR TSE 'KHOR BA THOG MA MED PA

NAS CHOS KYI PHYIR SROG BTANG BA GCIG KYANG MED, DA LAN CHOS KYI PHYIR SHIN LEGS PA YIN

PAS, RGYAL PO KHO LA GSER SE BA SE BA ZHES PA BOD KYI GSER DNGUL GYI LJID TSAD ZHIG YIN, SE BA BCU THAM PA LA SKAR GANG GI LJID YOD, RA TI ZER BA RGYA GAR GYI

RNYED PA SHIN TU RNGAMS CHE, DA MGO BO TZAM GANG NAS RNYED, GSER THAMS CAD RGYA GAR DU

PO LA BYIN YOD PAS, TSE RABS THAMS CAD DU BDAG LA THUGS RJES 'DZIN PA DANG, NGA'I

NA BZHIN MDZAD PA DANG, SKYE BA 'DI'I 'OG ROL DU KHYED RANG NGES PAR MJAL BA BYIN GYIS BRLAB

BYON TO, ,

LHA BLA MA BYANG CHUB 'OD KYIS, RGYA GAR NAS JO BO SPYAN 'DREN PA'I BANG CHEN

CHOS KYI SAR BYON NAS, KHYOD KYI 'DUL BA 'DZIN PA DE RGYA GAR NAS BYON NA NGA LA SBRON CIG BYA BA'I

'PHRIN BZHAG GO ,GUNG THANG PA BOD LA BYON PA'I TSE MI CHOS PA RNAMS KYIS SNGAR BZHIN 'PHRIN

'DRONGS PAR PHO NYA TSUR LOG PA LAS MA BYUNG, SLAR YANG GSER SGRUB TU BYON PAR GAR LOG

THAG BOD KYI DON DU PAndI TA D'I BAm KA RA SPYAN 'DREN PA LA 'DUL BA 'DZIN PA KHYED LAS 'OS PA MI 'DUG,

'DOD PAS DE'I BAR CHAD DU 'GRO BA 'DUG STE, BOD KYI RGYAL POS BSTAN PA'I DON DU SKU SROG

KYANG BLOS BTANG BAS NA, NGAS NI KHYED KYI THUGS 'DOD BZHIN JO BO GDAN 'DREN PA LA LOS 'GRO,

LA ROGS MI LNGA, PAndI TAR ZHU RTEN DU GSER THIG PO CHE BA GCIG LA SRANG DRUG CU YOD PA DANG,

@247 BOD LA PHAN THOGS PA DKA', DA DUNG JO BO RANG LA GSOL BA 'DEBS DGOS, KHYED RNAMS

BKOD PA RGYA CHEN PO DANG BCAS LCAGS PHO 'BRUG 1040 LOR, ZHANG ZHUNG MTHO LDING GSER GYI

DANG, LHAG PAR MGON PO NYID KYIS THUGS NYAMS SU BZHES PA'I ^ RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB

MDO RGYUD DGONGS 'GREL DANG BCAS THAMS CAD HRIL GYIS BSGRIL BA, NYAMS SU LEN BDE

BA'I BSTAN BCOS SHIG MDZAD PAR GSOL BA BTAB PAS, JO BOS BYANG CHUB LAM GYI SGRON ME

ZHES BYA BA MDZAD, DE'I DUS LO TZ'A BA RIN CHEN BZANG POS JO BO RJE KHONG NYID KYI BZHUGS GNAS

@250 BOR MDZAD DE DGUNG LO DGU BCU GO BDUN BAR BZHUGS PAR GRAGS, JO BOS MNGA' RIS

PHYOGS SU 'GRO DON RGYA CHEN PO MDZAD BZHIN LO GSUM BZHUGS NAS RGYA GAR DU PHYIR BYON PAR

CHAS TE PU HRENG GI RGYAL ZHING ZHES PAR BZHUGS PA'I TSE, RDO RJE GDAN NAS LHAS LUNG BSTAN

PA AU PA SI KA ZHES 'BROM STON RGYAL BA'I 'BYUNG GNAS DANG MJAL ZHING, 'BROM GYIS JO BO

DBUS SU 'BYON PAR GSOL BA BTAB PAS, NAG TSOS JO BO'I NA BZA' NAS 'JUS TE, NGAS

GNAS BRTAN PA LA DAM TSIG GI CHAD BYAS YOD PAS, NGA DMYAL BAR 'GRO MI PHOD PAS CIS

KYANG RGYA GAR LA GSHEGS DGOS ZHUS PAS, JO BOS LO TZ'A BAR DE TZAM SEMS LAS MI DGOS

SGRUB PAR MI NUS PA LA NYES PA MED CES DBUGS DBYUNGS, SOG PO BLA MA GU RU DE WE NAS SA RA NA THAR PAR DU BSKRUN PA'I LAM RIM ZIN BRIS GDAM NGAG BDUD RTZI'I SNYING PO 30-BA-5, DE NI DE DUS BAL PO'I RGYAL

KHAG GSUM NANG 'KHRUG LANGS TE RGYA GAR LA 'GRO BA'I LAM 'GAG YOD PAS DE LA DGONGS

PAR NGES SHING, DE NAS 'BROM STON PAS DBUS PHYOGS KYI MI CHEN RNAMS LA NGAS JO BO GDAN

'DREN BZHIN YOD PAS KHYED RNAMS BSU BA LA PHEBS DGOS ZHES ZHANG DBANG PHYUG MGON DANG,

KA BA SH'AKYA DBANG PHYUG SOGS LA, SHING RTA'I DBYIBS 'DRA 'DZAM GLING GI, ZHES BYA BA

LA SOGS PA'I PHEBS BSUR 'BYON DGOS PA'I 'PHRIN BTANG, KA BAS DO DAM CHER GYIS

NAS, RGYAL GYI ZHANG CHEN PO SOGS LA GROS BYAS TE GDAN 'DREN PA'I GRABS BYED PA'I TSE, KHU

STON GYIS NGA'I MING YI GE'I NANG MI 'DUG GSUNGS PAR, SOGS KHONGS NA 'DUG ZHUS

PAS, SOGS KHONGS SU 'JOG DGOS PA'I MI DE NGA MIN ZHES GSUNGS TE SNGON LA JO BO MJAL

BA ZHIG CIS KYANG BYA SNYAM NAS BYON PAS, GZHAN RNAMS LA'ANG 'UR LANGS NAS LCAG BRGYAB

PA BZHIN BYUNG, DER DBUS KYI MI CHEN RNAMS DPAL THANG DU PHEBS PA'I TSE, BOD STON

RNAMS DBU ZHVA SNA RING DANG, NA BZA' GOS CHEN GYI BER BSNABS TE RTA PA MANG PO RGYANG NAS 'ONG

@251 BA JO BOS GZIGS SHING ZHAL NAS, AU PA SI KA, MI MA YIN MANG PO BYUNG GSUNGS TE DBU

BTUMS NAS BZHUGS, DE NAS BOD STON RNAMS KYIS JO BO DANG NYE BA NA CHIBS LAS BABS,

BER DANG, DBU ZHVA BZHAG, SNAM SBYAR GYON PA SHA STAG BYAS NAS BYUNG BAR, JO BO YANG

DGYES NAS, DGE 'DUN LA SPYI PHYAG MDZAD, MI MA YIN 'DUG CES PA DANG, DBU

BTUMS MDZAD PA DAG NI BOD KYI CHOS PA RNAMS KYI RGYAS SPROS LA MI DGYES PA YIN, DE NAS

BOD STON RNAMS SNGON LA THEGS NAS, JO BO STON 'KHOR RIM GYIS BYON TE SNA BO LAR PHEBS DUS,

DAR 'PHYAR, LHA BTZUN GYIS MDZAD PA'I RAG DUNG BUD PAS, YUL MI RNAMS KYIS MA SHES

PAR DMAG BYUNG ZER, SPEL DMAR GYI GRU THON NAS BSAM YA SU PHEBS, LHA BTZUN BO DHIR

DZAS ZHABS TOG LEGS PAR MDZAD DO, ,

DE LTAR GNAS BRTAN GYI BKA' BZHIN JO BO GDAN DRANGS KYANG, BAL YUL

DU DMAG 'KHRUG GIS PHYIR LOG PHEBS DGOS BYUNG BA DANG, JO BOS BOD DU BSTAN BCOS

'DI 'DRA BA MDZAD, 'GRO DON YANG SHIN TU RGYA CHE BAS BOD DU BZHUGS CHOG PA 'DRA MI YONG

NGAM ZHES ZHU YIG DANG, LAM SGRON JO BO'I PHYAG BRIS NGO MA ZHIG DANG, GSER MANG PO

BCAS BSKUR TE RGYA GAR DU PHO NYA BRDZANGS BAR, PAndI TA RNAMS KYIS LAM SGRON GZIGS

PAS HA LAS NAS, MGRIN GCIG TU JO BO BOD DU PHEBS PA BOD PA RNAMS LA LEGS PAS

MA TSAD, NGED RGYA GAR BA RNAMS LA'ANG LEGS PA BYUNG, JO BO RGYA GAR DU BZHUGS NA RGYA

GAR BA RNAMS SHES RAB DANG, BRTZON 'GRUS CHE BAS BSTAN BCOS 'DI LTA BU MI GSUNGS,

BOD GLEN ZHING, BRTZON 'GRUS CHUNG BA LA DGONGS NAS TSIG NYUNG LA DON CHE BA'I BSTAN BCOS

'DI LTA BU BRTZAMS ZHES BSNGAGS BRJOD MANG PO MDZAD PAS, GNAS BRTAN SH'I LA AA KA RA

(RATNA A'A KA RA) YIS, PAndI TA RNAMS KYIS BSNGAGS BRJOD 'DI LTAR MDZAD, JO BO YANG

@252 BOD DU BZHUGS PA LA DGYES, 'GRO DON YANG CHE BA DE LTAR NA, DA NI JO BO BOD DU BZHUGS

CHOG PA GYIS, SKU TSAB TU LAM SGRON 'DI LA RANG 'GREL ZHIG MDZAD NAS BSKUR SHOG CES

BKOD PA'I YIG LAN 'BYOR BAS, NAG TSO LO TZ'A BA SHIN TU DGA' NAS, GNAS BRTAN

PAS 'KHUR RI TZAM BSKUR BA NYI MA DE RING NAS SANGS SONG LAM RIM ZIN BRIS BDUD RTZI'I SNYING PO'I SHOG GRANGS 30-BA-7 NANG GSAL, GSUNGS SKAD,

KHU STON BRTZON 'GRUS GA-YUNG DRUNG GIS JO BO THAB LO CHER GDAN DRANGS KYANG,

ZHABS TOG BZANG BA KHA NA YANG MA BYUNG BAS, JO BO STON 'KHOR RNAMS BROS STABS KYIS NYANG

PO GRU LA ZHUGS TE GTZANG PO'I GSUM CHA TZAM DU PHEBS PA NA, KHU STON GYIS RJES BSNYEGS TE

SKAD CHEN POS BZOD PAR GSOL ZHING, SLAR PHEBS PAR ZHUS KYANG MA BZLOG PAR DBU ZHVA

PHYIR 'PHANGS TE BYIN RLABS KYI RTEN DU GNANG, DPON SLOB RNAMS RE ZHIG 'ON DANG, DE NAS

BSAM YAS SU PHEBS TE PHYAG DPE GZIGS DUS RGYA GAR NA GZIGS MA MYONG BA'I RGYA DPE MANG

PO GZIGS PA NA, SNGON BOD DU BSTAN PA BYUNG BA DE 'DRA BA NI RGYA GAR DU'ANG BYUNG BAR DKA'

GSUNGS SHING, SPYIR CHOS 'KHOR LA SHIN TU DGYES TE YUN RING TZAM BZHUGS PAR BZHED

KYANG, BANG STON GYI RTA PA NYIS BRGYA'I BSU BA DANG BCAS RGOD DKAR LA BRGYUD DE SNYE THANG DU PHEBS,

LHA SA DANG, YER PA, 'PHAN YUL SOGS SU 'GRO DON DU YANG YANG PHEBS PA LAS, SNYE

THANG RANG LA GDAN SA'I THEL DU MDZAD, CHOS ZHU BA SLOB MA GRANGS KYIS MI LANGS PA 'DUS,

SLOB MA'I GTZO BO NI 'BROM STON RGYAL BA'I 'BYUNG GNAS DANG, RNGOG LEGS PA'I SHES RAB,

LHA BTZUN BYANG CHUB 'OD, LO CHEN RIN CHEN BZANG PO, NAG TSO TSUL KHRIMS RGYAL BA, LHO

BRAG PA CHAG KHRI MCHOG LA SOGS PA BSTAN PA 'DZIN SKYONG SPEL NUS PA'I SLOB MA YANG BSAM GYIS

MI KHYAB PA BYUNG, BKA' GDAMS BSTAN PA'I SROL BTOD, RGYA GAR DU'ANG BLA MA DANG, SLOB

@253 MA RNAMS LA 'BUL CHEN LAN GSUM DU BRDZANGS, JO BO RJE DGUNG LO BDUN CU DON GNYIS SU

PHEBS PA, BOD RAB BYUNG DANG PO'I SHING RTA JO BO'I RNAM THAR RGYAS PA DANG, DEB SNGON SOGS LA DGUNG LO 72 PHEBS PA, SHING PHO RTA'I LO STON ZLA 'BRING PO'I TSES 18 ZHES ZLA 8 TSES 18 NYIN GSHEGS PAR

GDUNG ZHUGS KYIS SBYANGS, 'OR GYI GTZUG LAG KHANG DU GDUNG RUS BZHUGS PA'I MCHOD RTEN

BSGYUR BA'I SKABS DANG, RGYA GAR DANG, BAL YUL DU SPYI LA DBANG BA'I RGYAL PO MED PAS

*, ,GONG DU JI LTAR BRJOD PA BZHIN, BOD SIL BU'I DUS SKABS LA BRTEN PAS

BLA CHEN DANG, SDE DPON, SA BDAG KHAG NAS RANG RANG GI 'DZIN BZHIN BDAG PA'I SA SDE

CHUNG NGUR KHRIMS LUNG RANG SKYONG LTA BUR BDAG 'DZIN BYED CING, SKABS RE SDE DPON KHAG

DBAR NANG KHUL DMAG 'KHRUG CHUNG TSAG RGYAG RES BYED PA DE TZAM LAS, BOD RGYAL KHAB

SPYI'I SA MTSAMS LA MNYAM SBREL GYIS SRUNG 'DOMS BYED MKHAN MED PAR, SA GNAS SO

1200 TZAM NAS BOD KYI BYANG SHAR DANG, NUB BYANG SOGS KYI SA MTSAMS YAS MAS TSANG

MAR SOG PO CHING GE SE KH'ANG GI DRAG PO'I DBANG SHUGS SLEBS TE SA GNAS SDE DGON DANG, SA

BDAG KHAG GIS 'PHRAL SEL SOG POR NGO SRUNG LTA BUS THOG MAR MJAL ZHU DANG, PHYAG RTEN

SPROD PA DANG, DE NAS RIM PAS 'DAB NOR ZHES RTEN CHAS CHUNG TSAG RE SPRAD DE RANG RANG GI SA

SDE'I NANG SOG PO'I DMAG DANG MI SNAS BRDABS GSIG MI 'BYUNG BA'I DUS YUN 'PHAR 'GYANGS

GNAS THABS KHO NA'I MUR SDOD BZHIN PAR, SA SKYA DANG, CHING GE SE KHA'ANG RGYAL RGYUD DBAR

MCHOD YON GYI 'BREL BA BYUNG STE, CHOL KHA GSUM DU GRAGS PA'I BOD YUL YONGS RDZOGS

SA SKYAS RANG BTZAN DBANG LUNG BSGYUR BA'I LO RGYUS SA SKYA'I GDUNG RABS NGO MTSAR RIN PO CHE'I BANG MDZOD DANG, GDUNG RABS YA RAB KHA RGYAN, TSAL PA'I DEB DMAR, DEB SNGON,

BSTAN 'GYUR DKAR CHA YID BZHIN NOR BU'I 'PHRENG BA, BOD DANG, CHEN PO HOR GYI RGYAL RABS, YIG TSANG MKHAS PA DGA' BYED, SOG PO, GZHAN YANG

@264 PHYI RGYAL DEB KHAG MANG POR GSAL YOD PAR GO BSDUR GYIS SKABS 'DIR CHE LONG TZAM ZHIG

BRJOD PAR BYA BA NI, HOR SOG GI RGYAL PO HA WAR THA (HOWORTH) DANG, TU'U CI (GIUSEPPE TUCCI) BRIS PA'I DEB, SBOG TA CHING GE SE KH'ANG ZHES PA DE BOD KYI RGYAL PO GRI

GUM BTZAN PO'I SRAS NYA KHRI'I SKU RGYUD YIN ZER BA DANG, 'GA' RES AA LON GVO ZHES PA'I

BTZUN MO YUG BZA' MO ZHIG LA RMI LAM DU LHA DANG 'GROGS PA LAS BU P'O GO H'A THIG (BO DON CHAR

MU GAN) CES PA'I RGYAL PO ZHIG BYUNG BA DE'I RGYUD PA YIN YANG ZER, YANG LA LAS GNAM

GYI BU SBOR TA CHE'I MI RGYUD YIN YANG ZER, KHA CIG GIS NI SOG PO KRA KRAR ZHES PA'I MI RGYUD

YIN YANG ZER ZHING, GANG LTAR 'DZAM GLING NANG SKAD GRAGS CAN ZHIG BYUNG YOD PA DE BOD RAB

BYUNG GSUM PA'I CHU RTA 1162 LOR SKYES TE, MING LA THE MU JEN ZHES BTAGS, KHONG LO

NA SON PA NA, POR TA CI SHIN ZER BA'I SOG PO'I BU MO ZHIG KHAB TU BLANGS, KHONG LO NYI SHU

RTZA BRGYAD LA SLEBS DUS HOR LEN CHU KLUNG 'GRAM DU PE TE ZHES PA'I MI SDE KHRI PHRAG BZHI BCU'I

RGYAL POR GYUR, RGYAL KHRIR 'KHOD PA'I RTEN 'BREL NYI MA GSUM PA'I NYIN, PHO BRANG GI

MDUN DU PHA BONG GRU BZHI CHEN PO ZHIG YOD PA DE'I STENG SNGAR MTHONG MA MYONG BA'I BYA MDZES SHING YID

DU 'ONG BA ZHIG GIS, CHING GE SE, ZHES PA'I SKAD SNYAN PO YUN RING PO BRGYAB PA BLON PO DANG,

MI DMANGS MANG POS MTHONG THOS BYUNG GSHIS, THE MU JEN KHONG NYID RGYAL POR GYUR PA'I GO

SA'I MTSAN DU CHING GE SE KH'ANG ZHES BTAGS SO, ,RGYAL PO KHONG NI DMAG LA DGA' ZHING, RANG

NYID DMAG BYINGS DANG MNYAM DU 'GRO SDOD BYED THUB PA DANG, LUNG PA GANG 'DRA ZHIG BLANGS KYANG

@265 DE LA DRANG PO'I KHRIMS LUNG BSGYUR THUB CING, NYAM CHUNG RNAMS LA LHAG PAR BYAMS PA DANG,

KHONG LA MGO GTAD PA YIN NA RANG MI DANG KHYAD MED KYI BYAMS SKYONG BYED CING, 'THAB 'DZINGS

BYAS TE BZUNG BA'I MI RNAMS LA NI SDUG SBYONG CHEN PO GTONG MKHAN ZHIG YIN NO,,

CHING GE SE KH'ANG LA BU PHA DANG 'DRA BA'I 'BYON PO BZHI DANG, BU MO GCIG,

DPA' MDZANGS SPYANG GSUM 'DZOMS PA'I BLON PO CHEN PO DGU BLON PO CHEN PO DGU NI, KHU MUG POR GRVE CHE DANG, MU GU LA'I SE CHEN, HA RA KHI RU GE, CA PA CHI NO, PUR GVA LA, SHI GI CHU BUG,

CI LA NA P'A THVAR, THOR GVAN SHA RA, CHU BA MER GEN BCAS SO,, BCAS BYUNG 'DUG, BOG TA

CHING GE SE KH'ANG GI DRAG PO'I STOBS SHUGS JE RGYAS SU SONG STE RGYAL KHAB KYI RGYA BSKYED PA STE,

NUB PHYOGS SU KA SPUL DANG, PAR SHI YA, TUR KI (TU RUKsh) SOGS RIM PAS BLANGS

NAS, ME YOS 1207 LO TZAM LA KH'ANG GI DBANG SHUGS NUB PHYOGS HENG GE RE'I YUL

GYI NANG BAR SLEBS YOD CING, AI tA LI DANG, 'JAR MAN DANG, PHA RAN SE'I YUL MI

RNAMS KYANG KHONG GI DRAG SHU LA 'JIGS SNANG BYED DGOS PA DANG, NUB PHYOGS PA TSOS PHRUG

GU RNAMS LA'ANG SOG PO SLEBS YONG ZHES 'JIGS BSKUL BYED PA ZHIG CHAGS 'DUG, BYANG

PHYOGS SU NI, AU RU SU'I SA CHA MANG PO BZOS, SHAR PHYOGS MAN JU RI DANG, LHO

PHYOGS SHI'I RNGAN DANG, ZI KHRON LA SOGS PA RIM BZOS KYIS MTHAR RGYA NAG YONGS RDZOGS

LA MNGA' DBANG BSGYUR PAS MA TSAD, BOD KYI SA CHA'I NANG DANG, RGYA GAR GYI SA SDE GHIL GYI

tA DANG, SPE SHA HOR A BRIEF HISTORY OF THE INDIAN PEOPLE, (OXFORD, 1897) P. 121. HOR PHYOGS SU'ANG DRAG PO'I DBANG SHUGS SLEBS 'DUG,

BOG TA CHING GE SE KH'ANG GI SRAS DANG PO JU CHE ('JOR JI) ZHES PA DE THO

MOG (KHUNG GE RE) YUL GYI RGYAL POR BSKOS, SRAS GNYIS PA CHA GA TA'I LA CHING WANG THA'I

@266 JI'I GO SA DANG BCAS AU RU SU DANG, THO (THOD) DKAR PHYOGS KYI RGYAL PO BYAS TE YAR KHYEN

GYI MKHAR LA BZHUGS, DE LA SRAS LNGA DANG, SRAS MO GCIG YOD PA, SRAS CHE BA AA PTO NI

RANG GI PHA'I RGYAL TSAB BYAS SHING, SRAS GNYIS PA, AI MA MA HU LIS TUR KI (TU RKshI) DANG,

KA SPUL SOGS KHA CHE'I YUL GYI RGYAL PO BYAS TE SA MAR KAN dA'I MKHAR LA BZHUGS, SRAS

GSUM PA A'A TIR MAH'ATA MTA RGYA GAR PHYOGS KYI RGYAL POR BSKOS TE PA LA SHA'I MKHAR DU BZHUd,

SRAS BZHI PA KONG KHAR NI, HENG GE RE DANG, RO 'OM PHYOGS KYI RGYAL POR BSKOS NAS STMBA

LA'I MKHAR DU BZHUGS, SRAS LNGA PA THE MUR NI, AO ROD KYI RGYAL POR BSKOS TE BA SBU HA RA'I

MKHAR LA BZHUGS, SRAS MO KU LUG, NI GAR, KHA NUM, (QUTLUG NIGER KHANUM)

DES AU MAR, SHEG, MIR DZA (UMAR SHAIKH MIRZA).... ZER BA DANG CHANG SA

RGYAB STE DE'I BU RGYUD LA RGYA GAR MO 'GOL GYI RGYAL PO DANG PO CAMBRIDGE HISTORY OF INDIAN, VOL.IV, BY BURN. SBAR PA (BUBAR) BYUNG, CHING

GE SE KH'ANG GI SRAS GSUM PA AUI GO TA'I NI, KH'ANG GI GO SA DANG BCAS BOG TO KH'ANG RANG GI

RGYAL TSAB TU DBANG BSKUR TE SOG YUL RANG DU BZHUGS, KHONG GI SRAS RGAN PA GO YUG DANG,

GZHON PA GO DAN GDUNG RABS NANG THO LO NO YON GYI SRAS GO DAN ZHES 'KHOD 'DUG, GYIS PHA MES KYI SHUL ZIN TE SOG YUL RANG GI RGYAL PO'I THOG ,GO DAN

GYIS NYING SH'A DANG, BOD SA MTSO SNGON PHYOGS KYI DPON BYAS SHING, DE DANG NYE BA'I BOD KYI

SA SDE KHAG LA LUNG PHRAN BU RE BSGYUR, CHING GE SE KH'ANG GI SRAS BZHI PA THO LO NO YON NI, RGYA

RGYAL RABS GNYIS LA GO BSDUR BYAS PA YIN, BA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO ZHIG BYAS SO,,

KYANG, RING MO NAS BLA MAR BZUNGS TE BOD MI KUN KHRAL NAS BTON ZHING, DBUS GTZANG

GI RTEN GSUM BCAS LA BSNYEN BKUR MDZAD PA'I BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG CHEN POR GYUR TO, ,

DU BYON NAS RI KHROD CIG LA BZHUGS SKABS, KHONG RNAMS LA HOR GYI RU PA DAG GIS LUG RDZI

@270 RDO'I CHAR BABS RDO'I CHAR BABS SA NI 'PHAN PO CHAG LA'I STENG YIN ZER, PAS KHO TSO 'JIGS TE BSHAGS PA PHUL ZHING, LHA KHANG DANG, DGON PA GTOR

BA GSO BA'I PHYIR GSER MANG PO PHUL, DE NAS BOD SHING SGO CAN PHAL CHER GYIS BABS BLANGS

(NGO GTAD) NAS, SHAR KONG PO'I YUL YAN CHAD NAS, NUB BAL PO DANG, LHO MON LA

THUG TSUN CHAD KYI BTZAN PO'I MKHAR RNAMS BSGYEL, SDE DPON DANG, YUL TSAN SO SOS

'DAB NOR SPROD RGYU BYAS PA TZAM LAS, SDE DGON RNAMS KYI BDAG DBANG TSANG MA SNGAR RGYUN DANG,

BOD KYI NANG HOR GYI GSER YIG PA DANG, 'DED PA'I 'GRUL BZHUD MA GTOGS, DBANG CHA

'DZIN MKHAN SOG PO'I MI SNA BSDAD PA NI BYUNG MED DO, ,

DE NAS GO DAN KH'ANG GIS HOR SOG GI YUL DU LAM GYI GNAD STON SHES PA'I

BLA MA BZANG PO ZHIG DGOS PAS, DENG DUS DBUS GTZANG NA SU BZANG, ZHES DRI BA 'BYOR

BAR, DOR RTAS, DGE 'DUN GYI SDE NI BKA' GDAMS PA CHE, MI CHOS NI STAG LUNG PA

MKHAS, GZI BRJID NI 'BRI GUNG PA CHE, CHOS NI SA SKYA PAndI TA MKHAS, ZHES LAN BTANG

BAS, GO DAN KH'ANG GIS, GSER YIG PA RDOR SRI MGON DANG, DBON JO DAR CAN CHED

MNGAGS SA SKYA PAndI TA KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO SOG YUL DU GDAN ZHUR BTANG NGO,,

DE YANG, RJE BTZUN PAndI TA DE NYID KYI GDUNG RGYUD NI, BOD KYI YUL DU

LHA SRIN DAR BA'I TSE, MA SANGS SPUN BDUN BYUNG BA'I MTHA' CHUNG THOG TSA DPA' BO STAG BYUNG LA

MON BZA' MTSO MO RGYAL ZER BA ZHIG KHAB TU BSUS PAR SRAS GA-YA' SPANGS SKYES 'KHRUNGS,

DES SRIN PO SKYA RENGS KHRAG MED BSAD, GA-YA' GRUM BSIL MA 'PHROGS TE KHAB TU BZHES

PAR SRAS SHIG BYUNG BA DE SRIN PO DANG, MA SANGS 'KHON PA'I BAR DU SKYES PAS MING LA JO BO

'KHON BAR SKYES SU BTAGS, DE'I RGYUD PA LA 'KHON GYI GDUNG RGYUD DU GRAGS, 'KHON KLU'I

@271 DBANG PO SOGS MKHAS DANG GRUB PA'I RGYUD PA ZAM MI CHAD PA LAS, 'KHON SH'AKYA BLO GROS LA

SRAS GNYIS BYUNG BA'I CHE BA 'KHON SHES RAB TSUL KHRIMS DANG, CHUNG BA 'KHON DKON MCHOG

RGYAL PO 'KHRUNGS, DKON MCHOG RGYAL POS 'BROG MI LO TZ'A BA DANG, BA RI LO TZ'A BA, SMAR

LO TZ'A BA, SPU HRENG LO TZ'A BA, GNAM KHA'U BA SKU MCHED SOGS BLA MA MANG PO BSTEN, BRA BO

LUNG PAR DGON PA CHUNG DU ZHIG BTAB STE LO MANG BZHUGS PAS SA SKYA GOG POR GRAGS SHING,

DE'I RI RTZE NAS GZIGS PAS, DPON PO RI'I NGOS 'GRAM NA SA DKAR ZHING SNYUM PA BKRA SHIS

PA'I MTSAN MAR MKHYEN NAS, YUL DE'I BDAG PO JO BO GDONG NAG CAN LA RTA DANG, NOR BU'I

'PHRENG BA SOGS RIN DU SPRAD DE NYOS, DER DPAL LDAN SA SKYA'I DGON PA BTAB PAS DE NAS

BZUNG SA SKYA PA ZHES SNYAN PAR GRAGS PA DE BYUNG NGO, ,

'KHON DKON MCHOG RGYAL PO'I SRAS RJE BTZUN KUN DGA' SNYING PO NI, MDO

SNGAGS KYI CHOS DU MA LA THOS BSAM SGOM PA PHUL DU PHYIN PAR MDZAD, GSANG CHEN RDO RJE

THEG PA'I BSTAN PA'I BDAG POR GYUR, DAM PA DE LA SRAS 'KHON DKON MCHOG 'BAR DANG,

RJE BTZUN BSOD NAMS RTZE MO, RJE BTZUN GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN, DPAL CHEN 'OD PO CHE STE,

SRAS BZHI BYUNG BA, CHUNG SHOS DPAL CHEN 'OD PO CHER SRAS GNYIS LAS, CHE BA RJE BTZUN

KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN GDUNG RABS RIN PO CHE'I BAR MDZOD DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG 40- BA- TU RJE BTZUN KUN DGA' SNYING PO'I SRAS GSUM PA KUN

DGA' RGYAL MTSAN YIN TSUL GSAL 'DUG KYANG, LO RGYUS 'DI GZHAN KUN DANG MI MTHUN ZHING, KHU BO GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYI SNYUN GA-YOG

ZHUS PAS RTOGS PA 'KHRUNGS TSUL SA PAn NYID KYIS GSUNGS ZHES SKYABS RJE KHRI BYANG RIN PO CHES BKA' PHEBS, DANG, CHUNG BA ZANGS TSA BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN GNYIS BYUNG ZHING,

RJE BTZUN KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN NI, RAB BYUNG GSUM PA'I CHU STAGS 1182 LOR 'KHRUNGS,

RJE BTZUN 'DI PAS MKHAS SHING GRUB PA'I BLA MA DU MA BSTEN NAS, RIG PA'I GNAS LNGA DANG,

@272 MDO SNGAGS YONGS RDZOGS LA MKHAS PAR GYUR NAS SA SKYA PAndI TA ZHES SNYAN PA'I GRAGS PAS

PHYOGS KUN TU KHYAB, DGUNG LO NYI SHU RTZA LNGAR PHEBS DUS NYANG SMAD RGYAN GONG GTZUG LAG KHANG

DU; KHA CHE PAndI TA CHEN PO SH'AKYA SHRI BHA DRA'I DRUNG LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, DE'I PHYI LOR KHA CHE PAn CHEN GYIS SOL NAG THANG PO CHER SANGS RGYAS MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS NAS DA LTA'I RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I ME YOS BAR

LO CHIG STONG BDUN BRGYA LNGA BCU THAM PA SONG ZHES BSTAN RTZIS MDZAD PA DE NI, LO GCIG GIS MA GTOGS DENG DUS MDO SDE

GNAS BRTAN PA'I LUGS DANG KHYAD PAR MI 'DUG, MANG YUL SKYID

GRONG DU MU STEGS PA'I STON PA 'PHROG BYED DGA' BO DE LUNG RIG GYI RTZOD PA DANG, RDZU 'PHRUL

GNYIS KYI SGO NAS TSAR BCAD PA SOGS YANGS PA'I SA CHEN PO KUN TU MTSAN SNYAN GYIS YONGS SU

KHYAB PA'I SKYES BU DAM PA DER, CHEN PO HOR GYI RGYAL KHAMS NAS, RGYAL PO AU GO TA'I KH'ANG

GI SRAS CHUNG BA GO DAN KH'ANG GIS GSER YIG PA RDOR SRI CAN GDONG GDAN ZHU'I ZHU YIG 'DI LTA BU

ZHIG PHUL 'DUG,

TSE RING GNAM GYI SHE MONG LA, BSOD NAMS CHEN POS DPAL LA BRTEN

NAS RGYAL PO NGED KYI LUNG, SA SKYA PAndI TA KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO LA GO BAR BYA

BA'I GTAM, NGED KYI PHA MA DANG, GNAM SA'I DRIN LAN 'JAL BA'I PHYIR, LAM GYI BLANG

DOR MA NOR BA STON SHES PA'I BLA MA GCIG DGOS PA BRTAG PA BYA DUS KHYOD DU 'DUG PA, LAM

GYI DKA' TSEGS LA MA BLTA BAR YONG DGOS, GAL TE NA SO RGAS ZER NA, SNGON THUB PA'I

DBANG POS SEMS CAN GYI DON DU LUS GRANGS MED SBYIN PA BTANG BA JI TZAM, KHYED KYI CHOS GO

BA'I DAM BCA' DANG AE 'GAL, NGAS MTHA'I KHRIMS RVA SLANGS, DMAG DPUNG CHEN POS

BRDA 'DED BYAS NA SEMS CAN MANG PO LA GNOD PA BYAS NA MI SKRAG PA AE YIN, DES NA SANGS

RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA DANG, SEMS CAN MANG PO LA SOMS LA KHYOD MGYOGS PAR SHOG ,NYI MA

@273 NUB PHYOGS KYI BANDHE RNAMS KHYED SHES SU 'JUG PA YIN, GNANG SBYIN LA DNGUL BRE CHEN LNGA,

GOS CHEN GYI CHOS GOS MU TIG GI TSOM BU CAN LA MU TIG RDOG STONG PHRAG DRUG DANG, NYIS BRGYA,

GOS LU HANG GI RING 'GAG SNAM 'BOB DANG BCAS PA, KHA THI KHA TSANG MA YUG GNYIS, MTHON

THI KHA TSANG MA GNYIS, GOS CHEN SNA LNGA YUG NYI SHU RNAMS YOD, 'DI'I LON LA RDOR SRI

MGON DANG, DBON CHEN PO HOR GYI RGYAL KHAMS KYI RTOGS BRJOD NANG, 'DI'I LON LA RDOR SRI MGON DANG, DOR RTA GNYIS BTANG BA

YIN ZHES GSAL, JO DAR MA GNYIS BTANG BA YIN, 'BRUG LO ZLA BA BRGYAD PA'I GNAM

GANG LA BRIS, GDUNG RABS RIN CHEN BANG MDZOD DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG 62-NA, ZHES ZHU YIG 'BUL RTEN DANG BCAS HOR GYIS GDAN ZHUR SLEBS PAR, RJE

BTZUN MCHOG DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE GNYIS SU PHEBS PAS SKU NA BGRES LA, SA THAG RING BA

BCAS DE LTAR YANG, SA PAn GYI KHU BO RJE BTZUN GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, DUS NAM

ZHIG NA SHAR PHYOGS NAS KHYED GDAN 'DREN PA 'DI LTA BU 'ONG, DE'I DUS THE TSOM MED PAR SONG

ZHIG DANG, BSTAN PA DANG, 'GRO BAR PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BAR 'GYUR RO ZHES LUNG

BSTAN PA THUGS SU DRAN NAS BYON PAR ZHAL GYIS BZHES, ZANGS TSA'I SRAS DBON PO 'PHAGS

PA BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN DGUNG LO BCU MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON NANG, DGUNG LO BCU DGU ZHES GSUNGS, LA PHEBS PA DANG, DE'I GCUNG PO PHYAG NA DGUNG LO DRUG

TU PHEBS PA BCAS PHYAG PHYIR 'KHRID NAS, RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I SHING 'BRUG, 1244 LOR

SA SKYA NAS PHEBS THON GYIS LAM BAR LHA SAR PHEBS TE GTZUG LAG KHANG DU MCHOD 'BUL RGYA CHE

SLOB DPON MDZAD DE DBON 'PHAGS PA BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN RAB TU BYUNG, DE NAS RIM PAS

GNAS SHING, CHING GE SE KH'ANG STOBS SHUGS CHE SKABS MI NYAG PA RNAMS KHA 'THOR TE BYANG GI MI NYAG CES SOG YUL NANG

RAB KHA RGYAN DU, BLA MA MNYES TE, NAM MKHA'I KHAMS NI KHRAG GI MDOG LTAR DMAR, RKANG LEB RO YIS PHYI YI RGYA MTSO KHEBS, 'DI 'DRA BCAD PA'I

@293 PA'I MTSAN BSTOD PHUL ZHING, ZANG ZING 'BUL BAR YANG DNGUL BRE CHEN STONG RA CHEN, GOS

DE LTA BU'I CHOS DANG, SRID KYI MDZAD PA MTHA' YAS PA DAG GNANG STE

BOD LJONGS SU PHEBS RGYU'I DGONGS PA GTAD PA'I TSE, PHYIS MCHOD YON MI MJAL BA'I RTEN

'BREL DBANG GIS RGYAL PO KH'ANG GIS BLA MA DANG 'BRAL MI PHOD PA'I THUGS NYAMS 'KHRUNGS

NAS PHEBS SKYEL DU ZHAG NAS ZLA BAR SPAR, ZLA BA LOR SPAR TE BOD KYI YUL, SPOM RA

LHA'I BYA 'DABS, RMA GU RI'I LHA ZHOL, RMA CHU'I KHUG PA'I SA CHA BAR RGYAL PO NYID YAN

DGE 'DUN RGYAL MTSAN GYI 'GO BYAS GTZANG GI DRUNG 'KHOR DPA' RKYEN 'DZOMS PA BDUN GTONG GNANG

DPA' MDZAD SA THABS SHES LA BRTEN NAS DUNG TSO'I DPON DON GRUB DAR RGYAS RJES 'BRANGS DANG BCAS

DANG, RGYANG MKHAR GYI RI SRUNG BA'I 'GAN GNANG BAR BRTEN MNGA' BDAG DPAL 'KHOR BTZAN GYI PHO

BRANG GI SHUL DU RGYANG MKHAR GYI RDZONG CHEN BRTZIGS RGYA BOD YIG TSANG MKHAS PA DGA' BYED, RDZONG CHEN DE LA SNGAR RGYANG MKHAR ZER YANG RJES SU RGYAL RTZE RDZONG ZHES 'BOD 'DUG, SO ZHES DANG, YANG, DPAL LDAN SHAR KA
