BGRES PA GNYIS KYIS RGYANG RTZE DANG SENG GE RTZE BZUNG ZHING, YAB BZANG PO RGYAL MTSAN GYIS 'BRONG

RTZE BZUNG, GCUNG DAR POS BRGYA GRONG DU RE ZHIG BZHUGS KYANG, RJES SU KA LA KHYUNG RDZONG

BRTZIGS TE GSHEGS, DE'I SRAS AA CHEN BZANG PO DPAL GYIS GANGS LA'I RDZONG DANG, RIM

PAS GTING SKYES KYI RDZONG CHEN BRTZEGS SHING, RTEN GSUM DPAG MED BZHENGS PA SOGS KYI LO DPAL LDAN SHAR KA BA'I GDUNG RABS RGYAN GYI 'PHRENG BA,

RGYUS HA CANG SNYAN PO DAG YOD,

DE YANG, DPON CHEN SH'AKYA BZANG PO NAS, GZHON DBANG BAR GONG DU SMRAS

ZIN PA DANG, DPON CHEN BYANG RDOR DANG, AAG LEN SKABS GDAN SA'I LCAGS RI PHYI MA DANG,

@304 DBON PO RI'I LCAGS RI BTAB, GZHON DBANG DANG, BYANG RIN, AAG LEN 'DI GSUM GYI

RING 'BRI GUNG PA DANG 'THAB, LHAG PAR AAG LEN SKABS 'BRI GUNG GDAN SAR GRAGS PA RIN

CHEN PHEBS TE LO GNYIS 'GRO BA'I LCAGS STAG 1290 LOR KHRI SKOR BCU GSUM GYI DMAG

BSKUL NAS 'BRI GUNG GLING LOG CES PA'I BCOM 'KHYER CHEN PO 'DI BYAS, DEB SNGON DANG, 'PHRUL GYI LDE MIG, GDUNG RABS, RDZOGS LDAN GZHON NU'I DGA' STON BCAS KYI NANG, GNUBS

GDAN SAR BZHUGS THOG GLING LOG CHEN PO DE BYUNG, 'DU KHANG LA ME BRGYAB PAS DGE 'DUN KHRI TSO TZAM GNAM YANGS NAS NAM

MKHA' LA 'PHUR ZER, ZHAL NGO KONG POR BROS, ZHES GSUNGS 'DUG, DGON YUL TSANG

MA ME LA BSREGS, DGE 'DUN DANG, MI SKYA MANG PO BSAD, 'PHROS BROS PA RNAMS KONG

PO BAR DED PAS DRAG SHUL CAN GYI DPON CHEN AAG LEN KONG POR 'BYOR BA'I MING SA MTSAMS

KYI BARG GA-YANG LA BRKOS PA SOGS RGYU CHUNG RKYEN CHE'I LAS KA TSABS CHE DE BYUNG,

SA 'BRI 'THAB PA'I RKYEN JI BYUNG SKOR LA CHOS 'BYUNG PHAL CHE BA'I NANG GSAL

BA ZHIG MA GSUNGS KYANG, ZUR TZAM RE KHA 'THOR GYIS GSUNGS PA KHAG SKABS 'DIR PHYOGS

BSDOMS KYIS CUNG ZAD GSAL BAR BRJOD NA, 'BRI GUNG GLING LOG GI RKYEN DANG PO NI, 'BRI

GUNG DBON RIN PO CHE BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA GSHEGS PA'I DUS SU, GANGS TI SIR 'GRO BA'I

'BRI GUNG PA'I RI 'BRI GUNG SKYOBS PA 'JIG RTEN GSUM MGON DANG, GLING RAS PA PADMA RDO RJE'I SKU DUS NAS BZUNGS 'BRI GUNG PA DANG, 'BRUG PA

BKA' RGYUD PAS GANGS TI SI DANG RTZA RI LA PHYI GSUM LA SGOM SGRUB BYED MI GTONG BA'I SROL YOD PA DE TSOR RIM ZER BA RED, PA TSAN GCIG SA SKYAR PHYIN, CHOS RJES PAn GYIS, RIN PO CHE 'OG MIN DU

GSHEGS SAM, GSHEGS LTAS CI BYUNG GSUNGS PAS, RI PA GCIG NA RE, 'OG MIN CI

YIN STENG MIN DU GSHEGS MOD, RING BSREL GYI CHAR BABS, PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO'I GSER SKU

KHRU GANG BYON, ZER BAS CHOS RJES CANG MA GSUNGS, SANG NYIN CHOS GRVAR, NGAS KHYED TSO LA

@305 MKHAS DRAG GI DRIN MED DE, KHA SANG GI KHA 'CHAL DE 'DRA KHA NAS MA 'ONGS TZAM 'DI NGA'I DRIN YIN

GSUNGS, DE THEL PAS THOS PAS THUGS LA MA 'THAD, DPON RDO RJE DPAL GTZANG GI DPON BYED

DUS, DE'I ZHE NAD DU, RJES PAn GYI CHOS GRVA LA RTA RGYUGS, ZANGS MO CHE LA RTA CHU BLUD,

SPYIL BU BSHIG NAS BRGYA SRANG BCOS, DE LTA BU LA SA SKYA PA RNAMS THUGS LAM DAN, PHYIS

'PHAGS PA RIN PO CHE THUGS SHIN TU BZANG ZHING, THAMS CAD LA PHAN BDE 'BA' ZHIG DGONGS

PAS BYED THABS MA BYUNG YANG, SKU GSHEGS RJES SU DE 'PHRAL NAS 'BRI GUNG GI RTZOD GZHI BYUNG

ZHES DEB DMAR DU BRIS MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON GYI YAN LAG GSUM PA, KARMA KAM TSANG CHOS 'BYUNG SHOG LHE 625 SNANG ZHES GSAL BA DANG, RKYEN GZHAN PA GCIG NI, 'BRI GUNG RIN PO CHE u GRAG SYES BLA MA 'PHAGS PA LAS RGYUD DANG GDAMS NGAG ZHUS, BLA MA SHAR PA YE RIN PA LA KHO

RANG GI DBON PO GNAG TSA BRAG SLE BA PHUL, DE LA SA SKYA PAS GDAN SA BSKO RTZIS MDZAD PAS GCUNG RGYA BOS BSKYANGS, DE RTING RIN PO CHE GRAGS YE GRONGS NAS, RIN PO CHE GCUNG RGYA BO

GRAGS PA RIN CHEN GYIS GDAN SA MDZAD, SA SKYA PAS BRAG SLE BA'I KHA MCHU RTZOD RTZIS BYAS PAS

GCUNG RGYA'I RTING 'BRI GUNG PAS MNAN, SA 'BRI 'KHRUG PA'I 'GO TSUGS TSAL PA'I DEB DMAR SHOG LHE 37-NA-5 ZHES GSAL BA DANG,

DPON RDO RJE DPAL GYIS BRNYAS BCOS BYAS PA LA BRTEN RIM PAS 'KHON 'DZIN CHE RU PHYIN TE SA 'BRI

GNYIS BRAG SLE BA'I SKOR LA KHA MCHU BYUNG, DE DUS BOD NANG GO DAN GYI SHUGS YOD PA'I SKABS

SHIG MIN NAM, STAG TSANG LO TZ'A BAS SA 'BRI 'KHRUG PA'I 'GO TSUGS DUS, KHRIMS KYI

GTUGS BSHER LA PHYOGS PHYOGS NAS MI DRAG PA 'GRO DGOS DUS DPON SH'AKYA BZANG PO (LO DUS

SGRIG SKABS DE DUS DPON CHEN BYED RGYU YIN 'DUG) DANG, GDAN SA GSUM BSAM STE BLOS BLANGS NAS

@306 BYON, KHRIMS LUGS SU SONG BAS TSAL GUNG THANG NAS, PHO BRANG SHANG THO'I BAR AAN 'KHUR

NAS RKANG THANG LA BYON, GONG DU GTUGS BSHER LEGS, SA KYA PA'I BYA BA RNAMS GANG 'DOD

LTAR LEGS PAR BSGRUBS NAS YAR 'KHOR DUS, KHONG RNAM PA GSUM LA YUS CHE BA'I MI

GSUM DU GRAGS YIG TSANG MKHAS PA DGA' BYED, PA BYUNG ZHES GSAL BA DE LTAR SA 'BRI RTZOD DE SA SKYA RGYAL BAR GYUR KYANG, 'BRI

GUNG PA PHAM PA'I ZHE NAD KYIS 'BRI GUNG PA SKU ZHANG TSUL RGYAL GYIS BYA YUL (SA SKYA PA'I KHONGS GTOGS

BYA YUL DGON) DU DMAG DRANGS, BANDE DGU BSAD, LHA KHANG GI RTZIG PA'I NANG DU LO PAS

GTOR MA SBAS YOD PA'I GTAM LA BRTEN BTZAL BAS RNYED DE GTOR MA GCIG PHYUNG NAS 'PHANGS PAS

SKU ZHANG PA YAB SRAS THAMS CAD MI LAG TU SONG, GTOR MA BTON DUS MA BSKAMS PAR RLON

PAR 'DUG CES GRAGS, BYA YUL BA'I GDAN SA KHAMS LUNG PA'I RJES SU, CHU LUG, SHING SPRE,

SHING BYA GSUM GTZANG STON PAS MDZAD SKABS KYI SHING BYA 1285 LOR 'BRI GUNG PAS GTZANG STON

BKRONGS, BYA YUL DGON PA MER BSREGS, DEB SNGON CA PA'I SHOG GRANGS 28-NA-5 DE LA BRTEN NAS RTZOD GZHI JE CHER SONG STE DPON

CHEN AAG LEN GYIS LCAGS STAG 1290 LOR KHRI SKOR BCU GSUM GYI DMAG BSKUL TE 'BRI GUNG

GI GZIM SPYI LA MA GTOGS GLING YONGS RDZOGS MER BSREGS PA'I YO LANGS DE BYUNG, 'BRI GUNG

PAS STOD HOR GYI DMAG 'BUM 'KHRID NAS SA SKYA BCOM PAR YONG SKABS, DPON CHEN AAG LEN

GYI DMAG DPAL MO DPAL THANG DU SONG, SA SKYAS SGRUB PA MDZAD PAS HOR PHAM, DMAG KHRI

TSO GSUM GANGS 'UR GYIS MNAN SONG ZER BA DANG, SMIN 'GRO 'DZAM BSHAD DU, SA SKYA NAS

BYANG DU BYIN LAM TZAM GYI SAR BLA MA KHA'U PAS MGON PO ZHAL SGRUB PA'I GNAS KH'U BRAG RDZONG ZHES PA

DE YOD, DE NAS BYANG DU GANGS RGYUD CHEN PO YOD PA DE'I RGYAB NA SRIN PO'I RIGS CAN GYI STOD HOR GYI

@307 SDE YOD, 'ON KYANG SNGAR SA 'BRI MA 'CHAMS PA'I SKABS 'BRI GUNG PAS KLA KLO KA SI KA RA STE,

HA SHI HAR DU GRAGS PA'I DMAG BSKUL BA SA SKYA'I PHYOGS RGYUD LA YONG PA DA LTA GANGS RI'I RGYAB TU

RTAGS GCIG YOD PA DANG, KHA'U MGON KHANG NANG YOD PA'I KLA KLO'I MGO LAG BYA BA DE KA SI

KA RA PA'I MGO DANG, LAG CHEN PO HOR GYI RTOGS BRJOD SHOG GRANGS 54-BA-6 PA YIN, ZHES GSAL BA DANG, DPON CHEN AAG LEN NI YAR

'BROG SNA DKAR RTZE PA'I ZHAL NGO YIN PAS, SNA DKAR RTZE'I MGON PO ZHAL GYI MGON KHANG NANG ZHING

BCU BSGRAL BA'I MDUNG ZHES PA 'DI DGRA 'BRI GUNG PA BSGRAL BA'I MDUNG YIN ZHES GNAS BSHAD

KYANG BYED SROL YOD PA BCAS RGYU CHUNG DES RKYEN CHEN PO DE 'DRA BA BZOS 'DUG, RTOGS LDAN GRAGS

PA SENG GES ('DI ZHVA DMAR BA SKU 'PHRENG DANG PO YIN) DGUN BDE CHEN DU BSGOMS PAS SGYU LUS

DANG, RMI LAM LA RTZAL THON PAR BYUNG BAS, STOD HOR GYI DMAG SKAD CHEN PO BYUNG BA YANG

DMAG MTSO MA DROS PA NAS LOG PAR GZIGS PA BZHIN, ZLA BA PHYED NAS DMAG MI DGOS PA'I

SKAD DEB SNGON NYA PA'I SHOG GRANGS 55-NA-1 CHA BYUNG, ZHES GSAL BA, STOD HOR GYI DMAG YONG RGYU'I SBIR GRAGS CHEN PO YOD BZHIN

PAR GLO BUR DU DMAG PHYIR LOG RGYAG STANGS DES GANGS 'UR SOGS KYIS SKYON BYUNG BA GTAN GTAN MIN

NAM SNYAM, 'ON KYANG GONG GI GNAS TSUL 'GA' SHAS KYI LO TSIGS CUNG ZAD MI 'GRIGS PAS

DOGS PA'I GNAS KYANG YONG GI 'DUG PA MA ZAD, DPON CHEN AAG LEN LA'ANG, AANG LEN

ZHES YIG CHA KHA SHAS LA 'KHOD 'DUG PAS DE GNYIS KA CHOS RGYAL 'PHAGS PAS 'DOGS GNANG

MDZAD PA'I LO RGYUS DU KU LA'I GOS BZANG KA PA'I SHO GRANGS 21-NA-6 KHUNGS DAG YANG 'DUG ,KLA KLO KA SI KA RA BYA BA'I SKOR LA, KLA KLO NI DE DUS

NANG PA SANGS RGYAS PA'I CHOS MI BYED MKHAN KHA CHE SOGS LA ZER BA DANG, YANG GAR LOG KYANG ZER

@308 BA YONGS GRAGS DANG, KA SI KA RA NI, YAR KHYEN GYI SA KHONGS SU KA SHI SGAR ZER BA ZHIG YOD

PA DE TSO'I MI RIGS KYI DMAG CIG YONG BA MIN NAM SNYAM, YAR KHYEN DANG, AAB GHA NA SE THAN,

TAG SE KHAN, KRAR KI SI THAN SOGS KYI LO RGYUS NANG THON RGYU MED DAM SNYAM LO MANG ZHIB RTZAD YANG

YANG BYAS KYANG MA BRNYED, NYE DUS RGYA GAR GYI LO RGYUS (CAMBRIDGE HISTORY OF INDIA)

ZHES PA'I DEB DANG PO NAS, BZHI PA BAR 'DUG PA DE DAG LA ZHIB 'JUG CIG BYED SKABS,

WA SE LI HEG (WALSELEY HAIG) ZHES PAS BRIS DEB AANG 3 KLOG SKABS, SHOG

GRANGS 154 NAS 156 NANG, LDI LIR KHA CHE'I RGYAL PO MA MUT TU GLAG (MUHAMAD

TUGHLUQ) GIS BOD LA RTA DMAG 'BUM PHRAG GCIG DANG, RKANG DMAG KHYON CHE BTANG

BA RI BRGYUD KYI SA MTSAMS SHIG NAS CHAR ZHOD CHE BAS DMAG MIR SHI SKYON CHEN PO BYUNG STE PHYIR BSHIG

RGYAG DGOS BYUNG BA'I LO RGYUS SHIG THON PA STOD HOR RAM, KLA KLO KA SI KA RA'I DMAG ZHIG BYUNG

BA'I LO RGYUS 'DI RANG YIN PA YID CHES SHIN TU GSAL PO BYUNG BA NI, 'DI LTA STE, RGYA GAR GYI

RGYAL PO MA MUT TUG LAG GIS 'DZAM GLING DBANG BA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO ZHIG BYED YAG GI RE BA YOD

PA RED, KHONG GI LAS THOG RING NOR 'KHRUL KHA SHAS BYUNG BA'I NANG NAS NOR 'KHRUL CHE SHOS SHIG

SPYI LO 1337-8 NANG LA BYAS YOD PA RED, MA MUT TUG LAG GIS, KHRANG SO DZA NI YA

DANG, PAR SHI YA LEN YAG GI RE BA 'DI MA BYUNG BA'I RJES LA, KHO'I RGYAL KHAB KYI BYANG SHAR

NGOS HI MA LA YA'I RI BRGYUD KYI RGYAB LA KHYAD MTSAR PO'I LUNG PA BOD DANG, DE'I PHAR PHYOGS LA

RGYA NAG CES PA'I LUNG PA CHEN PO YOD PA, KHO'I SEMS LA DMAG SHUGS CHEN PO ZHIG GIS

HI MA LA YA'I RI DE BRGAL THUB NA LUNG PA DE GNYIS GLO BUR LA LEN THUB KYI RED BSAM PA'I YID CHES

BYED KYI YOD PA RED, YIN NA YANG BOD KYI LUNG PA'I TSA GRANG GANG 'DRA YOD MED, LUNG PA DE'I

MI DE TSO GA 'DRA YOD MED, LA DANG, LAM KHA, BCA' PHRENG SOGS GA 'DRA YOD MED, RGYA

@309 GAR LUNG PA TSA PO'I NANG LA 'TSAR LONGS BYAS PA'I DMAG MIS LUNG PA GRANG MO DANG, KHAG PO

DE'I NANG LA 'GRO SDOD THUB MIN SOGS KYI BSAM BLO RTZA BA NAS MA 'KHOR BAR, KHOS BKA' BTANG NA

DMAG MI RNAMS KYIS DKA' NGAL GA RE YIN NA'I RGYAB STE LAS DON 'GRUB KYI RED BSAM GYI YOG

RED, DE 'DRA SONG TZANG, LDI LIR, DMAG DPON MA LIG NEG PA'I (MALIK NIKPAI)

ZHES PA'I 'OG LA RTA DMAG 'BUM GCIG DANG, RKANG DMAG KHYON CHE ZHIG GRA SGRIG BYAS TE,

DMAG DPUNG DE TSO NA GAR KOt 'AM KANG RA (NAGARKAT OR KANGRA) ZHES PA'I

GRONG GSEB DE TSO BLANGS BZHIN PHYIN PA DANG, DE BRGYUD PHYIN PA'I RTAGS, SBA DI RI CHAG (BADR-I

-CHACH) ZER BA'I SNYAN NGAG GI RTZOM NANG BRIS SHAG, KANG RA BRGYUD DE RI'I SGANG LA YOD PA'I

GRONG GSEB PA DE TSO BCOM 'PHROG BYED BZHIN DU HI MA LA YA'I RI BRGYUD PHYOGS LA PHYIN, DE

NAS GA-YANG SA CAN GYI LAM 'PHRANG DOG PO MI RTA RE LAS MA THAR BA'I LAM DE TSO BRGYUD WA RAN GHAR

(WARANGAR) ZHES PA'I SA CHA BTZAN PO DER SLEBS TE SDOD PA'I SKABS SNGAR MI SRID PA'I

CHAR PA SHUGS CHEN PO BABS TZANG DMAG MI DANG, RTA SOGS KHYON CHEN POR NA TSA 'PHOG STE SHI

CHAD DPAG TU MED PA BYUNG BA RED, DMAG DPON DE TSOS CHAR DUS DE'I RING SA DRO SAR SPOS TE

CHAR ZHOD CHAG PA DANG SA CHA DE TSO BRGYUD NAS DMIGS YUL RANG LA 'GRO CHOG PA'I GNANG BA ZHUS NAS,

KHO TSOS BCOM PA'I DNGOS PO RNAMS 'KHYER TE PHYI BSHIG RGYAG SKABS RI BRGYUD LA SDOD MKHAN GYI MI DE

TSOS BSGUGS RA SPRAS BSDAD NAS, DMAG MI DE TSO PHYI BSHIG RGYAB NAS YONG DUS RBAB RDO DANG,

SHING SOGS DBYUGS PA DANG, LA 'PHRANG SOGS BKAG STE DMAG MI LHAG 'PHROS PHAL CHER MED PA

BZOS PA DANG, BCOM 'PHROG BYAS PA'I DNGOS PO TSANG MA PHYIR 'PHROG BYAS 'DUG ,LDI LIR

DMAG DPON MA LIG NEG PA'I DANG, DPON PO GZHAN GNYIS, DMAG MI BCU THAM PA MA

GTOGS PHYIR LOG BYED MA THUB TZANG, RGYAL PO MA MUT TUG LAG ZHE DRAG NGO TSA PO BYUNG BA RED, RGYAL

@310 PO DES RI BRGYUD LA SDOD PA'I MI DE TSO DANG MNYAM DU ZHI BA'I GROS CHOD CIG KYANG BZO DGOS BYUNG BA'I

NANG, RGYAL PO'I DMAG DPUNG NAS RI THANG MTSAMS SU YOD PA'I SA ZHING LA DMAG MIS GNOD

PA BTANG BA'I GYONG GSAB LA LO LTAR KHRAL PHRAN BU SPROD RGYU YANG BZO DGOS BYUNG BA RED,

DMAG GI LAS KA DE YAG PO MA BYUNG BA'I 'BRAS BUS KHONG GI CHAB SRID LA

SKYON ZHE DRAG CHAGS PA DANG, DMAG SHUGS CHEN PO ZHIG RTZA MED BZOS PA, GO LAG SOGS

KHYON CHE SHOR BAS MA TSAD, MA MUT RANG GI MING MTHONGS LA SKYON CHEN PO BYAS PA RED, DE SONG

TZANG KHOS SNGON LA DBANG SHUGS KYIS BLANGS PA'I LUNG PA MANG POS MI DGA' BAR BSDAD YOD PA

TSOS NGO RGOL BYAS TE, DE PHYIN CHAD SNGON DU DMAG GRA SGRIG DUS LTA BU'I DMAG GRA 'GRIGS

PO RTZA BA NAS YONG GI MED PA RED, CES DANG, RGYA GAR GYI RGYAL RABS BRIS MI MKHAS PA DE

TSO'I BSAM 'CHAR LA, MA MUT TUG LAG GIS BOD DANG, RGYA NAG BLANGS YAG GI BSAM BLO

RGYA CHE DE 'DRA YOD PA MIN, YIN NA'I DE'I SKABS KYI SBAR NE (BARNI) ZHES PA'I DPON PO

GCIG DANG, AIB BA THU THA (IBN BATUTAH) ZER BA GNYIS NAS GSAL BSHAD BYED YAG

LA BOD DANG, RGYA GAR GYI BAR LA SA CHA KA RA JAL (KARA-JOL) ZER BA ZHIG YOD PA DE

LEN YAG GI BSAM BLO GTAN GTAN 'DUG THE CAMGRIDGE HISTORY OF INDIA, VOL, III, PP. 154-156. CES BRIS 'DUG ,LO DUS SGRIG TSE LO SUM CU

SKOR HE BAG THON PA LAS, DMAG MI'I 'BOR DANG, BOD PA'I DMAG MI DANG 'THAB LAG

MA 'PHROD GONG RKYEN NGAN GYIS PHYIR LOG MI BYA THU MED BYUNG BA, DE YANG RGYA GAR GYI YIG CHAR CHAR ZHOD

DANG, BOD KYI YIG CHAR GANGS 'UR ZHES GSAL BA HI MA LA YA'I RI BRGYUD LHO PHYOGS SU CHAR

ZHOD MI SRID PA ZHIG BYUNG NA, DE'I BYANG PHYOGS KYIS MTHO SAR GANGS NGES PAR YONG BA YID CHES

TSAD MAS SGRUB THUB PA DANG, SKABS DE'I TSE BOD PA TSOS PHYI PA'I CHOS BYED TSANG MAR KLA KLO ZER

@311 BAS DMAG TSOGS DE DAG KHA CHE'I MI RIGS YIN PA BCAS PHAL CHER RTZE MTHUN 'DUG PA DANG, KA

RA JAL ZHES PA SA SKYA ZER BA'I SGRA MA DAG PA ZHIG MIN NAM SNYAM PA BCAS 'BRI GUNG PA'I ROGS SU

YONG PA'I KLA KLO'I DMAG CES PA 'DI RANG YIN PA YID CHES BYAS CHOG PA 'DUG ,DA DUNG 'BRI GUNG

PA'I MI SNA SU PHYIN, SA LAM GA 'DRA ZHIG NAS PHYIN PA SOGS KYI YIG CHA KHUNGS DAG BYUNG NA THE

TSOM RTZA BA NAS BYED MA DGOS PA ZHIG YONG BA 'DUG GO,

DPON CHEN AAG LEN GYI RJES SU GZHON DBANG GIS BSKYAR DU DPON CHEN BYAS

ZER SENG GE, KUN DGA' RIN CHEN, DON YOD DPAL, YON BTZUN, SLAR YANG 'OD

BZHUGS SKABS, DPON CHEN RGYAL BA BZANG PO DANG, DBANG BRTZON MA 'GRIGS PA DANG, PHAG

MO GRU PA'I KHRI DPON DANG 'THAB PAS, SHING RTA 1354 LO STOD DU SA SKYA PAS DBUS KHUL

PHAL CHER PHAG GRUR SHOR, GDAN SAR BLA MA BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN DANG, DPON CHEN

DBANG BRTZON DANG, NAM MKHA' BRTAN PA'I SKABS, SA KHYI 1358 LOR SA SKYA'I DBANG LUNG

@313 CHEN DU BSKOS NAS, RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I SA KHYI, 1358 LOR TA'I SI TU BYANG CHUB RGYAL MTSAN

@312 RKYEN RNAMS SLAR 'JAGS SU GNANG STE DPAL LDAN SA SKYA PA'I CHOS RGYUD KYI BDAG PO MDZAD MUS

SU MCHIS SO, ,

SKABS DE'I YAS MAS SU KARMA PA RANG BYUNG RDO RJE RGYA SOG GI YUL GRUR SNGA

RJES LAN GNYIS PHEBS TE, RGYA HOR YON GYI GONG MA MTHA' MA THO GAN THE MUR GYI DBU BLAR GYUR

ZHING, CHOS THAMS CAD STONG PA NYID DU RTOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KARMA PA ZHES MTSAN GYIS

GZENGS BSTOD ZHUS PA DANG, CHIBS BSGYUR RJES MA'I SKABS RDZU 'PHRUL DANG, GRUB RTAGS

BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA STON BZHIN RGYA YUL RANG DU SKU GSHEGS, CHU SBRUL 1353 LOR DBUS

GTZANG DANG, BYANG RIGS KHUL DU SA GA-YOGS KYIS SA KHANG DANG, MI PHYUGS SOGS LA 'JIG

SKYON BYUNG, SKABS DE DAG GI DUS SU MKHAS SHING GRUB PA THOB PA'I SKYES BU DAM PA, DPA'

MDZANGS BRTUL PHOD CAN GYI DPA' BO, 'JIG RTEN DREGS PAS MYOS PA'I SDE DPON SOGS MANG

PO ZHIG BYUNG 'DUG PA DE DAG GI SKOR SKABS 'DIR YIG TSOGS LA 'JIGS TE MA BKOD KYANG,

ZHIG PAR GZIGS RTOGS 'DOD NA RANG RANG GIRNAMTHAR DANG, GDAN RABS, GDUNG RABS,

RTOGS BRJOD DAG LAS MKHYEN PAR 'GYUR RO, ,

DE LTAR, KUN MKHYEN YE BZANG RTZE BAS, SA SKYAS 'JIG RTEN GYI BDAG

PO LO BDUN CU DON LNGA MDZAD PA LA NANG TSAN BZHI THOG PAS LO NYI SHU RTZA LNGA DANG, SHAR PAS LO

NYI SHU RTZA LNGA, KHANG GSAR CHEN MOS LO NYI SHU RTZA LNGA STE, LO BDUN CU DON LNGA'I RJES LA SI TU BYANG

CHUB RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SA MO GLANG GI LO NAS SA'I BDAG PO MDZAD, DEB SNGON NGA PA'I SHOG GRANGS 7-NA-1 ZHES GSUNGS 'DUG KYANG,

DNGOS DON ZHIB RTZIS BYED SKABS, RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I CHU GLANG 1253 LOR KUB LA'I KH'ANG GIS

'GRO MGON CHOS RGYAL 'PHAGS PAR BOD CHOL KHA GSUM PHUL TE NYE GNAS SH'AKYA BZANG PO DPON

@314 SA BCAD LNGA PA,

PHAG MO GRU PA, RIN SPUNGS PA, GTZANG PA BCAS KYI SKOR,

*, ,RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I SA SPRE SPYI LO 1368 NAS RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SHING

SPRE SPYI LO 1644 BAR LA RGYA RGYAL MING GI RGYAL RGYUD TSOS BOD LA 'BREL BA BYED RGYU'I THOB

THANG DE SOG PO CHING GE SE KH'ANG RGYAL PO'I SKABS NAS BYUNG TSUL ZER BA 'DI LA LO RGYUD SMRA BA

TSOS SRID DON GYI THOG NAS YAG PO BYAS TE ZHIB 'JUG BYAS PA YIN NA DE LA KHYAD PAR CHEN PO

YOD PA RED, SOG PO CHING GE SE KH'ANG GI MI RGYUD NAS MNGA' THANG RGYA BSKYED BYED SKABS BOD

KYI SA CHA 'GA' SHAS LA DRAG PO'I SHUGS SLEBS TE MKHAR RDZONG MANG PO BSHIGS PA DANG,

'DAB NOR BLANGS PA SOGS KYIS SOG PO'I GRIB MA TZAM GYI 'OG LA YOD KYANG, CHU GLANG

SPYI LO 1253 LOR KUB LA'I KH'ANG GIS 'GRO MGON CHOS RGYAL 'PHAGS PAR CHOL KHA GSUM

MNGA' RIS DANG BCAS PA PHUL BA NAS BZUNGS BOD RANG BTZAN GTZANG MAR THON TE, BOD SOG

GNYIS MCHOD YON GYI 'BREL BA BYAS PAR BRTEN BOD NAS CHES MTHO'I BLA MA RGYA SOG YUL GRUR

PHEBS PA RED, RGYA NAG NI CUNG YUNG CAN GYIS 'GO 'KHRID BYAS TE SA SPRE 1368 LOR SOG

PO'I 'OG NAS RANG BTZAN BYUNG RJES BOD NAS BLA MA GDAN 'DREN ZHUS PA DE TSO SOG PO'I SKABS

GDAN 'DREN ZHUS PA DANG GCIG PA YOD PA MA YIN, M'ING GI ^ GONG MA TSOS BOD NANG CHOS

SRID GNYIS KYI BDAG PO SDE SRID PHAG MO GRU PA'I GDAN SA ^ GONG MA RNAMS GDAN 'DREN ZHU

YAG LA 'BAD RTZOL BYAS KYANG GDAN MA 'DRONGS PAR BRTEN, CHOS RANG GI THOG NAS CHES

MTHO'I BLA MA KHA SHAS GDAN 'DREN ZHUS TE MCHOD YON GYI 'BREL BA LA BRTEN NAS RGYA BOD RGYAL

KHAB PHAN TSUN GNYIS MTHUN LAM ZHI BDER GNAS THABS KHO NA LAS, RGYA BSKYED KYI BSAM PA

@315 RTZA BA NAS BYAS YOD PA MA RED,

SDE SRID PHAG MO GRU PA'AM, SNE GDONG PA'I SHUGS SLEBS TSUL NI,

SA SKYA'I 'OG TU KHRI DPON BCU GSUM YOD PA'I NANG NAS, 'BRU GUNG, PHAG GRU, TSAL PA

GSUM NI, SA SDE CHE SHOS TZAM MA ZAD, ZHABS 'BRING NANG MA'I GRAS SU GTOGS PA ZHIG

YIN KYANG, DPON CHEN 'GA' SHAS NAS KHRI DPON GZHAN GYI RGYUD BSKUL BSLU THABS SU

PHYIN TE PHAG GRUR SNGA PHYIR KHRIMS 'KHYOG DANG SDANG ZUG ,BTZAN GNON MANG PO BYAS

RKYEN, SNYING STOBS CAN GYI BYANG CHUB RGYAL MTSAN GYI DUS SU SKABS DANG BSTUN TE SA SKYA'I DBANG

CHA 'PHROGS PA RED, KHONG GI RGYUD PA NI, RLANGS KYI PO TI BSE RU LAS, RUS CHEN BCO

BRGYAD DANG, 'BRAS LA DKAR NAG KHRA GSUM SOGS DANG, BOD MI'U DUNG DRUG BYUNG TSUL

SHIN TU RGYAS PAR GSUNGS SHING, DE DAG GI RGYUD LAS, GNAM LHA MCHED BRGYAD KYI LNGA PA'I

SRAS SU SPRUL PA'I MING MANG LDOM STAG BTZAN GYIS RANG GI JO MO RONG BZA' KHYE LCAM LA SRAS MA

BYUNG STABS, SMAN BTZUN ZHIG DANG BSHOS PA LAS LO DUS SU SRAS SHIG 'KHRUNGS PA MAS LHA

RI'I RTZER 'KHYER TE GA-YAM SGROM ZHIG TU SRAS BZHAG NAS, MANG LDOM GYI SRAS YIN NA MI RGYUD LHA

LAS SRA BA DANG, MIN NA BYA DANG, GCAN GZAN GYIS ZA BAR SHOG CES SMON LAM BTAB, DER

MANG LDOM LA RGYU MTSAN RNAMS BSHAD PAS, SANG SNGA BAR YAB YUM GNYIS LHA RI'I RTZER PHYIN TE

GZIGS PAS, KHYE'U GA-YU'I ZUR PHUD CAN SPYI GTZUG NA RLANGS PA DKAR PO YOD PA DER BYA

RNAMS KYIS GSHOG PAS BKAB, GCAN GZAN DANG, RI DVAGS KYIS BSKOR BA BYED PA

GZIGS PAS, YAB DGYES TE, RLANGS LO RLANGS LO LAN GSUM RLANGS, GSUNGS PAS

@323 PA'I MTHA' MA 'JAM PO'I TSIG GIS DA LAN KHYOD RANG DGONGS PA ZHUS NA, NGAS LO GNYIS SAM,

GSUM NAS KHRI DPON KHYED RANG LA RANG 'JAGS SPROD RGYU'I KHAS LEN BYED KYI YIN LAB PAR, SI

TUS, KHYED RANG LA 'DI LTA BU'I MDZAD DKA' YOD NA, NGA DANG, BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN

GYI SKE LA THI'U TZE BRGYAB STE SA SKYA'I KHRIMS RVA CHEN POR BDEN PA ZHIB BSHER LA GTONG ROGS, DE

MIN NGA GSOD LA KHRI DPON RTZIS LONGS, ZHES RDO KHA DBYUGS PAS, DBANG BRTZON BYED THABS

MED PAR SI TU SNE GDONG LA PHYIR LOG GTONG DGOS BYUNG 'DUG ,'ON KYANG NANG CHEN DBANG BRTZON

BLO KHA MA KHENGS PA'I STABS KYIS SA SKYA ^ GONG MAR SNE GDONG KHRI DPON GYIS BKA' LAB RTZI MED BYAS

PAS MA TSAD, DPON 'BANGS LAR RGYA'I 'DU SHES MED TSUL ZHU LOG PHUL KHAR, TSAL PA KHRI

DPON, GA-YA' BZANG KHRI DPON, THANG PO CHE KHRI DPON BCAS LA MTHUN 'BREL BZOS TE NANG

CHEN DBANG BRTZON RANG GI RGYAB PHYOGS LA YONG THABS BYAS PA RED,

SKABS DE'I DUS TA'I SI TU DANG, MTHUN PHYOGS BYED BZHIN PA'I YAR

'BROG KHRI DPON LA THANG PO CHE'I KHRI DPON NAS NANG CHEN DBANG BRTZON GYI RGYAB SKYOR DANG BCAS DPUNG

'JUG GIS PHAM NYES CHEN PO BZOS PAS MA TSAD, RLANGS KYI PU TI BSE RUR LHA SAR GA-YA'

BZANG, TSAL PA, THANG PO CHE PA BCAS KYI KHRI DPON GSUM TSOGS 'DU ZHIG BYED SKABS,

GA-YA' BZANG KHRI DPON GYIS NGA DBYAR KHA YAR 'BROG DANG, DGUN KHA SNE GDONG LA SDOD KYI YIN

ZHES KHA PHO BSHAD PA DE THOS TE SNYING LA MDA' ZUG PA LTA BU BYUNG ZHES BRIS YOD PA RED, LCAGS

YOS 1351 LOR SI TU DAR MA RGYAL MTSAN YAR KLUNGS SU 'BYOR PAR GA-YA' PHAG GTUGS

BSHER BYAS TE TA'I SI TU RGYAL KHA THOB STE KHA MCHU'I DPYAD MTSAMS LEGS PAR BYAS NA'ANG,

GA-YA' BZANG PAS AE GNYAL GYI DMAG RNAMS BSKUL TE RDOG PO RGYUD DU 'KHRUG PAS PHAG GRU

RGYAL TE MA DGA' DGRA DGAS 'GO BYAS MI NYI SHU THAM PA BSAD, GA-YA' BZANG DGON DANG,

@324 GZHIS KA RNAMS BLANGS 'DUG ,GA-YA' PHAG GNYIS KYI GYOD GZHI 'DI TSABS CHE RU GANG 'GRO

LAS ZHI BA'I 'GRIGS THABS MED PA LTA BU ZHIG YOD KYANG, DE DUS SA SKYAR DPON CHEN

LEGS PA DPAL 'PHOS PA'I TSAB TU RGYAL BA BZANG PO 'BYOR TE GA-YA' PHAG GNYIS LHA RAB

ZHI BA'I NANG 'GRIGS DANG, DE NAS 'GRIGS BZO MED TSE SA SKYA RANG NAS DRAG PO'I SHUGS

KYIS GNYIS KA MING MED BZO RGYU'I 'CHAR GZHI BYAS TE SNGON LA NANG 'GRIGS BYED POR TA'I SI TU'I

BLA MA MNYAM MED PA CHEN PO DANG, KUN GYIS SPYI MOS YOD PA NANG SO BSOD SENG GNYIS BSKO

GZHAG BYAS SHING, DE'I GNAS TSUL BYANG RGYAL NAS THOS MA THAG, BANG MI ZHIG CHED

GTONG GDONG BLA MA MNYAM MED PAR ZHU YIG CIG PHUL BA'I NANG, DA LAN BLA MA RIN PO CHE 'DUM

PAR PHEBS PA YIN NA, GA-YA' BZANG PAS MTHONG PHYOGS BYAS TE KHYED RANG GI GSUNG TSIG LA

KHAS LEN ZHU GI MA RED, DER BRTEN DGOS MED SKU NGAL GYI RGYU LAS MED PAS MA PHEBS ROGS

GNANG ZHES GSOL YANG, BANG MI SA SKYAR MA 'BYOR GONG 'DUM PA RNAMS THON ZIN GYIS LAM DU

MJAL BAS BYED THABS MA BYUNG, DE NAS BYANG RGYAL GYIS MNYAM MED PA RIN PO CHE NGOS MJAL

ZHUS TE, DA LAM GYOD GZHI 'DI LA KHYED RANG BAR GZUR PHEBS ZIN PAS GA-YA' BZANG PAS

MTHONG PHYOGS MI 'BYUNG CHED KHO TSOR RGYAL KHA PHRAN BU THOB PA ZHIG GNANG NA NGAS DE LA MDZAD DKA' ZHU

GI MIN ZHES NANG GSOL BYAS KYANG, GA-YA' BZANG KHRI DPON GYIS MGO DANG MJING PA'I DPE

BZHIN BYED KYI RED BSAM PA'I DOGS PAS 'DUM SAR GDONG MA BSTAN PAR PHYOGS GA-YOL BYAS

GSHIS 'DUM PA RNAMS YUN RING BZHUGS MA THUB PAR SA SKYAR PHYIR LOG BYAS PA RED,

ZHI BA'I THOG BAR 'DUM BYED RGYUR LAM LHONGS MA BYUNG BAR BRTEN, SA SKYA NAS

DPON CHEN RGYAL BA BZANG PO DMAG MI BCAS DRAG PO'I SHUGS KYI THOG NAS RTZAD ZHIB BYED RGYU DANG,

CI STE DPYAD MTSAMS GNANG BAR MA NYAN NA BYANG RGYAL GSOD RGYU DANG, GA-YA' BZANG, THANG PO

@325 CHE'I KHRI DPON BCAS TSA LEN BYAS TE, GA-YA' PHAG THANG GSUM MNGA' SDE GCIG TU BSGRIL

NAS SA SKYA'I THAD KA'I DBANG LUNG BSGYUR RGYU BCAS LA THAG CHOD BYUNG BA RED, GNAS TSUL DE

TA'I SI TUS THOS MA THAG, GAL SRID SA SKYAS DRAG GNON BYAS PA YIN NA SNE GDONG RANG KHONGS

SBYONG BDAR BYAS PA'I DMAG MI TSOS SA SKYA'I DO YA THUB PA'I STOBS SHUGS YOD MED DANG,

RDZONG GZHIS KHAG GI BTZAN CHA, LAS BYED MI MANG GI SEMS SHUGS BCAS LA BSKYAR ZHIB DANG,

TSAGS 'TSUD NAN BRTAN BYAS PA DANG, YAR 'BROG KHRI DPON LA'ANG DGOS PA BYUNG TSE AANG

SAR SBE LAN DGOS PA'I GNAS TSUL YANG BTANG 'DUG,

DPON CHEN RGYAL BA BZANG POS, RTZOD RNYOG CAN GYI SA CHA DE LA ZHIB GCOD

BYED PAR DMAG MI DANG BCAS YONG DUS, BYANG CHUB RGYAL MTSAN GYIS GSER DUM BU GCIG DANG

DNGUL DUM BU GCIG PHYAG RTAGS SU PHUL NAS, LAS DON 'DI DRANG ZHING TSAD PA'I SGO NAS

THAG GCOD GNANG BA YIN NA, NGA'I PHYOGS NAS MTHUN BSGRIL DANG, GUS BRTZI ZHU GI YIN ZHES

SKU TSAB BANG MI ZHIG GAR MJAL SAR BTANG BA DANG, DPON CHEN GONG DKAR DU 'BYOR DUS, BYANG

CHUB RGYAL MTSAN NGO MA PHEBS BSU DANG, MJAL PHYAG ZHU BAR PHEBS, DE DUS RGYAL BA BZANG

PO'I ZHABS GRAS TSOS BYANG RGYAL LA DUS RGYUN LAS LHAG PA'I GUS 'DUD BYED 'DUG PAR DE

NGAN GA-YO'I RNAM PA ZHIG YIN PA'I DOGS PA BZOS PA DANG, DE NAS SNE GDONG RDZONG GI NYE

'GRAM RNAM RGYAL THANG DU DPON CHEN DMAG BCAS BZHUGS SGAR RGYA CHEN PO GRA 'GRIGS BYAS

YOD PA RED, DPON CHEN SNE GDONG LA 'BYOR PA'I DGONG DRO BYANG RGYAL NAS GUS 'DUD KYI

MJAL PHYAG LA BCAR DUS SA SKYA'I DPON RIGS TSO'I LAS KA'I BYED TSUL LA BLTAS NA BOD LA

ZHI BDE YONG BA MI 'DUG DGONGS PA DANG, MJAL PHYAG ZHUS TE LOG 'GRO SKABS BYANG RGYAL

@326 GTZANG MA ZHIG GNANG THUB NA SA SKYA ^ GONG MA'I MTSAN LA DGUNG 'DEGS YONG RGYU DANG, YANG

KHRIMS 'KHYOG GIS NGA BSAD PA YIN NA, NGA'I RO LA SHAR NUB GANG SA NAS BDAG PO RGYAG

MKHAN SLEBS YONG, DE'I RKYEN GYIS SA SKYAR PHUG YUL SKU MNYEL PO YONG GI RED, DE

TSO MA SNYEL BA GNANG DGOS ZHES ZHUS, RLANGS KYI PU TI BSE RUR, DE DUS DPON CHEN

BCAS, DBU 'JOG 'JOG CIG BYAS BYUNG ZHES GSUNGS DBU 'JOG 'JOG ZER BA NI, HA GO BYUNG ZER BA'I BRDA ZHIG RED, GSUNGS 'DUG,

NYIN RJES MA LA GA-YA' BZANG KHRI DPON DPON 'KHOR MANG PO BCAS 'BYOR

TE ZHIB GCOD PA'I BZHUGS SGAR DANG NYE SAR SGAR PHAB, BYANG RGYAL GYIS KHONG RANG GI ZHABS

'BRING HOR GZHON NU BZANG POS GTZOS BLON PO NANG MA RNAMS LA, SANG NYIN GTUGS BSHER

SAR NGES MED NGA 'JUS PA YIN NA, BDEN BRDZUN GYI MTHA' ZHIG MA GSAL BAR SNE GDONG

MA SHOR BA DGOS ZHES MNGAGS BYA GNANG ZHING, DE NAS GTUGS BSHER DNGOS GZHI'I NYIN

MO RANG NAS GA-YA' PHAG KHRI DPON GNYIS KA 'JUS, 'PHRUL GYI LDE MI 37-BA-4 NANG DPON CHEN RGYAL BA BZANG POS KHRI SKOR BCU GSUM GYI DMAG YAR KLUNGS SU DRANGS, SU TU BA DANG RNAM GNYIS

ZAM CHEN KHAR 'DZOMS TE CHINGS 'DUN GLENG PA NA SA SKYA PAS BSLUS THABS BYAS TE SI TU BZUNGS, ZHES GSAL, SO SOR DO DAM BYAS TE BZHAG PAS,

SNE GDONG RTZE'I NANG LA'ANG SA SKYA'I ZHI DRAG SER SKYA CHE CHUNG SU 'DRA ZHIG SLEBS KYANG MA BTANG, BYANG

@327 NAS DRI BA BYAS MTHAR SNE GDONG RTZE RTZIS SPROD DGOS PA'I YI GE BTZAN BLANGS BYED RTZIS BYAS KYANG,

NAS MI 'DUG BSAM PAS SNYING LA DAM BCA'I RI MO BRIS PA DANG CHABS CIG, DA DUNG GZHON NU

GAL CHE ZER MA GTAD PAS, MGO BSKOR BTANG BA SHES TE BYANG RGYAL LA KO SHAG BRGYA DANG SUM

CU SO LNGA TZAM BRGYAB, ZHVA RNGA MA'I KHRU CAN ZHIG GA-YOGS, BTZON CHAS SPRAS TE BZHON PA GLANG

@333 STE; DMAG SNE SA SKYAR THAD KAR GTAD PAS LAM DU STOD GTZANG KHUL GYI SER SKYA MI DRAG MANG PO

'DUM ZHUR 'BYOR YANG MA GSAN PAR SA SKYA PA'I DMAG DANG 'THAB 'KHRUG BYED MA DGOS PAR DPUNG GI

'JIGS ZIL KHO NAS BLANGS TE SA SKYA'I GDAN SA PA TA DBON BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN KHRI GDAN SA MTHA' MA TA DPON BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN NAS GNANG ZHES THU KVAN GRUB MTHAR GSAL YANG, 'PHRUL GYI LDE MIG DANG, TI SHRIR KUN

DGA' RGYAL MTSAN BZHUGS PA THAD NA'ANG, YIG CHA GSAL BA MA MTHONG ZHES GSUNGS LAS PHAB,

DPON CHEN BZUNG, LAS BYED GNAD CHE BZHI BRGYA BRGAL BAR KHRIMS KYI RTZA RVA DANG, GNAS NAS

DBYUNGS SHING, GSAR PA BSKO GZHAG DANG, SA SKYA'I SPYI KHYAB DANG, LHA KHANG RIN CHEN

SPUNGS PA SOGS KYI RTEN GSUM LA DMAG GIS MI 'THOR BA'I DAM GNYER GCIG LCOGS SU NAM

MKHA' BZANG PO BSKOS SHING, LA STOD LHO BYANG DANG MNGA' RIS BSKOR GSUM LA ZHIB GCOD GTONG

GNANG MDZAD PA SOGS BYA BA KHAMS CHEN PO DE DAG BYUNG BA'I GZHI RTZA SA SKYA'I GDUNG 'DZIN RNAMS

TSUGS MA THUB PA DANG, LHAG PAR DPON CHEN DBANG BRTZON NAS KHRIMS 'KHYOG BRNYAS BCOS TSOD

MED BYAS PA'I KHAR, RLANGS KYI PU TI BSE RUR, SNGON TSE DPAL LDAN SA SKYA PA, MNGA' THANG

GUNG LA REG PA DANG, DPAL 'BYOR PHUN SUM TSOGS PA YOD, DPON CHEN NAM MKHA' BRTAN

PA DE, NA SO GZHON PAS LAN PA DANG, ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR, NANG CHEN NAM MKHA' BRTAN

PAS BYED PA MA BZO BA ZHIG KYANG BYUNG BA BCAS RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I SA PHO KHYI 1358 LOR TA'I SI TU

BYANG CHUB RGYAL MTSAN NAS BOD CHOL KHA GSUM YONGS SU RDZOGS PAR DBANG BSGYUR RO, ,

DE LTAR TA'I SI TU BYANG CHUB RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, DVAGS PO BKA' RGYUD PAR

MDO PHYOGS BSHAD GRVA'I SROL MED PAR BSHAD GRVA GSAR DU GTOD DE CHOS GRVA CHEN PO RTZED THANG BTAB,

DE NAS THEL GYI SGOM GRVAR PHUN SUM TSOGS PA'I MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR ZHING, BDE BAR GSHEGS PA'I SKU

'BYUNG GNAS DANG, KUN DGA' LEGS PA GNYIS 'KHRUNGS, DE YANG ^ GONG MA CHOS

RGYAL CHEN PO GSHEGS PA'I RJES LA SDE DPON RNAMS KHRI THOG TU YAB SRAS SU GZHON NU'I DGA' STON LA YAB SRAS GSUNGS KYANG, 'PHRUL GYI

LDE MIG NANG KHU BO ZHES GSUNGS 'DUG, DE KHA'I MU 'THUD DE ZHIB SKABS YAB SRAS RANG YIN PA THE TSOM CHOD, SU PHEBS MI MTHUN

PA BYUNG MTSAMS, RIN SPUNGS PA NOR BZANG PAS, GRAGS PA 'BYUNG GNAS KYI YUM RIN

SPUNGS PA'I SRING MOR BRTEN THABS SHES KYIS THEL DU SPYAN SNGA RIN PO CHE BSOD NAMS RGYAL

MTSAN LA DGONGS BSKOR ZHUS NAS CI GSUNGS BYAS PA LEGS TSUL GROS STON PAS, SPYAN

SNGA BA'I ZHAL NAS, KHRI THOG TU BU CHUNG LAS 'OS MED, KHYIM PA RGAD PO ZHIG GIS MI

'ONG GSUNGS PAS, SUS KYANG 'DA' MI PHOD PA GRAGS PA BYUNG GNAS DGUNG LO BCU DGU

SON PA RTZER PHEBS TE CHAB SRID BSKYANGS, DE'I PHYI LO SPYAN SNGA BA GSHEGS, YAB CHE SA

SANGS RGYAS RGYAL MTSAN DPON BLON BAG YANGS TE KHRI THOG AE YONG DGONGS PAS SPUN GZED

MANG DU MDZAD PA LA, YAR KLUNG THEL DU DUS GZIR LANGS TE CHE SA DPON BLON MANG RAB GSOL

SKAL BZHES TE YAR RGYAB PA NI, DA LTA RGYAL GLING TSOGS PA ZHES DGE 'DUN SGANG PA'I BYES PHEBS KYI DGON PA DE NI SNGAR YAR RGYAB PA'I GZHIS YIN ZHES

SI TU BSTAN PA'I NYIN BYED KYI RANG RNAM SHEL GYI ME LONG 45-NA-5 PAR GSAL ZHING, YAR 'BROG DPAL DI YANG DE'I GZHIS LAG YIN NO,, TU THEGS DGOS PA BYUNG, DUS MI BDE BA YANG JE CHER SONG, 'DI

@345 LA STAG LO'I 1434 SDE GZAR CHEN MO'AM, PHAG GRU NANG ZHIG GI LO YANG ZER, DE LA

BRTEN SHING YOS 1435 NAS RIN SPUNGS PA'I SHUGS JE RGYAS DANG, PHAG GRU'I MNGA'

THANG CUNG ZAD NYAMS GUD DU SONG ZHES GLENG,

GYI BKA' 'GYUR SOGS GSAR BZHENGS DANG, NAG CHANG GI KHRIMS BSDAMS, SGRUB

@354 MKHA' RDO RJE DANG, LA STOD LHO PA (RDZONG KHA) CHOS RGYAL NOR BU'I SDE SOGS KYIS KHUL

LA'ANG DMAG KHA YAR MDZAD CING, SKYID SHOD DU DPUNG GI 'JUG SGO BRTZAMS PAR KUN

MKHYEN SMON LAM DPAL PAS MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I GTOR CHEN MDZAD PA LA BRTEN, DMAG

LAN GNYIS GZHAN DBANG GIS PHYIR LOG BYED DGOS PA BYUNG YANG, KUN MKHYEN PA ZHING

BRJES PA'I RJES LA SKYID SHOD DU SNANG RTZE KHU DBON BSAD PA'I RKYEN LAS SA RTA 1498 LOR

SLAR YANG GTZANG DPUNG GTOS CHE BA DBUS SU BCUG PAR SDE PA DGA' LDAN PA NAM MKHA'

RGYAL POS NGO GTAD, KARMA PA DANG, STAG LUNG PA, 'OL KHA BA SOGS NAS CHINGS

MOL LA PHEBS PAS SA SKYONG NGAG DBANG LHUN PO SKU MCHED SKU SKAL DANG BCAS SKYOR MO LUNG

DU PHEBS DGOS PA DANG, SNE'U GZHIS RTZIS BLANGS SHING, LHA SA DANG, PO T'A LA

SOGS LA BDAG PO BYAS, LO 'DI NAS LHA LDAN SMON LAM CHEN MOR SE 'BRAS GNYIS

PHEBS MI CHOG PA BZOS, GTZANG SMYON HE RU KA PA SPYOD PA LA GSHEGS PA'I SKABS RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR MTHONG BA DON LDAN,

DAG GIS BOD LJONGS CHOS SRID KYI SKU DBANG JI LTAR BZHES PA'I TSUL LA CUNG ZAD ZHIB 'JUG

SHING, DE YANG SKYABS MGON T'A LA'I BLA MA SKU 'PHRENG DANG PO NI, RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I

LCAGS LUG 1391 LOR GTZANG SHAB STOD DAM, GUR MO BYA BA'I YUL DU SKU 'KHRUNGS,

DGUNG LO BCU BZHIR PHEBS SKABS SNAR THANG DU GRUB PA SHES RAB KYI DRUNG LA RAB TU BYUNG ZHING,

DGE 'DUN GRUB PA ZHES MTSAN BTAGS, DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA BZHES, GSAN BSAM

LA RTAG TU BRTZON ZHING, LHAG PAR MTSAN NYID LA SLOB GNYER RGYA CHER GNANG STE, RI BO

DGE LUGS PA'I BSTAN PA'I BDAG PO 'JAM MGON BLA MA TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO'I SNYAN PA GSAN

TE SHING LUG 1415 LOR 'ON BKRA SHIS RDO MKHAR ^ GONG MA GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS

RJE RIN PO CHE GDAN DRANGS NAS CHOS 'KHOR BSKOR PA'I SKABS SU MJAL TE SLOB MA'I GTZO BOR

GYUR, 'KHRUNGS RAB GSOL 'DEBS RMAD BYUNG BSKAL PA MAR, ,MKHYEN PA'I PHA

MTHAR MI MNGON YANGS PA LA, ,PAn CHEN 'JIGS MED GRAGS PA THUGS 'PHROG NAS, ,

THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAR MTSAN GSOL GSER GDUNG 'DZAM GLING RGYAN GCIG DKAR CHAG 268-NA-2 JI BZHIN DU, ,DON LDAN DGE 'DUN GRUB LA GSOL BA

'DEBS, ,ZHES JI SKAD GSUNGS PA LTAR, BO DONG 'JIGS BRAL GYIS RJE 'DI SHES BYA

@366 PHROGS TE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA ZHES MTSAN GSOL, DAR RGYAS DPON DPAL BZANG GIS

SBYIN BDAG ZHUS TE ME YOS 1447 LOR GTZANG GZHIS KA RTZER GDAN SA CHEN PO BKRA

SHIS LHUN 'DI NI RJES SU PAn CHEN RIM BYON GYI GDAN SA MDZAD CING, BOD KYI DGON PA CHE KHAG GRAS ANG 4 PA YIN, SHAR RTZE

THOS BSAM GLING DKYIL KHANG BCAS GRVA TSANG GSUM LA DGE 'DUN SUM STONG SKOR BZHUGS, PO PHYAG BTAB, DGE 'DUN STONG PHRAG GSUM LHAG TZAM 'DUS, KHONG GIS

BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I GDAN SA'I MKHAN PO MDZAD DE PAn CHEN DGE 'DUN GRUB PA ZHES MTSAN

MDZAD LA PAn CHEN ZHES PA'I MTSAN SNYAN GRAGS, DGUNG LO BRGYAD CU GYA PAn CHEN YE SHES RTZE MOS MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR NOR BU'I 'PHRENG BA DANG, RJE KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I RNAM THAR

SHING RTA 1474 LOR BLA BRANG RGYAL MTSAN MTHON POR MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS,

YANG SRID DU NGOS 'DZIN ZHUS TE BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I GDAN SAR PHEBS, DE DUS RIN SPUNGS

'DI BKA' RGYUD PA'I BLA MA, SGOM CHEN PA'I SBAG SBUG GI NYAMS MED PAR, DPON SLOB

@372 'DREN ZHUS CHOG PA'I SKABS DBYE GROGS BYAS, KHYAD PAR, PA RNAM, 'BRONG RTZE RGYAL

BYED TSAL DU PHEBS, BSU BA SOGS BKOD PA'I KHYAD PAR RGYA CHEN PO BYAS, MJAL

'PHRAD KYANG PHEBS GDONG RANG LA BYAS, KHONG DGE LDAN PA'I ZHVA SER THOG GI GTZUG GI NOR

BUR SNANG BAS, NGED KYIS GTZUG LAG KHANG STENG DU BSU BA LA PHYIN, PHYAG RTZE SPROD KYI

DPYAD GZHI LA, SPRUL PA'I SKU DE JO BZANG BA DANG, NGED LA DGE BSHES BZANG PO'I

MTHONG GIS, PHA TSAD NAS DBU ZHVA ZUL GYIS PHUD, PHYAG MDZAD SNANG, NGED KYIS KYANG

RGYANG RGYONG SBAG SBUG MED PAR 'PHRAL MAR LAN PHUL BAS SHIN TU MDZES PA DANG, ZHES

DANG, BZHUGS STAN GCIG LA GDAN CHAGS PA SOGS THUGS KA THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I

NYE BAR BYUNG, ZHES GSAL BAS CHOS LUGS KYI KUN SLONG MA MDZAD PAR DE LTA BU'I RNAM

PAR THAR PA LA RJES SU YI RANGS BCAS BSNGAGS BRJOD ZHU ZHING, GZHAN LO RGYUS RNAMS

SU BLA CHEN RNAMS THOG MA'I MJAL 'PHRAD MA GNANG GONG, GZOS SGO CHE CHUNG SKOR LA RTZOD

GLENG GNANG BA'I RNAM THAR MANG PO ZHIG SNANG BAS DE DAG NI 'JIG RTEN SRID DON DREGS PAS

LTA BU ZHIG MTHONG GI MI 'DUG GO,

SHING PHAG 1575 LOR SDE PA RIN SPUNGS PAS GTZANG RONG GI DMAG

KHRI PHRAG TU NYE BAR BTEGS NAS, STOD LUNG SGAL PO NA KHAR SGAR PHAB, SGAL BYANG

@373 SOG PO BLA MA GU RU DE BA RIN PO CHE NAS HAL HA ZER BA LAS, CHA HAR ZHES PA MA DAG PA YIN GSUNGS 'DUG,

CHA HAR RGYAL PO AAL THAN KH'ANG LA MDZO DGE AA SENG BLA MAS RGYAL MCHOG BSOD NAMS RGYA

MTSO'I RNAM THAR BSHAD PAS DAD PA SKYES TE SOG YUL DU GDAN ZHU SNGA RJES 'BYOR BA RJES

SU PHEBS RGYU'I ZHAL BZHES THOG, RE ZHIG BLA MCHOD DU 'DUL BA BLA MA BRTZON 'GRUS

BZANG PO BRDZONG BDA' MDZAD, SLAR AAL THAN KH'ANG NGO MA RANG MJAL PHYAG TU MTSO KHA PHYOGS

SU 'BYOR RTZIS GNAS TSUL 'BUL BA DANG, GDAN 'DREN GYI MI SNA LTOS CHE BSKYAR MAR 'BYOR

BAR BRTEN, ME GLANG 1577 ZLA BA 11 TSES 26 NYIN 'BRAS SPUNGS NAS CHIBS KHA

BSGYUR, GDAN SA CHEN PO DGA' LDAN DANG, RVA SGRENG SOGS SU GNAS GZIGS GNANG,

DGA' LDAN KHRI RIN PO CHES DBUS GDA SA KHAG GI SLOB DPON, GONG DKAR RTZER SKU TSAB

SOGS BOD KYI CHE RGU KHAG NAS RVA SGRENG PAR PHEBS SKYEL ZHU BAR BCAR, DE NAS CHIBS

THOG 'KHYOL KHAR SA SKYONG BKRA SHIS RAB BRTAN 'DI DGE LDAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG GI GTZO BO BYE RI STAG RTZE PA'I ZHAL NGO YIN, GYIS CHIBS YOB LA 'JUS NAS, BSTAN

PA'I DPAL GYUR BLA MA'I ^ ZHABS PAD BRTAN, ,BSTAN 'DZIN SKYES BUS SA STENG YONGS LA

KHYAB, ,CES TSIG RKANG GNYIS 'PHRAL RTZOM MDZAD THOG ,MCHIMS BRNANGS TE GSUNG RGYU

MA BYUNG BAS, BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG MNGA' THANG 'BYOR BA RGYAS, ,BSTAN PA YUN RING

GNAS PA'I BKRA SHIS SHOG ,CES CHIBS THOG NAS GNANG, 'DI NI MCHOD YON GNYIS

BAR GRAGS,

DE NAS BYANG RIGS KYI 'BROG SDE MANG PO DANG, MI'I 'GRO BA MED PA'I

BYANG THANG RIM PAR BRGYUD 'BRI CHU KHA DANG, RMA CHU KHA SOGS CHU CHEN RNAMS BGROD DE RMA CHEN

@374 SPOM RA'I NYE 'GRAM DU AAL THAN RGYAL PO'I PHEBS BSU DANG PO YONG SHA BU'I BA KU THA'I JI, KHA

THAN BA THUR, THU MED KYI MA ZIN PAKshI RNAMS KYIS GTZOS RTA PA BRGYAD BRGYA SKOR 'BYOR, AA RId

DKAR PO'I THANG DU PHEBS SKABS PHEBS BSU GNYIS PA, 'UR BSDUS RGYAL RIGS SE CHEN

HONG THA'I JI DANG, THU MED KYI RGYAL RIGS, DA YAN NO YON GYIS GTZOS RTA PA STONG PHRAG

GSUM TZAM 'BYOR, GDAN 'DREN GSUM PAR, NYI MA GSUM GYI RING NYIN RE BZHIN JO RIGS

THU THA'I JI, CHING B'A THUR SOGS RTA PA SUM BRGYA SKOR DANG, RGYAL PO'I GAM NAS SNGAR

BRDZONG BDA' GNANG BA'I CHOS RJE BRTZON 'GRUS BZANG PO, LO TZ'A BA GU SHRI PKshI SOGS KYIS

GTZOS RTA PA LNGA BRGYA SKOR BCAS PHEBS BSU 'BYOR,

SA STAG 1578 ZLA 5 TSES 15 NYIN RTZOD DUS KYI 'KHOR LOS SGYUR

BA; AAL THAN RGYAL PO NYID MTHA' 'KHOB MUN PA'I GLING DKAR POR BYAS PA'I BRDA CHAD DU,

GOS DKAR PO GSOL, BTZUN MO DANG, 'KHOR KHRI PHRAG BCAS 'ONGS NAS DAD GUS CHEN

POS BSUS TE MCHOD YON THOG MAR MJAL, 'BUL BA RGYA CHEN PO PHUL ZHING, KHROM

'BUM PHRAG TZAM TSOGS PA'I DBUS SU MCHOD YON NYI ZLA ZUNG ZHIG PHEBS TE, HONG THA'I

JIS GTAM BTANG, GU SHRIR PAKshIS LO TZ'A BSGYUR TE, SNGON NAS CHA HAR GNAM GYI RIGS

LAS MCHED PAS STOBS CHE, RGYA BOD HOR GSUM DRAG POS DBANG DU BSDUS, SA SKYA PA DANG

MCHOD YON 'BREL TE CHOS DAR, SLAR YE MUR RGYAL PO NAS CHOS CHAD, LAS SU SDIG PA

DANG, ZAS SU SHA KHRAG KHO NA LA LONGS SU SPYOD PAS MUN NAG KHRAG MTSO'I GLING LTA BUR,

MCHOD YON NYI ZLA ZUNG GI BKA' DRIN LAS, DAM PA'I CHOS KYI LAM GTOD, KHRAG MTSO'O

MAR BSGYUR BA 'DI BKA' DRIN CHE BAS, PHYOGS 'DI NA YOD PA'I RGYA BOD HOR SOG KUN GYIS

KYANG DGE BA BCU'I KHRIMS LA GNAS PA DGOS, NYI MA DE RING NAS KHYAD PAR SOG PO CHA DKAR

@375 LA KHRIMS SU BCAS PA NI, SNGA SOR SOG PO SHI BA'I RJES SU DMIGS PA'I SROG GCOD

GTAN NAS MA BYED, GAL TE SNGAR BZHIN MI BSAD PA BYUNG NA KHRIMS KYIS LUS SROG

'BRAL BA YIN, RTA PHYUGS BSAD PA BYUNG KHRIMS KYIS NOR THAMS CAD 'PHROG, BLA MA

DANG DGE 'DUN GYI CHA LUGS CAN LA BRDUNG BRDZOG SOGS LAG BZHAG PA BYUNG NA, LAG

'JOG MKHAN GYI GZHI MA THAMS CAD GTOR, SNGAR AONG BKOD DU GRAGS PA'I GSHIN PO

THAMS CAD KYI GZUGS BYAS PA LA MING BTAGS PA'I ZLA BA BYUNG RES KYI NYA STONG BRGYAD GSUM

LA RTA PHYUGS BSAD PA'I KHRAG GIS MCHOD PA DANG, LO DUS KYI MCHOD PA LA DRAG ZHAN GYI

DBYE BA MANG NYUNG MTHA' YAS SHIG GSOD PA RNAMS, DENG PHYIN CHAD NAS BZUNG RTEN DE RNAMS

ME LA BSREGS NAS LO ZLA'I DUS KYI MCHOD PA SROG GCOD PA GTAN NAS MA BYED, GAL TE

BYAS PA BYUNG NA KHRIMS KYI CHAD PA RTA NOR GANG BSAD KYANG, DE'I BCU 'GYUR 'PHROG, AONG

BKOD ME LA BSREGS NAS KHYIM GTOR, AONG BKOD KYI TSAB TU YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG

DRUG PA'I SKU RE 'DZIN PA DANG, DE LA YANG DKAR GSUM GYI MCHOD PA MA GTOGS SHA KHRAG

GI MCHOD PA GTAN NAS MA BYED, GZHAN YANG THAMS CAD KYIS DGE BA LA 'BAD LA, NYA STONG

BRGYAD GSUM LA BSNYEN GNAS SRUNGS, RGYA BOD HOR KUN LA DGOS MED KYI 'PHROG BCOM

MA BYED, MDOR NA BOD YUL DBUS GTZANG DU JI LTAR BYA BA LTAR, YUL PHYOGS 'DIR

YANG BYA DGOS ZHES KHRIMS MANG DU BSGRAGS DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO'I SHING RTA 95-NA-1 BSGRAGS SO, ,

DER THUGS RJE CHEN PO'I BZLAS LUNG GNANG BA, LO TZ'A BAS SOG PO'I

SKAD DU BSGYUR TE KUN GYIS GO BAS, PHYOGS MTHA' DAG YI GE DRUG PA BZLA BA LA BRTZON

PAR GYUR, DE NAS MCHOD YON LHAN 'DZOMS GNANG BA'I SA DER, GTZUG LAG KHANG

@376 BZHENGS PA'I SA 'DUL MDZAD DE, RGYA BOD KYI BZO BO MKHAS PA MANG PO BKUGS NAS

GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG, PHO BRANG GCIG 'THUS BZHENGS NAS THEG CHEN CHOS 'KHOR GLING DPAG BSAM LJON BZANG 218/17/DANG, DEB THER RGYA MTSO'I STOD CHA 67/15 NANG, MTSO SNGON GYI LHO NUB THAD

CHAB TSA ZHES PA'I SA GNAS DE YIN TSUL GSUNGS 'DUG,

ZHES BTAGS, DE NAS BZUNGS SOG PO THAMS CAD KYIS AONG BKOD LO DUS SHA KHRAG SOGS KYI MCHOD PA BYED YUL AONG BKOD CES PHA MA SOd GSHIN PO'I 'DRA 'BAG BZOS PA DE LA ZER, ME LA BSREGS,

AAL THAN KH'ANG NAS MI RIGS MI GCIG PA DU MA'I DBUS SU, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAR,

GSER SRANG BRGYA LAS GRUB PA'I THAM GA 'BRUG SDER MO LNGAS MTSAN PA'I KHA RIS LA, RDO RJE

'CHANG T'A LA'I BLA MA RGYAL ZHES HOR YIG LAS BYAS PA DANG, MU TIG GI SNAM SBYAR GYIS

MTSON CHEN POR 'OS PA'I NA BZA' SOGS NOR BU'I RIGS BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA'I SNE

DRANGS, T'A LA'I BLA MA BADZRA DHAR ZHES KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG GI MTSAN BSTOD PHUL, RGYAL

DBANG MCHOG NAS KYANG, RGYAL PO AAL THAN KHANG LA, CHOS KYI RGYAL PO LHA'I TSANGS PA,

ZHES PA'I MTSAN GNANG NGO, ,DUS SKABS DE NAS BZUNGS ^ RGYAL DBANG MCHOG GI SKU

'PHRENG TSANG MAR T'A LA'I BLA MA ZHES SA GSUM NA YONGS SU GRAGS, DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO'I SHING RTA 96-BA-4 GRAGS, T'A LA NI SOG %PO'I

SKAD LA RGYA MTSO CHEN PO LA ZER ZHING, DE'I DON NI RJE 'DI'I MKHYEN RLABS DANG, MTSAN

KUN LA YONGS SU KHYAB PA'I BSNAGS BRJOD ZHUS PA ZHIG YIN, RJES SU SKU 'PHRENG BCU

NAG NAS, RGYAL PO HONG KHYI THUL GYIS MI SNA'I GDONG ZHU YIG GUS 'DUD CAN 'BYOR,

@384 BU BSKYUNGS TE NAN TUR CHEN PO YIS, ,SLAR YANG MOL MCHID YANG NAS YANG SMRAS PA, ,

'DZUM, ,DGE BAR BZHAD PA'I YON TAN RGYA MTSO NI, ,NAM ZHIG DNGOS SUM MTHONG SNYAM

'DI SKAD ZHU, ,KYE MA SNYIGS DUS MAR NGOR GYUR PAS NA, ,THUB BSTAN ZLA BA'I 'OD

BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB THUGS RJE'I NYIN BYED 'OD, ,DKYIL 'KHOR YONGS SU GANG BA DANG

PO'I GUNG, ,SHAR RI'I SPO LAS 'CHAR BA'I DUS MIN NAM, ,LTA BAS MI NGOM GTZUG

TOR GA-YAS 'KHYIL BA, ,BUNG BA LTAR GNAG LCANG LO RING PO CAN, ,BREGS SHING RAB TU

GDONG LNGA'I DBANG PO GZHON NUR GYUR KYANG DE, ,RI DVAGS PHAL GYI RJES SU CI'I PHYIR

'JUG ,PHAN DANG BDE BA'I 'OD STONG GLING BZHIL, ,RIM GYIS MNGON SUM GNANG BA

@385 GSOL BA BTAB PA DANG, RGYAL PO DANG YUM NAS THABS DU MAS 'GYANGS THABS GNANG

YANG, PHYAG MDZOD GU SHRIR GYIS ZHUM PA MED PA'I THABS 'PHRUL DU MA'I THUGS RJES

SGYUR BYED CES PAS PHAG 1599 LOR SOG PO'I PHEBS SKYEL LTOS CHE BA DANG BCAS

CHIBS ZHAL DBUS GTZANG DU PHYOGS PA'I GDAN ZHU ZHU THUB PA NA NYIN BCU PHRAG GI RJES SU

YAB YUM GNYIS KYANG PHEBS BRDZONG ZHU BAR PHEBS RJES SU BSNYEGS,

MTSO SNGON PHYOGS BRGYUD RIM GYIS RTZOL BSHAD KYIS PHEBS NAS LCAGS

GLANG 1601 ZLA BA DANG PO'I NANG RVA SGRENG DU PHEBS 'BYOR GNANG, DER DGA' LDAN KHRI

ZUR SANGS RGYAS RIN CHEN SOGS GDAN SA'I SLOB DPON LAS SNE DANG, DGA' LDAN PHO

BRANG NAS SKU MDUN RIN PO CHE CHOS BZANG 'PHRIN LAS DANG, SA SKYONG DGA' LDAN PA ^ MI

DBANG GA-YUL RGYAL NOR BU YAB SRAS SOGS DRUNG 'KHOR CHIBS BSU BA RNAMS 'BYOR, 'PHAN

POR DGA' LDAN KHRI RIN PO CHE DGE 'DUN RGYAL MTSAN PHEBS BSKUR PHEBS TE THOG MAR GDAN

SA CHEN PO RI BO DGA' LDAN DU PHEBS, DE NAS PHEBS THON GYIS LHA LDAN GTZUG LAG KHANG

DU GNAS GZIGS THOG ,SA SKYONG DGA' LDAN STAG RTZE BA'I BZHUGS YUL GZHIS KA

DGA' LDAN KHANG GSAR DU BZHUGS, DE'I NYIN PHYI MAR SE 'BRAS, DGA' SKYO ZOL GSUM DGA' BA GDONG, SKYOR MO LUNG, ZOL PHU BA,

SOGS KYI DGE 'DUN NI RNAMS KHYIS PHEBS BSU'I SER SBRENG DANG BCAS GDAN SA CHEN PO DPAL

LDAN 'BRAS SPUNGS DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG GI SENG KHRIR ^ ZHABS SOR 'KHOD, DE RJES LHA LDAN

SPRUL PA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU JO BO SH'AKYA MU NE'I SPYAN SNGAR DGA' LDAN KHRI ZUR RIN PO CHE SANGS

RGYAS RIN CHEN GYIS MKHAN PO MDZAD DE RAB TU BYUNG NAS DGE TSUL GYI DNGOS PO BZHES, SKABS

DE'I TSE ZHVA DMAR THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA GAR DBANG CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG GIS LEGS BYA'I ZHU SHOG

@386 SNYAN TSIG DANG LDAN PA ZHIG PHUL BA'I NANG, MDO SDAGS SOGS PHYI NANG RIG PA'I

GNAS LNGAR GSAN BSAM MDZAD DGOS TSUL SOGS KYI SNYAN SGRON LEGS PO ZHIG MDZAD

'DUG ZHU SHOG CHA TSANG RNAM THAR NOR BU'I 'PHRENG BA 29- BA-1 POR GSAL 'DUG KYANG, ZHU LAN GANG 'DAR ZHIG GNANG

YOD MJAL RIGS MA BYUNG, PAR, DE'I BKA' LAN 'BREL CHAGS SHIG DGOS RGYA YANG SKU GONG MA'I DBON PO

RTZE DGA' NAS CHOS RJE DANG, BZHU KHANG RAB 'BYAMS PA DGE LEGS LHUN GRUB GNYIS NAS

'BREL MED RANG MTSANG STON PA'I LAN ZHIG GNANG BAR GRAGS,

BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I GDAN SA BCO LNGA PA DPON SLOB BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN DPON SLOB BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN NI DBEN SA PA BLO BZANG DON GRUB KYI SPRUL SKU YIN,

MCHOG NAS DPON SLOB BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN GYI ZHAL SNGA LAS MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS BKA' MANG DU

GSAN, GONG DU BRJOD ZIN PA LTAR BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I GDAN SA PA TSANG MAR PAn CHEN

@396 BOD LA MTHA' DMAG GI GNOD PA MI 'BYUNG BA NI RNAM THAR CHE SHOS SHIG SNANG, ZHES GSAL,

YAB SRAS GZHIS KA BSAM GRUB RTZER GDAN DRANGS, GTZANG KHUL GYI SER MO BA THAMS

CAD CHOS 'BREL ZHU BA DANG, SER SBRENG ZHU BAR 'DZOMS, DE'I LOR 'BRUG PA KUN MKHYEN

PAD DKAR GYI YANG SRID RA LUNG DU 'KHRUNGS PA NGAG DBANG RNAM RGYAL DANG, 'PHYONGS RGYAS SDE

PA'I RTOL BUR 'KHRUNGS PA DPAG BSAM DBANG PO GNYIS MA DAN PAR DPAG BSAM DBANG PO'I

RGYAB SDE SRID PHUN TSOGS RNAM RGYAL GYIS BYAS RKYEN NGAG DBANG RNAM RGYAL RA LUNG GDAN SAR BZHUGS

MA THUB PAR LHO 'BRUG PHYOGS LA PHEBS DGOS BYUNG, LO 'DIR THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA YON

TAN RGYA MTSO DGUNG GRANGS NYI SHU RTZA BRGYAD DU PHEBS PA, ZLA BA BCU GNYIS PA'I TSES BCU

BZHI'I NYIN DGONGS PA GZHAN DON DU GSHEGS, PHYI LO NAS LO SHAS RING DPON SLOB PAn

CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN NAS SER 'BRAS KYI MKHAN PO'I KHRIR PHEBS PA DANG, LHA LDAN SMON

LAM CHEN PO'I GRAL DBUR YANG BSTAN CHAGS SU PHEBS 'DUG GO, ,,

@397 SA BCAD BDUN PA,

KAB RAL (CABRAL) ZER BA GNYIS 'BRUG BRGYUD GZHIS KA RTZER 'BYOR, LO 'KHOR

LHAG TZAM BSDAD PA, DE'I RING SDE SRID GTZANG PA NAS YAG PO GNANG RUNG, KAR LUGS

KYI GRVA PA TSOS CHOS PHYOGS NAS NGO RGOL BYAS RKYEN MGYOGS PO BAL YUL BRGYUD PHYIR LOG BYAS

PA DANG, LO GSUM RJES LA KA SI LA (CACELLA) GZHIS RTZER BSKYAR DU 'BYOR YANG,

KAB RAL (CABRAL) BAL YUL DU YOD PA 'BOD MI BTANG STE LO GCIG TZAM BSDAD DE

RANG YUL LA PHYIR LOG BYAS PA BAL YUL BAR SKYEL SGROL YANG BTANG 'DUG ,KHONG GNYIS

@405 NAS DVAGS PO SKU RAB RNAM RGYAL BAR DPUNG 'JUG BYED PA'I SLAD DU YAR STOD PHYOGS SU NGO MA

DPUNG RGYAB TU PHEBS MUS 'BRUG ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG RNAM RGYAL GYIS DRAG PO'I MNGON SPYOD

KYIS MTHU LAS 'BRUM PA'I NAD THEBS TE ZLA BA GCIG GI NANG KHONGS SU SDE SRID PHUN TSOGS

RNAM RGYAL DANG, LCAM GNYIS KA GRONGS NAS LO GSUM TZAM GSANG BA'I LUGS BYAS KYANG,

RJE NYID NAS PHYI NANG GSANG BA'I RTAGS LAS MKHYEN CING CHOS SKYONG RNAMS LA BTANG RAGS KYI

MCHOD PA PHUL ZHES GSAL BA CHOS KYI SPRIN CHEN PO'I DBYANGS KYI GLENG GZHI LHO'I SKOR 29-BA-3 DANG,

RDO BRAG RIG 'DZIN NGAG GI DBANG PO'I RNAM THAR NANG, AE WAm LCOG

SGAR PA'I GRVA TSANG RNAMS RE ZHIG SDE PA'I SKU RIM DU THOB RGYAL DU 'JOG PA GNANG NAS DPON

SLOB NYUNG BSDUS DBUS SU PHEBS, DE DUS GTZANG SKUR ZLOS PA'I SDE GZAR CHEN PO LANGS

PA DANG 'GRIGS, YAR KLUNG DU SDE SRID PHUN TSOGS RNAM RGYAL DANG MJAL 'DZOMS GNANG,

MCHOD GZHIS 'OS 'GAB CIG 'BUL SBYOR MDZAD, BYUS THAG CHOD NAS DPUNG GYES GDONG

DOL SNGON RDZONG DU GTZANG PA BZHUGS THOG MJAL BAR PHEBS PAS, NYIN MO SDE SRID THUGS

BREL GYIS GA-YENG TE MUN RUB PA DANG GDAN 'DREN BYUNG BAS NGA SNGAGS PA DANG MTSAN MO MJAL BA

LA DGA' RGYU AE YOD MI SHES GSUNGS, GANG LTAR MCHOD YON BAR DAM SEL CHE BA DANG,

RJE NYID PAD GNUBS KYI GDAMS PA ZAB MOR NANG BYAN CHUD PA'I LTAS NGAN GA-YANG DU LON PAS, SDE

PA PHUN TSOGS RNAM RGYAL 'BRUM PA'I SNYUNG NAD KYIS BTAB PA LA ZLA BAR NYE NAS KYANG SNAG CHU

'KHOR RGYU MED PA'I GSO BYED MKHAN PO RNAMS KYIS BCOS SU DKA' BA ZHIG BYUNG NAS, 'CHI

BDAG BEE WA SA TVA'I LHO BA'I GRONG KHYER DU GSHEGS SO, RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR BKOD PA 40-BA-1 ,ZHES GSAL BAS SDE PA PHUN TSOGS

@406 RNAM RGYAL LCAGS LUG 1631 LO SMAD TZAM LA LHO KHA KHUL GSHEGS PA GSAL PO 'DUG,

DE 'PHRAL SRAS KARMA BSTAN SKYONG DBANG POS SRID 'GAN BZHES,

CHU SPRE 1632 LOR SOG PO HAL HA PAS, HOR STOD PA DANG, AA MI

SGER RU BCOM PAR BRTEN GTZANG PA NAS RANG GI KLAD MI CHOR BA'I CHED KHRI SKOR BCU GSUM

GYI DPUNG BSDU GSOG GRA SGRIG DANG, NANG DON AA DRUNG RTA BZHON BKA' SHOG SKYEL

BAR BTANG BA'I NANG, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE DANG, ZHAL NGO GNYIS KA SOG KHROD DU CHINGS

LA PHEBS DGOS SLOB STON MDZAD PA LTAR, RDO TSIG DANG BSTUN PAS SOG PO RNAMS RANG

YUL DU SLOGS TE DON RAB TU 'KHYOL BAS GTZANG PA DPON BLON DGYES PA'I 'DZUM ZHAL LHUGS

PAR BSTAN, DPUNG CHEN YANG 'DAM KO KHYIM BAR BTEGS PAS SNYAN GRAGS DANG, GZI

BYIN MA SHOR BA'I MU NAS SO SOR GYES, TSUR LAM ZHAL NGO BKRA SHIS KYIS GTZOS PA KUN

'DZUM ZHAL MUL BA DANG BCAS 'BRAS SPUNGS SU 'BYOR PA SHES PA SKAD CIG MA'I SNGA PHYI LA'ANG

'GYUR LDOG 'DI GSHIS LUGS SU 'DUG DU KLU LA KA PA 68-NA-6, CES GSUNGS, SKABS DE DAG GI GNAS

TSUL LA BRTEN DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG PAS PAn HEN RIN PO CHER NANG ZHU DANG, GTZANG SDE

PAR YANG GSED BKROL BYAS TE LCAGS PO RI'I BKA' KHRA'I DON LTAR LHA SA DGA' LDAN PHO

BRANG PAS RTZIS BLANGS, DE YAN T'A LA'I BLA MA RIN PO CHE LHA SAR PHEBS SKABS SGO MO NANG

PA'I SGER SHAG SOGS LA BZHUGS KYI YOD KYANG, DE TSUN GTZUG LAG KHANG GI NUB

BRGYUD LA GZIM CHUNG GO BSGRIGS KYIS PHEBS BZHUGS GNANG BA RED, BKA' BRGYAD

NANG PA TZAM MA GTOGS LHA SA'I MI DRAG RNAMS NAS SDE PA GTZANG PA'I LAG NAS LHA SA

BYUNG BA'I LEGS SKYES PHUL, SA RTA 1618 NAS DKAR ME SOGS CHAD PA RNAMS KYANG

@407 DGA' LDAN KHANG GSAR NAS SNGAR GSO GNANG, DGA' LDAN KHANG GSAR NI, SNGA SOR SKYID

SHOD STAG RTZE BA'I GZHIS KA YIN ZHING, SKABS DE'I DUS KYANG ZHING KHA'I DKYIL DU YOD

PA'I GZHIS KHANG ZHIG YIN TSOD 'DUG PA RJES SU ZHIG GSO GRUB NAS ZHAL GROR T'A LA'I BLA MA

RIN PO CHE GDAN ZHU GNANG BA, GZHIS KA SPRO ZHING MDUN DU LHA SA'I GRONG KHYER DANG, GA-YAS

GA-YON RGYAB TSOR SBA PHRAN, NYANG DOGS SDE BZHI'I GRONG DANG, 'ONG GSEB RGYA CHE BAS RE ZHIG

THOG BSKOR DANG, LTAD MOS GA-YENG, SGYED BU (THAB) KHA GROR SE 'BRAS KYI SLOB DPON

LAS TSAN, DBON CHOS MDZAD KYIS GTZOS DRAG RIGS RNAMS LA GZHIS KAR JA GRAL DANG,

CHU SKOR SMAD GLING KHAR GUR PHUB PA'I RTA PA GNAD CHEN TSOR GZHIS LEN KHRUNGS BZHES KYI DGA'

STON MDZAD, DU KA'U LA KA PA 76-NA-2 CES GSAL BAR GZHIGS NA DE DUS LHA SA'I GRONG KHYER HA CANG CHUNG CHUNG ZHIG

YOD PA DANG, RGYAS BTAB RA MO CHE'I GTZUG LAG KHANG YANG 'ONG GSEB RANG LA YOD PAR SEMS,

SNGAR SOG PO MTSO CHEN DRUG LA GZHUNG DANG, CHINGS YOD PA RNAMS

CHA HAR LEGS LDAN RGYAL POS BSHIGS PA'I DUS BROS PA 'GA' ZHIG HAL HA'I KHROD DU 'ONGS

PAR, DPON PO NANG PHAN TSUN RTZOD PA'I RKYEN GYIS HAL HA CHOG THU DPON SDE BCAS RANG YUL

NGES PA BRTAN PO BRNYED CING, YANG RDOR GLING BOD YIG RANG DBANG GSAR SHOG CIG NANG,

LCAGS SBRUL 1641 LHA LDAN SMON LAM CHEN MO'I SKABS MDO KHAMS

PHYOGS NAS GU SHRIR KH'ANG GIS GNAS TSUL SKYEL BAR DKA' BCU DGE BSNYEN DON GRUB DANG,

RGYAL MO CHE BA'I MTSAMS 'DRI DANG SBRAGS SE CHEN AO PA SHI CAN 'BYOR BAR, MDO KHAMS

SGANG DRUG MTHA' DAG DBANG DU BSDUS, BE RI RGYAL PO BROS PA'I MTHAR YANG, LAS DBANG

GIS PHYE MA LEB DANG, ME 'OD KYI DPE BZHIN PHYAG TU 'BYOR TSUL GSAL BAR GRVA TSANG SNGAGS

KHANG DANG, GNAS CHUNG LCOG RNAMS SU BTANG RIGS RGYUS PA DANG, DU K'U LA KA 99-NA-6 SDE PA BSOD NAMS

CHOS 'PHEL NAS LHA LDAN RU BZHIR GTAM SNYAN DAR 'PHYAR GNANG BA DANG CHABS CIG BYUS YAG

@417 DAR CHEN ZHES PA 'DI YANG BTZUGS PAR GRAGS,

DE NAS LA LAS RGYAL PO MTSO KHAR LOG GAM ZER, 'GA' ZHIG GIS

DMAG DANG BCAS KHAD NYER 'BYOR 'DRA ZHES 'DOD GTAM SNA TSOGS KYI SBIR GLENG, ZHAL NGO'I

PHEBS SGOR, GTZANG PA DPON BLON LA CI ZHUS KYANG DGONGS PA DMA' ZHING, THUGS DOGS

HRAGS, RANG PHYOGS RNAMS NI DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG PAS GTZANG ZHEN BYAS ZER NYAG CIG YIN,

RGYAL PO'I DRIN LAS GTZANG PA'I KHRIMS 'OG NAS MA THAR NA SLAR THAR DUS SHIG MI YONG BA

'DRA BSAMS DGE BSNYEN DON GRUB BTANG SKABS DMAG BYED DGOS TSUL BYAS PA YIN GSUNGS

PAR, DE NI GCIG TU THAL 'DUG KYANG, GNYIS SU SOG PO 'DAM NAS SLOG NA SLOG GO

CHOD, KHA SING GI GSUNG 'PHROS DE'I STABS ZHAL NGO RANG NAS MDZAD MA BDE NA NGED KYIS 'DAM

DU PHYIN PAS CHOG ,CHOS DAM TSIG LA BKAR GTONG, GTAM DON GNYIS KA LA BZANG BA ZHIG

YONG ZHUS PAR, BRTAG PA BGYIS SHIG GSUNGS PA LA, DPAL LDAN DMAG ZOR MAR SHO

MO PHUL BAS JUS 'GRO, PHUGS NGAN ZER BA BABS, DE BZHIN MOL BAS JUS SONG NA DE

GAS CHOG ,PHUGS THAMS CAD SHI 'GRO GSUNGS NAS, DMAG BSHOL BA'I STANGS KA

MDZAD MA BYUNG, RGYAL POS PAn CHEN RIN PO CHER, BKRA SHIS LHUN POR BZHUGS NA SKU

NYEN YONG, RGYAL MO CHE BA NA SO'I STABS KYIS GTZANG DU MI SLEBS PAS DBUS SU PHEBS

DGOS TSUL ZHUS GSUNGS PA LTAR PHYI 'CHAR DE BZHIN DANG, NANG DON ZHAL NGO'I PHYAG BRIS YIG

CHUNG DANG BCAS DKA' BCU YE SHES RGYA MTSO GDAN 'DREN LA BTANG SONG BA, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE

@427 GSHIS DA LTA PHAN RANG 'JAGS, GNYAL DANG, 'OL DAGS TSON PA'I SA CHA SKU RAB PAR

RA'I YI GER KARMA PA'I BKA' SHOG SBYAR MA NGO MA MCHOD YON GYI PHYAG TU BRGYAB DU K'U LA KA 114-NA-2 PAS, RGYAL

PO LHAG PAR THUGS 'KHRUd TE DUG RTZA BONG NAG SDE PA GTZANG PA DANG, BLON PO GNYIS

SNE'UR YOD PA RKYEN LAM DU GTONG DGOS ZHES BKA' BTANG ZHING, BKA' RGYUD PA'I

BSTAN PA LA'ANG CHAGS 'JIG TU GYAR BA'I RTZA BA GCIG DER THUG PA DANG, SLAR YANG

MCHOD YON GNYIS DMAG BCAS KONG POR PHEBS TE KONG DMAG 'GO 'DZIN RJES 'BRANG DANG

BCAS PA BCOMS TE GA-YUL LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL TE DE NAS BZUNGS BOD NANG KHUL CHOS LUGS

KYI 'THEN 'KHYER MED PA BSTAN SRID 'JAM DAR YUG GCIG TU GYUR PAS MI SER RNAMS

SRID KYI BDAG POR GYUR PAR BRTEN RGYA GAR DANG, BAL YUL RGYAL KHAG GSUM SOGS

GNANG STANGS DANG, DGA' BSU ZHU STANGS TSANG MAR PHAN TSUN RGYAL KHAB RANG BTZAN DU NGOS 'DZIN

CHE MTHONG BLA NA MED PA ZHUS YOD PA'I SKOR LA, SAR, CAL CI SBEL GYI BRIS PA'I DEB NANG, PORTRAIT, P. 352.

@438 ROG HIL GYI BRIS PA'I DEB LA CHA BZHAG STE T'A LA'I BLA MAR MDZAD SGO ZHU STANGS DE RANG DBANG

RANG BTZAN GYI RGYAL KHAB CIG GI DBU 'KHRID LA MA GTOGS DE 'DRA YONG YAG YOD PA MA RED CES

ZHIG BYED KYI 'DUG ,DE'I SKABS LA RGYA NAG DANG, BOD MTHUN LAM GYI 'BREL BA DE T'A LA'I

LOR MAN JU ^ GONG MA GNYIS PA KHANG SHI'I NAS DAL GEL DGE SLONG DANG, SHES RAB 'OD

BSUN GTZER BYED 'DUG NA, BKA' SLOB GNANG MI'I SKU TSAB CHED STZAL THUGS RJE CHE BA

@447 GTZER MA BYAS PAR SNGAR LUGS TSONG GI 'BREL BA DAM ZAB BYED DGOS PA'I BKA' SLOB GNANG

BAR BYAMS GLING MKHAN PO TSUL KHRIMS RGYAL MTSAN DANG, KHANG GSAR RAB BRTAN PA GTONG

GNANG MDZAD PAR PHAN TSUN GNYIS KAS BKA' BRTZI DANG BLANGS ZHUS TE 'KHON RTZOD ZHI 'JAGS

DANG, TSONG GI 'BREL BA SNGA SOR CHUD PA BYUNG BAS RGYA SOG GNYIS KAR BKA' DRIN SHIN TU CHE,

PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN GYI YANG SRID NGES BRNYED BYUNG BA ME LUG 1667

LOR BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I BLA BRANG RGYAL MTSAN MTHON POR GDAN ZHUS KYIS MTSAN BLO BZANG YE SHES

ZHES GSOL, DE'I LO RJES MAR SDE SRID GRONG SMAD PA 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO KHRI LO DGU GNANG

STE SKU GSHEGS, DE NAS RING POR MA SONG BAR BSTAN 'DZIN DA YAN RGYAL PO YANG SKU TSE

ZIN MI 'DUG ,PHO BRANG DMAR PO DANG, LCAGS PO RI GNYIS KYI RI BRGYUD RGYA BZA' RJES

MA'I SKABS BCAD PA'I SA DGRA GSO CHED BRAG SGO KA nI'I MCHOD RTEN DE BZHIN NYAMS GOG

CHE BAR BRTEN RDO SHING MKHAS PA DANG, ZANGS BRDUNG BAL PO AA MA RA SI RDAS GTZOS BAL

PO BCO BRGYAD, ZANGS BRDUNG DKYUS MI GRANGS SUM CU BCAS KYIS BZO BSKRUN THOG ,THIG

RTZA DANG, GZUNGS BZHUGS, DKYIL 'KHOR BRIS THIG SOGS ^ RGYAL DBANG MCHOG DANG,

ZUR CHEN CHOS DBYINGS RANG GROL SKU DNGOS KYIS GNANG STE CHOS 'KHOR BCU GSUM RLUNG DRIL DANG

BCAS YUL GYI MDZES RGYAN LTA BUR LEGS PAR GRUB, SA SPRE 1668 LOR MON PA AA LCOG PA'I

STENG DU LHO 'BRUG PAS DPUNG RGOL BYUNG BAR AA COG NGO MA CHED BCAR GYIS RGYAB GNYER ZHUS

PA LTAR, ZLA BA BCU GCIG PA'I NANG STAR SDONG BLO BZANG TSE BRTAN CAN 'GO DMAG MTSO SNA PHYOGS

DANG, MAS CHAGS PA DANG, BHRUM PA NAS, MIG PA NAS SOGS 'GO DMAG 'BUM THANG

@457 ZLA BA GNYIS PA'I NANG NAS 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM SOGS SPROS BCAS KYI 'PHRIN LAS

PA'I SKU 'KHOR RNAMS LA LUGS ZUNG GI BSLAB STON DANG, KHYAD PAR RDO RJE'I SLOB BU BDAG

LA (SDE SRID RIN PO CHE) RGYA BOD HOR GSUM GYI LAR RGYA SKYONG LUGS, RE ZHIG GSANG RGYA

NGOS BYA BA CHE PHRA BLOS MA CHOD PA MTHA' DAG LHA MOR BRTAG BSGRIL ZHU DGOS SOGS ZHAL

CHEMS STZAL RJES, AO RGYAN SANGS RGYAS GNYIS PA'I SKU TSAB MTHONG BA DON LDAN SOGS THUGS

DAM GYI RTEN KHYAD PAR CAN RNAMS PHYAG TU BZHES THUGS SMON DANG, DBU THOG TU BYIN RLABS

ZHU GNANG MDZAD PA DANG CHABS CIG ZHAL NUB PHYOGS SU GZIGS SHING, PHYAG GA-YON

MNYAM GZHAG ,GA-YAS ZHABS PUS SU BKAG, SPYAN GNYIS PHYED BTZUMS TE BZHUGS

DKAR CHAG 138-NA-6

KUN MKHYEN LNGA PA CHEN PO NI, SKU GZHON NU'I DUS NAS GLING SMAD ZHABS

MCHOG GRUB, SMAN LUNG PA BLO MCHOG RDO RJE, CHOS RGYAL GTER BDAG GLING PA SOGS

GRUB MTHA' RIS SU MA MCHIS PA'I MDO SNGAGS GSAR RNYING GI MKHAS SHING GRUB PA'I YONGS

CU BRGAL BA BZHUGS PA SOGS CHOS PHYOGS KYI MDZAD PA NI SMRA BSAM BRJOD PA'I YUL LAS

SKYA PA'I CHOS THAMS CAD DANG, DGE LUGS PA'I CHOS THAMS CAD ZHUS PA BSRES TE

GRAGS CHE BAS SOG PO DANG, MTSO KHA'I DPON RIGS RNAMS ^ GONG MA MJAL BAR BSKYOD

NA 'GRIGS MIN SLOB STON ZHU MI 'BYOR BAR MI SNA DANG BLA MA KHA SHAS MTHUN LAM LTA BUR BCAR BA

LAS, RGYAL PO RGYAL RIGS SOGS SRID DBANG YOD RIGS BCAR NA 'GRIGS MIN DANG, DON

SNYING SOG BOD RNAMS PHYI NANG GANG SAR LAR RGYA MI ZHIG PA DGOS TSUL BKA' SLOB THOG ,^ RGYAL

DBANG DGONGS PA GZHAN DON DU PHEBS TSUL, BKA' SLOB LTAR GSANG RGYA GNANG TSUL, DA CHA

YANG SRID KYANG SKU NAR SON PA RING MIN PHO BRANG DU GDAN ZHU GNANG RGYU YIN TSUL SOGS GSANG RGYA

BKROL BA'I GNAS TSUL SKYEL MI BCAS PAR SKU TSAB CHED GTONG THOG ,MTHA' DMAG ZHI ZHING,

BZHED DON MYUR 'GRUB YONG BA'I ZHABS BRTAN YANG RGYA CHE GNANG 'DUG,

YANG SRID RIN PO CHE YAB YUM BCAS ME GLANG 1697 ZLA 4 TSES 15 NYIN

GSANG RGYA'I STABS SKYA DAR SOGS HA CANG RGYAS PA MA YIN PA'I CHIBS RAG RTA SPUNGS KYI TSUL DU

MTSO SNA NAS PHEBS THON GYIS, SNA DKAR RTZER SKU ^ GONG MA'I SKU ZHANG YAR 'BROG KHRI DPON GYI

GZIM KHANG DU GDAN 'DREN ZHUS, RAB GSAL GSER GYI SNYE MA 144-NAS 155-BAR, PHYOGS MTSUNGS ZLA 8 TSES 29 NYIN RTZE'I TSOMS CHEN

RNYING PAR SRID SKYONG GI DRUNG YIG BSTAN 'DZIN DBANG PO DANG, DKON MCHOG RAB BRTAN NAS

SE 'BRAS KYI SLOB DPON KHRI GDAN ZUR, TSOMS CHEN STENG DU CHA DKAR BA PADMA BSOD NAMS

@469 NAS GZHUNG ZHABS SER SKYA, 'BRAS SPUNGS SU CHA DKAR PA PADMA BSOD NAMS DANG, GRA

NANG PADMA TSE RING, SE RAR LHA KHANG PA RDO RJE NOR BU DANG, 'BRANG RGYAS SHAG PA PHYAG RDOR

DPAL 'BAR, DGA' LDAN DU CHU SHUR DBU BZHI BA DANG, ME TOG LDUM RVA'I THANG DU LHA SA BA

TSANG MA 'DZOMS SAR MI DPON ZHANG GRONG PA RDO RJE DANG, SHAR BKRA SHIS BCAS NAS LNGA PA DRUG

PAR 'PHOS PA'I GTAM RNA BA'I BCUD LEN RGYAS BSDUS THOG NAS GSANG BKROL LEGS PAR

MDZAD PA, ZHABS 'BRING GLANG SNYING CAN KHA CIG MA GTOGS, DE BYINGS SER SKYA MCHOG

DMAN TSANG MAS DGA' SKYO'I KUN RTOG PHAN TSUN 'GRAN PA BZHIN MCHI MA DBANG MED DU DRUL BAR

@476 ZHABS SOR 'KHOD, 'DI GAR RGYUN GANG RING BZHUGS NGOS TSOGS DBUR GSUNG CHOS DANG,

ZHABS BRTAN 'BUL RGYU YIN TSUL SOGS GSOL 'DEBS ZHUS PAR DON SMIN BKA' BZHES MA

BYUNG ZHING, SKU ZHABS RIN PO CHE SKU DNGOS KYI MDZAD PA'I TSUL STON PAR, NGED RANG NGOS

NAS SNYAN 'BUL ZHUS PA MA ZAD, SDE SRID RIN PO CHES DBUS, RGYAL YUM, SE 'BRAS

DGA' GSUM GYIS SNYAN 'BUL NAN ZHUS KHAR, BDAG NYID NAS SNGON DU GSOL BA BTAB PA

BZHIN, THUB BSTAN SPYI DANG, BYE BRAG KHAMS GSUM 'GRO BA'I BLA MA TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO'I

BSTAN PA, GZHUNG BSTAN LAR RGYA BCAS LA PHAN PA YE SHES KYI GZIGS PAS DPYAD PA YIN NA

ZHU TSOD CIL THING YANG, MTHA' DBUS GDUL BYA'I SNANG NGOR BSTAN 'GRO SPYI SGOS THAMS CAD

LA THUGS RJES MI BOR PA'I MDZAD PA RNAM THAR MTHA' DAG MKHAN CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN GZIGS

CHEN PO JI BZHIN GYI TSUL BZHES DANG, DAM PA'I CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO BSKOR BA'I GSOL 'DEBS

NAN CHAGS RTEN GSUM ZHU PHYAG 'BUL GSUM BYAS RUNG, BKA' BZHES MA GNANG ZHING, 'UR

STABS KYI RNAM PAS PHEBS TE NYI 'OD PHYI NAS SKU PHYAG GSUM GNANG STE BLA MA'I BKA' BCAG

PA MTHOL LO BSHAGS GSUNGS PA SPEL MAR GNANG NAS PHEBS PA SOGS BYA THABS MA BYUNG BA

DANG, RJES SU'ANG ZHU YIG RIM PA DANG BAS ZHU NAN GANG CHE BYAS KYANG MA SMIN KHAR, SNGAR THOB

KYI RAB BYUNG DANG, DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA PHYIR 'BUL MA SMIN NA NGED BKRA SHIS LHUN PO RANG LA

KHA BLTAS TE LCEBS PA DON GDAM GA'I GSAL DGOS PHEBS PA BLOS MA 'KHYUD PAS, SDE SRID

RIN PO CHE NAS GSOL 'DEBS KYI GROGS SU BRDZONG BDA' GNANG BA DE MO SPRUL SKU, SEMS

PA SPRUL SKU, STAG RTZE ZHABS DRUNG, RGYAL SRAS LHA BZANG, SE 'BRAS KYI SLOB DPON, SPYI

GNYER BCAS GROS BSTUN NAS MGRIN GCIG TU GSOL 'DEBS ZHUS PA DANG, SGER GYIS

RIM ZHUS BCAS PAR BKA' PHEBS JE ZHAN LAS MA BYUNG ZHING, SNGA SOR DE SKOR GYI GNAS

@477 TSUL 'BRAS SPUNGS SPYI SOR STZAL BA SDE SRID RIN PO CHE NAS 'DIR GNANG BA SOGS DGONGS GZHI

DPYAD DKA' ZHING, GLENG SNA TSOGS DANG, DON GDAM GA'I BKA' MTHA' SDUG DE BZHIN

PHEBS PA BCAS, THUGS RDZOGS LTA CI SMOS RAB BYUNG SNGAR BZHES KYANG SHUGS MA THUB KYIS

DOR GNANG DANG, MTHAR SKU SKYA CHAS SU MI BSGYUR BA DANG, MI RING BA BAR MA RAB BYUNG THUGS

RDZOGS BZHES TE CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO BSKOR BA SOGS NGED RANG GIS DBUS TSANG MAS GSOL 'DEBS

ZHUS KYANG MA SMIN PAS SDE SRID RIN PO CHER JI BYUNG GI GNAS TSUL ZHIB PA PHUL, GZHIS KA

RTZER BZHUGS ZHAG BCU BDUN BZHUGS TE PHYIR PHEBS ZHES GSAL BA DANG,

SKABS DE'I CHIBS ZHABS MKHAN PO'I GRAS SU SGO MANG MKHAN PO 'JAM

DBYANGS BZHAD PA YOD PA RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR SKAL BZANG 'JUG NGOGS 47-NA-6, DU, 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PAS, ^ GONG SA RIN PO CHER

PHYAG GSUM BTZAL TE, KHYED GANGS CAN GYI SKYABS GNAS GCIG PU YIN PAS BSTAN 'GRO KUN

LA BRTZE BAS DGONGS TE DE LTAR MI GNANG BA ZHU, ZHES GDUNG SHUGS DRAG POS GSOL 'DEBS

MDZAD KYANG, GDUL BYA'I BSOD NAMS DMAN PA'I DBANG GIS GSAN DGONGS MA GNANG BAR,

NYIN GCIG PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE'I GZIM CHUNG GI MDO NAS SKU PHYAG GSUM 'TSAL TE DA NGA'I DGE

TSUL GYI BSLAB PA PHUL YOD DO ZHES GSUNG SHUGS CHEN POS ZHU GNANG GIS DE NAS BZUNGS NA

BZA' SKYA CHAS BZHES, SKABS DE'I DUS ZHABS 'BRING GRAS NAS DE MO SPRUL SKU NAM MKHA'

'JAM DBYANGS SOGS KHA SHAS NAS KYANG BSLAB PA PHUL YOD PA, DE MO SPRUL SKU SGO MANG

MKHAN PO'I SLOB MAR BRTEN KHONG LA SPYAN 'BUR TSUGS SU GZIGS NAS GZHAN GYIS 'DI LTAR

BYED NA YANG, KHYED KYIS TSANGS PAR SPYOD PA'I BRTUL ZHUGS 'DOR PHOD DAM ZHES

BKA' BKYON GNANG BA'I LO RGYUS KYANG 'DUG GO ,DE NAS T'A LA'I BLA MA RIN PO CHE NA BZA' SKYA

@478 CHAS SU BSGYUR NAS BZHUGS YUL PO TA LA'I PHO BRANG RANG DU BZHUGS KYANG, BRTUL ZHUGS

KYI MDZAD PA SKYONG BZHIN, SPRO SKYID GNANG BAR LHA SA DANG, NYE BA'I RDZONG RGYAB, 'OL DGA',

'PHYONGS RGYAS, GONG DKAR KHUL SOGS GANG BYUNG LA THUGS 'DOD LTAR PHEBS KYI YOD PA

DANG, NYIN MO PHAL CHE BA RDZONG RGYAB TU ZHABS 'BRING LO GZHON DAG 'KHRID DE PHYAG MDAR PHEBS

PA DANG, MTSAN MO LHA SA DANG, ZHOL GYI GRONG KHYER NANG BUD MED DAG GI KHANG KHYIM DU BZHUGS

SHING, LHA SA'I GRONG KHYER GYI KHANG PA YONGS LA SA DKAR BTANG YOD KYANG, GRONG KHYIM KHA

DANG, MA 'KHOD PA KHAG PO TI BCU PHRAG BRGAL BA MDZAD PAR GZHIGS TSE SKU TSE'I RING DE KHO

NA RANG LA THUGS BRTZON GNANG BA LTA BU DANG, YANG MDA' RING THUNG 'PHEN PA LA MKHAS SHING,

LHAG PAR RGYANG MA'I RING TSAD KYANG YA BRAL DKAR PO ZHES PA'I RING TSAD KYI MTHO 'DZUd GNANG DANG,

SGRA SNYAN DANG, PI WANG SOGS KYI THEBS 'KHROL LA SHIN TU MKHAS SHING, GLU GZHAS KYI

@488 'GYUR KHUG SOGS GLU GAR GYI RTZA TSIG DEB THER MIG YID RNA BA'I DGA' STON MDZAD PA DANG, SHON

DANG, MIG MANG, RDEL RTZED BCAS LA BLTAS NA SKU TSE HRIL PO BAG YANGS SPRO DGAR

BZHUGS PA LTA BU'I MDZAD PA SOGS LA SUS KYANG 'GRAN PA'I ZLA DANG BRAL BAS CHOS DANG 'JIG

RTEN GANG LA'ANG PHUL DU BYUNG BAS SMRA BSAM BRJOD PA'I YUL LAS 'DAS PA ZHIG YIN KYANG,

CHE MCHOG 'DUS PA RTZAL GYI RNAM THAR 'PHRO 'THUD NANG, SDE SRID MCHOG SKU DBANG BTZAN ZHING,

BDE YANGS GSUM SKAS 'GO'I BKA' SHOG TU, RGYUN DU BAG MED KYI JO MO BZHES PA SOGS

MDZAD MI CHOG PA LA, DUS PHYIS 'CHI MED DGA' TSAL DANG, DPAL RAB KHANG GSAR GYI

BDAG MO GNYIS BZHES TE CHE 'DON BDAG RKYEN YONGS GRAGS MDZAD PA DANG, DE DUS LHA SA

DANG, PHYOGS NAS YONG PA'I SKYES DMAN KHA STABS DRAG TSAD SDE SRID RANG NAS MA BZHES

PA GCIG KYANG MED, PHAR PHEBS TSUR PHEBS DUS LAM 'GAG LA MI TSO YANG MNGON TSAN

CHEN POR BLTAS MI CHOG PA'I TSA NYAMS DANG, BLA KHAG, RDZONG GZHIS, PHYI NANG GI LAS

TSAN SOGS GANG LA YANG BDAG MO GNYIS KYI ZHU DBANG BTZAN PA BCAS DE TSO'I GNAS TSUL

GTER STON RIN PO CHES GSAN NAS SHIN TU THUGS KHREL BA'I RNAM PA DANG, THUGS ZHEN

BZHENGS NAS, DA MI BYED DGU BYED DE KHA GYIS, MGYOGS PO RANG BLA MA DE'I RKANG 'DREN

YONG ZHES THUGS 'PHAR 'PHAR GNANG, ZHU YIG TSA PO RKYANG PA 'BUL GNANG MDZAD NAS,

SDE SRID RANG YANG GTER STON RIN PO CHER THUGS DAD CHUNG DU SONG, RGYAL POS STOD LUNG SNANG

RTZER SDE SRID KYI MGUL BCAD PA GSAN DUS SPYAN CHAB DANG SBRAGS, DA ZHUS PA LA RKANG NAS

GSAN MA BYUNG ZHES THUGS DBYUNG BA'I GSUNG GCONG CHEN PO GNANG 'DUG CHE MCHOG 'DUS PA RTZAL GYI RNAM THAR LAS 'PHROS PA GDUNG BA'I MUN SEL ,CES GSAL

BA'I KHONGS NAS 'DIR CUNG ZAD BRIS PA, RJES SU MDZAD PA YANG CUNG ZAD MI LEGS TZAM

@489 BYUNG 'DRA BA DE DAG NI LO RGYUS LA ZHIB 'JUG CUNG ZAD BYAS PA'I KHYAD CHOS TZAM LAS, DON

LA NI, ^ RGYAL MCHOG LNGA PA CHEN POS ZHABS BRTAN GSUNG RTZOM MDZAD PAR, MA RIG

BRTAN SHOG ,CES DANG, MDO SMAD DGON SDE KHAG LA 'DZUGS GNANG MDZAD PA'I ZHABS

LAN GCIG MA YIN PAR GSUNGS 'DUG PAS SANGS RGYAS 'PHAGS PA'I MDZAD PAR MTHA'

MA BKAG CING, SO SO SKYES BUS KHA TSON CHOD PA'I SPYOD YUL LAS 'DAS PA ZHIG GO,

LHA BZANG KH'ANG LHA SAR MA 'BYOR GONG NAS, SDE SRID GSAR PA NGAG

DBANG RIN CHEN BROS YIB GNANG NGAM, GANG LTAR SKABS DER RGYAL PO'I LAG PAR MA THEBS

PA'I BZO 'DRA BAS, LO 'GA'I RJES LA SDE SRID NGAG DBANG RIN CHEN SMIN GROL GLING DU YOD

TSUL DOGS CHAGS KYIS LHA BZANG KH'ANG GIS BLON PO ZUNG DAR THA'I JI DPUNG BCAS RTZAD ZHIB

TU 'BYOR PA SKABS DER PHO LHA NAS BSOD NAMS STOBS RGYAS SMIN GLING DU LO CHEN DHRMA SHRI RI'I

SKU MDUN NAS RIG GNAS SLOB SBYONG GNANG BA'I SKABS LA BRTEN KHONG GIS MED TSUL GSAL

@490 'DUG ^ MI DBANG RTOG BRJOD 'JIG RTEN KUN TU DGA' BA'I GTAM 63-BA-3 PAR GZHIGS TSE DE DUS KYANG 'TSOL ZHIB BYED BZHIN PA'I CHO 'DRA ZHING, LHA BZANG

MI YONGS NAS SKU ZHABS PAD DKAR 'DZIN PA ZHES ZHU BA RED,

LHA BZANG KH'ANG GIS LO 'KHOR BCU GSUM RING BOD LJONGS YONGS LA LUNG

BSGYUR SKABS, CHOS PHYOGS LA RIS SU MA CHAD PA'I DGE 'DUN GYI SDE DANG, LHAG PAR DGE

LUGS PAR DAD 'DUN CHE ZHING, RGYAL PO RANG YANG MDO SNGAGS GNYIS LA NYAMS SNANG DANG,

@498 DGONGS PA ZAB, SE RA TSOGS CHEN GYI 'DU KHANG GSAR RGYAG GIS TSOGS CHEN 'DU KHANG RNYING

PAR, 'DAM DU YOD PA'I GU SHRIR KH'ANG GI AUR GE GRVA TSANG SPOS TE SNGAGS PA GRVA TSANG BTZUGS,

DBYAR 'DAM DANG, DGUN LHA SAR BZHUGS PA LHA SA DGA' LDAN KHANG GSAR DANG, PHUN

TSOGS RAB BRTAN DPAL 'BYOR, PHAL CHE BA KHROM GZIGS KHANG DU BZHUGS, ZHABS

'BRING GTZO CHE BA YANG, DA'I CHING BA DUR BSOD NAMS MGON PO, GSER YIG PA PHO

LHA NAS BSOD NAMS STOBS RGYAS, 'BUM THANG NAS, AO RONG PA, LHA RGYA RI SA SPYOD, LHO

MDO MKHAR BA, ZUR KHANG GU YANG KHA SHA KHA, CHANG KHYIM PAKSHI, PAD TSINGS, BKRA SHIS

RTZE PA, DRUG SKYABS, MTHAR KHOM BKRA SHIS ZER BA SOGS SHIN TU MANG PO YOD,

MDO STOD LI THANG THUB CHEN BYAMS PA GLING GI CHOS SDE'I ZHOL GRONG DU, SA

BYI 1708 ZLA 7 TSES 19 NYIN ^ RGYAL MCHOG BDUN PA CHEN PO SKU BLTAMS LCANG SKYA HO THOG THUS MDZAD PA'I ^ RGYAL MCHOG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO'I RNAM THAR DPAG BSAM RIN PO CHE'I SNYE MAR GZHI BCOS BYAS PA YIN, TE 'KHRUNGS

GA-YOS CHEN PO BYUNG STE MI PHYUGS DANG, SA KHANG LA SKYON SHOR CHEN PO BYUNG, LCAGS

@499 PO'I GSER YIG PA'I GO SA BZUNGS,

^ RGYAL BA'I MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE LI THANG PHYOGS 'KHRUNGS SO ZHES PA'I

SNYAN GRAGS DBUS GTZANG DU KHYAB PAS LHA BZANG KH'ANG GIS PHYOGS DER NYAN SNA BYED MI MDA'

DPON NOR BU DNGOS GRUB DANG, AU'I CING SBI CHA'I CHI SOGS MNGAGS PA GLO BUR DU GZIM

KHANG DU 'BYOR NAS, YAB YUM LA KHYOD TSO'I BU 'DI SU'I SKU SKYE YIN DRIS PAR, LI THANG

CHOS SKYONG NAS TSANGS DBYANGS RGYA MTSO'I SKU SKYE YIN TSUL BRJOD BYUNG ZHES YAB KYIS DRANG BSHAD

BYAS PAS, MDA' DPON NOR BU DNGOS GRUB KYIS TSANGS DBYANGS RGYA MTSO ^ RGYAL BA'I SKU SKYE

MIN PA THAG BCAD ZIN PAS DE'I SKYE BA YIN BRJOD NA PHAN GNOD GANG YANG MED CES YONGS

GRAGS SU BRJOD DE, ROGS ZLA'I SOG PO RNAmS MGO RMONGS PAR BYAS NAS, MDA' DPON

RANG NYID LKOG TU YAB YUM SAR YONG NAS SKU SKYE 'DI SA 'GOL ZHIG TU 'PHRAL DU GDAN ZHU BYAS NA

LEGS TSUL BSLAB BYA BYAS PAR BRTEN DE GA'I NUB MO RANG YAB KYIS 'BROG SAR GDAN ZHU DANG,

DE NAS GSANG THABS KYIS 'BRI CHU PHA KHAR GDAN ZHU BYAS PA SHING RTA 1714 ZLA 3 TSES 14 NYIN

SDE DGE RDZONG GSAR DANG, LCANG RA DGON SOGS LA PHEBS SKABS SDE DGE DPON BSTAN PA

TSE RING ZHES RGYAL BA'I BKA' 'GYUR RIN PO CHE SHING PAR DU GRUB MKHAN BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG

CHEN PO DES PHEBS BSU SOGS SNE LEN ZAB RGYAS ZHUS,

MDO SMAD PHYOGS YOD SOG RIGS MNYAM MTHUN GYI MAN JUR KHA GTAD BYED RTZIS BYAS KYANG, PHYI

TSANGS DBYANGS KHRI LAS PHAB PA SOGS LA MI DGA' BA BYED KYIN YOD PA KH'ANG GIS SHES BZHIN

PA DANG, HONG THA'I JIS KYANG, LHA BZANG KH'ANG GU SHRIR GYI SRAS RGYUD LA BRTEN BOD MI RNAMS

DGA' MOS JI YOD, STOBS SHUGS DANG, SA BTZAN JI YOD MYANG RTOG BYED PA DANG, NGES

MED DMAG RGYAL PHAM SHAN MA PHYE NA LAB SNE BDE KHYAD MI GTE ZHIG BYUNG NA DGOS PA CHE BA BCAS

MTHONG STE, LHA BZANG KH'ANG GI SRAS BGRES PA DGA' LDAN BSTAN 'DZIN DANG, HONG THA'I JI'I

SRAS MO GNYIS YI GE GTONG RES KYI MDZA' 'BREL BYED KYIN YOD PA DE LA SKABS BTZAL TE HONG

THA'I JIS, LHA BZANG KH'ANG LA, KHYED KYI SRAS DANG, NGA'I BU MO GNYEN 'BREL BYED 'DOD

DNGOS 'BREL YIN NA, BU MO'I CHE BA'I SLAD DU DNGUL SRANG 'BUM PHRAG GCIG DANG, SRAS

PA SKYES PA'I DON RNAMS RTOGS PAR 'GYUR RO GSUNGS PAR BZHED PA MI MTHUN KYANG, SNGON

@507 BRDA'I BKOD RGYA BTANG STE DPUNG DMAG RNAMS KYANG RIM PAS 'BYOR ZHING, 'DZING BYA'I

STA GON BYAS, 'JUN SGAR BA RNAMS KYANG ME BYA 1717 ZLA BA BDUN PA'I NANG RIM BZHIN

'BYOR TE 'DAM KHU 'DUS KYI RI BOR SGAR BCAS SO,,

DE NAS 'JUN SGAR BA DANG, LHA BZANG KH'ANG GI DPUNG RNAMS THENGS 'GA'

SHAS 'THAB LAG 'PHROD PAR RGYAL PHAM CHE BA MA BYUNG, ZLA 8 TSES 29 NYIN MO BOD DMAG

GIS 'JUN SGAR BA'I DMAG SGAR NANG 'TSANGS PAS DBUS MDA' DPON AO RONG PA DE NYID DU GRONGS,

'BUM THANG PA'ANG RMAS TE RANG GI SGAR SAR 'BYOR TE 'DAS PA DANG, RAB BRTAN SHAR PA'ANG

RMAS PA SOGS NYAMS NYES SU GYUR, GDAN SA GSUM GYI SLOB DPON DANG, BKRA SHIS LHUN

PO NAS PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE SKU NGO MA BCAS PHEBS TE BKA' MOL GNANG YANG DON PHAN MA BYUNG BA'I

MUR, 'JUN SGAR BAS, BOD MI RNAMS LA MGO BSKOR GYI SKAD CHA SNA TSOGS SHOD CING, LHAG

PAR BOD DMAG BZUNG BA RNAMS SLOD SKABS 'JUN SGAR BAS, NGA TSO RGYAL PO LHA BZANG KH'ANG LA

PHRAG DOG DANG, SNYAD 'TSOL BA'I SLAD DMAG RGYAG PAR YONG BA MIN, BOD KYI MI DMANGS

SKYABS MED MGON MED RNAMS KYI CHED DU MTSO SNGON PHYOGS NAS DAL CHING KHO SHO'U CHING DMAG

BCAS ` RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I YANG SRID BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO MDO KHAMS SMAD

NAS SPYAN DRANGS TE 'ONGS PA DANG, BSAM PA MTHUN PA'I SGO NAS KHYED CAG BOD 'BANGS KYI

CHED DU BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE SEMS LA BCANGS TE YONG BA YIN NA DGA' PO BYED DGOS PA DANG,

KHYED RNAMS RANG RANG GI YUL DU LOG SHIG, CES RGYAGS DANG BCAS TE BTANG BA'I SKAD CHA

GCIG NAS GCIG TU BRGYUD DE BOD MI RNAMS KYIS THOS PAS DMAG RGYAB PA'ANG ZOL GYIS BRGYAB

STE RIM PAS LHA BZANG KH'ANG GI DMAG SHUGS CHAG CING, 'JUN SGAR BA RNAMS GA-YUL LAS

RGYAL BA'I 'GO DOD, DE NAS ZLA 10 TSES 1 NAS 'JUN SGAR BA LHA SAR 'GRO BA'I DMAG GI

@508 GDONG BSGYUR BA NA, LHA BZANG KH'ANG DPUNG DANG BCAS PA TSES 3 GYI MTSAN THOG THAG TU

SNGON LA THON TE LHA SA'I PHYOGS DANG, PHYOGS MTSAMS, RTZE PHO BRANG CHEN PO'I PHYOGS

MTSAMS KUN LA BSRUNG BYA BZHAG ,DE DUS DMAG DPON CHE BA NI, DBUS MDA' DPON

AO RONG PA DANG, 'BUM THANG PA 'DAS PO'I BU GNYIS DANG, GTZANG DPUNG GI DMAG DPON

DU PHO LHA THA'I JI BSOD NAMS STOBS RGYAS DANG, BSAM GRUB GLING PA, BKRA SHIS RTZE PA,

SOG DPUNG GI DMAG DPON DU RAL THA'I JI BCAS YIN,

'JUN SGAR BA'I DPON DMAG RNAMS KYANG MJUG 'DED LTA BUR RIM BZHIN

'BYOR NAS GRA BZHI, SKU 'BUM THANG, LHA KLU SOGS LA SGAR CHAGS TE DMAG 'KHRUG BYED

MUS, NYIN GCIG, PHO LHA NAS KYIS LHA BZANG KH'ANG LA GSOL BA, LHA BZANG KH'ANG ZHABS

GRAS DPUNG HRAG NYUNG BSDUS BCAS MDO KHAMS BRGYUD MTSO SNGON PHYOGS SU PHEBS TE DMAG

ROGS BSKUL NAS SLAR DMAG 'THAB BYED DGOS DANG, DE'I BAR NGA TSOS GANG THUB KYI

GDONG LEN BKAG THABS BYAS NA LEGS TSUL ZHUS KYANG, SNGON LAS KYI 'BRAS BU LDOG TU MED

PAS MA GSAN, SKABS DER BKRA SHIS RTZE PA NAS 'JUN SGAR PA DANG, GSANG BA'I YIG

'GRUL BYAS PA SHES TSOR GYIS DE NYID DU RKYEN LAM DU BTANG, DE RJES RVA MO CHE'I PHYOGS NAS

SA SRUNG PAS MA BRTAN PAR 'JUN SGAR BA'I DMAG LHA SA'I NANG SHOR BAS LHA BZANG KH'ANG ZHABS

@518 GYI ^ RGYAL KHAB CHEN POR CHIBS ZHAL BSGYUR BA'I TSE RGYA YAG THANG DU ^ GONG MA'I LHA SRAS BCU

MTSO SNGON KHUL GYI SBYIN BDAG DANG, ZHAL SLOB THU KAN HO THOG THU, BKA' 'GYUR T'A BLA MA,

JING GIR GNAM GYI RGYAL PO'I GDUNG RGYUD KHAL KHA DON GRUB WANG, GUNG TSE DBANG NOR BU,

THA'I JI LHA DBANG RGYA MTSO, GU SHRIR GYI GDUNG RGYUD AE BUS PI LI, CHING WANG BLO BZANG

BSTAN 'DZIN, JUN WANG DGA' LDAN AER TE NI JU NANG, AER TE NE AER KHE, AER TE NI D'A

LAS SBO SHOG THU, MER GAN DA'I CHING, CHING HONG THA'I JI, AER TE NI JU NANG GI SRAS

DGE LEGS JU NANG SOGS DANG, ^ GONG MA'I LUNG LAS 'DZIN PA KHI YA, SBYAR KO CI,

SKU SRUNG DMAG MI BCAS YOD PA RED, ^ GONG MA'I SRAS TZANG JUN YANG 'BRI CHU'I KHA BAR

PHEBS SKYEL DU PHEBS TE DE NAS PHYIR LOG GNANG 'DUG,

GOL THO LER MJAL PHYAG TU BCAR SKABS, SDE PA NGA PHOD SNGAR 'DRIS YOD PAS DE'I BRANG DU

@528 CHING B'A THUR DANG, PHO LHA NAS GNYIS KYI SRID BYUS LA BKA' BLON GZHAN GSUM NAS

RTAG TU SKYON BRJOD DANG, GCIG LA GCIG PHAN PA MA YIN PA BYED PA DANG, LHAG PAR

DBUS DANG, GTZANG ZHES PHYOGS 'THEN BYAS TE SDE DPON SMOS CI, 'BANGS BYINGS

RNAMS LA NYES PA GCOD NA 'DIS SKYOB KYI GDENGS TSOD DANG, BAG YANGS KYI SROL

NGAN KHYAB GDAL DU GYUR ZHING, THOG MA'I CHAR ^ RGYAL BA'I YAB RJE BSOD NAMS DAR RGYAS

SPYIR STANGS LAS MED KYANG, RJES SU RIM PAS DBUS PHYOGS ZHE 'DZIN YOD PA LTA BU'I

MTHONG PHYOGS NGAN PA BCAS KYIS RTZA BA'I GZHUNG GI LAS DON LA 'THUS SHOR DANG, RANG KHONGS

MNGA' SDE SO SO'I 'DOD PA SGRUB PHYOGS KHO NAS CHAGS SDANG DANG, 'KHON 'DZIN JE CHER

SONG BA DANG, MTHA' GNYIS SU MA LHUNGS PA'I MI SER BYINGS SKYABS MED MGON MED DU

GYAR TA KHRAL DANG, 'UL LAG GIS DKA' SBYONG SHIN TU CHE KHAR, RNAM GRA PHAN BDE

LEGS BSHAD GLING PA'I DGE 'DUN RNAMS RTZED THANG DU SPOS TE SE 'BRAS DANG, RGYUD GRVA RNAM

GNYIS NAS PHYAG BZHES NYAMS LEN LDAN PA'I DGE 'DUN 'DEMS BSGRUBS KYIS SGRIG

'DZUGS MDZAD PA SOGS LA SGRO BTAGS GLENG BRJOD MANG BAR BRTEN, PHO LHA THA'I JIS, BKA'

BLON NGA LUM SBYAR GSUM GYIS BSAM PA MA YIN PA BYED TSUL RTOGS TE KUN MKHYEN ^ RGYAL BA'I

DBANG PO DANG, ^ RGYAL BA'I YAB RJE, DA'I CHING B'A THUR SOGS LA ^ SNYAN SENG ZHIB GSOL

THOG ,LHAG PAR DA'I CHING B'A THUR GYI SKU SROG LA RTAG TU BAG ZON DGOS TSUL NAN TAN CHEN

POS LAN 'GA' GSOL YANG, NYAMS SNANG CHE BA MA MDZAD STABS RE ZHIG RANG GI SROG SRUNG

THABS SU PHYOGS GA-YOL ZHIG LA 'GRO RGYU DGE MTSAN CHE BAR GZIGS TE, SBRUM PHO LHAR

LCAM CHAB GZHI'I NAD MNAR YOD TSUL LA KHAG BTAGS SRAS DANG BCAS 'KHOR ZHAG ZHUS

PHEBS SKABS, MDA' DPON BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS DANG, BON RIGS NGAG DBANG BDE CHEN,

@529 SKYID SBUG PA SOGS LA ^ RGYAL KHAB TU GNAS TSUL GSAR PA 'DRA BYUNG TSE LAM SENG BANG MI

GTONG DGOS MNGAGS DAM MDZAD,

SKABS DER LHA SA KHUL DU DA'I CHING B'A THUR LA MAN JU ^ GONG MAS GZENGS

BSTOD BYED PAR T'A SHIN GNYIS YONG NGO ZHES PA'I GSAR GNAS SHIG THOS PA, GUNG LUM PA

CAN NAS DA'I CHING B'A THUR DANG, PHO LHA THA'I JI GSOD RGYU'I NGAG GROS SNGAR NAS YOD PA RGYA'I MI

SNA DE DAG MA 'BYOR GONG MED PA MA BZOS NA, PHYIS NAS RE BA MED PA 'GYUR RO SNYAMS TE 'PHRAL

DU DA'I CHING B'A THUR DANG, PHO LHA THA'I JI NYE DU DANG BCAS PA MED PA BZO RGYU'I BLO GROS MTHUN TE,

ME LUG 1727 ZLA 6 TSES 18 NYIN LHA LDAN GTZUG LAG KHANG GI BLA BRANG STENG GZIM CHUNG

KHAMS GSUM NANG DA'I CHING B'A THUR DANG, PAS SE NGA PHOD PA, GUNG LUM PA BA, SBYAR RA

THA'I JI BCAS LHAN RGYAS TSUGS TE BZHUGS SKABS, ZHOL GNYER NGA PHOD BLO BZANG NAS YI GE

RING PO ZHIG DA'I CHING LA PHUL TE DE'I DON LA BRTAG CING BZHUGS PA'I SKABS SU, YOL BA'I

RGYAB NAS MGRON GNYER BLO BZANG DON YOD KYIS DA'I CHING GI DBU SKRA NAS BZUNG MA THAG DER YOD

NGA PHOD BLO BZANG DANG, PAS SE NGA PHOD PA, GUNG LUM PA, SBYAR RA THA'I JI BCAS NAS

'JUS TE SO SO'I RGYA GRI BTON TE BSNUN NAS MGO LUS THAMS CAD NAS KHRAG 'DZAGS TE MGUL

NAS SGRA 'GAR 'GAR PO SGROG BZHIN PAR GSHEGS, SGO 'GRAM DU DA'I CHING GI ZHABS

'BRING PA RNAMS LA GA-YOG GZHAN TSOS LAG RUB KYIS BSAD, DE 'PHRAL DA'I CHING GI PHYAG

MDZOD SRI THAR DANG, DRUNG YIG GDONG SNA BA YANG BSAD DE ZHABS 'BRING BYINGS BTZON DU

MI SLEBS SKABS GCIG GIS GCIG LA 'THAMS TE GSOD MI NUS TZAM BYUNG YANG, GZIM CHUNG

@530 SO SOR 'KHRID DE BSAD, DE NAS NAG CHU MKHAN PO DANG, JA'I SANG GSOD PAR BYINGS

PA BA DANG, GRUB RGYAL GLING PA BTANG STE BSAD, GTZANG DU PHO LHA YAB SRAS GSOD PAR

BKRA SHIS DPAL RA BA DANG, SKYA KHANG PA DPUNG BCAS BSHAD RTZOL GYI MNGAGS PAR PHO LHA THA'I

JIR BYA BYUNG STE PHYOGS THON TSAR BAS PHYIR LOG BYED DGOS BYUNG,

DE'I DUS SU 'DUS BYUNG SKYID SBUG DBANG 'DUD LHA LDAN NAS RANG GZHIS SU

YONG BA'I LAM DU DA'I CHING B'A THUR NYAMS NYES BYUNG BA'I GNAS TSUL THOS MA THAG ,DE'I GNAS

TSUL PHO LHA THA'I JIR ZHU BAR GA-YOG SPEN PA NAM NYIN BSHAD RTZOL GYIS BTANG BA, DE 'PHRAL

DON LTAR, LCAM CHAB GZHIS BSNYUN PA DE DANG, SRAS PHO LHA'I SRAS MO BDE LDAN SGROL MA RJES SU DGA' BZHI GUNG PAndI TA'I MNA' MAR PHEBS TE ZHABS DRUNG BDE LDAN SGROL MA ZHU BA DE RED, MO BCAS NYE 'GRAM GYI SA 'GOL ZHIG
