^ MI DBANG GI SRAS BGRES PA 'GYUR MED TSE BRTAN DANG, MDA' DPON

LCANG LO CAN PA DPUNG BCAS NYA SRAB DANG, MDA'U LA BRGYUD YONG SKABS DBUS DMAG DANG

'THAB 'DZINGS SHUGS CHE TZAM BYAS MTHAR MA BRTAN PAR DBUS DMAG RNAMS BYER, NGA'I

MES PO RTZIS ZUR BKA' DRIN CAN ZHVA SGAB GZHIS SU LHA GSOL LA PHEBS SKABS NGA RANG YANG

ZHABS PHYIR YOD PA, NYIN GCIG GNYER RGYA MTSO SOGS RGAN GRAS KHA SHAS BCAS GZHIS

KYI RGYAB RIR RI GZIGS SU PHEBS TE MDZUB STON GNANG DON, SNGAR DBUS GTZANG NANG 'KHRUG

SKABS MDA'U LA NAS YONG PA'I GTZANG DMAG RNAMS MDA'U'I GRU KHA NAS GTZANG PO RTA MCHOG

KHA BABS LA KO BA DANG, SHING GI RDZING BZOS TE THON SKABS, ZHVA SGAB DBUS

KHONGS SU GTOGS PA'I ZHEN GYIS GZHIS BZHUGS MI NGO DPAL LDAN RDO RJE ZHU BA NGO GA-YOG

@538 GSUM GYIS DA LTA PHYAG MDZOD NANG YOD SKYA RENG ZHES PA'I BOD MDA' RING PO DE GSUM 'KHYER

TE LHA MTHO SGANG NAS KO BAR YONG MI RNAMS LA 'PHEN PAS GTZANG DMAG MANG PO BSAD PA DENG

SANG BAR GRU SA DER MI RO RTA RO ZHES MING CHAGS, DE NAS GTZANG DMAG MANG BAS GLAGS MA

RNYED PAR NGO GA-YOG GSUM KA NYANG KHOL GYI BRAG GSEB TU BROS, GTZANG DMAG RNAMS GZHIS

SU YONG STE DNGOS PO, SGO PHYUGS TSANG MA BCOM 'PHROGS BYAS, BRAG DKAR BA'I MDUN

GYI THANG CHUNG DER SGAR CHAGS TE ZHAG GCIG SDOD SKABS RTAGS MTSAN MI 'DRA BA BYUNG BAS, PHYI

NYIN THON KHAR MI SER LA KHYOD TSO'I LHA DU MKHAN DE DANG, ZANGS SKAD RGYAG MKHAN DE 'DIR YOD

CES PHYIR SPROD BYAS PA TSOMS CHEN GYI RTEN GTZO SHAR LI LAS GRUB PA'I THUB PA'I SNANG BRNYAN BYIS

PA LO BRGYAD TZAM GYI SKU TSAD YOD PA'I BYIN CAN DE DANG, THAB TSANG NANG GI CHU ZANGS GOG PO DE

GNYIS PHYIR SPROD BYAS PA RED SOGS LO RGYUS SNYAN PO DAG GSUNGS PA DRAN,

DE SKABS BKRA SHIS LHUN PO NAS PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE DANG, SA SKYA'I

MGRON GNYER ZUNG, DBUS NAS DGA' LDAN KHRI RIN PO CHE DANG, GDAN SA GSUM DANG, RGYUD

GRVA RNAM GNYIS KYI SLOB DPON RNAMS CHINGS MOL ZHU BAR PHEBS PA, ^ MI DBANG GIS DBUS

PHYOGS CHINGS PA RNAMS LA DMIGS 'DZUGS KYIS GSUNGS DON, SNGAR DBUS DPUNG GIS

NGA NYAMS NYES SU GTONG BA'I CHED NGA'I RJES SU DMAG GTONG DUS KHYED RNAMS CHINGS SGRIGS SU

PHEBS SAM, DE RJES DBUS KONG DMAG GIS LO 'KHOR GNYIS TZAM GTZANG LJONGS SU BSDAD

DE DGON PA DANG, LHA KHANG, YUL GRONG MANG PO STOR 'JIG DANG, CHAGS RTEN BRAL BA'I

BRDABS GSIGS, BTZAN SHED BYED SKABS KHYED RNAMS CHINGS SGRIGS SU PHEBS SAM, DA

CHA NGAS ZHVA SER BSTAN PA'I ZHABS 'DEGS DANG, DA'I CHING B'A THUR GYI DGRA SHA LEN NYE BA'I

SKABS SU CHINGS DON GNANG BA DE DRANG PO MA RED GSUNGS SHING, 'PHAN YUL BRGYUD SGAR

@539 PAR DMAG GI PHRU MA BTAB, LUM PA BA DPUNG BCAS DGA' MO 'PHRANG BZUNGS KYANG, MTSAN

MO JO MO BSIL BSIL GYI RI RTZE NAS GTZANG DMAG KHAG GCIG GIS BSNAN, ^ MI DBANG NYID

DPUNG GI RU SNE 'KHRID DE 'JIGS PA MED PAR GZHUNG LAM NAS THAD KAR PHEBS PA, LAG

'DZING THUG NYER DBUS DMAG RNAMS DE NYID DU PHYIR BROS BYAS PA'I RJES DED DE DMAG 'GA'

SHAS BSAD RMAS BYAS, NGA LUM SBYAR GSUM GYIS GTZOS DPON RIGS RNAMS LAM MA THOB

PAR BROS NAS RTZE PHO BRANG CHEN PO PO T'A LAR KUN MKHYEN ^ RGYAL BA'I DBANG PO'I SKU MDUN DU SROG

SKYABS ZHU BAR BROS SHING CHAB SGO RNAMS BSDAMS, ^ MI DBANG DPUNG DANG BCAS PA SA SPRE

1728 ZLA 7 TSES 26 NYIN LHA LDAN DGA' BZHI 'PHRUL SNANG GI GTZUG LAG KHANG MNGA' RIS

DANG BCAS PA BDAG GIR BLANGS TE, GUNG BLON RNAMS PHYIR BROS BYOL MI 'BYUNG BA'I CHED

GTZANG DPUNG GIS RTZE PHO BRANG CHEN PO'I CHAB SGO RNAMS DANG, PHYOGS BZHI MTSAMS BRGYAD

BSKOR TE ZHAG GNYIS KYI BAR BSDAD, RIM BZHIN LHO BRGYUD NAS YONG MKHAN GYI GTZANG DPUNG

BYINGS KYANG 'BYOR TE LHA SA'I BYANG PHYOGS SU PHRU MA BTAB CING, DBUS GTZANG SMOS CI, BOD

LJONGS CHOL KHA GSUM LA DBANG LUNG BSGYUR BA DANG, BDE 'JAGS DGOS PA'I KHRIMS KYI

RTZA TSIG BRJID NON CHE BA ZHIG KYANG DRIL BSGRAGS BYAS PA RED, ^ MI DBANG RTOG BRJOD 281-BA-NAS 289-BA-BAR,

SKABS DER, 'ON RGYAL SRAS RIN PO CHE, BTZAN PO NO MI HAN, KHRI

PA DNGUL SRANG GANG TZAM GYI PHAN PA SGRUB TU'ANG MA BYUNG MOD, 'ON KYANG GNOD PA DANG, 'TSE BA

MED PAR NYE BA'I SEMS KYIS BSKYANGS PA DE YIN, SNGA SOR BLA MA PHYIR LDOG SKABS KYANG RE

@547 ZHIG BOD RANG DU BSDAD NA LEGS PA'I RGYU MTSAN BYAS PA YIN KYANG, 'DOD MOS LTAR LAS

BYA THABS MA BYUNG ZHING, DA LAM AEM CHI RANG YANG BOD KYI NAD PA MANG POR PHAN THOGS SHING,

SMAN RIN DNGUL SKAR GANG YANG MI LEN PA BCAS SEMS BSKYED BZANG PO GZHAN DANG MI 'DRA BA

'DUG PAS RE ZHIG BOD YUL DU BSDAD NA BSAM YANG, BLA MA LUS GCONG ZHING, SNGON LA

THON GRUB PA DANG BCAS, DA CHA KHYOD RANG YANG ZLA BA BDUN PA'I MJUG LA THON RTZIS YIN NA 'DOD

SBYAR BYAS CHOG PA'I LAM YIG KYANG SBYIN YOD, KHYOD RANG GNYIS KYI DGON PA GSAR RGYAG BYAS

PAR NGED NAS KHANG SRUNG BSKOS, RGYUN DUD SGO LA THE'U RGYAB NAS LDE MIG KYANG BSDU BCUG STE

BDAG TU BZUNGS NAS BLA MA DANG, AEM CHI KHYED RANG GNYIS MA GTOGS PA'I MI PHYOGS

POR YUL GCIG TU LHAN CIG TU 'GROGS NAS RANG YUL DU LDOG PA 'DI LA NGED KYANG SEMS

PA YIN PAS YID LA NGES PAR GYIS, CHU GLANG 1733 ZLA BA 6 TSES 18 DGE BAR BRIS,

ZHES SBUG THAM BKA' YIG GSOL RAS STZAL BA BCAS HA LAM LO 'KHOR BCU GNYIS RTZAM LHA

SA RANG LA BSDAD LUCIANO PETECH AND CAPPUCCINI MARCHIGIANI,

" LA LIBRERIA DELLO STATO (ROMA MCMIII)

'DZIN THAM KHAG DANG, BKA' YIG GNANG BA'I BOD YIG PHYAG THAM SBYAR MA'I PAR BTAB PA'I NGO BSHUS KHAG YOD, 'DUG,

@548 NGO 'DRA GNYIS BYUNG STE SNGAR NAS PHYOGS 'THEN DU GYAR BA'I 'BRUG SDE SRID DGU PA NGAG DBANG RGYA

MTSO'AM, WANG PHA JOR GRAGS PA PHYOGS GCIG DANG, SDE SRID BRGYAD PA'I NANG BLON KA

SBIS DON GRUB RGYAL PO DANG, MI PHAM DBANG PO PHYOGS GCIG BYAS TE NANG 'KHRUG BYUNG NAS, WANG

PHA JO BKRA SHIS CHOS RDZONG NAS PHYIR PHUD BYAS RKYEN BOD GZHUNG LA SKYABS ZHUR BANG MI CHED BTANG

GIS BKA' LAN MA 'BYOR BA'I DBAR, 'GAL ZLAS WANG PHA JO BKRONGS PA BCAS LA BRTEN

'BRUG NANG 'KHRUG RTZOD ME LTAR 'BAR BAS NANG 'KHRUG BDE 'JAGS 'BYUNG CHED DANG, PHA JO'I

RGYAB GNYER LTA BUR BOD GZHUNG NAS MDO MKHAR THA'I JI TSE RING DBANG RGYAL DANG, DBUS GTZANG

GI DMAG LTOS CHE LHO PHYOGS SU BSKUL TE SPEL GONG DAR HAN GRAGS PA DANG, SMAN THANG PA

GNYIS 'BRUG NANG GTONG GNANG MDZAD SKABS, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG YE SHES DANG,

SA SKYA ^ GONG MA, KARMA ZHVA NAG PA BYANG CHUB RDO RJE, ZHVA DMAR CHOS KYI DON GRUB BCAS KYIS

'BRUG NANG KHUL DPAR LA BAR GSES ZHUS CHOG PA'I BOD GZHUNG LA GNANG BA ZHUS THOB LTAR, BKA'

MOL GNANG STE SA SDE RNAMS RIS SU BCAD, GCIG LA GCIG GNOD 'TSE MI BYED PA DANG, NANG

'KHRUG SKABS PHAN TSUN NAS BTZON DANG, MI GTER BZUNGS PA'I MI RIGS RNAMS RANG GNAS

SO SOR BTANG ZHING, BOD GZHUNG LA'ANG DPUNG 'JUG MA DGOS PA ZHUS THOG, ,SKABS DE NAS

BZUNGS LO LTAR LO PHYAG DANG, DBYAR MJAL ZHU RGYU SOGS KYI MNA' DANG, YI GE'I CHAS

BYAS, SA SKYONG RIN CHEN 'PHRIN LAS RAB RGYAS KYI KHU BO TSE RING DBANG CHEN MI GTE LTA BUR LHA

SAR MNGAGS, BOD GZHUNG NAS KYANG LO PHYAG DANG, DBYAR MJAL ZHU MIR GTAN 'JAGS

LAM YIG DANG, 'TSER SHAG SOGS KYI GZIGS BSKYANGS GNANG RGYU BCAS BYAS TE 'KHRUG

CHOD LEGS PAR BYUNG BAR BRTEN 'BRUG GZHUNG NAS THUGS RJE CHE ZHU BAR MGAR THAR DU ^ RGYAL DBANG

MCHOG GI SKU MDUN DANG, LHA SAR ^ MI DBANG SKU MDUN DU SGANG STENG BLA MA DANG, KA SPE BLA MA

@549 DON GRUB BCAS ^ MI DBANG RTOG BRJOD 344-BA DPAG BSAM RIN PO CHE'I SNYE MA 155-NA-3, 'BRUG GI RGYAL RABS BCAS LA GSAL, BCAR, LO 'DI'I YAS MAS NAS ^ MI DBANG DANG, LHA SDOD MAN JU'I

AAM BAN YANG YANG MI MTHUN PA BYUNG BA DANG, MAN JU'I DMAG MIS KYANG MI SER LA BRDAB

GSIGS CHE RKYEN RGYAS BSDUS BYED CHOG SKOR DANG, SDOD YUL KYANG LHA SA'I GRONG KHYER LAS

T'A ZHIN RGYA DMAG CHIG STONG LNGA BRGYA BCAS RGYA YUL DU PHYIR LOG GIS, CI'U T'A LO YE DANG, RGYA

@557 SKOR NAS 'PHROS PA'I, GSOL DPON CHEN PO GRAGS PA MTHA' YAS LA'ANG GLENG GZHI BZOS

PA DE SKOR LA KHRI CHEN NO MI HAN 'DI NI RGYAL BA'I YONGS 'DZIN KHRI CHEN NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN YIN, GYI DRUNG DU ^ MI DBANG MCHOG NAS BSLAB STON ZHU BAR MNGAGS PA

GNANG BA, DRUNG YIG TSANGS SKYES KYI LAG BRIS MAR MNAN PA'I ZAG RDZAS LEN DGOS GSOL

DPON NAS BSLAB TSUL BYUNG YANG, NGED NAS 'DI LA BDEN 'DZIN BYED KYIN MED, 'ON KYANG

GLENG 'DI BYUNG GSHIS TSANGS SKYES DANG NGO 'DZOMS BYED DAM, YANG RANG BABS SU 'JOG

PA GANG 'DOD BYED RGYU YIN, KHYOD RANG ^ GONG SA CHEN PO'I ZHABS 'DEGS SGRUB MI'I GTZO BO

YIN GSHIS NGED NAS LOG MTHONG BYED DON MED CES RGYU MTSAN LOBS, GSUNGS PAR LTAR KHRI

CHEN DE NYID KYI DRUNG DU MOL BAR, GSOL DPON CHE MOS ZHU RIGS, DPON PO NAS

RANG NGOS LA SNGA PHYIR THUGS RJES 'DZIN BZHIN PA'I MU YIN, DE 'DRA BYED PA'I DON CI YOD,

MDOR NA YID LA BSAM PA LTAR ZHOG RMI LAM DU'ANG RMIS PA MED, 'ON KYANG DNGOS SBYOR SKOR

BKA' GANG GNANG ZHUS CHOG KYANG, BTZON DONG NANG GI MI DANG LAB GLENG BYED RGYU MI 'DUG,

DPON PO DGONGS PA DVANGS PHYIN DE KAS CHOG CES ZHUS SONG BA BCAS 'KHRUN CHOD PA DE BZHIN

LA; DE'I SANG NYIN ^ GONG SA MCHOG NAS KHO BO 'BOD DU GTONG GNANG BYUNG BA BZHIN SKU MDUN

DU BCAR BA BKA' LAS, KHA SANG MI DBANG GIS KHYOD BTANG NAS GRAGS PA MTHA' YAS LA

DRI BA BYAS PA DE NGED NAS GO BYUNG, DE SKOR GRAGS PA MTHA' YAS LA DON MED DU GZUGS

MED GZUGS BCOS KYI RGYU MTSAN BYAS PA LAS, DON DU SNYAD SNYOD BYED RGYU 'DI TSO THAMS

CAD NGA MA 'DOD PAR BYAS PA LOS YIN, DES NA NGED NI KHANG PA'I SBUG TU DPE CHA 'DRA BLTAS

NAS NYAM CHUNG GI SDOD PA LAS, GZHAN MA'I BYA BYED RNAM 'GYUR GANG YANG MED, 'DIS KYANG

MA 'THUS NA 'BRAS SPUNGS SAM, RI KHROD GANG RIGS LA PHYIN PAS CHOG ,DE'I RGYU MTSAN

@558 ^ MI DBANG LA LOBS PHEBS BYUNG, DE LA PHRAN BUS PHYAG BTZAL, GDUNG SHUGS DRAG

POS, DA LAm 'DI SKOR SOGS GZHUNG RANG GI SKU CHAG BOD BA 'BYUNG PO'I 'PHRUL GYI YONG BABS

GYA NYES ZHIG YIN 'DUG ,DENG SANG THAN LTAS NGAN PA'I RIGS KYANG MANG TZAM 'DUG PAS 'BYUNG PO'I

'PHRUL STOBS CIR 'GYUR MI SHES PAS THUGS STOBS RGYA CHER BSKYED DE 'JAM CHAGS SU 'GYUR BA,

BSTAN 'GRO SPYI'I BDE THABS SU DGONGS PA CI NAS KYANG THUGS RJES GZIGS ZHES GSOL 'DEBS

NAN CHE DANG, ^ MI DBANG MCHOG LA'ANG ^ GONG SA CHEN PO'I BKA' JI LTAR PHEBS PA RNAMS CHAD

LHAG MED PAR SNYAN DBANG DU GANG 'JEBS ZHUS PAR PHYIR PHEBS LA, SNGON MA'I RGYU MTSAN RNAMS

NI CHOS DBYINGS SU CHOD PA LTAR YIN 'DUG ,DA SGOS THAD NI, GANGS RI RVA BAS BSKOR BA'I

ZHING KHAMS 'DIR, ,PHAN DANG BDE BA MA LUS 'BYUNG BA'I GZHI, ,SPYAN RAS GZIGS DBANG BSKAL

BZANG RGYA MTSO YI, ,SKU TSE ZHABS PAD BSKAL BRGYAR BRTAN GYUR CIG ,CES PA'I DON DGONGS

DBYINGS SU 'JAGS PA DANG, BOD 'BANGS BSTAN 'GRO'I PHAN BDER DGONGS PA BKA' DRIN CHE

BA LAS, LOGS SU ^ SNYAN 'DEBS ZHU RGYU MED CES SOGS ZHU LAN 'BUL GNANG GIS ZHI 'JAGS

LEGS LAM DU GYUR PA BYUNG, ZHES GSAL BA DANG,

YANG, LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO RJE'I RNAM THAR NANG, LCANG SKYA HO THOG THU YE SHES BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME'I RNAM THAR DGE LDAN BSTAN PA'I MDZES RGYAN 131-NA-2, BOD KYI SRID SKYONG PHO LHA

BSOD NAMS STOBS RGYAS SPYIR BSTAN PA DANG, BSTAN 'DZIN DANG BCAS PAR GUS MCHOD LHUR

LEN PA DANG, DPA' MDZANGS BRTUL PHOD PA SOGS LUGS GNYIS CHAR NAS BSNGAGS 'OS

PA ZHIG YIN 'DUG KYANG, LEGS PA'I KARMAS SANGS RGYAS KYI MDZAD PA THAMS CAD SKYON GYI

GONG BUR MTHONG BA BZHIN DU RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAR GTING NAS MI DAD CING, LOG

SGRUB MANG DU BGYIS SHING, RJE BLA MA NYID ^ RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I 'PHRIN LAS

@559 PHYOGS KUN TU RGYAS PAR MDZAD PA'I THUGS KYI SRAS GCIG PU YIN PA'I DBANG GIS DNGOS SU

CI YANG MA NUS KYANG, LKOG NAS BLA MA KA: THOG PA SOGS NGAN SNGAGS MKHAN POR MTHU GTAD KYI

RIGS MANG DU BYED BCUG PAR GNANG STE SNGA MA ZHIG RJE BLA MA NYID SKU KHAMS CUNG ZAD BSNYEL

ZHING, 'TSUB LTAS KYANG CHE BA ZHIG BYUNG SKABS MNAL LAM DU RJE BLA MA RANG NYID MKHAR RDZONG

ZHIG GI YANG THOG NA BZHUGS 'DUG PAR, PHO LHA BAS DMAG DPON BYAS TE BOD DMAG

MANG POS RDZONG GI MTHA' BSKOR NAS ME MDA' CHAR BZHIN DU 'BEBS PAS RDZONG TSO MI THUB PA 'DRA

BA LA RDZONG ZHOL NAS BUD MED 'JIGS SU RUNG BA RAL GRI 'PHYAR ZHING, DRE'U LA BZHON PA

ZHIG GLO BUR THON NAS PHO LHA DPUNG BCAS BYI'U KHRAS DED PA BZHIN THAG RING PO ZHIG TU BSKRAD

PA'I RNAM PA GSAL BA BYUNG BA DANG, 'DI SKABS RJE BLA MA NYID KYI PHYAG GA-YOG PA RMI LAM

GSAL ZHING, THOG TU 'KHEL BA ZHIG YOD PA DE'I RMI LAM DU, BOD NAS ^ RGYAL BA

THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS BTANG BA YIN ZER BA'I BUD MED GOS SNGON PO GYON, DRE'U LA BZHON

PA SGA'I SNGA SHA NA PHO LHA BA'I MGO YIN NAM SNYAM PA'I MI'I MGO RLON PA KHRAG TZAR RE 'PHYANG BA

SA SBRUL 1749 PAn CHEN SPRUL SKU DPAL LDAN YE SHES ^ RGYAL MCHOG

BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO'I DRUNG LAS DGE TSUL GYI BSLAB SDOMS ZHU SLAD LHA SAR PHEBS TE ZLA 4

TSES 15 NYIN LHA LDAN JO BO RIN PO CHE'I SPYAN SNGAR DGE TSUL GYI BSLAB SDOM ZHU GNANG DANG 'BREL,

THUGS 'DUN CHE YANG, PHYI'I SNANG TSUL LA LA MO TSANGS PA'I LUNG DON LTAR PAn CHEN RIN PO

CHE 'PHRAL MYUR GTZANG PHEBS GNANG RGYU'I SGO DOD PAS ^ RGYAL BA YAB SRAS GNYIS KA'I THUGS

'DOD DANG MA MTHUN TZAM BYUNG RUNG, RJES SU SPRUL SKU SKU NA SON MTSAmS CHOS ZHUR BSKYAR

BCAR ZHU RGYU'I SNYAN SENG GNANG STE BDUN PHRAG GSUM LAS MA BZHUGS PAR PHYIR PHEBS GNANG

DGOS BYUNG 'DUG PA, NANG DON SRID SKYONG GI MDZAD PAR 'GYUR LDOG MANG BAS GLO BUR PHEBS

GNANG BA SHIN TU LEGS TSUL DANG, DA CHA 'DI KHAR RE ZHIG BZHUGS GDAN 'JAGS DGOS

@564 BRGYA STONG 'CHAD PA LAS, MCHOG GI SPRUL SKU RIN PO CHER TSIG GCIG 'BUL RGYU BYUNG BA SKAL

BA BZANG BA DANG, BSOD NAMS KYI TSOGS DPAG TU MED PA GSOG PA'I RGYUR MCHIS PAS

RE ZHIG BZHUGS DGOS, ZHES THUGS DGYES PA CHEN PO'I BKA' BZANG POR PHEBS PAR,

PHYAG MDZOD CHEN MO NAS, 'DI LTAR BKA' GNANG BA THUGS RJE'I GZIGS PA BLA NA MA MCHIS

PA YIN 'DUG KYANG, LA MO CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO'I LUNG PHEBS SU DA LAM SKU NA PHRA BAS DBANG

LUNG RJES GNANG PHRAN TZAM ZHIG ZHUS NAS MI RING BAR GDAN SAR PHYIR PHEBS LEGS LUGS

GSUNGS DON BZHIN DA LAM DE DON LTAR ZHUS CHOG PA DANG, SLAR SKU NA 'DI BAS CHER PHEBS

NAS DBANG LUNG RJES GNANG SOGS YONGS SU RDZOGS PA ZHUS CHOG PA DGOS PA'I SNYAN SENG

KUN GZIGS MCHOG GI YANG SRID LHA SAR RGYUN RING BZHUGS MI THUB PA'I THABS SHES SHIG

YIN PAR NGES,

DE SKABS MAN JU'I SKU TSAB KYIS DBYEN SBYOR DKRUG SHING LA BRTEN NAS

SRID SKYONG D'A LA'I B'A THUR DANG, MNGA' RIS SPYI KHYAB GUNG 'GYUR MED TSE BRTAN SKU MCHED

BGRES GZHON GNYIS DBAR 'THAB RTZOD YO LANGS CHE TZAM BYUNG BAR, ^ RGYAL DBANG MCHOG

NAS BOD 'BANGS SPYI'I LAR RGYA SEMS LA BZHAG STE PHAN TSUN MTHUN LAM LUGS LEGS

BYED DGOS KYI DGE SKYON BKA' SLOB YANG NAS YANG DU STZAL BA'I THOG ,SKU BCAR MTSAN

BSGROGS MKHAN PO'I GDONG BKA' YIG DANG BCAS LAN DGU CHAD 'THUD BYED PAR MNGA' RIS

SU GTONG GNANG MDZAD RTZIS THABS RNAMS JI LTAR MDZAD RUNG, BOD SPYI'I BSTAN PA'I BGEGS

CHAGS SAM, LAS KYIS RMONGS PA LTA BUS RTZOD GZHI JE SDUG JE ZHAN KHO NAR GYUR, SKABS

DER SRID SKYONG GIS DGA' LDAN KHRI RIN PO CHE NAM MKHA' BZANG LA DRAG PO'I LAS SBYOR MDZAD DE

@565 MNGA' RIS GUNG THAL BA'I RDUL BZHIN BRLAGS DGOS TSUL ZHUS PAS, BLA MAS CHEN PO'I

NGOS 'DZIN MA MDZAD PAR NGA DGA' LDAN KHRI PAS MI GSOD MI THUB GSUNGS PAS, RGYAL PO KHROS

NAS, DGA' LDAN GSER KHRI TSA LEN BYAS TE RGYUD PA DRI MED LA GSER KHRI GTAD, DER BLA

MA'I NYE GNAS KYIS, BSTAN PA LA DGRA BYUNG NA, SANGS RGYAS LA RA MDA' ZER BA YIN PAS

DRAG PO'I LAS SBYOR MDZAD DE RGYAL PO MED PA BZOD DGOS TSUL ZHUS PAR, BLA MA HA LAS PA

LTAR MDZAD DE CI ZER, NGA DGA' LDAN GSER KHRI'I THOG NAS, DGA' LDAN CHOS KYI PHO BRANG DU

RGYAL TSAB BYAMS PA MGON PO DANG, YAB RJE BLO BZANG GRAGS PA GNYIS THEG MCHOG CHOS

KYI BGRO BA MDZAD PA'I MDUN SA DER CHOS GOS RNAM GSUM 'DI GYON BZHIN DU 'GRO RGYU YIN,

KHYED RNAMS 'DI SKAD MA ZER ZHIG GSUNGS, DER BLA MAS KHRI THOG KHANG NAS PHEBS TE,

DGA' LDAN GSER KHRI'I THOG NAS DGE 'DUN RNAMS LA CHOS KYI MTHA' MA GNANG STE BSNGO SMON

MTSAMS SBYOR MDZAD NAS, KHO BO DGA' LDAN GSER KHRIR 'KHOD DE RGYAL BA TZONG KHA PA'I BSTAN

PA LA PHAN GNOD GANG BYAS DAM CAN CHOS RGYAL KHYOD RANG DPANG PO YIN NO GSUNGS TE LAM SENG

THE PO KHANG TSAN DU PHEBS TE GZUGS SKU RGYAL MCHOG 'JAM DPAL RGYAL MTSOS MDZAD PA YONGS 'DZIN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYI RNAM THAR PADMO 'BYED PA'I NYIN BYED 26-BA-3, BSDUS TSUL BSTAN PA DANG,

YANG, MDO MKHAR ZHABS DRUNG TSE RING DBANG RGYAL GYI RANG BYUNG BA BRJOD PA ZOL MED NGAG GI ROL MO 30-BA-5,

LHA SDOD RGYA MI'I SKU TSAB NAS SKU MCHED BGRES GZHON DBAR DKRUG SHING BYAS PA'I NGO SPROD, RANG RNAM ANG, SKABS

SHIG DGA' LDAN KHANG GSAR GYI GZIM CHUNG 'GAG TU NO YON PAndI TA DANG, KHO BO GNYIS BOS NAS,

MGRON BLO BZANG BKRIS DANG, DPAL SHAG PA BRGYUD WANG GI SLOB STON LA, BLA PHUR LCOG NGAG DBANG BYAMS PA, BU MO, SRID SKYONG RANG GI AA LCE

ZHABS DRUNG BDE LDAN SGROL MA,

@566 GUNG DGA' BZHI GUNG PAndI TA, GUNG, MDO MKHAR ZHABS DRUNG, ZHABS DRUNG BCAS NAS MNGA' RIS GUNG LA DMAG 'KHYOD SHOG BYAS 'DUG CES T'A ZHIN GONG DU BRJOD PA LTAR

LHA SDOD RGYA MI'I SKU TSAB NAS SKU MCHED BGRES GZHON DBAR DKRUG SHING BYAS PA'I NGO SPROD,

NAS NGED LA GSUNGS BYUNG, KHYED TSO'I BYED BABS JI LTAR YIN GSAL THONGS PHEBS PA, ZHU

LAN DU, RANG NGOS NAS DRAG ZHAN SU LA YANG DKRUG SHING DANG, BYED NGAN BSAM SBYOR LOG

PA'I RIGS RMI LAM DU'ANG BYAS PA MED, 'ON KYANG SO SO'I LAS DBANG MYONG BYAS MA NYES KHAG

GA-YOGS LTA BU YIN NA NI PHRAN RANG NA TSOD 'DI TZAM LA SLEBS PA DA LTA BAR RKYEN DBANG MED TZAM

BYUNG, DA NI BAN SKU TSE RING NA LO GSUM DANG, RKYEN GLO BUR BYUNG NA ZHAG GSUM DPE LTAR

YIN 'DUG PAS, JI LTAR GNANG YANG 'GYOD PA MED PAS DGONGS PAR GANG DPYAD LAS ZHU

RGYU MED, CES ZHUS, LO 'DI'I MJUG DANG, SA MO SBRUL, LCAGS PHO RTA'I LO LA BYANG

PHYOGS KYI YUL LJONGS SU RI DVAGS NYES MED BAG YANGS SU RGYU BA RNAMS LA GO 'DED DU

DBUS GTZANG GI DMAG DPUNG BSKUL BA LTA BU'I STOBS CHE DANG BCAS GSHEGS, 'BRONG,

RKYANG, DGE BA, GTZOD LA SOGS PA GRANGS KYIS MI CHOD PA SROG DANG PHRAL BAS THOG MAR

SNYING RJE DANG, ZHED SNANG CHE YANG, RIM PAS BLO DRED PAS NA SNYING RJE'I SEMS LTA CI SMOS,

DPON GYI TSA SHUGS MA BZOD PAS RI DVAGS SOGS BZUNG NA DANG, GSOD NA DGA' BA'I

BLO 'DI KHO NA SKYE BA SNANG, LCAGS RTA LO GTZANG DU CHIBS BSGYUR GYIS RIN CHEN RTZER BZHUGS

SKABS, YANG KHO BO GZIM CHUNG 'GAG TU BOS NAS, DZA SAG THA'I JI, DBUS MDA'

DPON, LA MO CHOS RJE BCAS GSUM DPANG POR BZHAG ,SRANG SBUG PA DANG, DPAL

SHAG GIS BKA' BSGYUR BA, SKU MCHED GNYIS 'KHRUG RKYEN YONG BA 'DI BLA MA BYAMS PA,

GUNG PAndI TA, BU MO, ZHABS DRUNG BCAS KHYOD TSOS MNGA' RIS GUNG LA YI GE BTANG TSUL TSE

RING GI LAG BRIS MA 'DI BZHIN BYUNG, 'DI SKOR NGOS LEN BYED DAM, KHO PA DANG NGO THUG BYED

GSAL THONGS, GSUNGS PAR, PHRAN GYI PHA MES RIGS RGYUD NAS BLA DPON YAB SRAS, SKU

@567 MCHED SOGS SU 'DRA'I RIGS LA'ANG DKRUG SHING PHRA MA BCUG PA'I RGYU MTSAN CI YANG MED,

PHRAN YANG DENG SANG DRUNG 'KHOR GRAS SU RGAN 'GO, BSAM PA MI CHUNG TZAM KUN GYI TSAD MAR

MI 'DZIN PA MED, 'DI LTA BU'I DKRUG SHING GI YI GE BTANG ZER NA TSE RING NGO THOG RANG DANG,

RA SPROD CHOG PA DGOS ZHES YUD MTHAR GYIS ZHUS PAR, BKA' LAN DU, TSE RING LA GLANG CHEN

SMYON PA GLANG CHEN SMYON PA ZHES TZAN DUG LA SBYOR BA BYAS PA'I SMAN ZHIG LA ZER, SNGAR NAG CHEN KHRIMS THOG NAS GSOD PA'AM, DBANG PO GCOD BREG BYED PA'I TSE SMAN DE

SBYIN NA DE'I NUS PAS TSOR BA NYAMS TE GCOD BREG GI SDUG BSNGAL MI TSOR BA RED CES ZER BA'I SROL YOD, PA SBYIN TSAR BSAD NGO GTUG SMI YONG BA 'DUG, ,DE RIGS MA BYAS NGES CAN KHUNGS BRDOL

MED NA DE GAS 'THUS TSUL BYUNG BA, DON DU TSE RING GI LAG BRIS ZER BA BCOS MA LAS, DON

GNAS CI LA BDEN YANG, BYA BA LAM DU MI GTONG BA'I SKABS 'TSOL KHO NA NGES, GO 'DED

RJES MA 'DI'I SKABS LE THOGS CI YANG MED RUNG, RI DVAGS SRUNG MA THUB PAR SNYAD NAS WANG

GIS KHO BO LA DMIGS PHUG STE PHYAG MDA' 'PHANGS PA THOG MA DE TA'I MJING PA LA 'PHOGS NAS

KHRAG MANG DU ZAG ,DE RJES LAN CIG 'PHANGS PA GA-YOG PHUN TSOGS DON GRUB CAN NA TSOD PHRA

ZHING, TZAL LAG DANG LDAN PA ZHIG NGED KYI MDUN DU YOD PA DE'I STOD LA 'PHOGS TE DE MA KHAD RTA LAS LHUNGS TE TSE 'PHOS, DES THUGS TSIMS PA LTA BU'I RANG NYID LA NYES SKYON DU MA GYUR

TZAM BYUNG STE, DE'I NYIN MO MTSON SRUNG SOGS KYIS GA-YOL THUB PA YIN NAM SNYAM ZHING, PHYI DRO

BZHUGS SGAR DU PHEBS NAS WANG GIS, PHRAN GYI GA-YOG PHUN TSOGS DON GRUB 'DAS PA'I DGE

THEBS YIN CES DNGUL RDO TSAD GSUM BSKYEL MI GNANG BYUNG BA DGRA GNYEN BRTAG MI THUB PA'I

RNAM THAR YA MTSAN SNYAM PA SHAR, ZHES GSAL BA BCAS SA SBRUL 1749 LO MJUG RANG

LA MNGA' RIS GUNG 'GYUR MED TSE BRTAN RKYEN LAM DU BTANG TSAR YANG, DA DUNG DGA' BZHI GUNG

PAndI TA DANG, MDO MKHAR ZHABS DRUNG SOGS LA SNYAD 'TSOL BYED PA'I SKABS SHIG YIN 'DRA

@568 ZHING, LCAGS RTA 1750 SRID SKYONG GIS LHA LDAN SMON LAM CHEN MOR MNGA' RIS GUNG GI DGE RTZA

@575 BSKUL BYUS MDZAD DE BOD GZHUNG DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG PA'I CHAB SRID KYI KA BA LTA BU ZHIG BYUNG BA RED,

KHAB KHAG GI BLON CHEN LHAN TSOGS (CABINET DEPT.) NAS GAL CHE DMIGS BSAL RIGS

LHAN TSOGS GROS BSDUR GYI THAG GCOD DANG, DE MIN BLON CHEN SO SOR DMIGS BSAL GYI

DE LA RJES SU BLTA DUS PHAN GNOD GNYIS BYUNG YOD, GAL CHE DZA DRAG GI SKABS SU 'PHRAL

@576 TE KHROM GZIGS KHANG GI LHO RGYUS SU AAM BAN PHUNG CI DANG, LAB TU, LAS BYED, DMAG

'BREL ZHUR LHA SAR BSDAD DE DE BYINGS DPON DMAG RNAMS PHYIR LOG BYAS, SRID SKYONG D'A LA'I

B'A THUR NAS RGYA NAG DANG, SOG YUL NANG NANG PA'I DGON PA DANG, LHA KHANG, CHOS BCAS

LA NYAMS CHAG GYUR TSUL GLENG SLONG GNANG BA'I 'BRAS BUR ^ GONG MA CHAN LUNG NAS, T'A LA'I BLA

MA RIN PO CHER BOD GZHUNG NAS CHOS SPEL 'DZIN SKYONG THUB NGES KI BLA GRVA RGYA NAG TU GTONG GNANG

SKYABS 'JUG ZHUS DON LTAR, RGYUD STOD RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG SHES RAB DANG, SER SMAD

RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG RAB BRTAN, BYANG RTZE RAB 'BYAMS PA TSUL KHRIMS DAR RGYAS BCAS

KYIS GTZOS DGE BA SHES MKHAS DRAG BCU GCIG RGYA NAG TU CHOS SPEL DU BKA' MNGAGS DANG BCAS BRDZONG BDA' MDZAD,

DBUS GTZANG NANG BAL tAM LHAD CAN MANG PO 'GREMS GTONG BYUNG BAR

BRTEN BAL PO'I RGYAL KHAB GSUM BAR LAM BLO GZU BOR MA GNAS PA DAG GIS BAL tAM

LHAD CAN SROL GTOD BYAS PA'I RJES SU MA SONG BAR LHAD MED 'DON 'GREMS DGOS PA'I BKA'

SHOG GNANG BA DANG, LA DVAGS RGYAL PO BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL DANG, BLON PO TSUL KHRIMS KYI

BU GNYIS NANG CUNG ZAD MA GSHIN PA'I GNAS TSUL GSAN 'PHRAL, PHYOGS DE'I RGYAL BLON TSANG

MA BDE 'JAGS LUGS LEGS DGOS PA'I BKA' SHOG GNANG BAR, KHO RANG TSO NAS NANG 'GRIGS

GNANG MIR BLA MA KA: THOG PA'AM, 'BRUG PA SPRUL SKU GANG RIGS SHIG GTONG GNANG YOD PA ZHU

MOS SKYABS ZHU 'BYOR PA LTAR, KA: CHOS RJE AO RGYAN NGAG DBANG YE SHES KYI RNAM THAR DPAG BSAM LJON SHING NANG, LA DVAGS KHUL BKA' MOL GNANG BAR KA: THOG RIG 'DZIN TSE DBANG

NOR BU ZHU BA'I MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO 'DI YIN ZHES GSAL, THOG PAR BYED SGO'I LAG RTZA DANG BCAS LA DVAGS PHYOGS

@577 GTONG GNANG MDZAD, KUN GZIGS PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE'I YANG SRID NAS SNGA SOR DGE TSUL

GYI SDOM BZHES SU PHEBS SKABS BKA' CHOS ZHU RGYU RNAMS THOG TU 'KHEL BA MA BYUNG BAS DA LAM

CHOS ZHUR CIS KYANG BCAR CHOG PA'I ^ SNYAN SENG GNANG DON LTAR CHU SPRE 1752 LO DBUS SU PHEBS

TE ^ RGYAL DBANG MCHOG GI ZHAL SNGA NAS MCHOG GI SPRUL SKU RIN PO CHER CHOS BKA', DBANG LUNG

RNAMS BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL DU GNANG ZHING, BSTAN PA DANG, SEMS CAN GYI DON LA DGONGS

TE SKU GONG MA'I DUS BZHIN RIG PA'I GNAS SPYI DANG, LHAG PAR GZHUNG CHEN BKA' POD LNGA DANG,

SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG CHEN MO RNAMS LA GSAN BSAM MTHAR PHYIN PA MDZAD DGOS DANG, GZHAN YANG

CHOS DANG SRID KYI BLANGS DOR RNAMS PHA MAS BU TSAR 'DOMS PA BZHIN BKA' SLOB STZAL ZHING, ZHABS

'BRING RNAMS LA'ANG GZHUNG BLA'I DBAR 'THEN 'KHYER PHYOGS ZHEN MED PAR SPYI DON LHAG BSAM

RNAM DAG GIS 'PHYAR BA GRU 'DEGS DGOS PA'I BKA' SLOB SHIN TU ZAB PA STZAL,

LHO 'BRUG GI SDE SRID SHES RAB DBANG PHYUG ^ RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA LA GUS

SHING, KHYIM MTSES YUL LUNG PHAN TSUN BDE 'JAGS KYI LHAG BSAM CHE BAS ^ RGYAL DBANG

MCHOG LA ZHABS BRTAN 'BUL BA DANG, GOS SKU GSAR BSKRUN GYI MTHUN RKYEN BZANG GOS SOGS

ZHU BAR DRUNG YIG PADMA CAN NGO GA-YOG 'BYOR BA GOS SKU'I RGYUR BZANG GOS YUG CHEN CHES MANG BA DANG, BKA' LAN GNANG SKYES DANG BCAS STZAL ZHING, DE GA'I LO RJES MAR SPUNGS THANG GTZUG

@587 GYAR GYIS LAM THOG SA RDZONG RKED CHAD DU 'GRO NYER BRTEN ME PHAG 1767 LOR RGYAL BLON BKA'

GROS THOG NAS, CHOS SDE CHEN PO KHAG GI MCHOD GZHIS DANG, YAB GZHIS, GUNG, BKA'

THOG SA RDZONG TSANG MA RGYUGS PA LEB BSDUR RGYUGS DGOS PA'I SPYI KHYAB RTZA TSIG STZAL BA DANG,

GZHUNG DON 'CHAR 'PHAR YIN NGES DANG, PHYOGS MTHA'I MI SNA GAL CHE DMIGS BSAL

BCAS LA RTA DOS DANG 'BREL BA'I LAM YIG DMIGS BSAL GNANG DGOS BYUNG NA MA GTOGS,

GZHAN MA GZAN SHING BSKUL GTONG TZAM GYI LAM YIG TSUN LA DAM BSGRAGS CI CHE MDZAD THOG,

LAM 'KHEL RDZONG GZHIS RGAN KHAG RNAMS NAS ZLA BA GSUM RE'I MTSAMS SU RTA DOS SONG KHRA BKA'

SHAG TU 'BUL BA DANG, LAM YIG DANG, SONG KHRA GNYIS GO BSDUR THOG NAS LAM YIG

MED PAR SNGAR LAM YIN KHUL RTA DOS GZAN SHING BSKUL 'DED BYAS RIGS, LAM YIG YOD

RUNG LAM GSAL LAS BRGAL BA'I BSKUL GTONG BYAS PA, YANG LAM YIG BKA' SHOG

DANG 'BREL BZHIN DU LAm THOG JI BZHIN MA RGYUGS PA SOGS BYED PO SO SOR BTZAG BU RNAG THOG TU

'KHEL BA'I RTZA 'DZIN RJES GNON MDZAD PAS RE ZHIG LAM 'KHEL GYI GZHUNG RGYUGS NYAM THAG

RNAMS LA BDE BA'I NGAL GSO CUNG ZAD THOB, ^ GONG MA CHAN LUNG GIS ZHE HO YUL DU PO T'A LA DANG, BKRA SHIS LHUN

PO ZHES PA'I CHOS SDE GSAR RGYAG GNANG BA'I MKHAN PO DANG, DBU CHOS SOGS MKHAS BTZUN

BZANG GSUM 'DZOMS PA 'GA' SHAS GTONG GNANG THUGS RJE CHE BA ZHES SKYABS ZHU GNANG 'BYOR

LTAR, RGYA BOD MCHOD YON GYI 'BREL BA DANG, SA MTHA'I YUL DU RGYAL BSTAN SPEL BA'I DGONGS

BZHED BLA MED KYIS SGO MANG DGE BSHES SRAS RGYUD MKHAN PO SANGS RGYAS 'OD ZER, SGO MANG MDUNG

@588 NAG ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS, BLO GLING BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS, DBU MDZAD RGYUD

SMAD DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG RIN CHEN DANG, DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG SKAL LDAN BCAS LA BKA'

SLOB DANG BCAS BRDZONG BDA' MDZAD,

BAR LAM MAN JUS SOG PO AO ROD ('JUN SGAR) BA'I YUL DU BTZAN

'DZUL BYAS TE DPON RIGS 'TSO KHAG LNGA BCU SKOR DANG, SDE DUD KHRI TSO BCU SKOR BAR LAM

AU RU SU'I SA DANG NYE BAR BSDAD PA DE DAG BOD DANG, CHOS SRID GNYIS KA NAS 'BREL BA CHE

ZHING, DPON RIGS RNAMS LA BOD GZHUNG GI GO GNAS DANG, CHO LO MED PA GCIG RKYANG

MED PA MA ZAD, CHOS PHYOGS KYI 'BREL BA HA CANG CHE BAS GDAN SA KHAG LA'ANG GRVA RGYUN KHYON

CHE YONG DANG, YONG MUS SHIG YIN STABS, LCAGS YOS 1771 LOR BOD GZHUNG NAS

RGYA SOGS GNYIS KAR LEGS CHE'I BKA' MOL GNANG STE 'JUN SGAR SOG PO RNAMS ZHI MTHUN

THOG NAS RANG YUL DU 'KHOD SDOD THUB PA DANG, MAN JU'I DPON DMAG GIS BSUN GTZER NAM

YANG MI BYED PA'I GNYIS DGE'I BKA' DRIN YANG DAG PA STZAL,

LCAGS YOS 1771 LOR GZHIS RTZE KHUL 'BRUM PA'I DOGS CHAGS KYIS

PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE 'BRUM GA-YOL DU DBEN DGON LA BZHUGS SKABS, 'BRUG SDE SRID BZHI DAR

BAS GOS SKU DANG, GSER ZANGS LAS GRUB PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYI STONG SKU GSAR BZHENGS GRUB

PA'I BZO PHUD YIN CES SKU RTEN BCAS 'BUL MI CHED 'BYOR BYUNG GDONG GSAN THOS SU, 'BRUG

DANG, GHA tI GA (KU CI BI HAR) RA DZA GNYIS MCHOD YON LA BRTEN RA DZA GSHEGS RJES SKU

MCHED RNAMS RGYAL KHRIR SU BSKO MA 'CHAM PAS 'BRUG SDE SRID BZHI DAR BAS RGYAL SRAS SGRA GCAN

KHRI LAS PHAB STE 'BRUG LA SPYUGS, 'BRUG PA'I MTHUN PHYOGS RGYAL SRAS KHRIR BKOD BYAS RKYEN

SGRA GCAN GYI RGYAB TU RGYA GAR GZHUNG 'DZIN PHYI GLING PAS LANGS TE DMAG 'KHRUG BYUNG, 'BRUG DMAG

@589 KU CI BI HAR NAS MTHAR BSKROD KYIS SBAG SA GRO BAR PHYOGS SU DED PAS MA TSAD 'BRUG PA'I SA

CHA MANG PO PHYI GLING PAS BDAG BZUNGS BYAS TSUL SOGS GSAN PAR BRTEN PAn CHEN BLA MA MCHOG

NAS 'BRUG SDE SRID BZHI DAR BAR GOS SKU DANG, STONG SKU GSAR BZHENGS KYI DGE TSOGS LA

BSNGAGS BRJOD DANG, KU CI BI HAR GYI RGYAL PO BRTZON 'JUG BYAS PA SHIN TU NAS MA 'GRIGS

PAS 'PHRAL DU SLOD BKROL GYIS ZHI BA'I BKA' MOL GNANG NA LEGS TSUL SKU TSAB DRUNG 'KHOR CHED

GNYER GDONG PHYAG BRIS GNANG 'DUG KYANG, SKABS DER 'BRUG PA NANG TSAGS MA 'GRIGS PAS

SDE SRID BZHI DAR BAS LAS 'KHUR BZHAG STE 'BRUG SDE SRID GSAR PA KUN DGA' RIN CHEN NAS

BKRA SHIS LHUN POR BANG MI CHED BTANG GIS PHYI 'BRUG GNYIS DMAG 'KHRUG MA DGOS PA'I KUN

GZIGS MCHOG NAS BKA' MOL YOD PA ZHES ZHU YIG 'BUL MI CHED 'BYOR 'DUG PA LTAR, PAn

CHEN RIN PO CHE NAS, KA LA KA TAR, 'BENG 'GOL SPYI KHYAB WAR RAN HE SE KRING GOV. GENL.

W. HASTINGS LA RGYA GAR DANG, 'BRUG GNYIS MTHUN LAM GNANG DGOS DANG, GHA tI

GA (KU CI BI HAR) RGYAL PO 'BRUG PAS 'DZIN BZUNGS BYAS PA DE LAM SENG SLOD GTONG BYED ROGS

'BRUG SDE SRID LA ZHU YIG PHUL YOD PAS, PHYI GZHUNG NAS KYANG 'BRUG GI SA SDE DBANG BZUNGS

BYAS PA RNAMS PHYIR SLOG YOD PA ZHES GNYIS DGE'I PHYAG BRIS RTEN BCAS 'BUL MI SKU TSAB CHED

BRDZONG MDZAD PA LTAR, 'BRUG PAS KYANG DE DON DANG BLANGS KYIS KU CI BIR RGYAL PO SLOD BKROL

BYAS 'BREL PHYI 'BRUG GNYIS KA LA KA TAR BKA' MOL GNANG STE SHING RTA 1774 ZLA 5 TSES 25

NYIN RGYA GAR DANG, 'BRUG GNYIS PHAN TSUN DMAG 'KHRUG MED PA ZHI BDER GNAS RGYU DANG,

TSONG GI 'BREL BA BYED RGYU'I GROS CHOD CHINGS YIG KYANG BZHAG THUB PA BYUNG ZHING, WA RAN HE SE

KRING GIS RKYEN DE LA BRTEN NAS BOD DANG, 'BENG 'GOL MTHUN LAM SGO DBYE BYED RGYU'I DUS SKABS

YAG PO ZHIG YIN PA MTHONG NAS, KHONG GIS PHYI 'BRUG GNYIS 'GRIGS THABS BKA' MOL

@590 GNANG BAR THUGS RJE CHE ZHU BAR SKU TSAB 'JOR JE, BHO GHAL (GEORGE BOGLE) DANG, AEM

CHI AE LEG DZAN DRAR, HAL MAL KRAN (DOCTOR ALEXANDER HAMILTON) ZHES PA

GNYIS 'BRUG YUL BRGYUD BKRA SHIS LHUN POR BTANG RNAM THAR NYI MA'I 'OD ZER 294-NA-3 DANG 325-NA-4, BOGALE, PP.1-14, 82-89, 130-71. BA RED,

PAn CHEN RIN PO CHES KHO TSO BOD NANG YONG CHOG PA'I SKOR LA BOD GZHUNG LA ZHU

GNANG GIS BKA' LAN DANG, LAG 'KHYER MA THON PAR BHO GHAL DANG, HAL MAL KRAN GNYIS

'BRUG NANG ZLA BA GSUM BSGUGS SDOD BYED DGOS BYUNG, SHING RTA 1774 ZLA BA 10 PA'I NANG

KHO TSO GZHIS KA RTZER 'BYOR SKABS PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE DBEN DGON NAS 'BRUM GA-YOL DU SHANGS

BDE CHEN RAB RGYAS DGON BDE CHEN RAB RGYAS NI SHANGS RNAM GLING RDZONG 'OG BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I DGON LAG ZHIG RED, DE NI GZHIS KA RTZE NAS BYANG PHYOGS

HA LAM MAL LE NYI SHU RTZA LNGA TZAM GYI SAR YOD, 'JOR JE BHO GZHAL NI PHYI GLING PAS RGYA GAR GZHUNG 'DZIN SKABS GZHUNG DON SKU TSAB

BOD NANG 'BYOR PA DANG PO DE RED, LA BZHUGS YOD PA DER MJAL 'PHRAD ZHUS SHING, BHO GHAL NAS 'BENG

'GOL SPYI KHYAB KYI PHYAG BRIS DANG, PHYAG RTAGS RNAMS PHUL BA RED, KHO TSO GTZANG LA 'BYOR

NAS ZLA BA KHA SHAS RJES BOD GZHUNG NAS KHO TSO GANG MYUR RGYA GAR LA PHYIR SLOG GNANG LEGS BKA'

'BYOR PAR BRTEN PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE 'BRUM GA-YOL NAS BKRA SHIS LHUN POR CHIBS BSGYUR SKABS

KHO TSO YANG BKRA SHIS LHUN POR PHEBS STON DKAR SPRO DANG, DGYES STON SOGS LA BCAR 'DUG,

SHING LUG 1775 KHO TSO BOD NAS RGYA GAR LA PHYIR LOG SKABS, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHES 'BENG

'GOL SPYI KHYAB LA CHU BO GANGGA'I 'GRAM LA BOD PA'I GNAS SKOR BA RNAMS SDOD SA'I MGRON KHANG GI

SA YUL ZHIG GNANG ROGS RE 'DUN ZHU GNANG MDZAD PA LTAR, WA RAN HE SE KRING NAS, HOG LI'I

CHU KHAS, KA LA KA TA'I GRONG KHYER GYI KHA SPROD DER LHA KHANG DANG, MGRON KHANG BCAS

@591 GSAR RGYAB DEB RTZOM PA PO BDAG GIS SA GLANG 1949 LOR SA GNAS DER BLTA SKOR ZHIG LA PHYIN PA DER LHA KHANG DANG, MGRON KHANG

GCONG CAN ZHIG 'DUG ,LHA KHANG NANG SANGS RGYAS KYI RDO SKU ZHIG DANG, BOD LI'I BDE MCHOG DANG, DPAL LHA'I SKU BRNYAN

MDA' TSAD MA TZAM DANG, HIN 'DU'I SKU BRNYAN YANG KHA SHAS 'DUG ,SKU GNYER RGYA GANG BA RGAD PO ZHIG 'DUG PA DES

BRJOD GSAL, GNAS 'DZIN SKU GNYER RDO LAG BRGYUD KYIS DENG SKABS GNAS 'DZIN SNGA RJES GNYIS POS KHANG THOG MA MTHUN

PAS KHRIMS KHANG CHEN POR THUG STE THAG MCHOD PAR BSDAD YOD PA RED ZER 'DUG, KYIS GNANG 'DUG ,BHO GHAL GYIS BRIS PA'I DEB NANG, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE DANG, KHO

RANG RGYA GAR GYI SKAD KYI THOG NAS BKA' MOL ZHUS PA YIN ZHES GSAL BA, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE'I

RNAM THAR DU'ANG, BHO GHAL DANG NA GA RA'I SKAD THOG BKA' MOL GNANG TSUL GSAL NYI MA'I 'OD ZER 331-BA-6 NA GA NGA ZER BA NI SRONG KHYER GYI SKAD DAM YUL SKAD ZER BA RED CES RGAN BSTAN 'DZIN RGYAL MTSAN RIN PO CHES GSUNGS, BA DE YIN SRID,

GRAS SHIG YIN PAS DE LAS RGYA GAR GYI GSUNG MKHYEN YOD PA 'DRA, DE RJES CHU YOS 1783 LOR

GONG GI 'BREL BA DE'I 'PHRO SKYONG DU KEB KRAN SI MOL KRAL NAR (CAPTAIN SAMUEL TURNER)

DANG, THO MA SE, SA 'ON GRAR (THOMAS SAUNDER) GNYIS 'BENG 'GOL DANG, BOD

GNYIS MTHUN LAM ZHU CHED BKRA SHIS LHUN POR 'BYOR 'DUG,

DE DUS KUN GZIGS MCHOG NAS RGYA GAR RDO RJE GDAN GYIS DBUS GNAS CHEN

KHAG LA MCHOD SPRIN SPRO BAR 'BRONG RTZE DRUNG RAM PA CHOS MDZAD BLO BZANG TSE RING NGO GA-YOG BZHI GTONG

GNANG MDZAD PA, KHO TSO WA RA nA SIR 'BYOR TE YUL DE'I RA DZA, TZE TE SING BHA DUR GYIS SNE BSHAN

DANG, MGYOGS BYAMS SOGS KYI ROGS RAM LA BRTEN NAS GNAS CHEN KUN LA MCHOD 'BUL RGYA CHE

ZHUS TE PHYIR LOG SKABS, RA DZA, TZE TI SING BHA DUR DANG, DMAG DPON LAL LA KA SHI MI RI

MAL GNYIS NAS PAn CHEN RIN PO CHER ZHU YIG RTEN BCAS 'BUL BAR KYI SHIG PU RI DANG, SO BA

@592 RAM GNYIS 'BRONG RTZE CHOS MCHOD MDZAD MNYAM BKRA SHIS LHUN POR 'BYOR BA, BHO GHAL 'BYOR

SKABS DANG MNYAM DU 'KHEL BAS BDAG RKYEN YANG BZANG PO GNANG NYI MA'I 'OD ZER 326-NA-4, GNANG 'DUG ,YANG 'BRUG GI LO RGYUS

SKABS LAM NAS BSAD PA RED CES GSAL YANG, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE'I RNAM THAR DANG, SHING

RTA 1774 ZLA 9 NANG SDE SRID RNYING PA BZHI DAR BA BSAM YAS SU RGYAL TSAB DE MO MJAL BAR

RGYAL TSAB DE MO NO MI HAN NGAG DBANG 'JAM DPAL BDE LEGS RGYA MTSOS CHAB

SRID KYI THUGS 'GAN LO 'KHOR NYI SHU RTZA GCIG GNANG RING THUGS GSHIS 'JAM ZHING, GSER

PA BCAS ME BYA 1777 ZLA 1 TSES 23 NYIN BSTAN RGYAS GLING DU SKU GSHEGS,

DE 'PHRAL BKA' SHAG DANG, SKU BCAR KHAG, GDAN SA'I MKHAN LAS,

@593 PAS LUGS GNYIS KYI THUGS 'GAN BSKYED BZHES YOD PA GSOL YANG, GSAN BSAM 'PHRO

SKYONG GNANG RGYUR BSDAD PAR BRTEN RE ZHIG THUGS 'GAN BSKYED BZHES THUB MIN ZHES BKA' BZHES

MA THOB PAS TSANG MA MOL BSDUR GYIS RGYUD STOD MKHAN ZUR TSA RDOR NGAG DBANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA NAG

CHOS SPEL LA BZHUGS YOD PAR GDAN ZHU DANG 'BREL BAS NO MI HAN GYI MTSAN GNAS BCAS SRID

SKYONG DU BSKO GZHAG 'DZAM GLING MTHA' GRU YANGS PA'I RGYAN 80-NA-3, GIS BZHUGS YUL DMIGS BSAL MED GSHIS SRID SKYONG D'A LA'I B'A THUR GYI

BZHUGS YUL DGA' LDAN KHANG GSAR 'BUL GNANG MDZAD, DE NAS RJES SU TSE SMON GLING DU

BZHUGS PAS TSE GLING RGYAL THOG DANG PO DE YIN,

SRID SKYONG 'DI NI, 'KHRUNGS YUL MDO SMAD (AA MDO) CO NE KHUL NAS

YIN CING, DBUS SU GRVA RGYUN LA PHEBS NAS SER SMAD TSA RDOR KHANG TSAN LA BZHUGS TE GDAN SA'I

SLOB GNYER MTHAR SON GYIS RGYUD STOD DU PHEBS, RIM BZHIN BLA MA DBU MDZAD DANG, MKHAN PO

GNANG BA TSA RDOR MKHAN PO ZHES ZHU, RJES SU GZHUNG GNAS NAS PI CING CHOS SLOB TU GTONG GNANG

MDZAD DE PI CING DU BZHUGS RING LCANG SKYA HO THOG THU YE SHES BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME DANG THUGS SNANG

DGE BAS DE'I MTHU LA BRTEN NAS MAN JU ^ GONG MA CHAN LUNG GIS KYANG GZIGS PA CHE BA YOD TSOD 'DUG,

KHONG SRID SKYONG GNANG BAR LHA SAR SPYI LO 1777 ME BYA ZLA 7 TSES 5 NYIN PHEBS 'BYOR GNANG

SKABS, SNGAR RGYUN DANG MI 'DRA BA'I LHA SA'I MI DMANGS KHRI PHRAG MANG PO MJAL KHA DANG, BLTA

MIR 'DUS PA DE SNGON RGYUD PA'I DGE BSHES GRVA RKYANG ZHIG NAS GLO BUR BOD KYI SRID SKYONG DU PHEBS

PAS MI DMANGS HA LAS PA LTA BU BYAS NAS BLTA BAR YONG PA RED CES KHO RANG GI RNAM THAR SER SMAD BLA ZUR DAD PA MKHAN PO BLO BZANG THUGS RJES PHYOGS SDEB MDZAD PA TSE GLING RGYAL TSAB NO MI HAN NGAG DBANG TSUL KHRIMS

GYI RNAM THAR DAD PA'I SGO 'BYED SMAD CHA 90-NA, THAR NANG

@594 GSUNGS YOD CING, RJES SU KHONG GIS SRID SKYONG SKABS DGA' LDAN KHRI PA YANG GNANG STE RGYAL

MAN JU ^ GONG MA, KA'O TZUNG CHAN LUNG (KAO-TSUNG SHIH-LU) NAS ZHE HO ZHES PAR ^ GONG MA DBYAR DUS TSA GA-YOL DU PHEBS PA'I YUL DER PO T'A LA DANG, BKRA SHIS

LHUN PO ZHES PA'I LHA KHANG GSAR RGYAG GNANG YOD PA DER RAB GNAS GNANG BA DANG, ^ GONG MA RANG

NYID DGUNG LO BDUN CU THAM PAR PHEBS RGYU'I 'KHRUNGS SKAR DGA' STON SKABS BKRA SHIS BDE

LEGS KYI THUGS SMON SHIS BRJOD MDZAD PA DANG, GZHAN YANG CHOS 'BREL RGYA CHE ZHU DGOS YOD

PAS, KUN GZIGS PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES RGYA NAG TU GDAN ZHU ZHU

RGYU'I SKOR BOD GZHUNG BRGYUD ZHU YIG SNGA RJES 'BYOR PA, KUN GZIGS MCHOG NAS ^ SKYABS

MGON RGYAL BA'I DBANG PO DANG, SRID SKYONG NO MI HAN, BKA' SHAG BCAS PAR DE'I SKOR

PHEBS BZHUGS JI LEGS DGONGS SKOR MDZAD PAR, GCIG TU RGYA PHYOGS TSA BA DANG, 'BRUM

NAD SOGS KYIS SKU PHYAR 'GAL RKYEN CHE YANG, RGYA YUL DU GNAS RTEN KHAG LA GNAS GZIGS

GNANG BA DANG, SA MTHA'I YUL DU CHOS SPEL DANG, LHAG PAR ^ GONG MAR CHOS 'BREL

GNANG RGYU SANGS RGYAS BSTAN PA'I MDZES RGYAN LA BRTEN DA LAM PHEBS NA LEGS TSUL DGONGS

MTHUN BYUNG BAR BRTEN, SA PHAG 1779 LO NANG BKRA SHIS LHUN PO NAS PHEBS THON GYIS

DGUN THOG RING SKU 'BUM DU SKU BZHUGS DANG, LCAGS BYI 1780 DBYAR THOG ZHE HOR 'BYOR

PA PHEBS RGYU'I BKA' BZHES BKA' LAN GNANG BA LTAR, SA PHAG ZLA 6 TSES 17 NYIN RGYA

CHE'I CHIBS RAGS DANG BCAS BKRA SHIS LHUN PO NAS CHIBS ZHAL BSGYUR TE, YANGS PA CAN NAS,

@595 'DAM STOD BKRA SHIS DBU MA THANG BAR ^ SKYABS MGON ^ RGYAL DBANG MCHOG DANG, RGYAL TSAB

SRID SKYONG NO MI HAN BCAS LHAN PHEBS MDZAD, YANGS PA CAN BZHUGS SGAR NAS, SNYE THANG

DU GRUB DBANG KLONG RDOL BLA MA RIN PO CHER PHYAG BSTAR MA'I PHYAG BRIS SHIG GNANG 'DUG PA

GSHAM GSAL,

MTSUNGS PA MED PA'I SLOB DPON CHOS KYI RJE NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RIN PO

CHER, DGE SLONG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS NANG SBYAR LAG BRIS 'BUL SNYING, NYID SKU KHAMS

BZANG BAR BZHUGS LAGS SAM, NGOS KYANG BDE ZHING, SHAR PHYOGS RGYA MTSO CHEN PO'I NGOS

SU RJE BTZUN 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS DANG, 'PHAGS PA SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI ZHING KHAMS BLTA BA

DANG, GRUB PA'I SLOB DPON CHEN PO LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO RJE DANG MJAL ZHING, CHOS KYI DGA'

STON 'GYED PA, RGYAL PO DPUNG DANG, GRONG KHYER DANG BCAS PA'I GNAS LUGS LA BLTA BA'I

DGA' STON NYAMS SU MYONG BA'I PHYIR 'GRO BA'I SKABS SU YOD LAGS, GSOL DPON 'DI PA NGED

KYI NYE GNAS KYI MCHOG YIN PAS TSE BSOD RING DU 'PHEL BA ZHIG NYID NAS NGES PAR MDZAD DGOS

PA LAGS, RTEN PAR MDZOD 'DOM GSUM YOD, BAL tAM BRGYA THAM PA, SHA KHA RA BCAS

PHUL KLONG RDOL RNAM THAR RGYAL SRAS SPYOD RGYAN 54-NA-2 PA DANG KLONG RDOL GSUNG 'BUM AA PA'I 15-BA-2 PA BCAS LA

GSAL ZHING, SHA KHA RA ZHES PA NI SHEL KA RA YIN ZHES ^ SKYABS RJE YONGS 'DZIN RDO RJE 'CHANG NAS GSUNGS,

ZHES PA'I PHYAG BRIS NANG RJE BTZUN 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS KYI ZHING KHAMS RI BO RTZE LNGA DANG,

'PHAGS PA SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI ZHING KHAMS ZHES NAN HAS PO T'A LA MJAL BA DANG, LCANG SKYA

ROL PA'I RDO RJE DANG CHOS KYI DGA' STON 'GYED PA BCAS MDZAD SGO'I GTZO BOR BSTAN PA DANG, RGYAL

PO ZHES MAN JU ^ GONG MA CHAN LUNG DPUNG DANG, GRONG KHYER BCAS KYI GNAS LUGS LA BLTA BA

ZHES ZHOR DU GZIGS MOR PHEBS PA LTA BU GSAL PO GSUNGS 'DUG PA NAS, SKABS DE'I DUS

@596 RGYA NAG MAN JU'I RGYAL KHAB KYI STOBS SHUGS MTHO TSAD YIN YANG, RGYA BOD MCHOD YON GYI 'BREL

BA DANG, BOD RANG GI GNAS STANGS NI PHYAG BRIS 'DI RANG NAS HA CANG GSAL PO HA GO THUB PA MA

ZAD, RJES SU ^ GONG MA'I ZHU YIG DANG, CHE BSTOD ZHU STANGS SO SO'I SKABS SU ZUR DU GSAL

BSHAD BYAS MED KYANG, ZHIB 'JUG YAG PO BYAS TE KLOG PA YIN NA MCHOD YON GYI GNAS STANGS

GSAL PO SHES THUB PA YOD DO,,

DE NAS RIM GYIS GDAN SA SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING DU PHEBS PA DER DGUN

THOG RING BZHUGS, DE SKABS ^ GONG MAS PHEBS BSUR MNGAGS PA AAM BAN WAN PHU DANG,

SOG PO'I KHRIMS RVA'I AA SA HAN AAM BAN, BU'U THE SOGS GDONG ^ GONG MAS PHYAG BRIS GNANG

BA; TSE RING GNAM GYI SHE MONG BTZAN PO'I LUNG GIS 'DZAM GLING YANGS PA'I SA CHEN PO LA

STOBS KYI 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR PA HVANG DI'I BKA', PAn CHEN AER TI NI LA PHAB PA, NGED SA STENG GI

SKYE 'GRO MA LUS PA LA KHRIMS KYIS KHA LO BSGYUR BA'I TSE, PHYOGS MTHAR GNAS PA'I SEMS CAN

RNAMS BDE SKYID KYIS 'TSO BA DANG, RGYAL PHRAN CHAB SRID MA LUS DAR ZHING RGYAS PA 'GYUR NA SNYAM

PAS, BLA MA KHYED BDAG GIS SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA DANG, SEMS CAN GYI BDE SKYID LA

LEGS PAR GZHOL PA'I DGONGS PA MTHAR THUG PA DANG MTHUN PAR ZHVA SER GYI BSTAN PA SPEL ZHING,

BSHAD SGRUB LA BRTZON PAR MDZAD PA NI SHIN TU LEGS, DA LAM AER TI NI NYID NAS, SANG PHOD

BDAG GI DGUNG LO KHRI PHRAG GI 'KHRUNGS SKAR NYIN PAR SKU RIM LA PHEBS PA 'DI BDAG GI DGONGS

PAR SHIN TU 'PHROD, NYID MYUR DU YONG 'GRO SNYAM DU YID SMON BYED BZHIN PAR YOD, PAn CHEN

AER TI NI NYID NAS SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA DAR BA DANG, BOD SOG GI SKYE BO RNAMS KYI DON

MDZAD KYIN LAM BAR BDE BAR BYON YOD LAS CHE, NGED NAS DA LTA BOD SKAD SLOB KYIN YOD, NGOS

MJAL DUS SPRO DGA' CHEN POS GSUNG GLENG BYED, NYID SKU 'BUM DGON PAR SLEBS PA THOS NAS

@597 PHEBS BSU LA AAM BAN WAM PHU DANG, SOG PO'I KHRIMS RA'I AA SA HAN AAM BAN, BU'U THI,

KHY'A YU, AAN ZHE THANG AA, SOG PO'I KHRIMS RA'I THU SA PAG CHI BLON PO SHU LAN TE, THIM TIG

LOG CHE BLON PO AANG LEN RNAMS CHED DU MNGAGS NAS BSU BA BYAS, BKA'I GSER YIG SPRINGS

PA'I RTEN MU TIG GI PHRENG BA GCIG ,SKU LA BSTEN PA'I CHIBS SGA BZO KHYAD LEGS PA CHA TSANG,

CHIBS CHEN RTZE GRA 'GROS BZANG BA GCIG ,DNGUL SRANG SUM CU'I MDONG MO GCIG ,BYA MA BUM

GCIG ,KAR TSUG GCIG ,GOS SNA TSOGS YUG NYI SHU, MDZOD BTAGS CHE CHUNG BCU RE

BCAS SPRAD NAS BSRINGS YOD, CHED DU PHAB PA YIN, GNAM SKYONG KHRI LO ZHE BZHI PA'I DBYAR

ZLA DANG PO'I TSES NYER BRGYAD LA, NYI MA'I 'OD ZER SMAD CHA 85-BA-5,

ZHES PA'I PHYAG BRIS 'BYOR BA DANG, DE RJES KYANG PHEBS GSOS DANG, NA

BZA' SOGS 'BUL MI'I MI SNA'I GDONG ZHU YIG KHAG KHA SHAS RIM BZHIN 'BYOR, SKU 'BUM DU ZLA BA

BZHI DANG, ZHAG NYI SHU THAM PA BZHUGS TE LCAGS BYI 1780 ZLA 3 TSES 10 NYIN SKU 'BUM

NAS PI CING PHYOGS CHIBS ZHAL BSGYUR, DE SKABS 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I SPRUL SKU DKON

MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS ROGS RAM ZHU GNANG GIS KHU BO PHYAG MDZOD CHEN MO DRUNG PA HO THOG

THU BLO BZANG SBYIN PA DANG, GSOL DPON, GZIM DPON SOGS 'BRUM PA MA THAR BA ZHABS

GRAS SUM BRGYA SKOR AA LA SHA DGON BSTAN RGYAS GLING DU 'BRUM SMAN 'DEBS PA'I ROGS RAM

ZHU GNANG GIS TSANG MA LAM LHONGS BYUNG YANG, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE RANG LA 'BRUM PA'I 'DEBS

SMAN 'BUL RGYU SUS KYANG 'GAN BLOS MA BZOD PA LTA BU BYAS TE LHOD YANGS SU SONG 'DUG PA 'DI NI

RMONGS RTAGS RGYU MTSAN CAN ZHIG YIN PAR MNGON, LAM 'KHEL TSANG MAR RGYA SOG DPON KHAG

DANG, SER SKYA MI DMANGS BCAS NAS PHEBS BSU SKYEL RGYA CHE ZHU BZHIN DANG, ^ GONG MA RANG

@598 NAS ZHU YIG DANG, PHEBS GSOS THENGS MA KHA SHAS RIM 'BYOR THOG ,TA'I KA ZHES PA'I SA

GNAS SU ^ GONG MA'I SRAS DRUG PA DANG, LCANG SKYA HO THOG THU RNAM GNYIS GDONG ^ GONG MA'I

@606 THUGS 'GAN BZHES GNANG MDZAD RUNG, RGYUN DU CHOS PHYOGS KHO NAR NYAMS BZHES THUGS GZHOL

CHE BAS SRID SKYONG KHRI CHEN NO MI HAN PHYAG ROGS ZHABS ZHUR SNGAR RGYUN LTAR BZHUGS DGOS BKA'

PHEBS PA MA ZAD, DE KHA'I LO RJES MAR SKYID GRONG BSAM GTAN GLING NAS MKHAS SHING GRUB PA'I

DBANG PHYUG DKA' CHEN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GDAN ZHUS KYIS SKU'I YONGS 'DZIN DU BSKO GZHAG GIS

RGYUN DU RTZE PHO BRANG RANG LA RTAG BZHUGS MDZAD CING, PI CING NAS MAN JU GONG MAS LUNG GNYIS

THUGS 'KHUR BZHES PA'I LEGS 'BUL ZHU MI'I SKU TSAB AAM BAN GDONG, GSER SRANG BDUN CU

LAS GRUB PA'I PANG LEB BCU BDUN LA 'JA' SA'I YI GE ZONG BRKOS KYIS MAN JU, RGYA YIG ,SOG

YIG ,BOD YIG BZHI SBYAR DU, NUB PHYOGS MCHOG TU DGE BA'I ZHING GI ^ RGYAL DBANG SA STENG ^ RGYAL

BSTAN YONGS RDZOGS KYI BDAG PO THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA RDO RJE 'CHANG T'A LA'I BLA MA, ZHES 'JA' SA

'BUL MI 'BYOR BA MA ZAD, RGYA KHYAB YONGS NAS LEGS 'BUL ZHU MI'I MI SNA DAG KYANG 'BYOR,

CHU YOS 1783 LOR MDO STOD (KHAMS) RMI LI DE BZHIN RGYA BOD SA MTSAMS

KYI DGON SDE GAL GNAD CHE BAS GZHUNG GNAS NAS SNGA PHYIR MCHOD GZHIS DANG, KHRAL CHAG SOGS

KYI BDAG RKYEN RGYA CHE GNANG BA DE LTAR YANG, DA LAM SPRUL SKU 'DI PA SLOB GNYER ZIN TE SA GNAS SU

'GRO RGYU'I THON PHYAG SKABS PAn ZHVA SNA RING GIS MTSON BLA CHAS DANG, RTA SGA SGA 'KHOR, RTA DAR,

SBOB BCAG SOGS CHO LOS GZENGS BSTOD DANG, RANG KHONGS SDE DGON TSANG MAR BYAMS SKYONG 'TSO

'TSIS GANG CI'I THOG ,RGYAL BSTAN MTSAN LA DGUNG 'DEGS DGOS PA'I BKA' SLOB STZAL,

^ RGYAL DBANG SKU 'PHRENG GONG MA RNAMS NAS STON MTSAMS BDUD RTZI SMAN CHU'I

CHAB BZHES SU CHIBS BSGYUR GNANG YUL RTZE PHO BRANG CHEN PO NAS MAL LE GNYIS TZAM GYI NUB PHYOGS

SU NOR BU GLING KHA ZHES PAR CHAB BZHES SKABS DBU GUR SGRON YUL DANG, CHAB RDZING TZAM LAS

SPROS RGYAS GANG YANG MED RUNG, SHING 'BRUG 1784 LOR SKAL BZANG PHO BRANG GSAR BZHENGS

@607 KYIS CHAB BZHUGS MDZAD SGO RGYA CHE GNANG BA DE NAS BZUNGS, SKU 'PHRENG RJES MA RIM BYON NAS

DBYAR THOG PHAL CHE RGYUN BZHUGS MDZAD DE, RIM PAS RIM PAS RGYA BSKYED GNANG STE SHIN TU RGYA

CHE BA'I LCAGS RI PHYI NANG GNYIS YOD PA'I NANG MAR, YAS MAS SU MDZES SHING SPRO BAG RNAM PAR

PHEBS PA'I T'A LA'I BLA MA RIN PO CHE'I GZIM CHUNG KHAG ,PHUN TSOGS SDE BZHI'I DPAL YON GCIG

TU SPUNGS 'DRA'I GZI BRJID MNGON PAR 'PHAGS PA'I MDZAD SGO GNANG YUL GZIM CHUNG NYI 'OD

DGA' LDAN 'DOD RGU 'KHYIL GZIM 'GAG DANG BCAS PA, MJAL BA TZAM GYIS SGRIB GNYIS

CIG CAR DU BCIL ZHING, MCHOG DANG THUN MONG GI BYIN RLABS 'BAD MED DU STZOL BA'I RTEN MCHOG

KHYAD PAR CAN BZHUGS PA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG, SKU BCAD RGYA GNANG YUL GYI GZIM CHUNG

KHAG ,^ RGYAL BA'I BKA' DANG, 'PHAGS BOD PAn GRUB RNAMS KYI BSTAN BCOS MA LUS PAS

YONGS SU PHYUR BUR BLTAMS PA'I PHYAG DPE KHANG, ZHING BCU'I DGRA BGEGS THAL BAR RLOG

PA'I MAH'A KA LA DNGOS BZHUGS KYI MGON KHANG, ZAB RGYAS CHOS KYI GRU CHAR 'BEBS SHING, BRGAL

BRTAG GI RTZOD PA'I SGRAS ZHI BSIL YID LA BDUD RTZI STER BA'I CHOS RVA, NGAL GSOS BU'I DPAL

'BYOR MOG POR BYED PA'I MDZOD CHUNG, NGANG PA DANG, NGUR PA, CHU SKYAR SOGS CI BDER GNAS

PA'I CHAB KYI RDZING BU, DUS BZHI'I 'PHEL SGRIB DANG BSTUN KHA DOG DANG, DBYIBS SNA TSOGS

PA SHAR BA'I DRI MCHOG LDAN PA'I ME TOG GI SKYED MOS TSAL LA GSER DANG, GA-YU'I SBRANG MA DANG,

PHYE MA LEB KYI 'PHUR LDING BRTZEN PA, RO MCHOG PHUN SUM TSOGS PA'I BZA' SHING GI RVA BAR RMA BYA

RNAMS ZLOS PA'I GAR BSGYUR ZHING, BYA DANG, BYI'U RNAMS SKAD SNYAN PAR SGROGS, SPRA DANG SPRE'U,

RI DVAGS KYI TSOGS DOGS PA MED PAR BAG PHEBS SHING RGYU BA'I PHO BRANG GI LCAGS RI PHYI NANG

GNYIS KYI BAR NA, ZHI RGYAS DBANG DRAG SOGS PHYOGS LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I CHAB SRID KYI 'KHUR

'DZIN SRID BLON KHANG, BKA' SHAG ,YIG TSANG, 'PHRAL BDES GTZOS LAS KHUNGS KHAG

@608 DANG, LAS BYA RNAMS KYI BZHUGS YUL, PHO BRANG CHEN PO 'DI'I NANG GNAS SHING RGYU BA'I SKAL

BA MCHOG DANG LDAN PA'I ZHABS 'BRING RNAMS KYANG, RANG RANG GI GO BABS DANG MTHUN PA'I CHAS

KYIS MDZES SHING, SGRIGS KYIS SPA BA DAG YANG DAG PA'I SPYOD LAM GYI SGO NAS BGO SKAL SRI

ZHUR RAB TU BRTZON PA KHO NA LAS, CHAS GOS YA MA ZUNG GYON ZHIN ZHING, RTZED 'JO DANG 'KHRUG RTZOD

BYED PA, THA MI KHA DANG, MYOS BYED 'THEN 'THUNG SOGS RTZA BA NAS MTHONG THOS MED, DE DAG

GI PHYI ROL DU BSRA BRTAN MTHO BTZAN LDAN PA'I LCAGS RI CHEN POS 'KHOR RA KHOR YUG TU BSKOR

BA'I SHAR, LHO, BYANG BCAS PAR RGYAL SGO CHEN PO GNYIS RE DANG, NUB TU GCIG STE BDUN GYIS

RNAM PAR MDZES PA LA MTSON CHA LDAN PA'I SKU SRUNG DAG GIS DUS DRUG TU SRUNG BZHIN GNAS PA,

LCAGS RI PHYI MA'I LHO NUB NGOS SU DENG DUS KYI DRAG PO'I LUGS SROL SBYONG BDAR CAN GYI SKU SRUNG

DMAG SGAR BCAS NOR GLING SKAL BZANG PHO BRANG ZHES 'DZAM GLING YUL PHYOGS KUN TU GRAGS SNYAN GYIS

YONGS SU KHYAB PA DE'I DGE MTSAN SNYING POR BSDUS NAS BSHAD NA, BLTAS NA PHO BRANG DANG, SKYED

MOS TSAL RNAMS MIG SNGAR MDZES PA, BSDAD NA ZHI ZHING BAG PHEBS PA, NYAN NA CHOS KYI

SGRA LHANG LHANG RGYUN CHAD MED PAR THOS PA, SNOM NA RANG BZHIN GYI ME TOG DANG, SBYAR SPOS KYI DRI BSUNG

KUN TU KHYAB PA, BSAM NA BDE BA CAN GYI ZHING KHAMS DE KHO NA'O SNYAM PA'I DAD PA LHAG PAR DU

SKYES PA STE KHYAD CHOS CHEN PO LNGA DANG LDAN PA'I GNAS MCHOG KHYAD PAR CAN DE'I RNAM PA YID LA LHANG

DGE MTSAN YONGS SU RDZOGS PA NI CHU LHA LCE BRGYA LDAN PAS BRJOD KYANG SMRA BSAM BRJOD PA'I YUL

LAS 'DAS PA ZHIG GO,

@617 KHAL, MI HRENG BCAS BTANG CHOG AANG GSAR YOD KYANG, ZA 'TSOL BRDAB GSIGS BYAS TE

NYI MA LNGA BCA' ZHAG BYAS PAS MA TSAD, DE'I RING KHRIN THA'I THU DANG, KRANG RDA' LO YE, RGYAL RONG

MU THAR, THA'I THU'I GROS 'DON SI YI SOGS MNGON CHUNG GROS TSOGS KYIS ZER RIGS SU, RGYA

DMAG RJES MA RNAMS MA BSGUG PAR THON RKYANG BYAS NA MANG SNE NYUNG GIS MA BSTEN PAR CHAG GRUM

'DRA BYUNG NA ^ GONG MA'I MTSAN SHAS DANG, RJES MA BSGUGS TE MNYAM BSKYOD BYAS NA DMAG TSAN

CHE BAS LAM 'KHEL RTA KHAL SOGS GRA SGRIGS DKA' BAS, DPUNG 'JUG YO LANGS SOGS

DPA' THAL MA DGOS PAR LE 'GRIGS SHIG BYAS NA BKA' BLON RANG LA 'CHAR STON BYED RGYU AE YOD,

CES DON LA DMAG RGYAG NUS MED PA'I BZO CHO GSAL PO ZHABS PAD RDO RING LA BRJOD PA'I LAN DU,

NGA RANG GI BSAM 'CHAR BYAS NA, GOR DMAG RNAMS BOD KYIS KHONGS NAS PHYIR BSKRAD THOG, DMAG

RGYAB RNAMS 'BYOR MTSAMS CHINGS MOL GLENG NA GANG BRJOD NYAN SHAG DANG, DE MIN BAL YUL

RANG DU DPUNG 'JUG GIS RTZA MED BZOS NA BSAM PA, DA LTA RDZONG 'GO RNAMS PHA ROL PA'I LAG

TU YOD BZHIN DU ZHI 'PHROS BYAS NA DON PHAN YONG BZO MED SNYAM YANG, BOD MI DGRA 'THAB LA SBYANG

PA MED GSHIS PHUGS MTHA' MTHONG DKA' BAS ZHI DRAG JI MDZAD LHUS THING MDZAD DGOS ZHES

GSUNGS 'DUG KYANG, DON LA ZHI 'PHROS SHIG BYED DGOS LAB SNE THON THABS KHO NA BYED PA MA ZAD,

CIS KYANG BKA' BLON RANG NAS BLOS MA 'KHYUD NA, T'A LA'I BLA MA RIN PO CHER BKA' SLOB DGONGS

BSKOR ZHU DGOS NAN CHE ZER YANG, KHA 'PHANGS LAG PHYID BZO 'DOD LAS, DON CHER MED

GSHIS ^ SNYAN ZHU 'BUL BLOS BZOD MIN BRJOD THOG ,'PHRAL DU DMAG SAR THON DGOS NYAG RKYANG

BYAS PA YIN ZHES GSAL,

DER BRTEN KHRIN THA'I THU NGO LAS NAS ZHABS PAD RDO RING NGO MAR MTHO 'TSAMS

MA BYAS KYANG, DON LA TSIG ZA KO LONG GIS ZLA BO DANG, RDZONG GZHIS KYIS MTSON LAS BYED TSANG

@618 MAR RTA KHAL DANG, SDOD SGRIGS 'GRIGS MIN PHRAN BUR YANG SKER LCAGS THAG GA-YOGS PA DANG,

SPEN TZE (SHING LEB) BTANG BA SOGS BRJOD KYIS MI LANGS, RIM BZHIN SHEL DKAR DU 'BYOR TE,

RGYA DMAG RNAMS DING RIR SA SRUNG BOD DMAG YOD MUS THOG PHAN TSUN BYAS BSDAD, BOD PHYOGS NAS

CHINGS SGRIG BYED RGYU'I LAB GLENG SPU TZAM MED KYANG, RGYA PHYOGS KYI LAS BYED PA PHAN TSUN YIG

'GRUL GYI THABS SHES LA BRTEN NAS KUN GZIGS PAn CHEN MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE'I YAB DPAL

LDAN DON GRUB DANG, SA SKYA'I MGRON GNYER BCAS CHINGS 'GRIGS ZHABS ZHUR 'BOD 'BYOR BZHIN,

GNYA' NANG MTHONG LA KHA BAS 'GAG PA BAL YUL DU LAB SNE MA 'PHROD CING, DGRA KHOG DGRAS MA

LON PAR ZLA BA BRGYAD TZAM BSDAD,

SA BYA 1789 LO RGYA DMAG RJES MA RNAMS KYANG RIM PAS SHEL DKAR KHUL DU

'BYOR, ZLA BA BZHI PA'I NANG MTHONG LA PHYE MTSAMS SA BKRAS CHINGS PA RNAMS NAS BANG MI BTANG

STE GOR RGYAL DANG, BLA MA ZHVA DMAR BAR LAB SNE 'PHROD PAR, ZHVA DMAR BA'I BTANG YIG CIG LA,

RANG NGOS NAS DA BAR SKYABS MGON MCHOD YON GYI BKA' DRIN SNYING LA BCANGS TE BOD SPYI DON DANG,

GZHUNG BSAM MA BYAS PA'I GNONG 'GYOD MED RUNG, RTEN BZHENGS SBREL POS CHU THON GYI ZAM PA BYAS

TE GZHUNG BLA DPON RNAMS NAS BDEN RDZUN ZHIB GZIGS MA MDZAD PAR PHYOGS GCIG ZHU DBANG LA TSAD

'DZIN MDZAD DE KHO BO BAL YUL DU BYIS PHRUG THANG BSKYUR BZHAG PAR BRTEN, DA CHA KHO BO'I LUS SROG,

LONGS SPYOD LA LEGS NYES JI BYUNG GOR RGYAL RANG DBANG BAS HA CANG ZHU NAN CHE BA BYED MI NUS, GAL TE

DE RIGS BYAS TE 'GRIGS TZAM ZHIG BYUNG RUNG BLA DPON JI GSUNG DANG, DGONGS GZHIR JI YOD MA

SHES TSUL ZHIG BTANG 'BYOR 'DUG PA, DE 'PHRAL DMAG SAR YOD PA'I RGYA BOD BKA' MOL THOG

@619 GZUGS GCONG GIS BAL YUL DU BGROD DKA' STABS, BLA MA RNAM RGYAL GYIS NANG TSAGS YIN KHUL

ZHVA DMAR BAR YI GE ZHIG BTANG 'DUG PA, DENG DUS RGYA DMAG DANG, BOD DMAG GRANGS MED BYA

SPU BSNON DU 'BYOR DANG, 'BYOR BZHIN PA BCAS DA MUS 'GYANGS NA RGYA BAL BOD GSUM TSANG MAR

BKRAS GNYIS NAS CHINGS SGRIGS MDZAD RTZIS LA DAN 'KHYOL YONG BA MDZAD DGOS DANG, DE SNGON

PA ZHIG 'BYOR 'DUG,

@620 PA'I ZHABS PAD DANG, MDA' DPON, RDZONG GZHIS NGO MA NGO TSAB RNAMS NAS RGYA DPON RNAMS LA

LAN 'PHROD NGES BYED PAR DPUNG DMAG DE TZAM GTONG GNANG THOG ,BOD SAR RTA KHAL MI GSUM

DE KHAR 'PHRAL BRDZONG BYED DGOS BKA' SHAG SOGS 'BREL YOD LAS KHUNGS KHAG LA BKOD PA BYAS YOD,

'DREN ZHUS PA LTAR PHEBS KHAR ^ RGYAL DBANG MCHOG DANG BKA' SHAG LA NGAS LO BCU'I RING SRID SKYONG SKABS GZHUNG LA GZHIS KHAG BCU DRUG GSAR SBYOR

DANG, PHYI NANG PHYAG MDZOD KUN LA DO DAM BYAS PA RTZE RNAM SRAS GAN MDZOD DU BKAR RGYA BSGRIL BAS GSER SRANG BRGYAD BRGYA BZHI BCU ZHE BDUN, DNGUL RTA RMIG MA DANG,

HROG 'DRES MA RDO TSAD NYIS STONG SUM BRGYA GSUM, RGYA tAM DANG, 'JA'U 'DRES MA RDO TSAD SUM CU SO BRGYAD, BAL tAM RDO TSAD NYI SHU RTZA GCIG, RTZAm LEN BYINGS PA DANG, RI ZUR

PA GNYIS NAS GTONG LHAG PHUL BA RDO TSAD NYIS BRGYA THAM PA, GZHAN YANG GOS DAR, SMAN RTZE, KHA BTAGS SOGS BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA YOD TSUL GSUNGS 'DUG, NAG CHOS SLOB DBU 'DZIN DU PHEBS KHAR ^ RGYAL DBANG MCHOG

@626 DANG, BKA' SHAG BCAS PAR KHO RANG CHAB SRID KYI PHYAG LAS LO BCU GNANG RIN RNAM GAN LA BKAR 'JUG

MANG PO GNANG YOD TSUL GSAL 'DUG PA, GCIG BYAS NA RGYA DMAG GI GRO CHAS, RTA DOS SOGS LA

BKAR 'JUG RNAMS BTON DAG SONG BA MIN NAM SNYAM,

RDZONG 'GO'I BLU RIN CHAG ZHU'I SKOR LA NYIN NAS NYIN BTUD 'PHROS PA BYAS MTHAR

CHINGS KHRA NGO MA BCOS BSGYUR MA BYAS KYANG, ZUR CHINGS SU 'DI LO'I RDZONG 'GO BZHI'I BLU RIN DU RGYA

DNGUL MA RTZA LONGS PA'I RDO TSAD SUM BRGYA THAM PA DA LAM 'PHRAL SPROD BYUNG RJES RDZONG GZHIS RNAMS MKHREd

BZUNGS MED PAR BOD LA RTZIS SPROD BYED RGYU DANG, CHINGS KHRA NGO MAR RDZONG GZHIS KHAG BZHI'I BLU RIN

GONG 'BOR LTAR GSAL RUNG, PHYI LO BAL YUL DU SKU TSAB SER SKYA DO CHOD ZUNG SBREL YAM BU RGYAL SAR

CHAG ZHUR 'BYOR TSE GOR BOD DKAR TSO LEGS LAM LA BSAMS, DNGUL 'BOR GONG GSAL RTZA CHAG

YONG BA'I 'GAN LEN BLA MA ZHVA DMAR BAS BYED RGYU YIN ZHES ZUR CHINGS 'JOG RGYU BCAS LA GTAN

'KHEL TE CHINGS KHRA NGO MA DANG, ZUR CHINGS BCAS LA PHAN TSUN SKU TSAB SO SOS RTAGS 'DZUGS BYAS,

SLAD MI 'GYUR BA'I KHYAD PHAN TSUN GNYIS KA'I BAR DPANG LTA BUR RGYA NAG GZHUNG GI SKU TSAB NAS BAR BZHUd

KYI THE'U BYUNG NA ZHES GNYIS MOS BYUNG RKYEN SHEL DKAR NAS RGYA DPON 'BOD MI CHED GTONG BYAS DON, MU

AAM BAN DANG, KRANG AAM BAN GNYIS, LAS BYA NYAN TZONG YE BCAS 'BYOR, CHINGS KHRA'I GSHAM

DU; GONG DU YOD PA'I CHINGS DON LA BOD GOR PHAN TSUN GNYIS KAS SOR GNAS RGYUN 'KHYONGS DGOS

PA DANG, SU THAD NAS SNGA 'GAL BYAS NA RGYA NAG GZHUNG NAS SNGA 'GAL BYED MI MTHAR SKROD GTONG RGYU

ZHES BKOD DE DAM PHRUG BRGYAB YOD PA CHINGS DON SKOR TSANG MA ZOL MED GTAM GYI ROL MO'I 361-BA-3 NAS 365-BAR- GSAL RED,

MU AAM BAN NAS, DA LAM BOD GOR CHINGS DON LUGS LEGS BYUNG BAS RGYA NAG

GZHUNG NAS GNYIS DGE'I BAR DPANG GNANG BAR BRTEN GOR RGYAL NAS MAN JU ^ GONG MAR THUGS RJE CHE ZHU MI'I

@627 SKU TSAB RTEN CHAS MI SNA BTANG NA DGE MTSAN CHE TSUL BSHAD PAR, BHAM SA HEB NAS NYIN SHAS NAS

LAN PHUL 'THUS BRJOD DE GSANG THABS GOR RGYAL LA NANG SLOB ZHUS PA'AM, GANG LTAR NYIN SHAS

RJES SU RTEN 'BUL MI SNA GTONG RGYU GANG LEGS 'DUG PAS GOR MI RGYA NAG TU 'GRO MYONG MED PAS

LUGS SROL SLOB MI DANG, 'BUL RTEN JI DGE SLONG PAR MU AAM BAN SU RUNG ZHIG 'PHRAL DU BAL

YUL LA PHEBS ROGS BRJOD PA, RGYA DPON NYAN TZONG YE NGO GA-YOG KHA SHAS BTANG BA LAM RGYUS SU

ZHVA MGRON YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN YANG BTANG, RDZONG 'GO'I BLU RIN RGYA DNGUL RTA RMIG MA DANG, HROG

BSDOMS RDO TSAD SUM BRGYA THAM PA 'BYOR NYID GOR shA'I SKU TSAB LA RTZIS SPROD GNANG ZHING, GNYA' NANG,

RONG SHAR, RDZONG DGA', SKYID GRONG SOGS LA YOD PA'I GOR DMAG TSANG MA PHYIR 'THEN BYAS TE RTZIS

LEN BYED MI'I RDZONG 'GO'I GZHUNG ZHABS RNAMS KYANG 'BYOR,

NANG BLON CHIN KHRA P'A RDA RIN RGYA DMAG GANG 'TSAMS BCAS LHA SAR ^ GONG SA

LA B'A THUR CAN NGO GA-YOG BCU SKOR DANG, NYAN TZONG YE MNYAM YONG SKABS RGYA MIS 'AR 'DED BYAS

PAS GOR shA RNAMS MA 'DOD RNAM 'GYUR GYIS SHEL DKAR GLING NUB ZHAG SA NAS PHYIR LOG BYAS PA,

GOR shA RGYAL KHANG NAS, ^ GONG SA SKYABS MGON MCHOD YON LA RTEN CHAS

'BUL BAR KEB KRAN BAM SA HI'I HA SA DHARMA SA HEB DANG, SHRI KA SHA AU PA RDHYA SOGS NGO GA-YOG

BZHI BCU THAM PA 'BYOR BA SNE LEN GZAB RGYAS GNANG ZHING, PHAR YANG GOR RGYAL LA MTHUN LAM

RTEN CHAS 'BUL BA DANG, CHINGS DON LTAR, RDZONG 'GO'I BLU RIN CHAG ZHU BYED PAR RTZE MGRON

@634 NO MI HAN BSTAN PA'I MGON PO PI CING CHOS SLOB KYI DBU 'DZIN DU PHEBS PA'I LAM DU YOD GSHIS GDAN

@635 GNYA' SHO'I NGO TSAB DANG, GNAS PO KO THANG PAS YI GE PHUL 'BYOR DU, BLA MA ZHVA DMAR BA, BHAM SA

HEB, KA JI RDAM RDAR P'A dAS BCAS LI KHRI SPA SGOR 'BYOR 'DUG PA MA ZAD, DMAG MI KHYON CHE DANG, 'BRAS

DOS KYANG PHON CHE 'BYOR MUS THOS PA, DE NA BKA' MOL GNANG YUL GNYA' NANG TSONG 'DUS SA YUL GU

DOG CING, 'GRO SDOD BDE MIN LA 'PHEL RGYAS GLING TZAM LA LHAN RGYAS GNANG NA JI 'GAB DANG, RANG

PHYOGS LA'ANG CHINGS RGYAB DMAG MI PHON 'BOR CHE TZAM MED NA BLOS 'KHEL MED TSUL NANG MA'I YI GE

'BYOR PA LTAR RGYAL KHAB TU DE DON SNYAN ZHU PHUL, DE'I BKA' LAN BSGUGS TE NYIN SHAS SHEL DKAR DU

BZHUGS PA RGYAL KHAB KYI BKA' LAN DU, CHINGS RGYAB DMAG MI KHYON CHE LAM SENG GTONG GRA 'GRIGS

MIN YANG, GANG THON RIM BRDZONG BYAS YOD PA, DMAG MI RNAMS GNYA' NANG DU 'KHRID NA, PHA ROL PO DOd

'DROGS KYIS BKA' MOL MI 'GRIGS PA'I RGYU BCAS DE PHYOGS NAM DGOS THON CHOG AANG SAR SBE LEN

BYAS TE DING RI TZAM DU 'JOG PA LAS, MTHONG LA BRGAL NA 'GRIGS MIN DANG, GNYA' NANG TSONG

'DUS RANG LA PHA ROL PO'I 'DOD MOS LTAR BKA' MOL 'PHRAL 'DZUGS DGOS RGYU'I GNAS TSUL 'BYOR

'DUG ,CHINGS RGYAB DMAG MI 'BYOR NA, GANG CI'I 'GO TSOR SHOD DRUNG RNAM SRAS GLING PA BZHAG NAS

ZHABS PAD GNYIS LAS BYA BCAS GNYA' NANG TSONG 'DUS SU 'BYOR TE SHO KHANG DU BZHUGS, GOR shA'I

DZA MI RDAR GCIG DANG, DMAG MI KHA SHAS 'BYOR TE ZHU GSAL, BOD GOR BKA' MOL GNANG RGYU'I SNGON

'GRO'I GROS GZHI BZO DGOS LA SKU TSAB KHA SHAS GNYA' KHONGS 'GRAM LA GTONG GNANG DGOS TSUL

GSAL BA LTAR, BSTAN GLING DZA BLA DANG, BKA' MDA'I NGO TSAB, GNYA' SHO SNE SDOD PA BCAS GOR shA'I

DZA MI RDAR CHABS CIG 'GRAM LA THON,

LCAGS PHAG 1791 ZLA 6 TSES 27 DGONG DRO NAS GNYA' NANG DU GOR shA'I

MI SNA KHAG GI GRA SGRIG BYED MI YIN TSUL DZA MI RDAR DANG, DMAG MI MANG PO RIM 'BYOR DANG, TSA

'BRAS DO LEN RONG PA RNAMS NAS DO NUB LHA CHEN DBANG PHYUG CHEN PO'I DUS CHEN YIN GSHIS SHO KHANG

@636 GI RDO GCAL NANG LHA GSOL KHRAB STON DANG, SHING RTZED SOGS PHUL CHOG PA ZHUS SMIN LTAR RONG PA

MANG POS MTSAN SGANG RNGA BRDUNGS, 'BUD BKROL SOGS RTZED SNA MANG PO BYAS, BKA' MDA' RNAMS

KYANG GZIM CHUNG RAB GSAL NAS GZIGS MOR GA-YENG STE BZHUGS SKABS, TSES 22 NAM LANGS SNGA

CHAR DZA MI RDAR NAS GOR PHYOGS KYI BKA' BLON RNAMS LA ZHAL TOG 'BUL BAR BTANG TSUL DMAG MI MANG

PO SHO KHANG NANG YONG STE GZIM CHUNG SO SOR 'TSANG 'DZUL DANG, KHRAB STON BYED MI'I RONG PA RNAMS KYANG

LAM SENG DMAG MIR GYUR TE SHO KHANG NANG KHENGS SHING, PHYIR PHYOGS BZHI MTSAMS BRGYAD NAS GOR DMAG

GIS BSKOR TE BKA' BLON DGA' GA-YU GNYIS DANG, MDA' DPON LCANG CAN BCAS GSON BZUNGS BYAS,

LAS BYA DANG, ZHABS GRAS RNAMS NAS SHO KHANG NANG LAG 'DZINGS BYAS PA SHOD DRUNG SGOG MKHAR BA DANG,

SBAN RTZA LHO PA, SHEL DKAR KHUL LCANG SBUG PAS GTZOS BKA' MDA'I ZHABS GRAS SUM CU SO LNGA BSAD,

BCU SKOR RMAS, GOR DMAG BRGYA LHAG BSAD RMAS BYAS PAS SHO KHANG KHRAG DANG, BSAD RMAS KYI ROS

KHENGS, BKA' MDA' GSUM GYI PHYAG PHYIR BSNOL ZHAGS THAG GIS BSDAMS TE GOR DMAG GIS

BSKOR NAS BAL YUL DU 'KHRID 'GRO DUS, ZHABS GRAS KHONGS SU GA-YU THOG MDZOD PA RGAD PO DANG,

DGA' BZHI'I MDZOD PA DGA' SHAG PA, 'DUS BYUNG SMON SKYID PA'I BSOD NAMS TSE DBANG SOGS MGO

LUS RMAS TSABS CAN GYI ZHABS GRAS TSO BKA' MDA' 'KHRID 'GRO BA'I SGO 'GRAM DU YONG STE, RANG GZHAN

TSANG MAS SDAR MA'I SPYOD TSUL BZUNGS TE BROS PA DANG, DGRA LA MGO BSGUR BA SOGS KYI GNONGS 'GYOD

MED, MGO BSKOR THOG ,MANG SNE NYUNG GIS MA BRTAN PAS BYA BA THABS RDUG 'DI 'DRA BYUNG, STABS

@637 GOR DMAG GIS DE LTA BU'I NGAN GA-YO BYED RGYU'I 'CHAR GZHI SNGON NAS YOD 'DRA

DU BTANG, GOR DMAG KHAG GCIG GNYA' NANG NAS DING RI BRGYUD SHEL DKAR PHYOGS DANG, KHAG GCIG

Bogle, p. lxxvi. NANG DE DUS GOR DMAG STONG PHRAG BCO BRGYAD BTANG YOD TSUL BRIS SHAG, ,ZLA BA BDUN PA'I ZLA

DKYIL TZAM LA LHA SAR GOR shAS NGAN GA-YO BYAS TE ZHABS PAD GNYIS 'JUS TE BAL YUL DU 'KHRID TSUL DANG,

DA CHA GOR DMAG KHYON CHE SHEL DKAR DANG, GTING SKYES KHUL BTZAN 'DZUL BYAS LUGS KYI SNYAN ZHU KHAG

RIM 'BYOR DANG, DE 'PHRAL BKA' SHAG NAS, RGYA KHYAB RDZONG GZHIS KHAG LA DMAG GI BSKUL BRDA DANG,

GDAN SA GSUM, RGYUD GRA RNAM GNYIS, SA NGOR, RDOR SMIN SOGS RIS SU MA MCHIS PA'I 'DUS SDE

ZHU SOGS DMAG DON DZA DRAG CHEN PO GNANG DGOS BYUNG, LHA SDOD MAN JU'I AAM BAN PO THAS Pao-tai

GZHUNG ZHABS KLAD MED 'GA' SHAS NAS GZIM CHUNG GI SKU RTEN RTZA 'GANG CHE RIGS DANG, GSER DNGUL

@644 BOD DKAR TSO GCIG GYUR GYI BSAM SHES MA BYAS PA MED KYANG, ZHVA DMAR PA PAn CHEN GONG MA'I SKU

TSAR BRTEN SKU CHAS BDAG SPROD BYED RGYU MA BYUNG BA'I KO LONG LTA BUS BKRA SHIS LHUN POR DMAG GTONG

DGOS AU TSUGS BYAS PAR BRTEN, ZHVA DMAR BA 'DI PA SNGA PHYIR GOR RGYAL BSAM PA'I LAS KA YAG

PO BYAS GSHIS NGO MA LCOGS PAS LAS KA 'DI 'DRA BYED DGOS BYUNG ZHING, DA CHA KHO RANG YANG DUG

'GAMS TE SHI DGOS PA DANG, RGYA BAL BOD GSUM TSANG MAR DMAG GI BRDAB GSIGS CHEN PO 'DI

'DRA BYUNG BAS, DA CHA KHYED RANG BOD PA RNAMS BKRA SHIS LHUN PO NAS BYUNG BA'I DNGOS PO RNAMS 'KHYER

TE RGYA BOD DMAG SGAR GAR 'PHRAD SAR PHYIN NAS BAL PO'I SA MTSAMS NANG MI YONG BA'I THABS SHES ZHU

BSKUL BYED DGOS ZHES WA SKAD SHOR BA'I GNAS TSUL MANG PO BSHAD 'DUG PA, BKA' BLON DGA'

BZHI BAS, NGA TSOS NGES PAR PHYIN CHOG KYANG, LHA RAB NGA TSO DANG MNYAM DU GOR RGYAL NGO MA RANG DANG,

DE MIN AA KHU B'A THUR SH'A KHYED RANG NGO MA RGYA BOD DMAG SPYI LHAN RGYAS SAR BCAR TE GNAS TSUL DRANG ZHU BYAS NA

LAS, NGA TSO GCIG PUR PHYIN PAS RGYA BOD KYI DMAG 'GOG THUB DKA' MO YIN TSUL GSUNGS PAR,

GOR shA'I NANG BLON DRAG GRAS KA JI RATNA JI P'A dAS DANG, STAG GSAR LAS THOG NAR SING MI SAR, SHRI

KI SI nA GSUM GTONG RGYU BYAS PA LTAR, MDA' DPON LCANG LO CAN PA BKRA SHIS PHUN TSOGS TSA BAS SNGON

'DAS ZIN ZHING, ZHABS PAD DGA' GA-YU GNYIS KYI THOG ,GNYA' NANG DANG, SKYID GRONG NAS BZUNGS

PA'I RGYA DPON BZHI BCAS SKYID GRONG PHYOGS DANG, GNYA' SHO SNE SDOD PA DANG, SNGON BTANG 'GRAM

NAS 'DZIN BZUNG BYAS PA'I BKA' MDA'I NGO TSAB BCAS GNYA' NANG PHYOGS NAS YONG MI'I RGYA BOD DMAG

DPUNG 'GOG THABS SU THON, ZOL MED GTAM GYI ROL MO 486-NA-1 NAS 493-BA-5 ZHABS PAD DGA' GA-YU SOGS RGYA BOD DMAG SAR MA THON GONG B'A MA ZHVA DMAR BA DNGOS GNAS

GRONGS MIN BRTAG ZHIB TU GOR shA'I SKU TSAB BCAS PHEBS PA MCHOD RTEN RIN PO CHE'I NYE 'GRAM KHANG PA ZHIG NANG ZHVA DMAR BA'I SKU GDUNG LA GRVA PA 'GA' SHAS KYIS GDUNG MCHOD BYED 'DUG PAR

ZHIB 'JUG SKABS NYIN SHAS SONG BAS MDOGS BSGYUR RUL DRI CHE YANG PHYAG GA-YAS KYI 'DZER PA DANG, ZHAL RAS KYI RMEB BCAS NAS NGO 'PHROS BYUNG TSUL GSAL,

@645 LAM DU GOR shA'I DMAG MI RMAS MA MANG PO 'KHUR YONG MI DANG, DMAG SNON

GSAR PA PHAR 'GRO BA SOGS ZING LONG GIS KHENGS PA'I GZHUNG BRGYUD, YAM BU RGYAL SA NAS HA LAM LE

DBAR BZHI BCU (MAL LE SUM CU) TZAM GYIS BAL PO RDZONG ZER BAR RGYA DMAG DANG, BOD DMAG DANG

PO KI SVA'I SGRA DANG, RNGA BRDUNGS, DUNG 'BUD KYI SGRAS KHENGS BZHIN DU YONG 'DUG PA KHO TSOS ZHI BA'I

BRDA SBYAR BA, RU SNE 'KHRID MI DBUS MDA' DPON PHA JO LHA KHANG PA BSTAN 'DZIN RNAM RGYAL DANG, SO LONG

B'A THUR GYI 'GO PA HAD GUNG GNYIS DANG 'PHRAD, SA GNAS DE MAN GNAS SKABS DMAG MI 'GRO BA'I

'PHROS GTAM BYAS, RGYA BOD KYI SPYI KHYAB GAR MJAL SAR 'GRO DGOS YOD TSUL BRJOD PAR, DE GA'I

CHU PHA RI'I RI LDEB SDE SPUNGS ZOL MED GTAM GYI ROL MO 497-NA-3 DANG, Richerdson,p. 69; Rockhill,p.52. ZER BA'I SA DER MAN JU'I DMAG DON SPYI KHYAB PHU ZI GUNG RD'A KRUNG THANG (PHU'U

KANG RNGAN) YOD PA DANG, BOD PHYOGS KYI DMAG DON SPYI KHYAB BKA' BLON DZA SAG (HOR KHANG GSAR BA)

BSOD NAMS BKRA SHIS RONG TSAD KYIS GSHEGS TSAB BKA' BLON BSHAD HOR (BSHAD SGRA) KUN DGA'

DPAL 'BYOR PHEBS NYER YOD TSUL BRJOD 'DUG,

DE NUB BAL PO RDZONG DU ZHAG BSDAD KYIS SANG NYIN SNGA THON NYIN TSUGS RING TSAD

TZAM NA PHU ZI KRUNG THANG GI SGAR SAR CHU BYI 1792 ZLA 6 TSES 27 GYI DGONG DRO 'BYOR, SNGON LA

BKA' BLON DGA' GA-YU GNYIS SOGS BOD PA RNAMS MJAL 'PHRAD THOG SNGA PHYI'I GNAS LUGS DANG,

DA LAM AA KHU B'A THUR SH'A NAS JI BRJOD RNAMS ZHIB BRJOD BYAS, DE RJES GOR shA'I SKU TSAB RNAMS SGAR

GYI PHYIR DMIGS BSAL GYI MJAL 'PHRAD GUR ZHIG TU MJAL 'PHRAD BYED SKABS ZHABS PAD GNYIS

KYANG PHYOGS GCIG TU 'KHOD NAS, KRUNG THANG NAS MAN JU'I THUNG SI BRGYUD BRJOD GSAL, GOR shA

RGYAL BLON RNAMS NAS RANG GNONG NGOS BLANGS KYIS TSUL MTHUN GUS 'DUD ZHUS PA DNGOS 'BREL YIN

TSE LHA RAB GOR RGYAL NGO MA'AM, DE MIN DPON RIGS LAS 'GAN YOD NGES YOD DGOS THOG ,BLA MA

@646 ZHVA DMAR 'DAS PO'I RUS PA DANG, BZA' ZLA BU MO LAGS ZER BAS GTZOS GA-YOG RIGS BYED

GTE RNAMS DANG, BKRA SHIS LHUN PO, GZHIS RTZE GRONG NAS BCOM 'KHYER BYAS PA'I DNGOS PO

RNAMS RTZIS 'BUL BYUNG NA DPUNG 'JUG NGANG 'THEN BYED RGYU, DE MIN BAL YUL RTZA GTOR GTONG

RGYU YIN PAS KA JI RATNA P'A dAS DANG, STAG GSAR NAR SING MI GSAR GNYIS 'DIR MI GTER NYAR

RGYU YIN GSHIS GZHAN DE BAL YUL DU PHYIN NAS BDUN PHRAG GNYIS TSUN BYED BDE'I LAN GSAL DGOS

RGYU BRJOD SONG BA DANG, DE MTSUNGS GNYA' NANG PHYOGS NAS YONG MI'I RGYA BOD DMAG MI RNAMS

YAM BU RGYAL SA NAS MAL LE NYI SHU'I SA NA WA KOR ZHES PAR THUG PAS DER BKAG BSKYIL BYAS 'DUG,

DE 'PHRAL GOR shA'I SKU TSAB SHRI KI SI nA LAM SENG BAL YUL DU BSHAD RTZOL

GYIS BSKYOD DE RGYAL BLON GROS BSDUR GYIS GOR RGYAL CHAB SRID KYI 'GAN 'DZIN CHE SHOS GRAS BHAM SA

HEB DANG, KU LA B'A THUR, 'JU TA B'A THUR SOGS GTZO GNAD MI GSUM GDONG GOR RGYAL NGO MA DANG,

AA KHU B'A THUR SH'A SO SO'I YI GE RTEN SBRAGS DANG, BLA MA ZHVA DMAR BA'I GDUNG MER BSREGS PA'I RUS

'THUM, 'GAG PA DGE LEGS BOD DU BTANG ZIN PA DANG, GSOL DPON RJE DRUNG LAM KHAR DUG

BZAS TE SHI BA'I PHUNG PO, ZHVA MGRON YE SHES DANG, BZA' ZLA BU OMO LAGS KYIS GTZOS GRVA RIGS

LAS BYED NYI SHU SKOR, BKRAS LHUN DANG, GZHIS RTZE NAS BCOM 'KHYER BYAS PA'I SKU GSUNG THUGS

RTEN LA SOGS PA RONG PA DO 'KHUR SUM BRGYA SKOR BCAS 'BYOR,

BOD GZHUNG DMAG DON SPYI KHYAB GSAR PA ZHABS PAD (BSHAD SGRA HOR) KUN

DGA' DPAL 'BYOR YANG PHEBS ZIN TE BAL PO'I DPON RIGS DANG, ZHVA DMAR BA'I GA-YOG RIGS

RNAMS RGYA BOD LHAN RGYAS SAR BCAR TE BKA' MOL GNANG BA'I SNYING POR, BAL YUL GZHUNG NAS,

RGYA BOD KYI DMAG RGYAL CHINGS DNGUL SLOG CHA MA DGOS PA CHAG YANGS GNANG ZHING, BOD GZHUNG

NAS BAL YUL GZHUNG LA SNGA LO'I CHINGS DON LTAR RDZONG 'GO'I BLU RIN YANG SPROD MA DGOS PA BYAS,

@647 BAL tAM RNYING PA DANG, GOR tAM GSAR PA, BOD tAM GSAR PA BCAS BOD BAL GA PAR BTANG

YANG 'DZA' GCIG GYUR DU 'GRO RGYUGS BYAS CHOG PA, BAL tAM RNYING PA ZANGS DANG, TI TSA'I

LHAD CAN RNAMS 'GRO RGYUGS MI CHOG PA BYAS, BAL BOD KYI SA MTSAMS SNGON GNAS RNAMS LA

YIG RIGS DANG, SA GNAS YUL MI RGAN GRAS RGYUS CAN THUN MONG THOG NAS SA RTAGS RDO YIG

GSAR DU RGYAG RGYU, SA RTAGS BRGAL TE PHAN TSUN SU THAD NAS DMAG MI GTONG, DE BZHIN GOR

PHYOGS NAS 'BRAS LJONGS DANG, GLO BO, 'DZUM LI SOGS SU'ANG BTZAN 'DZUL MI BYED, GNYA'

SKYID RONG GSUM SOGS TSONG RVA SO SOR BAL YUL NAS THON PA'I 'BRAS DANG, BOD NAS THON PA'I

TSAR BSRES LHAD MED PAR SKABS MTSAMS SO SO'I YUL GYI THON BSKYED LA GZHIGS PA'I TSONG GI

THANG GZHI GOR BOD GZHUNG GNYIS KA'I SKU TSAB NAS LAS 'BRAS DPANG 'PHER GYI THANG GZHI GCOD RGYU,

BOD KYI RTEN BZHENGS PA DANG, SMAN SGRUB, GNAS BSKOR BA SOGS BAL YUL NANG YONG BAR BKAG

'GOG DANG, KHRAL 'GAL MI BYED, DE BZHIN BAL PO'I LAG SHES PA DANG, TSONG PA BOD NANG

YONG BAR BKAG 'GOG DANG, KHRAL 'GAL MI BYED, GOR shA'I GZHUNG NAS LO LNGA RE'I MTSAMS

RGYA NAG GZHUNG LA RTEN CHAS 'BUL MI'I MI SNA GTONG RGYU SOGS GNYIS MOS THAG GCOD BYAS ZHES

BKA' BTANG BA LTA BU LAS, GROS CHOD DANG, CHINGS YIG 'DRA GNYIS BZHAG TSOD MI 'DUG

PA; CHINGS YIG GI NGO BSHUS SOGS KYANG LAG SON MA BYUNG ZHING, PHRAN NAS BRIS PA'I DBYIN

YIG GI DEB NANG RDZONG 'GO'I BLU RIN CHAG CHA'I SKOR, GOR BOD TSONG DANG BAL tAM 'DZA' THANG

SKOR GSAL KHA MI 'DUG CES BRIS YOD KYANG, GONG DU GSAL BA'I DON TSAN DE DAG RDO RING GI RANG RNAM

ZUR 'PHROS LAS GANG THON BKOD PA LAGS, DA DUNG YIG CHA KHUNGS LDAN BYUNG TSE KHUNGS 'DIR 'JUG PAR 'TSAL LO, ,

SKABS DE'I DUS SU BKA' BLON RDO RING BSTAN 'DZIN DPAL 'BYOR GYIS BAL

YUL DU BZHUGS RING BOD NANG YAB MES GNYIS RIM GSHEGS SOGS KYI GNAS TSUL GSAN PA

@648 DANG, RGYA BOD KYI DMAG BAL YUL DU 'BYOR SKOR TSIG RTZOM ZHIG GNANG 'DUG PA 'DI LTAR,

KA SHI'I RAS GOS GYON PA'I GOR DPUNG GIS, ,KHA LJONGS GTZANG STOD PHYOGS

SU GA-YUL BSHAMS TE, ,GA RU'ANG 'GRAN MED BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I NOR, ,NGA RGYAL DREGS PAS

SKAD CIG BTZAN 'PHROGS BYAS, ,CA CO'I GA-YUL NGOR RMAS PA'I ZLA GRAS RNAMS, ,CHA MED YUL DU

RGYUS MED DGRA SDEBS NAS, ,JA CHANG BZA' BTUNG YO BYAD KUN MDZAD DE, ,NYA MO BYE THANG 'KHYAMS LTAR

PHYIR LDOG DUS, ,TA THA GA TA'I BSTAN SRUNG PHYAG DRUG MGON, ,THA MAL BYA ROGS KHYO SHUGS LA SPRUL

NAS, ,DA LAM GSANG BA'I MGYOGS LAM 'DIR SHOG CES, ,NA 'CHI MED PAR DE DAG BDE BAR 'KHRID,

PA tA'I RIS LTAR LU GU BRGYUD DU NI, ,PHA ROL RGOL NGAN GTZANG NAS DBUS LJONGS SU, ,BA DAN RLUNG BSKYOD

JI BZHIN CHAS DOGS NAS, ,MA LUS PHYOGS BZHI MTSAMS BRGYAD DU BROS SKABS, ,TZA RI'I GNAS

KYI 'DAB 'BREL BYA YUL DU, ,TSA DRAG BYAS NAS GZHIS BZHUGS NGO MA RNAMS, ,DZA HU'I BU MO'I

'GROS LTAR BSKYOD DUS SU, ,WA LE MDZA' MO'I LUS RGYA MNGAL 'KHUR GROL, ,ZHVA SER BSTAN 'DZIN

BYAMS PA SMON LAM GYI, ,ZA 'OG RIS 'DRA'I SGYU 'PHRUL YANG SRID MCHOG ,'A CAG DGA' BZHI'I

RIGS SU BLTAMS PA 'DIR, ,YA MTSAN NGES 'DRONGS MTSAN LTAS GSAL BA BYUNG, ,RA BA GANGS

RIS BSKOR BA'I SRID SKYONG MGON, ,LA 'UR SKYABS MGON RTA TSAG BYON MTSUNGS PAR, ,SHA ZA KHRAG

'THUNG RGYA SOG RGYAL RONG DPUNG, ,SA SKYONG GONG MA'I LUNG GIS BOD 'DIR MNGAGS, ,HA CANG 'JIG

RTEN MKHYEN YON MA CHE YANG, ,AA DON CHOS LA MOS SHING SKU BSOD LA, ,HA LAS THA'I JI PA SANGS

TSE RING ZHES, ,AA BO'I YAB RJE TSUR LAM ZHING GZHAN GSHEGS, ,KA BA'I 'KHUR 'DZIN NANG BLON

KRUNG THANG MDUN, ,KHA LJONGS GTZUG RGYAN BDAG GI MES PO LA, ,GA RU'ANG 'GRAN MED GNAM BSKOS

^ GONG MA YIS, ,NGA NYID DGRA LAG 'TSUD LA SEMS GSO MDZAD, ,CA GA BYAS PA'I BKAR 'JUG

'BRU STENG NAS, ,CHA SHAS GONG MA'I BKA' DRIN GSAB PHYIR DU, ,JA YUL RGYA DMAG RTZAM RGYUR NAD GAD

@649 GTZANG, ,NYA GAR MA SGYER 'BO KHAL BZHI KHRI PHUL, ,T'A LA'I BLA MA'I BKA' YIS GUNG BLON 'KHUR,,

THA SNYAD RIG LAM SMRA BA'I PAndI TAS, ,DA DUNG MU 'THUD BGYIS ZHES BKA' PHAB TSE, ,NA RGAD DUS KYANG

DKA' BA DANG BLANGS MDZAD, ,PA PHA'I BU CHUNG MI 'GYUR BSOD NAMS LA, ,PHA LAS LHAG PA'I KRUNG

THANG GZIGS BSKYANGS NI, ,BA GAM LTA BUR 'GYUR MED MDZAD PA'I MTHUS, ,MA RUNG SKYE BO'I BSAM

NGAN SBYOR RTZUB ZHI, ,TZA KO RA LTAR RI RTZER GNAS NA YANG, ,TSA DMYAL GDUNG BA MYONG MI BSTAN GLING GI,

DZA BLA BKA' GA-YU MDA' LCANG KHO BO BCAS, ,WA MO GAL LA THEBS DANG MTSUNG PAR GYUR, ,ZHVA DMAR

BLA MAS NGAN BSLABS PHUNG GA-YOS PAS, ,ZA BTUNG DKON ZHING NYAM THAG MTHAR LHUNGS KYANG, ,'A

CAG RKYEN NGAN GROGS SU SHAR BA'I MTHUS, ,YA MED MA BYAS BLO SBYONG ZAB GNAD SBYANGS, ,RA DANG MA HE

BA MEN RI PHAG GLANG, ,LA SOGS SROG CHAGS MANG PO BSAD BYAS NAS, ,SHA KHRAG PHUD KYIS MCHOD PA

PHYI ROL LHA, ,SA GSUM GOM GCIG GIS BSGROD KHYAB 'JUG GNAS, ,HA CANG RGYA CHE TZANG KUN nA RAn

NAS, ,HA RI TZAN DAN DRI LTAR CHES BZANG BA, ,AA MA BYA RDZIS BZHENGS PA'I MCHOD RTEN CHE, ,AA HO

BYA RUNG KHA SHOR GNAS DER SLEBS, ,KI SVA'I SGRA SGROG GOR DPUNG BOD YUL NAS ,KHU BYUG MON LA

JI BZHIN TSUR 'KHOR DUS, ,GE SAR LTA BU'I DPA' NYAMS STON BZHIN DU, ,NGO MTSAR NOR SKAL ZHVA DMAR

BLA MAR SBYIN, ,CI BYAS SRID NA RNYED DKA' GSER DNGUL SKU, ,CHU LTAR THUR 'GRO'I BSAM SBYOR NGAN PA

YIS, ,JE SDUG RNAM SMIN NAG PO MYONG SLAD DU, ,NYO TSONG RDZAS BZHIN BSHIG NAS RGYAN CHA BZOS, ,TI SI

DANG MTSUNGS LHAG BSAM RAB DKAR ZHING, ,THU MI SAM BHO dA 'DRA'I RIG PA CAN, ,DE NYID DON MKHYEN

KHO BO'I MES CHEN PO, ,NO YON GZUGS SKU CHOS DBYINGS THIM PA NA, ,PI CING RGYAL POS DUR MCHOD

DGOS CHA STZAL, ,PHU MDA' MED PAR DGONGS RDZOGS RGYA CHE SGRUBS, ,BE RE'I GDUNG SHUGS DRAG

PO'I MYA NGAN NI, ,MO PHOR MA NGES RANG LTOS KUN GYIS BYAS, ,TZI NA'I DPUNG DANG GANGS CAN BOD DMAG

RNAMS, ,TSU ROL NEE P'A LA YUL LHAGS DOGS NAS, ,DZE RA'I GA-YENG BAS ZHVA DMAR 'GAG PA NYID, ,

@650 WO RGYAL BSTAN GLING DZA BLA'I PHYI BZHIN BRDZANGS, ,ZHI BAR GSHEGS PA MDA' LCANG BKRAS PHUN LA, ,

ZU BOR MI GNAS SO SKYE BDAG LTA BUS, ,'E ME'I DBYANGS KYI NGO SPROD GSAL 'DEBS DANG, ,YO MED SKYE

GNAS SPAR BA'I 'PHO DMIGS BYAS, ,RI DVAGS LTA BUR RTZA CHU LA BSTEN NAS, ,LU GU BRGYUD DU DGE LA

BRTZON BYAS TSE, ,SHE 'U'I MDOG MTSUNGS RING BSREL MCHOD RTEN NAS, ,SO SKYE BDAG CAG BSOD

NAMS SKAL BAR THOB, ,HI HI BGOD SHOR 'KHRUL RMI MA YIN PAR, ,AO LO SDIG SGRIB DAG PA'I RMI LTAS

KYANG, ,HE RU KA DPAL BLA MA'I THUGS RJE LAS, ,AO RGYAN BYIN RLABS MCHOD RTEN DRUNG DU BYUNG, ,KI SVA

GA-YUL LAS RGYAL BA'I RGYA BOD DMAG ,KHU MTSUR MTSON CHA SNA TSOGS BRDEGS BZHIN DU, ,GE SAR

BDUD 'DUL LTA BUR CHAS PA'I TSE, ,NGO TSA KHA SKYENGS GOR shA RGYAL BLON RNAMS, ,CI DRAG THABS KYIS

GROS BSDUR MANG BYAS KYANG, ,CHU SHOR RAGS MTSUNGS GYUR TSE 'GRAN 'DOD BLO, ,JE MTHOR BSKYED KYANG

RANG SDUG RANG NYID KYIS, ,NYO BAR BSAM NAS KHO BO TSUR SHOG CES, ,TI PI LCAGS DANG GLANG CHEN BSU

BAR BCAS, ,THU LUD 'DEBS 'DEBS 'OS GOR RGYAL DRUNG BOS TE, ,DE RING SANG LAS MA 'GYANGS SONG ZHIG

CES, ,NO 'KHOL 'DRA BA'I RGYAL NGAN WA SKAD SHOR, ,PI CING GNAM BSKOS RGYAL PO'I DPUNG DMAG GIS,,

PHU MDA' PHYOGS MTSAMS MDA' DBUS KUN BSKOR TSE, ,BE DO'I SHING LTAR RGYUD RTZUB MGO MKHREGS

SHING, ,MO STON PHAG MGO'I TSUL 'DZIN ZHVA DMAR BA, ,TZI KHUNG CHUS KHENGS BYI BA DBANG MED DU, ,TSU

ROL ZHING STENG DON NAS SHI BA LTAR, ,DZE RE'I 'O DOD 'BOD CING SKAD CIG LA, ,WO RGYAL 'JIG RTEN

PHYI MA'I GZIGS MOR GSHEGS, ,ZHI DRAG JI BYAS LAM DU MA SONG TSE, ,ZU LUM DGRA GNYEN GO

LDOG BDAG SOGS LA, ,'E YA'I DBYANGS KYI BSTOD CING RDZONG BA BCAS, ,YO LANGS KRUNG THANG DMAG

SAR RTZIS 'BUL ZHUS, ,RI BONG STENG DU BYA GLAGS LDING BA'AM, ,LU GUR SPYANG KYIS JI BZHIN GOR DMAG

RNAMS, ,SHE MONG BTZAN POS PHA MTHAR BSKROD PA LA, ,SO LONG SBA THUR RGYAL RONG DPUNG TSOGS DPA',,

HI HI'I SGRA SKAD DRAG POS PHAS RGOL DPUNG, ,HU LUS 'KHYUR MID ROL BA'I BRTUL SHUGS CAN, ,

@651 AE MA ^ GONG MA'I DPUNG GI SGYU RTZAL LA, ,AO LO MI PHYED DANG BAS GUS PAR GYUR,,

ZHES PA ZHIG RTZOM GNANG MDZAD 'DUG PA DES KYANG SKABS DE'I GNAS TSUL

GSAL PO SHES THUB KYI 'DUG ,DER BLA MA ZHVA DMAR BA'I BZA' ZLA BU MO LAGS SOGS GA-YOG RIGS

RNAMS RGYA DMAG GI GDONG BCUG RGYA YUL DU BRDZANGS, BKRAS BLA'I SKU CHAS SNGON 'BYOR LAS LHAG

'PHROS DA DUNG KHYON CHE YOD PA CHE RTAGS LTA BU BYAS TE 'PHROS 'OR 'DREN MA DGOS PA BSTER ZHING, CHIN

KHRA'I P'A CUNG DANG, KHRIN THA'I THU SOGS MAN JU'I DPON RIGS SNGON MA RNAMS KYIS BAL BOD SKYID GRONG GI

CHINGS YIG DANG, CHINGS DNGUL SLOG RGYU RNAMS BKA' BLON RDO RING NAS RANG MTSAMS BYAS TSUL BRDZUN

BSHAD LA BRTEN BKA' BLON DGA' GA-YU GNYIS KYANG DBANG MED DU BYANG BRGYUD PI CING DU BTANG BA RIM

PAS BDEN PA MTHA' GSAL GYIS CHIN KHRAL P'A CUNG RANG GNONG MA BZOD PAR RANG SROG RANG BCAD

BYAS PA DANG, KHRIN THA'I THU KHRIMS THOG NAS BSAD, ZHABS PAD GA-YU THOG PI CING DU 'BRUM PAS

NAD 'DAS DANG, RDO RING BSTAN 'DZIN DPAL 'BYOR ^ RGYAL KHAB TU PHYIR PHEBS KYIS BKA' ZUR

GNANG STE BZHUGS SO,,

CHU BYI 1792 LO MJUG ,PHU ZI KRUNG THANG DANG, ZHABS PAD BSHAD HOR

BCAS LHA LDAN RGYAL KHAB TU 'BYOR, RGYA MIS BOD LA DMAG ROGS BYAS TE GOR shA MTHAR SKROD BTANG

TSUL DANG, DE LA BRTEN NAS PHU ZI KRUNG THANG RANG GI BYAS RJES CHEN PO BCU THAM PA YONGS SU BSGRUBS

TSUL RNAMS MAN JU DANG, RGYA'I YI GER BRKOS PA'I RDO LEB PO T'A LA'I ZHOL RDO RING PHYI MA'I NYE 'GRAM

KHANG SER NANG BTZUGS PA GSHAMS GSAL,

BYAS RJES THENGS BCU THAM PA BYUNG BA'I SKOR LA BZHENGS PA'I DRAN RTEN, GOR shAS

NGA TSOR MGO BSKUR ZHING, ^ GONG MA'I DMAG MI 'THEN, BYAS RJES CHEN PO BCU PA 'DIS MTHAR PHYIN

PA BSGRUBS PA YI GE 'DI'I NANG BRIS YOD, SKAD GRAGS CAN GYI BYAS RJES YON NA'I TSANG MAS GSAL

@652 PO SHES KYI YOG MA RED, 'DI 'DRA SONG TZANG, TSANG MAS SHES SHING, DRAN PA'I CHED DANG, RJES

SU MI RNAMS KYIS LEGS NYES DBYE BA 'BYED THUB PA BCAS KYI CHED DU DRAN RTEN GYI RDO LEB 'DI BTZUGS

NAS KHYAB BSGRAGS BYAS PA 'DI LA RGYAL POS GSUNGS RGYAL POS GSUNGS PA ZHES PA 'DI PHU ZI KRUNG THANG (PHU'U KANG RNGAN) NI ^ GONG MA CHAN LUNG GI SPUN NYE'I GRAS YIN PA DANG, LA'I KUNG

(LIANG-KUANG) ZHES PA'I YUL GYI RGYAL TSAB BYED MUS STABS RGYAL PO ZHES BRIS PA 'DRA, PA ZHES BRIS YOD,

THOG MAR NGA'I BSAM BLOR YU GUR SHIN CANG, GYI BRIS STANGS LA CHA BZHAG NAS BRIS

DGOS BSAM BLOR 'KHOR YANG, 'DI NI CE'I YU GUR GYIS BRIS STANGS LTAR, GUS ZHABS DANG,

SEMS GSO BYED MKHAN GYI AAM BAN DANG, TSANG MA BYED THUB MKHAN GYI LUNG PA'I BDAG POS BYAS PA

BRIS 'DUG LU'U, AA'U'I DEB KYI NANG LA, SEMS GNAS STANGS YAG PO YOD PA'I SKABS

LA; SEMS DANG BYA BA GNYIS MNYAM SBREL BYAS TE LAS KA BYED KYI YOG RED CES BRIS SHAG

DE 'DRA BSAM BLO BTANG NAS LAS KA BYED MKHAN 'DI LA, GNAM GYI LHAS MAN JU'I ^ GONG MA, GZIGS BZOS DANG, BDAG

RGYAN GNANG GI RED, BYAS TZANG NGAS 'GRO LAM BZANG PO 'DI'I SGANG LA PHYIN TE NGAR DMAG BCU THAM

PA YAG PO BYAS RGYAL KHA TSANG MA THOB BYUNG, 'DI TSO DRAN RTEN GYI RDO LEB 'DI'I SGANG LA BRKOS NA

LUGS SROL DANG MTHUN GYI 'DUG ,BYAS RJES BCU GSHAM GSAL, 'JUN SGAR LAS RGYAL KHA GNYIS,

HU'U AA'I SI LAS RGYAL KHA GCIG ,TSA LA DANG, CU CHEN LAS RGYAL KHA GNYIS, THA'I DBANG LAS

RGYAL KHA GCIG ,MIS HAN TAN DANG, AAN THAN LAS RGYAL KHA GNYIS, DA LTA NGAS GOR shA MNYAM DU

DMAG THENGS GNYIS RGYAB STE RGYAL KHA THOB PA DANG, KHO TSO RTZA MED STOR TZANG, KHO TSOS NGAR MGO

BSGUR ZHU 'BUL BYAS PA RED, 'DIS BYAS RJES BCU ZER BA TSANG GI YOD PA RED, RGYA NAG NANG

@653 RGYAL KHA GSUM THOB PA GAL CHUNG GI RED,

DA SA MO BYA'I LO LA GOR shAS MGO BSGUR BA'I SKOR LA, KHO TSOS DBUS DANG

GTZANG GI NANG LA DMAG 'KHRID DE BCOM 'PHROG BYED PAR YONG DUS, A'A 'U HU'I RDO RING GI YIG CHAR KHRIN THA'I THU ZER BA DE RED, NAS ZHED SNANG BYAS TE

DMAG LA MA PHYIN PA DANG, P'A CUNG RDO RING YIG CHAR, CHIN KHRA'I P'A RD'A RIN ZER, GIS DE TSO'I SKOR LA ZHIB 'JUG YAG PO MA BYAS PAR MGYOGS PO

SGRIGS THABS BYAS PA SONG TZANG GOR shAS ZHED SNANG MA BYAS PA RED,

YANG BSKYAR SNGA LO KHO TSO BSKYAR 'BYOR GYIS BCOM 'PHROG BYAS PA BLON PO SDUG CHAG

GO SA PHAB NAS, SKAD GRAGS CAN GYI CANG CUN RDO RING YIG CHAR, KHRIN THU CANG CUN ZER, BTANG NAS, KHOS ZA CHAS DANG, DGOS DNGUL,

DMAG MKHO'I YO CHAS PHON CHE GRA 'GRIGS BYAS PA RED, PHU KANG PHU KRUNG THANG RANG LA ZER, GI MI TSOS NGA'I PHOGS DAN

GSOL RAS LA DGA' BSU CHEN PO BYAS TE ZHED SNANG DANG, DKA' NGAL LA MA 'DZEMS PA RED,

NA NING DGUN KHA SO LONG RGYAL RONG GI BOD DMAG, DANG, ZI KHRON NAS DMAG SNON TSO KHAG, TSO KHAG

BYAS TE MYUR MGYOGS ZI LING GI LAM BRGYUD RKUN GOR shA'I LUNG PA, RKUN BU'I LUNG PA'I NANG LA 'DI LO ZLA BA LNGA PA'I NANG 'BYOR

PA; LAM SENG DBUS DBUS LA GOR DMAG SLEBS MED KYANG RANG BZHIN KYIS BRIS PA ZHIG RED, DANG, GTANG GI LUNG PA TSUR BLANGS TE RKUN BU'I SA MTSAMS LA 'DZUL BA

RED, KHO TSOS RI MTHON PO DANG, 'GRO KHAG PO 'DI TSOR THANG LA PHYIN PA LTAR BGROD PA DANG, GTZANG

@654 PO DANG, RONG CHU RBA RLABS DRAG PO YOD PA 'DI TSOR RGYUGS CHU CHUNG CHUNG BRGAL BA LTA BU BYAS TE

KHO TSO RI'I RTZE NAS, RONG LA DED NAS SA CHA GNAD CHEN RNAMS BZUNGS, LAM GYI 'DZINGS 'GAG
