GOR BOD SDE GZAR GYI RJES LA MAN JU ^ GONG MAS BOD SDOD AAM BAN DBANG

CHA CHE RU GTONG RGYU'I SRID BYUS BYAS TE AAM BAN LA ZI KHRON TZUNG THU DANG 'DRA BA'I GO GNAS SPRAD THOG,

RNAM KUN ^ GONG SRID BKA' SHAG SOGS NAS ^ GONG MAR PHYAG BRIS 'DRA GNANG DGOS TSE THAD KAR

'GRO LAM YANG, SNGON LA AAM BAN NAS ZHIB 'JUG GIS DE NAS PI CING DU GTONG RGYU'I SROL GSER

BZOS PA DANG, GOR DMAG SNGA RJES LA KHAG BTAGS TE GZHIS RTZE DANG, DING RING RGYA DMAG BRGYA

SKOR RE 'DZUGS RGYU DANG, LO GSUM RE'I MTSAMS AAM BAN NGO MA SA GNAS DE TSOR BLTA BSKOR

LA 'GRO RGYU BCAS KYI SROL GSAR BZOS PA'I RKYEN GYIS GZHUNG ZHABS SER SKYA DANG, GDAN SA'I GRVA

RIGS, BOD LJONGS MI DMANGS SEMS RTZA RAB TU 'KHRUGS TE ZUR TSOGS KYIS, DE SNGON LHA ZHOL

DU SBYAR YIG DANG, PHU ZI KRUNG THANG LA ZHU THO BCAS PHUL YANG BDAG SPROD MA BYAS KHAR, DA DUNG

MU GE'I THOG TU ZLA LHAG GI DPE BZHIN SNGAR MED AAM BAN LA GO GNAS SPAR BA, GZHIS RTZE DANG,

DING RIR RGYA DMAG BZHAG PA BCAS GOR BOD SDE GZAR SNGA PHYIR GOR shAS STOR BCOM BYAS PA LAS

@664 LHAG PA'I DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM NANG RGYA MI'I DPON DMAG GIS BCOM 'PHROG BYAS TSUL, GZHUNG

ZHABS MTHO RIM 'GA' SHAS NAS MAN JU'I AAM BAN DANG NGAN MTHUN DPAL LAS BYAS TE RANG GI PHA

GZHIS SDE DPON DGA' BZHI BAS BKA' BLON BSTAN 'DZIN DPAL 'BYOR DGRA LAG NAS THON PA'I SBA YER RAM,

THUGS RJE CHE ZHU YIN TSUL YAR KLUNG MTHONG SMON CHU 'KHOR, RGYAL RTZE KHUL PHO LHA GZHIS, GONG DKAR

KHUL DPAL GLING GZHIS DANG THO DKAR GZHIS, BRAG ZUR GZHIS BCAS RGYA MI'I DMAG PHOGS THOG

PHUL BA LA ZER BA YIN TSOD 'DUG, MANG PO RGYA MI'I DMAG PHOGS SU PHUL KHUL MI SER GYI KHRAL RTEN SA KHANG KHYON CHE NGO GZHIS

SA SNON DU BRTZAN 'PHROG BYAS PA SOGS DA CHA BOD MI RNAMS CHAGS RTEN DANG BRAL GSHIS SNGAR BOD

RJE CHOS RGYAL DANG, RGYAL THOG RIM PA'I DUS BOD LJONGS BOD MI RANG NAS SKYONG BA LAS, SOG

PO DANG, MAN JUR BYUS 'KHRI MED PA RGYA BOD DEB GSAL LA BRTEN MAN JU DANG, RGYA MI'I ZHI DRAG

DPON RIGS LAS BYED GCIG KYANG MED PA 'PHRAL DU PHYIR 'THEN MA BYUNG MTHU MED YIN, ZHES ZI

KHRON CHIN THU HU'I LAS KHUNGS BRGYUD ^ GONG MA RANG LA SNYAN ZHU PHUL 'BYOR BYUNG 'DUG PAS MA TSAD,

LHA ZHOL LA'ANG SBYAR YIG DANG, BSKYUR YIG MANG PO THON PA DANG, DBUS GTZANG, CHAB BRAG,

RMAR KHAMS, 'BA' LI, CHA PHRENG BCAS KYI MI DMANGS NAS KYANG RGYA MIR MI 'DOD RNAM 'GYUR RJE CHER

BSTAN TE LAM 'KHEL RTA ZAM BCAD 'THEN DANG, AAM BAN DANG, SBA YER SOGS KYI 'GRUL

BZHUD LA GNOD SKYON YANG YANG BYUNG BAR BRTEN, ^ RGYAL TSAB RTA TSAG NO MI HAN NAS LHA ZHOL GNYER

MI DPON DANG, GDAN SA, RGYA KHYAB RDZONG GZHIS SNE SDOD BRGYUD MI DMANGS LA ZHI 'JAM LAS, RGYA

BOD MCHOD YON DBAR DKROG RKYEN ZING SLONG BYAS NA MI 'GRIGS PA'I SLOB GSO BYED DGOS BKOD RGYA

DANG, MAN JU ^ GONG MAR YANG MI DMANGS KYI BDE SDUG ZHU GSAL DNGOS 'BREL LA BRTEN DGONGS

BZHES GNANG DGOS PHYAG BRIS GNANG BA, MAN JU ^ GONG MA CHAN LUNG GSHEGS RJES GSAR PA

@665 C'A CHEN NAS (1796-1820) ZHIB GCOD DU RGYA DPON TSE'U ZOL MED GTAM GYI ROL MOR TSE'U ZHES GSAL YANG, THA'I SAN SLIS KYI DEB SHOG GRANGS 59 NANG TSE'U ZER BA DANG,

TSE PA NYIS ZER BA MI GCIG GI MING RED CES BRIS SHAG, DANG, LAS ROG SHAN ZHES PA BTANG

THOG ,AAM BAN GYI GO GNAS SNGAR RGYUN DANG, SKU SRUNG DGOS NGES LAS, DE BYINGS GZHIS TZE DANG, DING RIR RGYA DMAG

BTZUGS PA 'THEN TE BOD DMAG 'DZUGS RGYU DANG, BOD NANG YOD PA'I RGYA DMAG DANG LAS BYED

BRDAB GSIGS GTONG MI RNAMS 'PHRAL DU PHYIR 'THEN BYED DGOS BKA' PHAB 'DUG,

ZHIB GCOD DPON RIGS LHA SAR 'BYOR TE RGYA MI'I LAS BYED DANG, DMAG

MI BRDAB GSIGS STOR BCOMS BYED MI MANG PO NGO 'PHROD KYIS ZHI DRAG DPON PO MANG PO DANG, AAM

BAN GYI SKU SRUNG DMAG GA-YUNG ZHES PA NYIS BRGYA LNGA BCU THAM PA MA GTOGS DE BYINGS TSANG MA PHYIR

SLOG BYAS SHING, BOD GZHUNG NAS KYANG GZHIS RTZE DANG, DING RIR RGYA DMAG 'THEN TSAB SA SRUNG DU

BOD DMAG GSAR 'DZUGS GNNAG ZHING, ZHU THO PHUL SKOR, SA BRKOS RDO LANGS RGYA CHER 'GRO MA

DGOS PAR MI DMANGS KYI ZHU THO 'BUL MI BYED GTZO YIN KHUL STOD LUNG CHU BZANG DGON GYI MKHAN

ZUR DGA' BZHI BSTAN 'DZIN DPAL 'BYOR BZHUGS YUL SPRO KHANG NAS AAM BAN DANG 'BREL BA

BYAS TE BOD MI DMANGS KYI SNGA RJES GSANG GROS BYAS PA'I GNAS TSUL NANG GTAM PHYI SKYEL BYAS PA'I

SA'I SLOB DPON LAS ZUR, GZHUNG ZHABS SER SKYA SPYI MGRIN THOG NAS, DE MO AER TI NI NO MI

HAN THUB BSTAN 'JIGS MED RGYAL TSAB KYI KHRIR BSKO GZHAG ZHUS PA LTAR LCAGS LUG 1811 ZLA 4

TSES 11 NYIN THUGS 'GAN BZHES, PHRAN GYIS SNGON BRTZAMS BOD KYI SRID DON ZHES PA'I DBYIN

YIG GI DEB NANG RGYAL TSAB DE SKABS RE THUGS 'TSO MA ZIN PA'I SMYO SPYOD PHRAN BU GNANG GI YOD TSUL

ZHIG BRIS YOD PA DE NI NOR 'PHRUL BYUNG 'DUG ,DE MO SMYON PA ZHU BA DE NI RAB BYUNG 14 SHING BYA 1825

MAN JU ^ GONG MA'I SRID KYI SHUGS DE ZLA BA MAR NGO BZHIN CHUNG RU 'GRO BA'I

@674 BOD KYI DGON PA CHE KHAG TSANG MA'I NANG RGYA MI'I GRVA PA MANG PO BTANG STE PHYI RGYAL MI RIGS BOD NANG

YONG NA NANG PA'I CHOS LA SKYON BYED TSUL GYI RGYUD BSKUL KHYAB BSGRAG ZHE DRAG BYAS SPYI LO 1811 NANG THO MA SE MAN NING (THOMAS MANNING) GIS CHAS RDZUS SPRAS TE LHA SAR 'BYOR NAS

T'A LA'I BLA MA DGU PA DANG MJAL ZHING, KHONG GIS LHA SAR YOD PA'I RGYA MI'I AAM BAN DE TSO MI SPUS ZHAN CING, 'BYOR STANGS GANG YANG

MED PA ZHE CIG RED CES BRIS YOD PA DANG, RI CAR SAN SHOG GRANGS 72, PA DANG RGYUD

BSKUL DE DAG LA BRTEN NAS GDAN SA GSUM GYIS BOD NANG PHYI RGYAL MI RIGS 'GRUL BZHUD BYED

MI BKAG 'GOG GNANG DGOS YANG YANG ZHUS RKYEN GZHUNG GNAS NAS KYANG RGYA KHYAB SA MTSAMS TSANG

MAR DRIL BSGRAGS BKA' RGYA YANG GNANG YOD PA RED, 'DIS BOD MI'I BSAM BLO'I NANG LA

BSGUL BSKYOD CHEN PO ZHIG THEBS YOD PA PHA MA TSOS BU PHRUG LA RGYA GAR NAS THON PA'I KHRUS RDZAS

BED SPYOD BYED PA DANG, MNGAR CHA BYE RIL BZOS NA PHYI RGYAL GYI LTA BA 'JAGS TE CHOS LA

SKYON BYED TSUL SHOD SROL ZHIG KYANG BYUNG BA RED, MTHA' MA LO BRGYA RTZAM GYI RJES LA RGYA GAR GZHUNG

'DZIN DBYIN JI SKYANG SRID DON GZHAN ZHIG GIS PHYOGS NAS GONG GI SKABS DE BZUNG NAS, BOD

PAS DA LTA BZHIN PHYI'I RGYAL KHAB SU GANG DANG 'BREL BA MA BYAS PA'I SROL BZANG DES BOD LA SKYID

PO DANG, BDE BA, CHOS LA NYAMS CHAGS MED PA 'DI BYUNG BA RED, DE MIN PHYI RGYAL GZHAN LA ZHI

BDE RTZA BA NAS MED PA'I DPE BCAS BSTAN TE RGYA DBYIN GNYIS KAS BOD MI RNAMS 'DZAM GLING NAS

GCIG PUR YA BRAL DANG RJES LUS SU 'JOG RGYU'I SRID BYUNG NGAN PA DE DAG RIM BZHIN BYAS PA RED,

'DZAM GLING RGYAL KHAB GZHAN DANG 'BREL BA MED TZANG BOD 'DI RGYAL KHAB GZHAN

DAG LTA BU'I DENG DUS DANG MTHUN PA'I TSAN RIG DANG, DPAL 'BYOR, DRAG SHUGS BCAS KYI

YAR RGYAS RTZA BA NAS MA BYUNG BA MA ZAD, RGYAL KHAB GZHAN PA TSOS KYANG BOD KYI SRID DON GYI GNAS

STANGS SKOR DBYIN JI DANG, RGYA MIS GANG BSHAD LA CHA 'DZIN BYED RGYU LAS, DNGOS GNAS GANG

@675 YANG SHES KYI MED PA RED, RGYA MI DANG DBYIN JIS GANG BSHAD PA DE TSOR BOD PHYOGS NAS DGAG PA

YANG BYED MKHAN YOD PA MA RED, GANG YIN ZER NA KHONG TSOS GA RE SHOD KYI YOD PA BOD MI TSOS SHES

KYI MED PA RED, DENG SKABS BOD MI TSO DBANG MED KYIS PHYI LA THON DGOS BYUNG TZANG, BAR DER RGYA

MIS BOD NANG DBANG CHA MA YOD YOD TSUL RDZUN BSHAD KYI DEB DANG, SA KHRA MANG PO BZOD YOD PA

RNAMS RE RE BZHIN HA GO GI YOD PAS MA TSAD, DA CHA BOD 'DI 'DZAM GLING RGYAL KHAB GZHAN PA'I

RJES LA JI TZAM LUS PA GSAL POR RTOGS SHING, DA DUNG YANG BOD MI LO RGAN PA MANG POS ZLA

BA'I DKYIL 'KHOR NANG MI'I RGYU 'GRUL BYED PA YID CHES BYED KYI YOG MA RED,

LCAGS LUG 1811 LOR, 'BA' DANG, LI THANG, LCAGS LA, HOR

SER KHAG LNGA BCAS PAR SA MI ZHIB GCOD DU ZHABS PAD KHRI SMON PA DANG, LAS BYA RU DPON NGA PHOD

PA; ZHOL GNYER RGYA MTSO BA, BKA' MGRON ZHVA SGAB PA SOGS BSKO BRDZONG GNANG BA LTAR SA GNAS

SU SDOG BSKOR DANG 'BREL BAS ZHIB GZHUNG GTAN 'BEBS GNANG, CHU SPRE 1812 ZLA 8 TSES 22 NYIN

@682 BSGRIGS SGER GYI YIG CHA PHYOGS BSDEBS, GNANG, LCAGS YOS 1831 DANG CHU 'BRUG 1832 GNYIS SU MTSO SNGON PHYOGS JU NANG DZA SAG SHOG NAS, PHYI 'BROG SBRA NAG PAR DGRA RGYAG TSOD MED BYUNG BAR BRTEN ZHIB GCOD DU SKU BCAR

MKHAN CHE BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN NGO LAS THOG DGOS PA BYUNG TSE DPUNG ROGS SU TSA DAM SBU YAN DZA SAG

SHOG KHONGS NAS DMAG GTONG DGOS BKA' RGYA STZAL BA LTAR SA GNAS THOG BSKYOD 'PHROD PA BYAS PAR

JU NANG DZA SAG CAN NAS BKA' BRTZI KHRIMS 'KHUR MED PAS, DA DUNG DPUNG SHED BYAS PAR BRTEN DIM

CHI NYER LNGA DANG, RAG SHUL, YUL SHUL PHYOGS NAS RGYAB DPUNG DGOS RIGS DANG, 'GO 'DZIN

MDA' DPON GSAR BYUNG BA DANG, RU DPON RAM PA BA DBUS DMAG BCAS SNGON RDZONG DANG, RGYAB DPUNG DU

SDE DGE KHUL NAS YUL DMAG BCAS BSKUL BA'I DMAG DON SPYI KHYAB TU ZHABS PAD THON PA BA DANG,

LAS BYAR RTZIS DPON SPO SHOD PA, PHOGS DPON RGYA MTSO BA, BKA' DRUNG GSAR BYUNG BA, RTZE MGRON

BKRA GSHONGS THOGS MED CHOS 'BYOR BCAS GTONG GNANG GIS ZHABS PAD NAG CHUR PHEBS NYIN

MTSO SNGON JU NANG PAS MGO BSGUR TSUL MTHUN ZHUS LUGS RTA SHAD 'BYOR RKYEN DPON DMAG RNAMS

PHYIR LOG GNANG, ZHIB GCOD PA'I GDONG JU NANG DZA SAG NGO MA DANG, SRAS, 'GO 'KHRID GZHAN 'GA' SHAS

BCAS RGYAL KHAB TU PHYAG 'BUL SKYABS ZHUR 'BYOR, YIG CHA PHYOGS BSDUS,

DE NAS LO GNYIS KYI RJES SU SPO BO KA: GNAM SDE PAS GZHUNG SA'I LO DUS KYI

BCA' KHRAL DUS THOG MA PHUL KHAR, BKOD RGYA GNANG BAR YANG GO BA RNAR GZON DANG, SA BTZAN PHRAG

'KHUR BYAS GSHIS, ZHABS PAD BSHAD SGRA DON GRUB RDO RJE DPUNG DMAG BCAS SPO KHUL ZHIB GCOD DU

PHEBS TE ZHI DRAG GNYIS KYI SGO NAS KHYAB 'DOMS GNANG BA KA: GNAM SDE PA CAN DPON SDE TSANG MAS SNGA

'GYOD PHYIS 'DOMS KYIS GZHUNG SA'I BKA' BRTZI DANG LEN ZHU RGYU'I DAM BCA' GTZANG MAR PHUL 'DUG

KYANG, SLAR YANG ME BYA 1837 LOR GONG GI BLOS BLANGS MTHA' TSIG LA MI GNAS PA'I NGAN BSHED

@683 BYAS PAR DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM NAS DMAG BSKUL GYIS DPUNG RGYAB TU ZHABS PAD PHA LHA BA

PHEBS TE BYED GTE MTHAR SKROD THOG, SLAD TSUL MTHUN ZHU GAN BLANGS TE 'KHRUN GCOD RNAM THAR NOR BU'I 'PHRENG BA 300-NA-2 GNANG,

LHA SA KHUL RDO RJE 'TSER MA'I YAMS NAD BYUNG RKYEN CHU SBRUL 1833 SHING RTA 1834

LO 'KHOR GNYIS RING RTE PHO BRANG DU PHI 'GRUL MTSAMS GCOD MDZAD DE RGYUN GYI DRUNG BZHES DANG, 'CHAR

'PHAR MDZAD SGO TSANG MA GZHUNG SGO PHUN TSOGS 'DU LAM DU NA BZA' GDAN ZHUS KYIS GNANG YANG, ^ GONG

SA MCHOG BSNYEN RDZOGS BZHES RGYU GAL CHER BRTEN KUN GZIGS PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE RGYAL KHAB TU GDAN

ZHUS KYIS NOR BU GLING KHAR BDUN PHRAG KHA SHAS BAG GSENG MDZAD DE BZHUGS RJES RTZE PHO BRANG DU PHEBS

NAS 'KHRUNGS RAB LHA KHANG DU BSNYEN RDZOGS SDOM BZHES GNANG BA DANG, DE BZHIN KHAL KHA RJE BTZUN

DAM PA DANG, THOR RGOD RGYAL PO RNAMS ZLA BA MANG PO'I LAM NAS CHED MNGAGS MJAL PHYAG TU PHEBS

GSHIS RDZONG RGYAB KLU KHANG DU BDUN PHRAG GSUM RE BAG GSENG MDZAD RJES RTZER GZIM CHUNG DU DMIGS

BSAL MJAL KHA DANG, CHOS 'BREL GNANG BA MA ZAD, THOR RGOD RGYAL PO'I ZHU MOS LTAR, THOR RGOD YUL

DU DUS 'KHOR SGRUB MCHOD GSAR 'DZUGS BYED PAR GRVA TSANG GRVA RIGS NGAG DBANG DON GRUB DANG, SMAN

SLOB LCAGS RI SMAN PA 'JAM DBYANGS SKAL BZANG BCAS LA BYED SGO'I BKA' SLOB DANG, DAD RTEN

GNANG SKYES BCAS GNANG STE CHED BRDZONG MDZAD,

^ SKYABS MGON ^ RGYAL DBANG MCHOG RGYUN DU SKU GZUGS GCONG KHAR, BAR

SKABS MTSO SNGON, KHAMS PHYOGS, SPO BO'I PHYOGS BCAS PAR SDE GZAR SNGA PHYIR DPON DMAG MANG PO

'GRUL BZHUD BYED DGOS BYUNG BAS GZHUNG GRON DANG MI SER LA BRDAB GSIGS CHE BA DANG, LHAG PAR

GZHUNG GI ZHABS 'BRIN RNAMS NAS KYANG ZHABS 'DEGS DGONGS MTHUN RANG ZHIG ZHU GI AE YOD SNYAM,

RNAM THAR NANG, BSTAN NGO MTSAR NOR BU'I 'PHRENG BA 318-BA-1, PA YUN DU GNAS PA DANG, 'GRO BA RNAMS BDE BA DANG, SKYID PA'I DPAL LA SPYOD

@684 PA ZHIG DANG, DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG PA'I CHAB SRID KYI LEGS TSOGS RNAMS GONG DU 'PHEL BA ZHIG BYUNG

NA DGONGS PA'I THUGS BSKYED DANG, MDZAD PA RTZAL DU BTON PA MDZAD NA'ANG, SNYIGS MA'I RANG

MDANGS 'GOG PAR MI NUS PAS, SER SKYA PHAL MO CHE MTHA' DAG MI DGE BA'I LAM LA NGAM NGAM SHUGS

KYIS 'JUG CING, DANG DU LEN PA DANG, DGE BA'I BYA BA RNAMS RTZA LTAR DOR BA SOGS BLANGS DOR GO LOG SHA

STAG TU SPYOD CING, RGYU DE LTAR BSAGS PA LAS 'BRAS BU MI 'DOD PA PHYOGS THAMS CAD NAS GCIG RJES GNYIS

'THUD KYI TSUL DU SPUNGS PA LTAR BYUNG STE BDE SKYID NAM LANGS KYI SKAR MA BZHIN JI NYUNG JE YAL DU 'GRO BA

DANG, DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG BA'I BSTAN SRID KYI LEGS TSOGS RNAMS LTAG CHU CHAD PA'I RDZING LTAR JE DMA' JE

DMAR GYUR PA SOGS KYIS THUGS YID NGES PAR 'BYUNG BA NI 'OG TU RIM PAS BRJOD 'GYUR RNAMS KYIS

SHES PAR 'GYUR LA, RGYU MTSAN DE DAG LA BRTEN NAS RING MIN SKU TSE MTHA' MA'I MDZAD PA STON PAR BZHED

DO ZHES GSUNGS 'DUG PA DANG, 'OG TU ZUR TZAM GSAL BA 'DI NI 'DI LTAR, ME BYA 1837 ZLA BA BDUN

PA SNGON MA'I TSES 20 NAS SKU KHAMS CUNG ZAD MI BDE BA'I TSUL BZHES SHING, DNGOS SU SNYUN ZUG CHER

MED KYANG, GSOL ZAS GSOL 'DOD MED PA DANG, ZHABS CHAGS GNANG BA'I TSEG ZHAL DBUGS CUNG ZAD

'TSANG NYAMS BYUNG STABS DE 'PHRAL BLA SMAN RNAMS NAS PHYAG RTZA ZHUS TE GSOL SMAN PHUL YANG DVANGS BSKYED

MA BZHES SHING, GZHUNG GNAS NAS KYANG BLA LHAR BRTAG LUNG ZHUS TE ZHABS RIM RGYA CHE SMIN SGRUB DANG, BLA

SMAN MKHAN PO 'BRUG GRAGS SOGS SNGON YOD THOG, GZHUNG GI SMAN SBYIN PA DANG BSTAN GLING AEM CHI DPAL

RGAL, GA-YU THOG AEM CHI SOGS 'DEMS SGRUG GIS PHYAG RTZA DANG, SKU CHAB LA ZHIB 'JUG GO BSDUR THOG

GSOL SMAN PHUL, SLAR YANG GZHUNG GNAS NAS ZHABS BRTAN RGYA CHE GNANG RGYU YIN LUGS DANG, SKU TSE ZHABS

PAD BRTAN DGOS TSUL SKU BCAR RNAMS NAS GSOL 'DEBS GNANG BAR, BKA' LAN NGO MTSAR NOR BU'I 'PHRENG BA 320-BA-5 LAN DU, ZHABS BRTAN

RGYA CHE SGRUB KYANG, RNAM DKAR YIN 'DUG PAS RGYU SONG GI 'BRAS BU YONG RUNG, ZHABS BRTAN GA-YOR SGRUB

@685 ZER BA RGYU LA DPAG PA'I LHA BZHENGS ZER BA'I DPE LTAR YIN, SNGA SOR NGOS NAS RNAM SRAS GAN

MDZOD DU LCAGS STAG ZHIB DNGUL DANG 'BREL BA'I DNGUL 'BOR PHON TSUGS TZAM ZHIG BYUNG NA SNYAM PAS LO SNGA

PHYIR HAL HA DANG, THOR RGOD SBYIN BDAG RNAMS NAS 'BUL DNGUL GA-YOR CHE BYUNG BA TSANG MA RNAM GAN DU BCUG

NAS RE ZHIG BDE SPYOD MI DGOS PA'I RTZIS BYAS PA YIN KYANG, SPO BOR DMAG GI ZING CHA DE DANG, NGOS GZUGS

GZHI MI BDE BA'I SKU RIM BCAS LA PHAL CHER DAG SONG, 'DIS MTSON GZHUNG GI BSTAN SRID LAR RGYA DANG,

BOD KHAMS SBYI'I BDE THABS SOGS LA PHAN PA GANG CHI ZHIG BYUNG NA SNYAM RUNG, YAR SKYED MI 'DUG PAS GANG

BYAS KYANG BYAS PA RJES MED CIG RANG YIN PA 'DRA ZHES PHEBS PA, DE DAG GI SKABS SU RGYAL BLON, SKU BCAR

TSANG MAS LHA DGONG DVANG SPA'I GSOL 'DEBS JI LTAR ZHUS KYANG, BZHAD MO DANG BCAS DE RANG RED

GSUNGS PA TZAM LAS ZHAL BZHES MA GNANG BA BCAS, DGUNG GRANGS 22 PHEBS PA ME BYA ZLA 9 TSES 1 NYIN

GZIM CHUNG PHUN TSOGS 'DOD 'KHYIL DU KHRI'U SHIN GI KHAR BYAMS PA'I BZHUGS STANGS KYIS BZHUGS TE, BZHAD MO'I

RNAM PA BCAS MDZAD BZHIN PA'I NGANG MDZAD PA'I MTHA' MA MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS PA'I TSUL BSTAN NGO MTSAR NOR BU'I 'PHRENG BA 327-BA-5 NO,,

DE 'PHRAL SRID SKYONG YONGS 'DZIN RIN PO CHE DANG, BKA' SHAG, SKU BCAR SPYI MKHAN

BCAS LHAN RGYAS THOG, SKU 'PHRENG RIM PA'I MDZAD RNAM LTAR THUGS DGONGS ZAB MO YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I MCHOD

SPRIN RGYA CHE SPRO 'BUL DANG, YANG SRID RIN PO CHE MYUR DU BYON PA'I BDEN TSIG SMON LAM 'GREMS SPEL, GSER

GDUNG RIN PO CHE GSAR BZHENGS ZHU RGYU'I DO DAM NGO LAS SOGS BSKO GZHAG MDZAD DE RING POR MA SONG BAR LAS

GRVA KHAG TSUGS SHING, RGYA NAG DANG, BAL YUL, 'BRUG YUL SOGS NYE 'BREL RGYAL KHAB KHAG NAS DGONGS RDZOGS

MCHOD 'BUL ZHU MI'I SKU TSAB KHAG KYANG RIM 'BYOR BYUNG 'DUG PA BCAS GLEGS BAM DANG PO RE ZHIG

RDZOGS SO,, ,,
